Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_attribute_bonus_Des: 每點技能點數提升所有屬性
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_attribute_: Improves all attributes per point spent
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_fountain_glyph_Desc: 賦予所有己方建築為期 6 秒的無敵狀態。冷卻時間會隨己方一塔被毀而刷新。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_fountain_g: Grant your structures and lane creeps invincibility for 6 seconds. Refreshed if a first-tier tower falls.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_fountain_buyback_De: 花費金錢讓您的英雄立即復活。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_fountain_b: Respawns your hero immediately, for a price.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_courier_shield_Desc: 在信使周圍召喚一面守護護盾
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_courier_sh: Summons a protective shield around the courier
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_courier_burst_Descr: 讓信使的速度在 %duration% 間獲得大幅提升
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_courier_bu: The courier gains a burst of speed for %duration% seconds
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necronomicon_warrio: 每次攻擊燃燒目標的魔力，並依燒去魔力的一定比例造成額外傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necronomic: Mana burned per hit, a portion of which is dealt as damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necronomicon_warrio: 對擊殺死靈戰士的單位造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necronomic: Deals damage to the unit that kills the Necronomicon Warrior.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necronomicon_archer: 向目標發射箭矢燃燒其魔力，同時造成與燒去魔力值等量的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necronomic: Launches an arrow that burns away the targeted unit's mana, dealing damage equal to the amount of mana burned.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necronomicon_archer: 提升周圍單位的移動速度和攻擊速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necronomic: Increases movement and attack speed of nearby units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_mana_break: 令自身普攻會燃燒目標的魔力，並造成相當於燃燒掉的魔力 %percent_damage_per_burn%%% 的額外傷害
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_m: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack.  Mana Break deals %percent_damage_per_burn%%% of the mana burned as damage to the target. Mana Break has %illusion_percentage%%% effect if caused by illusions.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_mana_break: 一種星隱寺僧侶們非暴力的改良式戰鬥技巧，用施法者的魔法能量傷害他們自己。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_m: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_blink_Desc: 短距離的瞬間移動讓敵法僧在戰場上來去自如。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_b: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_blink_Lore: 在面臨死亡軍團時，敵法僧了解到讓敵人捉摸不定相當重要。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_b: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_spell_shie: 提升敵法僧的魔法傷害抗性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_s: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_spell_shie: 多年的冥想以及對復仇的執著使敵法僧抵擋法力的身軀日益堅強。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_s: Years of meditation and obsession with revenge have hardened Anti-Mage's skin against mystical opponents.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_mana_void_: 對目標造成短暫暈眩，同時依據目標單位損失了多少點魔力對目標及周圍敵人造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_m: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_mana_void_: 擊敗敵人使他們屈膝臣服後，敵法僧給予他們懲罰作為使用奧術的代價。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_m: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_shadow_: 猛力投擲一把淬毒匕首造成初始傷害，然後再接著造成後續傷害。中毒的單位移動速度會降低 %abilityduration% 秒並在期間每隔 %damage_interval% 秒受到一次後續傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpai: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for %abilityduration% seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every %damage_interval% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_shadow_: 阿卡莎的有毒匕首讓她持續從受害者的痛苦中取得愉悅。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpai: Akasha's envenomed dagger allows her to delight in the drawn out suffering of her victims.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_blink_D: 短距離的瞬間移動讓痛苦女王在戰場上來去自如。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpai: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_blink_L: 女王得名的秘密，是因為你無法從她的痛苦中逃脫。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpai: The Secret Queen lives up to her title, making her pain impossible to escape.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_scream_: 痛苦女王發出銳利的刺耳尖叫，對周圍敵人造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpai: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_scream_: 阿卡莎用魅惑的聲音引誘她的對手，竊取受害者的靈魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpai: The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_sonic_w: 痛苦女王在她面前製造出巨大的音波，對所有波及到的敵方單位造成重大傷害和擊退效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpai: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_sonic_w: 阿卡莎的音波能帶來最劇烈的痛苦，令她可憐的敵人得以從痛苦中解脫。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpai: Her most exquisite of all of torments, Akasha's Sonic Wave puts her poor foes out of their misery.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_dragon_slave_D: 莉娜的龍息釋放出一陣烈燄焚燒所有波及到的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_drago: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_dragon_slave_L: 在紛爭之國的貧瘠焦地，莉娜學會了掌控沙漠巨龍的烈焰龍息並且用以自娛娛人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_drago: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_light_strike_a: 召喚火焰之柱傷害並暈眩敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_light: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_light_strike_a: 莉娜的精隨讓她能集中太陽能量，隨心所欲地讓空氣燃燒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_light: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_fiery_soul_Des: 使莉娜能夠隨著施放技能獲得攻擊速度和移動速度加成。效果可自行疊加。持續 %fiery_soul_stack_duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_fiery: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts %fiery_soul_stack_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_fiery_soul_Lor: 舞動的火焰體現了莉娜愛玩的天性，展現她真實的炙熱自我。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_fiery: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_laguna_blade_D: 發出閃電雷擊一個敵方單位，造成大量傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_lagun: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_laguna_blade_L: 莉娜周圍的空氣變得極度灼熱，產生白熱的閃電灼燒距離不遠的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_lagun: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arrow_Descri: 以致命的精準度射出一支能飛行相當距離的箭矢，對第一個擊中的敵方單位造成傷害和暈眩效果。隨著的箭矢飛行距離越遠，暈眩時間將從最小值的 %arrow_min_stun% 秒逐漸提升至最大值的 %arrow_max_stun% 秒，且傷害也會隨距離附加最高到 %arrow_bonus_damage% 的額外傷害。月神之箭將會秒殺非遠古的非英雄單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arr: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from %arrow_min_stun% to %arrow_max_stun% seconds, with bonus damage up to %arrow_bonus_damage% added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arrow_Lore: 月之能量讓月之公主的箭矢變得更加致命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arr: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_invis_Descri: 讓蜜拉娜和所有友方英雄進入隱匿狀態，並於期間獲得移動速度加成。而只要月之陰影的持續時間尚未結束，藉由此效果隱匿的英雄在揭露出行蹤後仍可經由隱匿延遲時間後回復為隱匿狀態。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_inv: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_invis_Lore: 身為賽莉蒙娜的公主，蜜拉娜能將月蝕投影至大地，將她的隊友隱匿在月影之中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_inv: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_leap_Descrip: 蜜拉娜往前飛躍並兇猛地發出一聲的振奮咆哮，提升自己的攻擊速度和移動速度。速度加成持續 %leap_bonus_duration 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_lea: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts %leap_bonus_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_leap_Lore: 蜜拉娜標誌性的白色野獸即便夾雜在戰火之中也是人人都能認出。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_lea: None can fail to recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_starfall_Des: 召喚一陣流星雨傷害附近敵方單位。然後對蜜拉娜身邊 %starfall_secondary_radius% 範圍內距離最近的目標進行二次攻擊。二次攻擊的傷害為首次攻擊的 %secondary_starfall_damage_percent%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_sta: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a %starfall_secondary_radius% radius will be struck a second time for %secondary_starfall_damage_percent%%% of the damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_starfall_Lor: 月之女神擊碎了月岩地表讓她的公主在需要時能夠使用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_sta: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_rage_D: 進入狂暴狀態，在此狀態下獲得技能免疫，並提升移動速度。\n\n驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, and gaining increased movement speed.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_open_w: 噬魂鬼撕裂一個敵方單位，降低受害者的移動速度。所有友方單位對該目標造成傷害時都可以獲得傷害值一定百分比的生命恢復。包括技能在內的所有傷害皆可吸取生命。受害者會在持續時間內逐漸恢復移動速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_infest: 噬魂鬼寄宿在目標單位體內以躲避敵方察覺，在寄宿狀態下為對方提供生命加成，同時自己每秒恢復自身最大血量的一定百分比。寄宿無時間限制，寄宿者可隨時從宿主體內爆發出來，對周圍敵方單位造成傷害。如果宿主是敵方小兵或中立野怪，噬魂鬼將可操縱對方進行移動和攻擊。無法寄宿在敵方英雄身上。\n\n驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable, and healing for a portion of his max hitpoints every second while inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack. Does not work on enemy heroes.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_consum: 噬魂鬼從內部吞噬宿主，並從其體內爆出。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out, exploding from within.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_sprout_Descr: 在目標地點萌生一圈樹木，令其中敵人受困，並就地提供 %vision_range% 半徑的視野。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_spr: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place, and providing vision in a %vision_range% radius.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_sprout_Lore: 繁茂的樹木給那些試圖攻擊自然先知的人留下了難以抹滅的恐懼。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_spr: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_teleportatio: 傳送到地圖上任何位置。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_tel: Teleports to any point on the map.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_teleportatio: 先知保護著整片森林，當森林需要他的時候立刻​​出現。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_tel: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_force_of_nat: 將一片樹木轉化成自然先知麾下的樹精。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_for: Converts an area of trees into Treants under the command of Nature's Prophet.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_force_of_nat: 樹木之神維羅迪希雅賜予先知召喚樹精守衛的能力，這是神話中大自然的軍隊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_for: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_wrath_of_nat: 在目標地點一道產生傷害性能流，這道能流將迅速的在場上四處流竄去攻擊我方視野內的敵人，且傷害在每經過一次彈跳之後就會提升。能流將優先攻擊較靠近目標地點的目標。同時，此技能將隨著擊殺敵方單位提升自身的普攻傷害，傷害加成持續 %kill_damage_duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_wra: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage. Enemies that die under this spell grant you bonus damage for %kill_damage_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_wrath_of_nat: 自然先知召喚樹木之神維羅迪希雅的狂怒，擊倒那些想要毀壞自然的傢伙。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_wra: Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_focusfir: 風行者引領風向，帶著 %bonus_attack_speed% 攻擊速度加成以及普攻傷害降低懲罰朝敵方單位或建築射擊。傷害懲罰不影響藉由道具觸發的附加傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner: Windranger channels the wind to gain %bonus_attack_speed% additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_focusfir: 以放棄準確度為代價，萊瑞蕾像狂風般地向敵人發射出無數箭矢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_powersho: 風行者為射出一支強力箭矢將弓弦上的箭矢蓄力 %channel_time_tooltip% 秒。這支箭將對箭頭觸及的敵人造成傷害，且威力會隨著蓄力越少而越低，也會隨著每擊中一個敵方單位而損失 %damage_reduction%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner: Windranger charges her bow for up to %abilitychanneltime% second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by %damage_reduction%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_powersho: 在早期的訓練生涯，萊瑞蕾學會了如何射出足以在劈開樹木後仍直達目標的強力箭矢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_shackles: 將目標束縛在目標後方的一個敵方單位或樹上。若目標後方沒有其他敵方單位或樹木可供連體綑綁，則暈眩時間將減少至 %fail_stun_duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to %fail_stun_duration%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_shackles: 風行者的諸多弓技中，有一種用密集的繩索來束縛住敵人讓其難以逃脫的箭矢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_windrun_: 提升移動速度並迴避所有普攻，同時對自身周圍敵人造成移速減緩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_windrun_: 正如她的風行之名，萊瑞蕾用強風之力來閃避接踵而來的攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_impale_Descrip: 沿直線從地中穿出岩石尖刺。將敵方單位拋向空中，落地時受到傷害並暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_impal: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_impale_Lore: 惡魔巫師行使他的惡魔契約，打開一條來自地獄的裂縫。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_impal: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_voodoo_Descrip: 將一個敵方單位變成毫無傷害的動物，受害者無法使用所有特殊能力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_voodo: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_voodoo_Lore: 萊恩將他的變形術用在敵人身上，扭曲其生命本質。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_voodo: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_mana_drain_Des: 持續施法 - 從一個敵方單位吸取魔法能量，每秒恢復自己一定的魔力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_mana_: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_mana_drain_Lor: 對惡魔巫師來說那些比他弱小的法師只不過是恢復魔力的來源。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_mana_: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_finger_of_deat: 撕裂一個敵方單位，將他折磨地死去活來，並造成巨大傷害。死亡之指的傷害將隨著每擊殺英雄一次而提升。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_finge: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_finger_of_deat: 萊恩醜陋的手正是他最強大的力量來源，能夠用惡魔的力量讓受害者完全崩潰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_finge: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_magi: 向一個敵方單位射出魔法靈彈，暈眩並造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulsp: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_magi: 天怒一族的簡單戰鬥技巧，魔法靈彈是仙德爾主​​要的複仇工具。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulsp: A simple Skywrath technique, the magic missile is Shendel's primary tool for vengeance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_wave: 復仇之魂放出一道嚎叫波動，削弱敵人的護甲並打開波動行經的路徑視野。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulsp: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_wave: 仙德爾那揮之不去的聲音暗示著她的裁決將至。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulsp: Shendel's haunting voice hints at her approaching vindication.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_comm: 復仇之魂提升附近友方單位的遠程普攻距離和主要屬性。她也將在死亡後化身為一個可供她繼續操作的復仇幻象，直到幻象被摧毀或她重生為止。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulsp: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the ranged attack range and primary attribute of nearby friendly units. Spawns a Strong Illusion of Vengeful Spirit when she dies that lasts until it is killed or Vengeful Spirit revives.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_comm: 儘管其他人無法理解她對於復仇那無休止的強烈愛好，但戰鬥時他們還是會利用她的複仇狂熱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulsp: Although they may not share her undying passion for revenge, allies do draw on her fanaticism in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_neth: 與一位目標英雄瞬間交換位置，無論敵我。移形換位會打斷目標的持續施法。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulsp: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy.  Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_neth: 復仇有時需要一點犧牲作為小小的代價。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulsp: Martyrdom is a small price to pay for vengeance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_paraly: 拋出一個裝滿麻痺粉末而且會在敵人之間來回彈跳的木桶，暈眩並傷害所有擊中到的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doct: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_paraly: 巫醫回收倒下的友軍和敵人的屍骨，磨成粉末用作他的符咒和煉丹術的材料。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doct: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_voodoo: 巫醫匯聚他的魔法，持續消耗魔力去持續治療身旁的友方單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doct: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo restoration is active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_voodoo: 扎瓦克的藥酒不僅可以用來戲弄對手，用來治療小傷也不錯。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doct: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_maledi: 某種會讓敵人後悔招惹巫醫的巫毒魔法。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doct: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_death_: 持續施法 - 召喚出一定點守衛去猛烈地攻擊周遭敵方英雄。守衛最多可持續 %abilitychanneltime% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doct: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within it's attack range. Lasts a maximum of %abilitychanneltime% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_death_: 巫醫跳起他的傳統巫毒舞蹈，在生者的夢中作祟。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doct: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_split_earth: 撕裂敵人腳下的大地。造成傷害和短暫的暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_sp: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_split_earth: 拉席瑞克用他惡毒的意志扭曲大自然，撕裂大地摧毀那些擋他路的倒霉鬼。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_sp: Twisting nature to his vile will, the shifting earth consumes those unlucky enough to cross Leshrac's path.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_diabolic_ed: 拉席瑞克令他四周的空間中充滿爆發性的魔法能量，對敵方單位和建築造成物理傷害。有效範圍內的敵人越少，這些敵人受到的傷害就越大。可對防禦塔多造成 %tower_bonus%%% 的傷害。傷害過程將持續 %abilityduration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_di: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal physical damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.  Deals %tower_bonus%%% more damage to towers.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_diabolic_ed: 古老的能量從一個空間向另一個空間爆發，將觸碰到的一切化為灰燼。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_di: Chronoptic energy bursts from one plane to the other, evaporating anything it touches.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_lightning_s: 召喚一陣閃電風暴攻擊指定的目標敵方單位，然後風暴將接續劈打目標附近的敵方單位。被閃電劈中的敵人移動速度將降低。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_li: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_lightning_s: 刑受之靈用來擊倒敵人的閃電風暴展示了他對元素的精通。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_li: The Tormented Soul's mastery of the elements is evident in the massive storms that strike down armies before him.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_pulse_nova_: 開啟時，拉席瑞克以每秒一次的速率在他周圍創造破壞性的能量波去對敵方單位造成傷害，同時每秒消耗魔力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_pu: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units. Drains Leshrac's mana with each pulse.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_pulse_nova_: 必要時，刑受之靈能操縱時空本身，毀滅弱小的存在。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_pu: If necessary, the Tormented Soul can manipulate space time itself, ravaging lesser beings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_blade_fu: 舞起具有破壞性力量的旋風斬，使自己於旋風斬期間持續傷害附近的敵人並呈現技能免疫狀態。\n\n驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. \n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_blade_fu: 無論是戰士還是法師，都害怕尤涅若的武士刀劍技。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_healing_: 召喚一個治療守衛，對鄰近友方單位進行基於各自最大生命值的治療。治療守衛在召喚之後可以 %healing_ward_movespeed_tooltip% 的速度進行移動。持續 %abilityduration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at %healing_ward_movespeed_tooltip% movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_healing_: 這是劍聖在遮面之島學到的一項慣用技巧，戰鬥證明會使用一點巫毒魔法治療傷口是很有效的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_blade_da: 劍聖的普攻有一定機率造成暴擊傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_blade_da: 作為他對劍技傳承的最後承諾，尤涅若立誓將使此劍技為世人所銘記。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_omni_sla: 劍聖揮劍躍向一名敵人，帶著傷害加成和攻速加成進行一陣猛砍。劍聖在施展超究武神霸斬時將處於無敵狀態，並會嘗試在多名敵人之間來回攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.
'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_meat_hook_Des: 帕吉向指定的方位或目標伸出他血腥的肉鉤，將接觸到的第一個單位勾回身邊，假如是敵方單位將對其造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_meat: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_meat_hook_Lor: 屠夫的肉鉤是噩夢的象徵，鋒利的倒鉤暗示了他嗜血的本性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_meat: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_rot_Descripti: 帕吉持續散發出毒氣，減緩與其接觸之敵人的移動速度。毒氣會同時對帕吉和敵人造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_rot_: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_rot_Lore: 從屠夫腐爛腫脹的肉體中放出的有毒氣體，氣味噁心得令人窒息。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_rot_: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_flesh_heap_De: 被動給予帕吉額外的魔抗，並且每當擊殺敵方英雄或者附近有敵方英雄死亡時，帕吉都將獲得額外力量屬性。學習此技能前可預先統計層數，學習後直接獲得相應力量值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_fles: Gives Pudge increased magic resistance, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_flesh_heap_Lo: 屠夫讓「肉盾」一詞有了全新的體現。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_fles: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_dismember_Des: 持續施法 - 帕吉撕咬一個敵方單位，令其失去行動能力並受到持續傷害，同時使自己接受與傷害等量的治療。對小兵及野怪持續更久。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_dism: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts longer on creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_dismember_Lor: 「等我幹掉這些蠢貨以後，就可以把它們做成肉餅了！」
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_dism: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_enfeeble_Descr: 自己的其他技能會一併目標施加衰弱減幅，令其降低狀態抗性和魔抗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_enfee: Bane's abilities enfeeble his targets, lowering the affected unit's magic and status resistances.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_brain_sap_Desc: 侵蝕一個敵方單位的生命能量，造成傷害並恢復自身生命值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_brain: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_brain_sap_Lore: 阿特洛波斯認為收割那些被他親自製造的恐懼玩弄崩潰的生命是至高的享受。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_brain: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_nightmare_Desc: 令目標敵方或友方英雄進入夢魘狀態而沉睡。夢魘狀態會隨著被沉睡者受到攻擊而解除，並轉移給攻擊者。災禍元素做出的普攻可繞過夢魘的轉移和解除機制。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_night: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack nightmared targets freely.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_nightmare_Lore: 從夜之女神妮塔莎那裡偷來的能力，讓獵物一覺不醒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_night: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_fiends_grip_De: 持續施法 - 箝制住一名敵方單位，使其失去行動能力並，並以每 %fiend_grip_tick_interval% 秒一次的頻率造成傷害和偷取對方最大魔力的一定百分比。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_fiend: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every %fiend_grip_tick_interval% seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_fiends_grip_Lo: 阿特洛波斯的受害者經常因為夢魘中逼真的幻象痛不欲生。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_fiend: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshaker_fissure: 用威武的圖騰猛擊地面，沿施法方向爆出一條筆直岩脊阻礙通行，並對岩脊兩側敵人造成傷害和暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshake: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshaker_fissure: 尼西埃圖騰能以驚世之力使大地裂開。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshake: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshaker_enchant: 撼地者將力量注入圖騰，使其獲得增幅，下次攻擊消耗增幅造成額外傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshake: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have %bonus_attack_range% bonus attack range on the next attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshaker_enchant: 瑞格勇猛的的蠻力能摧毀山脈。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshake: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshaker_aftersh: 撼地者施放技能時會引起腳下的大地震動，對周遭的敵方單位造成傷害和暈眩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshake: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshaker_aftersh: 大地在瑞格強而有力的步伐下顫抖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshake: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshaker_echo_sl: 猛擊地面傳導衝擊波，每個被衝擊波擊中的敵人都會引起回音波去傷害附近的其他單位。英雄單位（幻象單位不算）會引起兩道回音波。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshake: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshaker_echo_sl: 地殼開裂，山巒層疊，回音猛擊壓碎敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshake: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_burrowstri: 沙王鑽入地面挖掘隧道前進一段距離，對路徑上的敵方單位造成傷害和暈眩效果，接著穿出地面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_b: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_burrowstri: 克里瑟利斯經常鑽入地下埋伏，等待伏擊敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_b: Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_sand_storm: 沙王刮起一場可怕的沙塵暴，對場內的敵方單位持續造成傷害，並使自己在其中隱形。隱形效果將在離開到場外時立即退去，和在做出普攻、施放技能、和使用道具時短暫失效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_s: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_sand_storm: 有人認為克里瑟利斯只是傳說中的幻影，因為他的甲殼在閃爍荒原的沙塵中總是若隱若現。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_s: Some say Crixalis is a mirage; his carapace appearing then vanishing between the whirling sands of the Scintillant Waste.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_caustic_fi: 沙王對敵人進行的普攻將施加腐屍毒減幅，藉此造成移速減緩效果，並使對方會隨著在此狀態下死亡而產生屍爆，去對周遭的其他敵人造成屍爆傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_c: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to move more slowly and to violently explode when it dies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_caustic_fi: 克里瑟利斯的毒液讓受害者變的脆弱並且乾涸如乾旱的荒地，最後爆裂而死。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_c: An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_epicenter_: 持續施法 - 沙王在經過 %abilitychanneltime% 秒的持續施法後使周遭大地開始劇烈震動，這場局部地震將產生數道震波去對敵人造成傷害、攻速減緩、及移速減緩效果。地震波的範圍將逐波擴大。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_e: CHANNELED - After channeling for %abilitychanneltime% seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_epicenter_: 許多探險家喪生於閃爍荒原的流沙。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_e: Many an explorer was lost to the quicksands of the Scintillant Waste.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_shadowraz: 影魔向正前方發出毀滅能量，對該區域中的敵人造成傷害並施加一層毀滅陰影減幅，每層提升下次毀滅陰影傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadow Raze damage per stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_shadowraz: 影魔收割靈魂的經典手段。
影魔向正前方發出毀滅能量，對該區域中的敵人造成傷害並施加一層毀滅陰影減幅，每層提升下次毀滅陰影傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a short distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadow Raze damage per stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_shadowraz: 影魔收割靈魂的經典手段。
影魔向正前方發出毀滅能量，對該區域中的敵人造成傷害並施加一層毀滅陰影減幅，每層提升下次毀滅陰影傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a longer distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadow Raze damage per stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_shadowraz: 影魔收割靈魂的經典手段。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_necromast: 影魔每擊殺一個單位，就能竊取該單位的靈魂來提升攻擊力。若影魔死亡，他將失去半數的靈魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases half of them from bondage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_necromast: 被收割的亡魂在影魔體內的魂淵盤旋，讓影魔能不斷地增加他靈魂收藏的能量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_necromast: 每個靈魂提升普攻傷害：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_dark_lord: 影魔的出現使得周圍的敵人護甲降低。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_dark_lord: 就算只是在影魔周圍遊蕩，靈魂也會被侵蝕。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_requiem_D:
影魔將他目前為止用支配死靈技能所捕獲的靈魂匯聚起來轉換成多道直線狀的魔能衝擊波，接著讓它們往四面八方散射去造成傷害、移速減緩效果、和恐懼效果。緩速和恐懼效果的持續時間取決於對方被多少衝擊波擊中，每道 %requiem_slow_duration% 秒。靈魂的衝擊波轉換比率為每 1 個靈魂形成 1 道。

靈魂輓歌會在影魔死亡時自動施放，且將不會影響到技能的冷卻時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_:
Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed reduced for %requiem_slow_duration% seconds for each line hit. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery.

Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_storm_bolt_Des: 斯溫釋放他的魔力拳套的威力，對擊中點附近的敵人造成傷害和暈眩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_storm: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_great_cleave_D: 斯溫猛力揮擊，劈斬周遭所有敵方單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_great: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_warcry_Descrip: 斯溫用戰吼激勵自己和附近的友方英雄，產生持續 %duration% 秒的護甲加成和普攻傷害加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_warcr: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_gods_strength_: 斯溫爆發出他流浪劍客的力量，獲得額外傷害 %duration_tooltip% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_gods_: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for %abilityduration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_st: 對敵方單位擲出匕首，造成 %base_damage% + 自身普攻傷害 %attack_factor_tooltip%%% 的物理傷害。匕首和普攻一樣可附帶來自道具和技能的效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_as: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing %base_damage%+%attack_factor_tooltip%%% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_ph: 傳送到一個友方或敵方單位身邊，如果是敵方單位則在攻擊該目標時獲得攻擊速度加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_as: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_bl: 魅影刺客集中精神，令她有一定機率被動地迴避敵人的普攻。能以漸減的方式與其它來源的迴避屬性疊加。\n\n此技能可主動施放，模糊她的身體，令她完全消失於敵方的視野之中直到時效結束或靠近敵方英雄為止。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_as: Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks. Can be activated to blur her body, causing her to be impossible to see until near enemy heroes.\n\nStacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_co: 魅影刺客精湛的戰鬥技巧讓她有一定機率對敵方單位造成毀滅性的暴擊。窒息之刃也能受惠於同樣的機率打出暴擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_as: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_hellf: 冥魂大帝向一個敵方單位發射幽魂之火，造成傷害並暈眩目標，之後再造成持續傷害和減速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_k: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_vampi: 附近的友方近戰單位會依照對敵方單位進行普攻所產生的傷害來恢復生命值。吸血效果對攻擊類型為遠程的受效者僅有 %vampiric_aura_ranged_pct%。對友方小兵單位無效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_k: Nearby friendly heroes restore health based on the damage they deal when attacking enemy units. Has %vampiric_aura_ranged_pct%%% effect on ranged allied heroes. Does not affect allied creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_reinc: 冥魂大帝倒下後，散落一地的遺骸會漸漸重組，令他在戰場上復活。遺骸散落之際 %slow_radius% 範圍內敵人的移動和攻擊速度會被減緩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_k: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a %slow_radius% radius will be slowed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_frost_a: 在卓爾遊俠的普攻中加入可降低敵人移速的冰凍效果。對英雄單位持續 %abilityduration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_range: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage.  Slow lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_silence: 在施法目標區域內沉默所有敵方單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_range: Stops all enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_truesho: 為地圖上的所有友方遠程英雄單位提供傷害加成，幅度為卓爾遊俠敏捷屬性的一定百分比。此技能可主動施放去一併作用於友方小兵 30 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_range: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_marksma: 卓爾遊俠的戰鬥經驗使她為周遭友方遠程英雄提供敏捷加成，同時讓她射出的箭矢有一定機率打出極為準確且有效的穿心攻擊。穿心攻擊將無視目標的基礎護甲、迴避屬性，並對英雄追加造成物理傷害。此技能將隨著自身周遭 %disable_range% 半徑內有敵方英雄而失效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_range: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. Grants Drow and nearby ranged heroes with bonus agility based on Drow's current agility. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within %disable_range% range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_waveform_: 變體精靈化為波浪向前湧進，對路徑上的敵人造成傷害。變體精靈在波濤形體狀態下無敵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_morph_agi: 變體精靈改變它的形態，將一些力量屬性轉化成敏捷屬性。該過程可逆轉。升級此技能將提升轉化效率。此技能將被動提供敏捷屬性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_morph_str: 變體精靈改變它的形態，將一些敏捷屬性轉化成力量屬性。該過程可逆轉。升級此技能將提升轉化效率。此技能將被動提供力量屬性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Strength.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_replicate: 變體精靈變成目標敵方英雄，並能使用對方的普通技能。可在持續時間結束前隨意來回切換。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities with reduced mana cost. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_morph_rep: 變體精靈在原形態和複製體形態之間作切換。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_: Toggles Morphling's form between his own and the replicated enemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_bloodra: 對自己或友方英雄施放。給予目標單位噬血狂暴狀態，使其在此狀態下提升攻速和技能增強，不過每秒流失最大生命值一定百分比的血量。攻速加成效力對友方僅有一半。生命流失不致命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeke: Drives you into a bloodthirsty rage during which causes you to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of your health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_blood_b: 血魔將聖血灑在目標區域，在當地舉行耗時 %delay_plus_castpoint_tooltip% 秒血濺儀式，隨著儀式完成對區域內的敵人造成傷害和沉默效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeke: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After %delay_plus_castpoint_tooltip% seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_thirst_: 敵人身上的傷口令血魔興奮，被動的使他隨著擊殺敵方單位而恢復同等於自身最大生命一定百分比的血量，以及隨著地圖上有任何敵方英雄的血量低於 %min_bonus_pct%%% 而獲得移速加成。此移速加成將隨著對方負傷越重而越多，加成效力可因為有多名敵方英雄血量夠低而疊加，並且可讓血魔藉此突破移動速度上限。若對方的血量又低於 %invis_threshold_pct%%%，那麼血魔還將進一步感知對方的所在位置，並在對方身上取得真實視野。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeke: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemiesm, restoring some life when he kills an enemy unit. Also gains bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below %min_bonus_pct%%%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below %invis_threshold_pct%%%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_rupture: 讓一個敵方單位皮開肉綻，使對方在此狀態之下會承受與移動距離成一定比例的傷害，且傷害能穿透技能免疫狀態。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeke: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_berserkers_call: 斧王嘲諷附近的敵方單位，強迫他們攻擊斧王自己；期間斧王將獲得護甲加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_berser: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_berserkers_call: 蒙哥可汗的狂吼嘲諷逼迫敵人不得不與他作戰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_berser: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_battle_hunger_D: 激怒一名敵方單位，對其造成持續傷害和移速減緩效果。受效者可擊殺一名單位來提前終止效果。施效者將從被戰鬥飢渴影響的單位獲得移速加成，此加成可疊加，但在藉由小兵或野怪等蔓生單位獲得時只有一半的效力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_battle: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger, half speed from creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_battle_hunger_L: 通常英雄都無法抵擋蒙哥可汗的戰鬥狂怒，他們會一直受傷，直到蒙哥可汗的狂怒平息。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_battle: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_counter_helix_D: 每當斧王受到普攻時將有一定機率做出螺旋反擊，對附近所有敵方單位造成純粹傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_counte: When attacked, Axe has a chance to perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_counter_helix_L: 這支軍隊只要有斧王就不需要援軍了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_counte: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_culling_blade_D: 斧王看準對方弱點大斧一揮將血量低於閾值的目標直接秒殺，或對高於閾值的敵人造成些許傷害。秒殺成功後技能將不會進入冷卻，同時斧王及周圍的友方單位將獲得攻擊速度和移動速度加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_cullin: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_culling_blade_L: 蒙哥可汗是戰鬥與狂怒的化身，膽敢與斧王為敵者只有死路一條。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_cullin: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_spir: 放出一個精神體往目標刺去，於擊中時造成傷害和移動速度減緩效果，並製造出一個幻影接續攻擊該單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_la: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_dopp: 幻影長矛手帶著當下位於自身附近的任何幻影瞬間消失在場上，接著夾帶兩個額外幻影在 %delay% 秒的延遲後一齊在目標區域內的隨機位置重新出現，並延長所有幻影的持續時間。兩個額外幻影中的一個會照常承受傷害但無法產生任何傷害，另一個則承受 %illusion_2_damage_in_pct% 傷害和輸出 %illusion_2_damage_out_pct%%% 傷害。\n\n驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_la: Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After %delay% second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. Extends duration of all illusions. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes %illusion_2_damage_in_pct%%% bonus damage and deals %illusion_2_damage_out_pct%%% less damage.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_juxt: 幻影長矛手有一定機會進行分裂，製造出一隻自己的幻影。而幻影們也都有一定的機會進一步去分裂出更多幻影。幻影長矛手本尊所分裂出的幻影將會維持 %illusion_duration% 秒，而由幻影所分裂出的幻影則只會維持 %illusion_from_illusion_duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_la: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for %illusion_duration% seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last %illusion_from_illusion_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_plasma_field_: 向外釋放一波威力隨擴張程度提升的電漿領域，對經過的敵人造成傷害和緩速效果。領域將於完全擴張後接著收縮，對經過的敵人再次造成傷害和緩速效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_plas: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_static_link_D: 在剃刀和一個敵方英雄之間建立靜電連接，偷取目標的攻擊力並將其轉移給剃刀，同時讓剃刀能夠邊移動邊向連接對象普攻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_stat: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows razor to attack while moving with the link active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_unstable_curr: 被動地提升自身移動速度。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_eye_of_the_st: 召來強大的閃電風暴，電擊生命最低的敵方單位，造成傷害並降低護甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_eye_: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spirit_static: 風暴之靈就地創造出一個爆炸性的電氣殘影，如果有人接近就會引爆造成傷害。殘影持續 %abilityduration%  秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spir: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts %abilityduration% seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spirit_electr: 用一股渦流將一名敵人拖往風暴之靈所在位置。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spir: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spirit_overlo: 風暴之靈在每次施法時會產生電荷，使下次普攻能波及附近敵人，造成傷害和攻移雙緩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spir: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spirit_ball_l: 風暴之靈變成不穩定的電流在戰場上橫衝直撞，直到他的魔力耗盡或抵達目的地才停止。啟動時將消耗 %ball_lightning_initial_mana_base% + %ball_lightning_initial_mana_percentage%%% 的自身總魔力，在之後的過程中每行進 100 距離將接續消耗總魔力的 %ball_lightning_travel_cost_base% + 0.75%%。衝撞所造成的傷害會與風暴之靈的行進距離成比例，每 100 距離累加一次。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spir: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is %ball_lightning_initial_mana_base%+%ball_lightning_initial_mana_percentage%%% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is %ball_lightning_travel_cost_base%+%ball_lightning_travel_cost_percent%%% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_crys: 在目標區域創造出具有破壞性的冰霜爆發，對範圍內的敵人造成傷害並且降低對方的移動速度和攻擊速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_ma: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_fros: 用冰包住一個敵方單位，令其無法移動或進行普攻，同時造成持續傷害。對 6 級以下的小兵及野怪則固定持續 %creep_duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_ma: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Lasts %creep_duration% seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_free: 持續施法 - 冰晶聖女佈下極寒領域，持續 %abilitychanneltime% 秒，於期間提升自身護甲，對範圍內的敵人造成移速和攻速減緩效果，同召喚冰晶轟炸敵人造成大量傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_ma: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts %abilitychanneltime% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_torrent_Desc: 召喚噴湧的洪流，短暫延遲後將敵人衝上天，造成傷害、暈眩並減速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_tor: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_tidebringer_: 昆卡的傳奇之劍強化他的下次普攻，使其提升傷害、且會波及到目標後方的一個大範圍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_tid: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_x_marks_the_: 對友方或敵方英雄施加 X 標記去紀錄對方的當下位置，然後在持續時間結束時將對方送回 X 標記處。X 標記可在持續期間隨時再度手動施放來提前生效。持續時間對友方英雄加倍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_x_m: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_return_Descr: 將標記的英雄送回 X 位置。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_ret: Returns the marked hero to the X.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_ghostship_De: 召喚一艘幽靈船穿越戰場，最終撞得粉碎，對撞毀地點附近的敵人造成傷害和暈眩。接觸幽靈船的友軍將暢飲統帥的朗姆酒，獲得移動速度加成，且受到的傷害將有一定比率會延遲至朗姆酒效果結束後才逐漸生效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_gho: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_fatal_bonds: 將數個敵方單位連接在一起，使其中任何一人所承受傷害會被其他分享有聯結的人感受到。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_fa: Binds several enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_shadow_word: 術士低聲細語念出一個咒語，持續治療一個友方單位或傷害一個敵方單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_sh: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_upheaval_De: 持續施法 - 在目標區域傳導一個減速湧流，減速效力將隨著傳導逐漸增強，最多傳導 %abilitychanneltime% 秒。減速效果在敵人脫離有效範圍或傳導結束之後，維持 %duration% 秒才會失效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_up: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to %abilitychanneltime% seconds.  Enemies are slowed for %duration% seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_rain_of_cha: 從深淵召喚一個地獄火巨人，對召喚區域內的敵人造成 1 秒暈眩。巨人持續 %golem_duration% 秒並對法術有一定抗性，同時還具有永恆獻祭和烈焰之拳技能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_ra: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives %golem_duration% seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_golem_flami: 使普通攻擊造成額外傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_go: Deals extra damage to nearby units when attacking.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_golem_perma: 地獄火燃燒它周圍的敵方單位，每秒造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_go: Burns the Golem's nearby enemy units, with damage per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_arc_lightning_: 釋放一道會在附近敵方單位之間彈跳的雷霆閃電。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_arc_l: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_static_field_D: 令宙斯的技能會二度電擊受效者，造成對方目前生命一定比例的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_stati: Zeus shocks any enemy hit by his abilities, causing damage proportional to their current health.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_thundergods_wr: 用雷霆閃電攻擊所有敵方英雄，無論他們在何處。雷神之怒會在每個受攻擊的英雄周遭提供真實視野。無法同時揭露和傷害隱形的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_thund: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_avalanche_Desc: 以亂石轟炸一個範圍，對目標區域內的敵方陸地單位造成傷害和暈眩。山崩將對處於被投擲狀態下的敵人造成 3 倍傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_avala: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does 3x damage to units being tossed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_toss_Descripti: 抓起 %grab_radius% 範圍內最近的一個單位（敵我皆可）投向目標或是神符，然後在落地區域造成傷害。如果被投擲的是敵方單位，則此單位將會受到 %bonus_damage_pct%%% 額外傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_toss_: Grabs the nearest unit in a %grab_radius% radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.  If the tossed unit is an enemy, it will take an extra %bonus_damage_pct%%% damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_grow_Descripti: 小小快速長大，提升傷害、護甲，但降低攻速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_grow_: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor, while slowing his attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_illusory_orb_D: 帕克延直線方向發出一顆魔法球，對經過路徑上的敵人造成傷害。在幻象法球飛行過程中，帕克可以使用縹緲之途來傳送到法球所在的位置。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_illus: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_waning_rift_De: 帕克傳送至目標地點，在該處灑出神秘的仙女粉塵去對周圍的敵人造成傷害和沉默效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_wanin: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_phase_shift_De: 持續施法 - 帕克短暫地將它自己轉移到另一個空間來避免傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_phase: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_ethereal_jaunt: 傳送帕克到幻象法球所在的位置。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_ether: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_poison_touch: 對一扇形區域內的敵人釋放劇毒，使其受到移速減緩效果和持續傷害。此狀態的持續時間會隨著受效者另外受到普攻而刷新。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_poi: Releases a cone of poison that strikes multiple enemy units. Deals damage over time and slows the targets. Anytime the targets get attacked, the debuff duration is refreshed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_shallow_grav: 施放薄葬於一名友軍，使對方在持續時間內無論受到多大傷害都不會死亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_sha: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_weave_Descri: 根據對方是敵是友向目標區域內的英雄施予會影響護甲的增幅或減幅，友方英雄的護甲會逐漸提升，若為敵方英雄則會護甲則會逐漸下降。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_wea: Applies a buff that increases the armor of allied heroes while decreasing the armor of enemy heroes in the target area over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_battery_: 持續引爆高能破片彈，一次攻擊附近的隨機一位敵方單位，造成小幅魔法傷害和短暫暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_power_co: 將通電齒輪在發條技師周圍組成一圈障礙物，困住貼近的單位。外側的敵人碰到齒輪會被電流震退，損失生命值和魔力。每個齒輪發動過一次震擊後就會報廢。敵人攻擊數次可摧毀齒輪，發條技師只需攻擊一次即可摧毀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_rocket_f: 向目標區域發射射程無限的照明彈，對區域內敵人造成傷害，以及揭露該區域的視野 %duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_hookshot: 往一個目標位置發射一個迅速飛行的鉤爪。若鉤爪擊中到了一名單位，那麼發條技師將被迅速牽引過去，對目標造成暈眩和傷害。發條技師在牽引途中所衝撞到的任何敵方單位也會一併受到傷害和暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_nova_Des: 在一名敵方單位身上對方身上爆發出寒霜，對其造成基礎傷害和範圍傷害，同時在爆發地點附近造成範圍傷害。寒霜爆發將減緩攻擊速度和移動速度 %abilityduration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for %abilityduration% seconds.  The primary target receives both base and area damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_dark_ritual_De: 犧牲一個友方小兵，將對方目前生命值的一定百分比轉化成巫妖的魔力值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_dark_: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_chain_frost_De: 釋放一個可在不同敵人之間來回彈跳 %jumps% 次的寒霜法球，造成傷害和緩速效果。傷害將隨著每次彈跳提升。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_chain: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to %jumps% times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. Each bounce increases the damage for the subsequent bounces.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_gush_Des: 召喚一股巨浪傷害一個敵方單位，降低移動速度和護甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_kraken_s:
強化潮夕獵人的外皮去被動地抵擋普攻傷害。同時每當自己的傷害承受量在特定時間內達到特定門檻時，海妖外殼將會移除當下自己身上的減幅效果。

海妖外殼不與其它物品的傷害抵擋疊加。

驅散類型：強力
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_anchor_s: 潮汐獵人揮動他的巨錨，對附近敵人造成附加著額外傷害的普攻並降低他們的基礎攻擊力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_ravage_D: 猛擊地面，使觸手從地表內朝四面八方穿出，傷害並暈眩附近所有敵方單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_ether: 利用蒼穹的能量製造出分叉的閃電，襲擊一群敵方單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_sha: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_voodo: 將一個敵方單位變成毫無傷害的動物，受害者無法攻擊和使用技能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_sha: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_shack: 持續施法 - 使用魔法綁住一個敵方單位，使其無法攻擊和移動，同時造成持續傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_sha: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_mass_: 召喚 %ward_count% 支群蛇守衛來攻擊敵方單位和建築物。守衛對魔法免疫。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_sha: Summons %ward_count% Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_smoke_screen_D: 丟出一枚煙幕彈使範圍內的敵方單位沉默，且在煙幕中做出的大部分普攻都將落空。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_smoke: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_smoke_screen_L: 自從他在他的背叛之夜逃脫後，力丸發掘出這能混淆對手的簡單煙幕價值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_smoke: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_blink_strike_D: 傳送至目標單位背後，如果是敵人的話則對其造成會附加額外傷害的普通攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_blink: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_blink_strike_L: 潛行刺客迅速敏捷的動作讓他的目標幾乎不可能逃脫。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_blink: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_permanent_invi: 力丸淡入陰影呈現隱匿狀態。在力丸做出普攻時將會現形。提供額外移動速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_perma: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible. Grants bonus movement speed
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_demonic_conv: 將一隻小兵或野怪轉換成三個謎團的碎片。這些邪惡虛靈受謎團控制，且會在反復做出幾次攻擊後恢復生命值並一分為二。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_dem: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_midnight_pul: 將一塊區域沉浸在黑暗的共振中，對敵方單位造成他們最大生命值一定比例的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_mid: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_black_hole_D: 持續施法 - 召喚一個強力漩渦吸住敵方單位。被黑洞影響的單位不能移動、攻擊或施法。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_bla: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_heat_seeking: 向方圓 %radius% 範圍內距離最近的可見敵方英雄發射火箭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_hea: Launches rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within %radius% range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_march_of_the: 徵募一支機器人軍隊，摧毀修補匠周圍的敵方單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_mar: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_rearm_Descri: 持續施法 - 重設修補匠大多數技能和物品的冷卻時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_rea: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_shrapnel_Des: 發射一枚破片榴彈使目標區域淋浴在爆炸性雨彈之下一段時間，使淋浴在彈雨之下的敵人持續受到傷害和移動速度減緩效果。破片榴彈將會揭露目標區域的視野。破片榴彈將每 %abilitychargerestoretime% 秒補充一枚。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_shr: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every %abilitychargerestoretime% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_headshot_Des: 狙擊手提升他的射擊精度，使他的普攻有一定機率造成額外傷害以及微幅的擊退效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_hea: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and briefly knocks back his enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_take_aim_Des: 被動地提升狙擊手的步槍射程。此技能可主動施放，使下次普攻獲得的增程幅度加倍。主動施放的射程加倍需要冷卻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_tak: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle. Can be activated to double the attack range bonus for 1 attack. Goes on cooldown after the attack is used.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_assassinate_: 狙擊手鎖定一個目標敵方單位，在短暫瞄準後發射一發威力強大的子彈，造成傷害和小暈眩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_ass: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range and mini-stuns the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_death_pul: 死靈法師在他周圍釋放死亡脈衝，傷害敵方單位並治療友方單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_heartstop: 死靈法師讓敵人的心臟停止跳動，使附近敵方單位依據最大生命值一定比率受到持續傷害。同時，自己將隨著每擊殺一名單位獲得一層竭心靈氣增幅，每層提供生命和魔力恢復，持續 %regen_duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time. Passively provides regen for %regen_duration% seconds for each unit Necrophos kills.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_sadist_De: 死靈法師進入了陰陽兩隔的領域，散發靈氣降低周圍敵人的移動速度。他無法攻擊或被攻擊，承受更多魔法傷害，同時強化生命和魔力恢復能力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_reapers_s: 暈眩目標敵方英雄，接著依據對方目前少了多少生命值來造成傷害。被死神鐮刀擊殺的單位復活時間將增加 %respawn_constant% 秒，且任何在此效果下死亡的單位均計為死靈法師的擊殺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. Heroes killed by Reaper's Scythe will have %respawn_constant% seconds added to their respawn timer. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_sprint_Desc: 斯拉達盤底抹油，使自己顯著地提升移速並能忽略單位碰撞。若身在河道，守衛衝刺將被動地解鎖移速上限，和帶來能與主動部分疊加的移速加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_sp: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units. Slardar has unlocked max speed and grants movement speed while in the river.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_bash_Descri: 在普攻 %attack_count% 次時觸發深海重擊，使普攻重擊目標，造成暈眩和額外傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_ba: After %attack_count% attacks, your next attack will bash the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_wild_ax: 獸王扔出兩把飛斧然後收回它們，劈開所有經過的敵人和樹木。兩把飛斧可對每個敵人各造成一次傷害，並造成可疊加的野性之斧減幅，每層加深受效者從獸王和聽命於他的單位那收到的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaste: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_call_of:
獸王喚來野獸們助他戰鬥。

等級 1：1 級箭豬
等級 2：2 級箭豬
等級 3：3 級箭豬 + 戰鷹
等級 4：4 級箭豬 + 戰鷹 + 隨機野怪
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaste:
Beastmaster calls forth beasts to aid in the battlefield.

Level 1: Boar Level 1
Level 2: Boar Level 2
Level 3: Boar Level 3 + Hawk
Level 4: Boar Level 4 + Hawk + Random Neutral
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_hawk_in: 如果靜止不動 4 秒，強化戰鷹將會進入隱匿狀態。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaste: If motionless for some time, the hawk becomes invisible.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_boar_po: 能使目標移動速度和攻擊速度降低的毒性攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaste: Inflicts a poison that slows attack and movement speeds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_greater: 能使目標移動速度和攻擊速度降低的毒性攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaste: Inflicts a poison that slows attack and movement speeds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_venomous: 沿直線射出一顆毒液球，碰到的敵人受到初始傷害和持續傷害，並受到減速效果影響。瘴氣在持續時間內每 3 秒造成一次持續傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_poison_s: 在劇毒術士的普通攻擊中加入毒性傷害，並降低敵人的移動速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks and slowing movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_plague_w: 召喚瘟疫守衛來攻擊敵方單位和建築物。守衛對魔法免疫。守衛將獲得劇毒術士當前等級的毒刺並造成全額傷害的 50%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_void_time_: 衝到目標位置，並回溯自己在最近 %backtrack_duration% 秒間受到的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_v: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last %backtrack_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_void_time_: 普攻有一定機率令敵人困在時間之中並附加額外傷害，同時使自己瞬間再對對方多做出一次普攻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_v: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time while attacking it a second time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_void_chron: 在時空中創造一個結界，將所有身在其中的單位定住，虛空假面卻能迅速移動。只有虛空假面及其所控制的單位可以在其中自由行動。結界會揭露位在其中的隱形單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_v: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible enemies in the sphere will be revealed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prophet_carri: 召喚一群食腐蟲肆虐死亡先知面前的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prop: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prophet_silen: 阻止目標區域內的敵人施放魔法。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prop: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prophet_exorc: 釋放惡靈竊取敵方單位和建築物的生命。持續時間結束後，死亡先知依據造成的傷害量，獲得一定比例的治療。持續 %abilityduration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prop: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_nether_blast_: 一道爆炸性脈衝對範圍內的敵方單位造成傷害。能對建築物造成 50%% 傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_neth: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_decrepify_Des: 對目標施加驅逐咒語，降低對方的移動速度並將對方變為虛靈。處於虛靈狀態的單位將無法供他人進行普通攻擊，但自己也無法做出普通攻擊，且還將承受更多魔法傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_decr: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_re: 聖堂刺客變得十分難以捉摸，在避開傷害的同時也獲得一定的傷害加成。避開傷害與傷害加成的效果是各自分開計算的，且有固定的發生次數。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_as: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_me: 聖堂刺客將自己隱藏起來，在靜止不動的時候處於隱形狀態。若隱形狀態是藉由普攻破除的，則該次攻擊將附帶額外傷害，並降低目標護甲 %abilityduration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_as: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still.  If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for %abilityduration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_ps: 聖堂刺客的靈能之刃鋒利地穿梭於敵人之間，對敵人正後方的敵人造成波及傷害，同時提升攻擊距離。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_as: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_ps: 聖堂刺客放下一個隱形的神祕陷阱去監視敵蹤。當她啟動陷阱時，作用範圍內的敵人將受到為幅 %movement_speed_min%%% 的移速減緩效果。陷阱的緩速效力將隨著靜置逐漸提升，最高可在靜置達 %trap_max_charge_duration% 秒後緩到 %movement_speed_max%%% 移速。若完全靜置，靈能陷阱將可造成額外傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_as: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of %movement_speed_min%%% in the area. Traps charge up to slow %movement_speed_max%%% after %trap_max_charge_duration% seconds. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_tr: 觸發最近的陷阱，使周圍的敵人減速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_as: Springs the nearest trap, slowing nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_se: 觸發陷阱，使周圍的敵人減速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_as: Springs the trap, slowing nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_poison_attack: 增強蝮蛇的毒液，令牠的普攻附帶移速減緩效果、魔抗降低效果、和每秒傷害。毒性攻擊可疊加 %max_stacks% 次。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_pois: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to %max_stacks% times.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_nethertoxin_D: 向目標區域釋放出幽冥劇毒，對範圍內的敵人造成持續傷害、魔抗降低、被動技能封鎖。持續傷害會隨著目標處於範圍內越久而越高。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_neth: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take an increasing damage over time based on how long they remain in it. Disables passives of affected units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_corrosive_ski: 蝮蛇分泌出容易沾惹的毒素，對任何在牠附近的 %max_range_tooltip% 範圍內傷害牠的敵人造成傷害和攻速減緩效果。這種酸性分泌物還能夠被動地提升蝮蛇的魔法抗性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_corr: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a %max_range_tooltip% radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_viper_strike_: 蝮蛇惡毒的撕咬降低目標敵方單位的攻擊速度和移動速度，並造成持續中毒傷害。移動速度會緩慢恢復。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_vipe: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_lucent_beam_De: 露娜指引一道純淨的月光能量攻擊敵人，造成傷害和暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_lucen: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_moon_glaive_De: 強化露娜的飛刃，令她的普通攻擊能在敵方單位之間彈跳。傷害將隨每彈一次而遞減。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_moon_: Empowers Luna's glaives, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_lunar_blessing: 提升露娜和周圍友方英雄的普攻傷害、以及露娜自己的夜間視野。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_lunar: Increases the attack damage for Luna and nearby allied ranged player units. Luna is also blessed with increased vision range at night.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_eclipse_Descri: 召喚月蝕將白晝轉為黑夜 %night_duration% 秒，接著月蝕將於期間以目前等級的透徹月光去攻擊周遭敵人。月蝕產生的月光不具有暈眩效果。月蝕對於每位目標都有著重複攻擊次數限制。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_eclip: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for %night_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_knight_breat: 朝瞄準的方向噴出一道火焰龍息，造成傷害並降低對方的攻擊力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_kni: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_knight_drago: 龍騎士用盾重擊身邊的一個敵方單位，造成暈眩和少量傷害。此技能的施放距離在真龍形態下將提升至 %dragon_cast_range%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_kni: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to %dragon_cast_range%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_knight_drago: 龍族的鮮血能提升龍騎士的生命恢復速率以及護甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_kni: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_knight_elder:
龍騎士能夠變身成為三種不同的真龍形態，隨著化身為龍提升移動速度和神龍擺尾的施放距離，並使普通攻擊受到以下：
<font color="#9acd32">等級 1 - 腐蝕龍息</font>：普攻開始附帶每秒 %corrosive_breath_damage% 的毒素傷害，持續 %corrosive_breath_duration% 秒。對建築也有效。
<font color="#ff0000">等級 2 - 濺燒龍息</font>：普攻開始在 %splash_radius% 範圍内的所有敵人造成 %splash_damage_percent%%% 傷害。
<font color="#87ceeb">等級 3 - 寒霜龍息</font>：普攻開始令敵人降低 %frost_bonus_movement_speed%%% 移動速度和 %frost_bonus_attack_speed% 攻擊速度，持續 %frost_duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_kni:
Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.
<font color="#9acd32">LEVEL 1 Green Dragon</font> - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal %corrosive_breath_damage% poison damage per second for %corrosive_breath_duration% seconds. Works on structures.
<font color="#ff0000">LEVEL 2 Red Dragon</font> - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a %splash_radius% radius for %splash_damage_percent%%% damage, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
<font color="#87ceeb">LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon</font> - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by %frost_bonus_movement_speed%%% and attack speed by %frost_bonus_attack_speed% of enemy units in Splash Attack range for %frost_duration% seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
