Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_vacuum_De: 黑暗賢者在目標區域製造一個真空環境，將周圍的敵方單位吸進去，打亂陣腳並造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_ion_shell: 將目標用一面尖刺之盾包圍起來，對周圍的敵人造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_surge_Des: 為一個友方目標注入能量，使其在短時間內移動速度激增至最大值、無視單位碰撞、並免疫緩速效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of movement speed and removes unit collisions. Allows the unit to reach maximum movement speed and cannot be slowed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_wall_of_r: 製造一堵扭曲的光牆，對行越光牆的敵方英雄造成移速減緩效果，並複製出一個該英雄的扭曲幻象讓黑暗賢者控制。扭曲幻象在受摧毀前或光牆消失前都會一直留在場上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_: Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_strafe_Descr: 克林克茲進入掃射狀態，於期間提升大量攻速，並對於敵方投射物具有 100% 迴避率。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_str: Clinkz nimbly attacks with a barrage of arrows. Gains 100% evasion from ranged attackers and dramatically increases attack speed for a short time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_searing_arro: 克林克茲讓自己射出的箭矢帶有火焰去造成更多傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_sea: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_wind_walk_De: 進入隱形狀態，於期間獲得移速加成並無視單位碰撞。使用技能或做出普攻將使狀態提前結束。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_win: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses items.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_death_pact_D: 瞄準一名敵方小兵或自己的骷髏射手，吞噬對方來獲得死亡契約增幅，藉此獲得基於對方目前生命的生命加成和普攻傷害加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_dea: Clinkz consumes the target enemy unit or friendly unit, gaining max health and damage based on its current health.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_untouch: 魅惑魔女的美貌令人神魂顛倒，被動地使攻擊她的敵人受到攻擊速度減緩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantres: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_enchant: 魅惑魔女魅惑一名敵人。若對方是英雄單位，魅惑將造成移速減緩效果。若對方是小兵和野怪，則魅惑將令對方受魅惑魔女控制，且獲得普攻傷害加成和血量加成。\n\n驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantres: Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control, increasing it's attack damage and max health.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_natures: 喚來一群小精靈到魅惑魔女身旁，持續治療鄰近的友方單位。小精靈持續 %abilityduration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantres: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_impetus: 為每次普攻附魔，依據目標的距離造成額外傷害。距離越遠，傷害越高。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantres: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_purifica: 立即治療一個友方單位，並對周圍的敵方單位造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_repel_De: 在一名友方目標身上創造出一個神聖屏障，首先對其施加驅散效果，接著予其一些狀態抗性、力量屬性、和生命恢復。\n\n驅散類型：強力
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight: Creates a divine barrier around an ally which grants them increased Status Resistance, Strength and Health Regeneration.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_degen_au: 大幅減緩附近敵人的移動速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight: Greatly degenerates the movement capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_inner_vitali: 解放一個友方單位的恢復力，依據目標的主要屬性進行治療。如果目標血量低於 35% 治療速度便會提高。治療效果持續 %abilityduration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_inn: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 35%, it will heal faster.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_burning_spea: 哈斯卡消耗一點生命值點燃長矛，使自己的普攻將一併對目標和其周圍敵人施加一層持續 %abilityduration% 秒的沸血之矛減幅去每秒造成傷害；此減幅可疊加，無疊加上限。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_bur: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_berserkers_b: 哈斯卡的傷痛賜予他力量，依據損失的生命值來獲得攻擊速度和生命恢復。生命恢復效力為自身力量屬性的一定比例。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_ber: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and health regen based on missing health. Health regen is a percentage of your strength.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_life_break_D: 哈斯卡利用自己的生命值摧毀敵人的生命，衝向目標並對敵方單位造成當前生命一定百分比的傷害，同時降低其移動速度。哈斯卡在衝向對方時對技能免疫。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_lif: Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them.  While leaping, Huskar is Spell Immune.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stalker_cripp: 暗夜魔王持續恫嚇附近的所有敵人一段時間，令他們在此期間受到沉默。時效將在夜晚持續更久。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stal: Night Stalker horrifies all nearby enemies, causing them to become silenced while near him.  The effect lasts longer at night.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stalker_hunte: 每到夜幕降臨，暗夜魔王就如魚得水，攻擊和移動都變得更加迅速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stal: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stalker_darkn: 暗夜魔王遮天蔽日，讓黑暗瞬間籠罩戰場，自身能力也發揮到極致，於此狀態下提升普攻傷害，並且獲得能夠跨越的飛行能力還有 %vision_range% 範圍大的不受阻礙視野。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stal: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. Nightstalker gains flight and bonus damage during this time. Has unobstructed vision.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_spawn_s: 育母蜘蛛將她的卵注入敵人體內，造成傷害。如果目標在感染期間被擊殺，卵會孵化成小蜘蛛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmothe: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_spin_we: 育母蜘蛛噴出一張蜘蛛網，讓她可在其中被動地享有生命恢復加成、移動速度加成、和能讓她穿越地形的自由移動能力。用來編織網子的蜘蛛絲將每隔 %charge_restore_time% 秒補充一次。蜘蛛網沒有在場時間限制，且可以手動銷毀，但會隨著達到數量上限時使新織的網子取代最舊的那張。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmothe: Spins a large web that grants Broodmother a passive movement speed increase, gives free movement, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity. Spin Web charges restore every %charge_restore_time% seconds. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_incapac: 育母蜘蛛用毒液削弱敵方單位，令其移動速度下降且做出的普攻有一定機率落空。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmothe: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_insatia: 對活物體液的強烈飢渴提升了育母蜘蛛的攻擊傷害，並使她的攻擊附帶吸血效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmothe: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_poison_: 普通攻擊會令敵人中毒和受到移動速度減緩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmothe: Poisons and slows enemies with each attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_spawn_s: 隨著攻擊時對敵人注入蜘蛛卵。如果目標在減幅的效力期間內死亡，則對方的屍體將會孵化出一隻幼蜘蛛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmothe: Applies debuff on attack. If debuffed unit dies, a spiderite will spawn.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hunter_jinad: 賞金獵人準備好他的下次攻擊，造成額外傷害並竊取一些不可靠金錢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hun: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, dealing bonus damage and stealing some unreliable gold.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hunter_wind_: 賞金獵人進入隱形狀態，並能夠穿越其它單位，直到他做出普攻或使用技能。破除隱形的那次普攻會造成移速減緩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hun: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will slow the target's movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hunter_track: 追蹤一名敵方英雄，在對方身上取得真實視野，並得知目標所攜帶的金錢。賞金獵人將在目標附近獲得移動速度加成，且對目標做出的所有普攻將打出暴擊傷害。如果目標在被追蹤期間死亡，賞金獵人和附近友方英雄將獲得一筆賞金。追蹤術的施放不會破除自身既有的隱形狀態。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hun: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. You move fast when near the tracked unit and deal critical strikes when attacking it. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold. Casting Track does not take you out of invisibility.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_the_swarm_De: 編織者釋放 %count% 隻編織者幼蟲，每隻幼蟲都會緊緊纏住它遇到的敵人，攻擊敵人並降低他們的護甲，直到幼蟲被擊殺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_the: Weaver launches a swarm of %count% young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_shukuchi_Des: 編織者進入縮地狀態，於期間獲得隱形、移速加成、和無視單位碰撞效果，並對任何接觸到的敵人造成一次縮地傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_shu: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining bonus movement speed and the ability to ignore the movement speed limit --doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_geminate_att: 允許編織者立刻對敵人造成兩次攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_gem: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_dual_breath_: 傑奇洛對面前的敵人先後噴出寒冰和火焰。寒冰龍息減速敵人，火焰龍息對敵人造成持續傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_dua: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_ice_path_Des: 製造一條冰封路徑，冰凍並暈眩觸碰它的敵方單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_ice: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_liquid_fire_: 傑奇洛在普攻中添加熔岩，濺燒距離擊中點一定範圍內的敵方單位，造成持續傷害和攻擊速度降低效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_liq: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_macropyre_De: 傑奇洛向前釋放出寬闊而持續燃燒的火焰，對火焰內的敵人造成每秒持續傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_mac: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_sticky_nap: 用黏性燃油浸透一塊區域，令沾染到黏油的敵人降低移動速度和轉身速率，並使蝙蝠騎士的攻擊和技能可藉由那些易燃的黏油去造成更多傷害。黏性燃油可重複對敵人施放，對方沾染到的燃油越多，額外傷害就疊的越深，最多可疊加 %max_stacks% 次。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_s: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to %max_stacks% stacks.  The extra damage is halved against creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_flamebreak: 直線投擲一瓶會爆炸的燃燒瓶，當到達目標地點時爆炸，擊退區域內的敵人並造成持續傷害和短暫暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_f: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_firefly_De: 蝙蝠騎士飛向天空獲得自由移動能力。火焰飛行期間，行進時會留下一道燃燒痕跡，破壞樹木，並對接觸到火焰的敵人造成傷害，同時也獲得晝夜視力加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_f: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air.  The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider. Batrider has bonus day/night vision while Firefly is active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_flaming_la: 用枷鎖捆住一個敵人，在蝠騎士的後面拖行。無法被拖過不能通行的地形。被拖行的單位不能移動、攻擊或使用技能。傳送或閃躍會打破枷鎖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_f: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_penitence_Desc: 使一個敵方單位移動變慢，同時使友方單位對其的攻擊變快。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_penit: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and for allies to attack it more quickly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_test_of_faith_: 考驗目標單位的忠誠，對敵方單位施放時造成隨機傷害，對友方單位施放時造成隨機治療。療效對自己施放時永遠為最大值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_test_: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith. Heals a random amount to allied units. Always applies the maximum effect when cast on yourself.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_holy_persuasio: 陳用他的神聖信念招降一個敵方小兵或中立野怪，令對方受陳控制。若目標的血量先天上低於最低值，則其血量將被拉抬至該門檻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_holy_: Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum. Converted creeps will have increased movement speed and bonus damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_hand_of_god_De: 治癒地圖上所有受陳控制的小兵以及所有友方英雄。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_hand_: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_spectral_da: 幽鬼擲出一把匕首，留下一條暗影之徑，對路徑上的敵人造成傷害並降低移動速度。被匕首扔中的單位移動時也會留下暗影之徑。幽鬼在暗影之徑上進行無視地形的空間移動。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_sp: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_desolate_De: 幽鬼的普攻將對身旁 %radius% 範圍內沒有其他敵人的敵方單位造成額外傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_de: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy that does not have any allied units within a %radius% radius around them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_dispersion_: 幽鬼減免自身承受的傷害，並對周遭敵人造成與減免量等值的反射傷害。敵人距離越遠，受到的反射傷害就越低。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_di: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_haunt_Descr: 在場上每位敵方英雄的身後創造一個鬼影去攻擊他們。幽鬼可在技能持續期間內隨時與任一鬼影的互換位置。\n\n這些鬼影無法控制，算是一種幻象單位，傷害輸出較本體低，承受傷害較本體高，且移動不受地形或障礙影響。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_ha: Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt.\n\nHaunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They ignore terrain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_reality_Des: 幽鬼與選中的鬼影互換位置。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_re: Spectre exchanges places with a chosen Haunt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_devour: 把特定等級以下的敵方小兵或中立野怪吞下肚，獲取對方身上的技能，同時隨著吞噬產生的消化增幅獲得生命恢復加成，還有隨著消化完畢獲得額外金錢。此技能若不啟用自動施放，則吞噬將不會獲取對方的技能。消化增幅的持續時間與技能的冷卻相同。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bring: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed. If autocast is deactivated, Doom will not acquire the creep's abilities. Provides bonus health regeneration for the duration of the spell. Duration is equal to the cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_scorch: 進入焦土狀態，在此期間用火焰覆蓋周圍的土地，持續對敵人造成傷害，並提升移動速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bring: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies, while also granting him increased movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_empty1: 此欄將由吞噬得來的技能取代。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bring: This slot will be replaced with abilities acquired using Devour.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_empty2: 此欄將由吞噬得來的技能取代。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bring: This slot will be replaced with abilities acquired using Devour.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_apparition_: 在一個敵方單位身上施放造成持續傷害的寒冰咒印，但物體只要遠離施法點足夠距離即可消除咒印。如果受攻擊單位沒有在 4 秒內走出消除距離，則將暈眩並被凍在原地。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_ap: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_apparition_: 製造一個寒冰能量的漩渦，提升範圍內敵人承受的魔法傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_ap: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows and increases magic damage done to enemies in its range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_apparition_: 令自身普攻附帶攻距加成、額外傷害、和短暫的移速減緩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_ap: Enhances Ancient Apparition's attack with increased range, heavy magic damage, and movement slow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_apparition_: 發射一枚能射到地圖上任何地點的信標，接著再次使用此技能以對信標的當下位置進行標記，使遠古幽魂朝標記區域發射爆炸冰球。信標的移動距離越遠，它能夠標記的轟炸範圍也就越大。接觸到冰球或受其轟炸的敵人會受到寒霜詛咒，無法恢復生命值並持續受到傷害。且如果在承受寒霜詛咒的期間生命值下降到了某一百分比以下，單位將立即死亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_ap: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_apparition_: 釋放冰晶爆轟並在信標目前的位置提前引爆。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_ap: Releases the ice blast to explode at the tracer's current location.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_earthshock_Des: 烏爾薩向前跳 %hop_distance% 距離並猛擊地面帶來強烈的衝擊，對附近範圍內的所有敵方單位造成傷害並減速 %abilityduration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_earth: Ursa leaps forward %hop_distance% units and slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for %abilityduration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_overpower_Desc: 烏爾薩的戰鬥技巧提升他接下來幾次普攻的攻速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_overp: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_fury_swipes_De: 烏爾薩的利爪深深地撕裂敵人的傷口；每次普攻會施加一層怒火狂擊減幅，使普攻基於攻擊目標身上的怒火狂擊減幅層數造成更多傷害。傷口會在烏爾薩未繼續攻擊達 %bonus_reset_time% 秒後恢復。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_fury_: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after %bonus_reset_time% seconds, the bonus damage is lost.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_enrage_Descrip: 烏爾薩進入狂暴狀態，首先移除自己身上的所有減幅，接著在此狀態下提升狀態抗性，並使自身所有承受傷害減少 %damage_reduction%%%。\n\n驅散類型：強力
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_enrag: Ursa goes into a frenzy, providing damage reduction and status resistance. Removes any existing debuffs.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter_rocket_b: 向自轉旋翼機周圍一定範圍內的敵方單位發射一連串的火箭。持續 %abilityduration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter_homing_m: 放出一枚在升空後會自動前去追擊目標單位的追蹤飛彈，於擊中時造成傷害和暈眩。飛彈會在起飛後逐漸增加飛行速度。敵方單位可在飛彈命中前將其擊毀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target. Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter_flak_can: 自轉旋翼機架設高射火砲，使自己接下來的 %abilityduration% 秒做出的幾次普攻能擊中目標周圍一定範圍內的所有敵人。只有主要目標會受到暴擊等攻擊效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds or until the attacks are used.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter_call_dow: 呼叫兩枚先後抵達的導彈去轟炸目標區域，造成傷害和移動速度減緩效果。第一枚將於技能施放的 %missile_delay_tooltip% 秒後抵達，而第二枚將接著在 %missile_delay_tooltip% 秒後抵達。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter: Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area. After %missile_delay_tooltip% seconds, two missiles arrive in succession, with %missile_delay_tooltip% seconds between them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_char: 裂魂人緊盯一個敵方單位，開始無視一切物體的衝刺。衝刺目標及途中經過的所有敵方單位將受到巨力重擊。如果目標單位在裂魂人到達前死亡，則衝刺目標將會改為距離原目標最近的一個敵方單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_bre: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects.  All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash.  If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_empo: 裂魂人的高移動速度賦予他更強大的力量。他的存在也將被動地提升附近友方單位的移動速度。此技能可主動施放，%duration% 秒内進一步提升被動加速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_bre: Causes Spirit Breaker to gain power with higher movement speed. His presence increases the movement speed of nearby allied units. Can be cast to improve the movement speed bonus for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_grea: 令普攻一定機率暈眩並擊退對方，並造成相當於自身移動速度一定百分比的額外傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_bre: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_neth: 裂魂人遁入幽冥領域，從目標身旁再次出現，接著造成附帶額外傷害並擊退雙倍距離的當下等級的巨力重擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_bre: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage. Knocks back for double the normal distance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_acid_spra: 對指定區域噴灑出高壓酸液，使所有步入區域內的敵人護甲值降低並每秒承受傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.
Throw it before it blows up!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_unstable_: 煉金術士調製一瓶不穩定的化合物，能夠對敵方英雄投擲，並在其周圍造成傷害和暈眩。調製的時間越久，傷害越大，暈眩時間也越長。調製 %brew_time% 秒後達到最大傷害和暈眩時間。然而，如果 %brew_explosion% 秒後還不扔出去的話，則會在煉金術士自己手中爆炸。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After %brew_time% seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after %brew_explosion% seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_goblins_g: 煉金術士將從敵人和財智神符中萃取金幣，每次殺敵時獲得更多的基礎金錢和額外金錢。若煉金術士在擊殺一個單位後的 %duration% 秒內再度擊殺一個敵人並獲得金錢，則額外金錢的獲得量還將再度增加。此外還將使煉金術士從獎賞神符那獲得更多金錢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next %duration% seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield more gold.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_chemical_: 煉金術士誘發他的食人魔同伴進入化學狂暴狀態，降低基礎攻擊間隔，提升移動速度並使恢復速度激增。\n\n驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and health regeneration.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_quas_Descri: 讓召喚師掌握<font color='#7998b5'>冰元素</font>。每一點冰元素都將為召喚師提供一定的每秒生命恢復。\n
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_qu: Allows manipulation of ice elements. Each <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> instance provides increased health regeneration.\n
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_wex_Descrip: 讓召喚師掌握<font color='#d671a9'>雷元素</font>。每一點雷元素都將為召喚師增加一定的攻擊速度和移動速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_we: Allows manipulation of storm elements. Each <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_exort_Descr: 讓召喚師掌握<font color='#cabe68'>火元素</font>。每一點火元素都將為召喚師提升一定的攻擊力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_ex: Allows manipulation of fire elements. Each <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> instance provides increased attack damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_empty1_Desc: 召喚師根據目前持有的<font color='#7998b5'>冰</font>、<font color='#d671a9'>雷</font>、<font color='#cabe68'>火</font>元素所融合而成的技能將置入此欄。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_em: Casting Invoke will replace this slot with one of ten unique spells based on Invoker's currently active <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>, and <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> buffs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_empty2_Desc: 召喚師根據目前持有的<font color='#7998b5'>冰</font>、<font color='#d671a9'>雷</font>、<font color='#cabe68'>火</font>元素所融合而成的技能將置入此欄。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_em: Casting Invoke will replace this slot with one of ten unique spells based on Invoker's currently active <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>, and <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> buffs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_cold_snap_D: 召喚師將敵人的熱量抽空，將其降到絕對零度，持續時間取決於<font color='#7998b5'>冰元素</font>的等級。敵人將受到傷害並被短暫凍結，於效力期間造成後續傷害將會進一步使敵人再度遭到短暫凍結並承受額外傷害。敵人能被凍結的頻率是固定的，但允許凍結的間隔時間將會隨著<font color='#7998b5'>冰元素</font>的等級提升而縮短。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_co: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_cold_snap_d: 急速冷卻持續時間（<font color='#7998b5'>冰元素</font>）：\n
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_ghost_walk_: 召喚師操縱冰雷之力纏繞自身，令自己隱形起來。元素的組合會使附近敵人的移動速度下降，減速效果取決於<font color='#7998b5'>冰元素</font>的等級，這也會降低召喚師的移動速度，減速對自身的影響程度會隨著<font color='#d671a9'>雷元素</font>的等級改善。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_gh: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, and slows Invoker as well based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_tornado_Des: 釋放出一道快速移動的龍捲風，將路徑上的敵方單位捲起，使其在空中無助的漂浮一段時間，然後落地摔死。最大距離取決於<font color='#d671a9'>雷元素</font>等級。吹起時間取決於<font color='#7998b5'>冰元素</font>等級。落地時將造成基礎傷害加上取決於<font color='#d671a9'>雷元素</font>等級的額外傷害。\n\n驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_to: Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Holds enemies in the air for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. Deals base damage plus added damage based on levels in <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_emp_Descrip: 召喚師在指定位置召喚出一道強力的電磁脈衝，%delay% 秒後爆炸。爆炸將覆蓋一定區域，並根據<font color='#d671a9'>雷元素</font>的等級損毀敵方的魔力，以及造成和損毀的魔力等量的傷害。而如果損毀到了敵方英雄的魔力，電磁脈衝還會將損毀掉的英雄魔力的 50% 轉移給召喚師。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_em: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after %delay% seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Deals damage for each point of mana drained.  If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50% of the mana drained.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_alacrity_De: 召喚師給友方單位灌注強大的能量，提升攻擊速度和傷害。攻擊速度提升程度取決於<font color='#d671a9'>雷元素</font>的等級，攻擊力提升取決於<font color='#cabe68'>火元素</font>的等級。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_al: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> and their damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_chaos_meteo: 召喚師從宇宙中召喚一顆燃燒的流星襲擊指定位置。流星著陸後會向前滾動一段距離，繼續造成傷害。輾壓傷害和持續傷害取決於<font color='#cabe68'>火元素</font>的等級，滾動距離取決於<font color='#d671a9'>雷元素</font>的等級。受到效果影響的單位會被點燃並依據<font color='#cabe68'>火元素</font>等級受到持續傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_ch: Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>, and rolling further based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time, receiving additional damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_chaos_meteo: 每秒燃燒傷害（<font color='#cabe68'>火元素</font>）：\n
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_sun_strike_: 向目標區域釋放毀滅性的陽炎之光能量，能量在著陸後將對區域內的敵人進行灼燒，傷害取決於<font color='#cabe68'>火元素</font>的等級，且會平均分攤給區域內的所有敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_su: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Deals damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>, however this damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_ice_wall_De: 在召喚師前方製造一堵寒冰之牆，冰牆持續時間取決於<font color='#7998b5'>冰元素</font>的等級。寒冰之牆放射出的寒冰之氣將對敵方單位造成減速和傷害，減速程度取決於<font color='#7998b5'>冰元素</font>的等級，每秒傷害取決於<font color='#cabe68'>火元素</font>的等級。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_ic: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> and deals damage each second based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_deafening_b: 召喚師在自己前方釋放出超強的聲波，對所有敵方單位造成傷害，傷害取決於<font color='#cabe68'>火元素</font>的等級。聲波的絕對衝擊能夠將敵方單位擊退，擊退時間取決於<font color='#7998b5'>冰元素</font>的等級，並同時令其無法進行攻擊，禁止攻擊時間取決於<font color='#d671a9'>雷元素</font>的等級。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_de: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, then disarm their attacks for a duration based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_curse_of_t: 詛咒目標區域內的敵方英雄，使他們在背負詛咒期間受到持續傷害和移動速度減緩。且每當對方施放技能時，詛咒的持續時間將會延長。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_c: Curses the target area, causing enemy heroes to take damage and slowing their movement speed. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_glaives_of: 沉默術士用他的智慧強化他的闊刃，使普攻造成基於他智力屬性的額外傷害，並且暫時竊取對方的智力屬性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_g: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence. Silencer temporarily steals his target's Intelligence with each hit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_last_word_: 向目標施加詛咒，若目標在詛咒期間施放技能或詛咒結束，他將會受到傷害並被沉默。遺言傷害具有取決於施效者和受效者之間智力屬性差異的浮動值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_l: Enchants a target, providing vision of them and causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires. Deals extra damage based on the difference in intelligence between Silencer and the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_global_sil: 沉默術士消滅一切聲音，阻止地圖上所有敵方英雄和單位進行施法。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_g: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_fountain_glyph_Des: 此建築物暫時不受任何傷害動搖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_fountain_: This structure is briefly impervious to damage.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_pudge_rot: Causes damage to every fighter in a radius every second.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sange_buf: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sange_and_yasha_bu: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，攻擊速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sange_and: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_eul_cyclone_Descri: 被旋風吹起，您不受到傷害但無法行動。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_eul_cyclo: Swept up in a cyclone, you are invulnerable and unable to act.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sheepstick_debuff_: 您是隻豬。無法攻擊和施法。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sheepstic: You are a pig. Cannot attack or cast spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_shivas_guard_: 攻擊速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%，生命恢復/治療/吸血降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_LIFESTEAL_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_shiv: Attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and regeneration by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_LIFESTEAL_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_skadi_slow_De: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，攻擊速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_skad: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_ancient_jangg: 移動速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%。\n攻擊速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_anci: Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.\nAttack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_smoke_of_deceit_De: 隱形、移速提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%、且不會顯示在敵方小地圖上。詭計之霧的遮蔽效果將隨著做出普攻、與敵方英雄或防禦塔相距 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% 以內而破除。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_smoke_of_: Invisible, moving %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% faster, and hidden from the minimap. Attacking or moving within %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% range of an enemy hero or tower will break the invisibility.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_desolator_buff_Des: 黯滅的腐蝕攻擊使護甲降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% 點。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_desolator: Desolator attacks reduced your armor by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_invisibility_descripti: 進入為期 45 秒的隱形狀態。此狀態將隨著做出普攻、施放技能或者使用道具而破除。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_rune_invisibility_: Become invisible for 45 seconds.  This invisibility is broken by attacking or by using an ability or item.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_regeneration_descripti: 恢復至最大生命和魔力
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_rune_regeneration_: Regenerates health and mana to maximum.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_regen_Descrip: 每秒恢復 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% 生命和 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% 魔力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_rege: Regenerating %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% HP and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% mana per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_invis_Descrip: 攻擊行為將導致隱形效果終止。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_dustofappeara: 即使具有隱形狀態也會被敵人看到。隱形時移動速度下降 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_dust: Can be seen by enemies and slowed when invisible. Slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lina_fiery_soul_De: 提升攻擊速度 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% 和移動速度 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lina_fier: Attack Speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and Movement Speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_warlock_shadow_wor: 作為敵人將受到持續傷害，作為友方則受到持續治療。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_warlock_s: Taking periodic damage if an enemy, and periodic heal if a friend.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_warlock_golem_perm: 在地獄火附近時受到傷害
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_warlock_g: Taking damage while near the golem
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kobold_taskmaster_s: 地靈長官殘酷地追求效率，提升他和附近所有友方的移動速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kobold_tas: The Kobold Foreman's cruel efficiency increases his movement speed and the movement speed of all nearby allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_khan_endura: 令人生畏的地獄熊怪攻擊起來更為迅捷，並威脅附近友方一起這樣做。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_kh: The fearsome Hellbear Smasher attacks more quickly and bullies nearby allies into following suit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_khan_war_st: 半人馬征服者用強而有力的蹄踐踏地面，對附近周遭敵人造成傷害和暈眩效果。英雄單位從暈眩狀態甦醒的速度較快。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_kh: The Centaur Conqueror's powerful hooves stomp the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemies. Heroes recover more quickly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gnoll_assassin_enve: 豺狼人刺客用他自己混合的痛苦捕食者毒液浸透他的武器。英雄解除中毒狀態較快。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gnoll_assa: The Vhoul Assassin has soaked his weapons in his own blend of painful predator venoms. Heroes recover from the poison more quickly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ghost_frost_attack_: 鬼魂放出的詭異攻擊，讓敵人感受到刺骨的寒冷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ghost_fros: The Ghost launches an eerie attack that chills her enemies to their bones.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ghost_frost_attack: 降低移動速度 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% 並降低攻擊速度 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ghost_fro: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_polar_furbolg_ursa_: 地獄熊怪擊碎者將他巨大的手掌猛烈拍合，發出震耳欲聾的爆音。爆音傷害附近敵人並掀倒他們。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_polar_furb: The Hellbear Smasher claps his massive hands together, creating a deafening blast. The blast damages nearby enemies and throws them off their footing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_polar_furbolg_ursa: 降低移動速度 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% 並降低攻擊速度 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_polar_fur: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_neutral_spell_immun: 這個生物不受大部分魔法的影響。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_neutral_sp: This creature does not feel the effects of most magical spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_frost_arm: 食人魔寒霜法師召喚一層看不見的冰氣圍住目標友方單位，提升他的護甲值並短暫減速任何膽敢攻擊他的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_: The Ogre Frostmage summons an invisible layer of icy air that surrounds the target friendly unit, increasing its armor and temporarily slowing any enemies that dare attack it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi_frost_ar: 提升護甲 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%。敵方近戰單位會受到移動和攻擊減速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi: Armor increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS%. Enemy melee units that attack will suffer reduced movement and attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi_frost_ar: 降低移動速度 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% 並降低攻擊速度 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_troll_warlord_: 黑暗巨魔召喚師向一個敵人腳下扔出誘捕網，使他暫時無法移動，被網住的單位仍然可以攻擊和使用技能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_troll: The Dark Troll Summoner tosses netting around an enemy's feet, briefly immobilizing the unit, though the unit can still attack and use abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_troll_warlord_: 黑暗巨魔召喚者攪動腳下的大地，從死亡巨魔的屍體中招出兩隻骷髏戰士為他作戰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_troll: The Dark Troll Summoner stirs the ground underfoot, raising the remains of trolls long dead, bringing to life two skeleton Warriors who will fight at his side.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_giant_wolf_critical: 巨狼兇猛的攻擊有時會撕裂敵人的肌腱，造成致命傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_giant_wolf: The Giant Wolf's ferocious attacks occasionally tear a vital tendon, inflicting critical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alpha_wolf_critical: 殘忍的頭狼抓住任何破綻攻擊敵人要害，造成致命傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alpha_wolf: The cruel Alpha Wolf attacks his enemy's unprotected vitals at every opportunity, inflicting critical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alpha_wolf_command_: 頭狼無情的攻擊造成額外傷害。在他的帶頭指揮下，周圍友軍的攻擊也同樣殘忍無情。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alpha_wolf: The Alpha Wolf's ruthless attacks do extra damage. His commanding presence inspires nearby allies to attack ruthlessly as well.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tornado_tempest_Des: 召喚出一道龍捲風襲捲附近所有敵人，持續造成緩速效果和傷害。和龍捲風中心近到一定距離的敵人將承受較大傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tornado_te: The Tornado's overpowering winds slow all nearby enemies, flinging debris at them and inflicting damage every second. Enemies closer to the center of the Tornado take more damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tornado_tempest_de: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，攻擊速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%。距離龍捲風很近時將受到較大傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tornado_t: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%. Taking damage per second based on proximity to the Tornado.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enraged_wildkin_tor: 持續施法 - 梟獸召喚精神之風，創造並控制一股有知覺的龍捲風。龍捲風對周圍所有敵方單位造成減速和傷害。龍捲風不受任何傷害，可以隨意移動。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enraged_wi: CHANNELED - The Wildwing Ripper calls on the spirit of the wind, creating a sentient Tornado that he can control. The Tornado slows nearby enemies and does damage. It is invulnerable and can move anywhere.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enraged_wildkin_tou: 梟獸酋長已經狂怒到無法自拔的境界，使它和附近的友軍能夠承受更多傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enraged_wi: The Wildwing Ripper's fury numbs it to attacks and inspires nearby allies to withstand more blows.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_trickster_pur: 薩特放逐者通曉所有的詭計，讓他能移除友方身上的減幅效果或者敵人身上的增幅效果。且若目標是敵人的話，對方的移動速度還將隨之下降。\n\n驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_tric: The Satyr Banisher knows every trick in the book, allowing him to remove debuffs from allies or buffs from enemies. His trickery also slows the enemy's movement.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_soulstealer_m: 薩特竊靈者偷走敵人靈魂的一塊碎片，燃燒掉目標的一些魔力並造成等量傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_soul: The Satyr Mindstealer removes a fragment of his enemy's soul, burning away some mana and dealing damage equal to the amount of mana burned.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_hellcaller_sh: 薩特苦難使者劈開一條通向地獄的不穩裂縫，產生一道直線穿過地面的震波，對擊中的敵人造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_hell: The Satyr Tormenter tears open an unstable rift to the underworld, creating a shockwave that travels in a line along the ground, dealing damage to enemies it hits.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_hellcaller_un: 薩特苦難使者的惡魔之力讓他散發出恢復能量，提升他和附近友方的生命恢復能力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_satyr_hell: The Satyr Tormenter's demonic communion allows him to emanate regenerative power, increasing the health regeneration of himself and all nearby allies.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_satyr_hel: Health regeneration increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_forest_troll_high_p: 丘陵巨魔祭司對目標友方施放神聖祝福，恢復部分生命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_forest_tro: The Hill Troll Priest lays his holy blessing upon the target ally, replenishing some health.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_harpy_storm_chain_l: 鷹身女妖風暴巫師對目標敵人釋放一道高壓閃電，造成傷害。閃電會在附近敵人之間彈跳，並隨著每進行一次彈跳後損失一些威力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_harpy_stor: The Harpy Stormcrafter releases a high-voltage bolt of electricity at the target enemy, dealing damage. The bolt jumps to other nearby enemies, losing power with each jump.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_black_dragon_splash: 周圍所有敵人都感受到黑龍的爆炸性攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_black_drag: The Black Dragon's explosive attacks are felt by all nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_blue_dragonspawn_so: 龍人護衛呈現飄逸的姿態，讓他難以被擊中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_blue_drago: The Drakken Sentinel has assumed a partially ethereal form, making him difficult to hit with attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_blue_dragonspawn_ov: 龍人士兵快速四處移動，讓他難以被擊中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_blue_drago: The Drakken Armorer moves about quickly, making him difficult to hit with attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_blue_dragonspawn_ov: 龍人士兵完全致力於他的職志，提升他對物理傷害的忍耐力。附近友方受他影響，也可承受更多傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_blue_drago: The Drakken Armorer is wholly devoted to his cause, increasing his tolerance for physical attacks. Nearby allies are similarly devoted to the Overseer and are able to withstand more blows.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_big_thunder_lizard_: 遠古雷隱獸用它巨大的身體猛擊地面。震擊傷害附近敵人並掀倒他們。英雄恢復平衡較快。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_big_thunde: The Ancient Thunderhide slams his mammoth body against the ground. The shock damages nearby enemies and throws them off their footing. Heroes regain their balance more quickly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_big_thunder_lizard: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，攻擊速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_big_thund: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_big_thunder_lizard_: 遠古雷隱獸令一位友方變得疾速瘋狂，提升對方的攻擊速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_big_thunde: The Ancient Thunderhide works an ally into a frenzy, causing his ally to have increased attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aegis_Descript:
被動：重生

死亡 %reincarnate_time% 秒後在原地滿血滿魔復活。

不朽守護有為期 %disappear_time_minutes_tooltip% 分鐘的保存期限，時間到時將會消失並產生一個持續 5 秒的恢復效果（療效會隨著受傷而中斷）。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aegis:
Passive: Reincarnation

Brings you to life with full health and mana %reincarnate_time% seconds after you die, at the location where you died.

Reincarnation must be used within %disappear_time_minutes_tooltip% minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aegis_Lore: 據說不朽者擁有一面能幫他躲過死亡的盾牌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aegis: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_arcane_ring_De:
主動：補充魔力

為周圍友方英雄恢復 %mana_restore% 魔力。

施效範圍：%radius%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_arcan:
Active: Replenish Mana

Restores %mana_restore% mana to all nearby allies.

Radius: %radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Descrip:
切換：「不潔之力」開關

開啟時，提升 %unholy_bonus_damage% 普攻傷害、%unholy_bonus_strength% 點力量、%unholy_bonus_armor% 護甲，且每秒流失 %unholy_health_drain_per_second_tooltip% 生命。

開啟期間的生命流失和關閉後的力量加成消退最多使血量降至 1 點，不會致使用者死亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armle:
Toggle: Unholy Strength

When active, Unholy Strength grants +%unholy_bonus_damage% damage, +%unholy_bonus_strength% strength and +%unholy_bonus_armor% armor, but drains %unholy_health_drain_per_second_tooltip% health per second.

You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Lore: 能讓你成為野獸的武器，持有者犧牲自己的生命能量來獲得巨大力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armle: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_assault_Descri:
被動：強襲靈氣

提升附近友方單位和建築 %aura_attack_speed% 攻速和 %aura_positive_armor% 護甲，降低附近敵方單位 %aura_negative_armor% 護甲。

施效範圍：%aura_radius%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_assau:
Passive: Assault Aura

Grants %aura_attack_speed% attack speed and %aura_positive_armor% armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by %aura_negative_armor%.

Radius: %aura_radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_assault_Lore: 在幽冥地帶的深淵鍛造，這件地獄盔甲提高整支軍隊的裝甲和攻擊速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_assau: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_basher_Descrip:
被動：碎顱重擊

近戰/遠程普攻有 %bash_chance_melee%%%/%bash_chance_ranged%%% 機率造成 %bonus_chance_damage% 額外物理傷害和 %bash_duration% 秒的暈眩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bashe:
Passive: Bash

Grants melee heroes a %bash_chance_melee%%% chance on hit to stun the target for %bash_duration% seconds and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus physical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is %bash_chance_ranged%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_basher_Lore: 正確使用下會是件恐怖的武器，不要低估這把大槌粉碎對手防禦的能力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bashe: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_belt_: A valued accessory for improving vitality.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury_Descript:
主動：劈砍樹木

摧毀目標樹木。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%\n

被動：壓制

普攻會對非英雄單位造成額外傷害，額外傷害效力將取決於攻擊者的攻擊類型，近戰為 %quelling_bonus%，遠程為 %quelling_bonus_ranged%。\n

被動：波及

近戰普攻造成的傷害有 %cleave_damage_percent%%% 會擴散給攻擊目標附近 %cleave_distance% 範圍內的其他敵人，擴散率對小兵為 %cleave_damage_percent_creep%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury:
Active: Chop Tree

Destroy a target tree.

Cast Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against non-hero units by %quelling_bonus% for melee heroes, and %quelling_bonus_ranged% for ranged. \n

Passive: Cleave

Deals %cleave_damage_percent%%% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to %cleave_distance% around the target. Deals %cleave_damage_percent_creep%%% against creeps. (Melee Only)
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury_Lore: 持有這把強大斧頭的人可以一次砍倒一片敵海。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_black_king_bar:
主動：天神下凡

進入技能免疫狀態。持續時間將隨每用一次而降低。

持續時間：%duration%
驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_black:
Active: Avatar

Grants Spell Immunity. Duration decreases with each use.

Duration: %duration%
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_black_king_bar: 蓄集巨人之力的強大法杖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_black: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade_mail_Des:
被動：傷害反射

被動地隨著被敵人普攻向攻擊者造成該次普攻傷害 %passive_reflection_pct%%% + %passive_reflection_constant% 的反射傷害。\n

主動：傷害反射

進入為期 %duration% 秒的全面傷害反射狀態，使被動傷害反射的反射率提升 %active_reflection_pct%%%、同時不拘攻擊形式去反射在此狀態下承受的所有傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade:
Active: Damage Return

For %duration% seconds, the damage returned from all sources is increased by %active_reflection_pct%%%.\n

Passive: Damage Return

Everytime you are attacked, you return %passive_reflection_constant% damage plus %passive_reflection_pct%%% of the attack damage dealt to you.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade_mail_Lor: 覆蓋著尖銳刀鋒的盔甲，戰鬥中可以用來做出不顧自身安危的烈士行為。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blades_of_atta: 不要低估這裡面小刀片所藏的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade_of_alacr: 一把充滿時間魔法的長刃。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade: A long blade imbued with time magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink_Descript:
主動：閃躍

傳送至目標位置。有效距離 %blink_range%。

閃躍匕首將隨著使用者承受來自敵方英雄或羅煞的攻擊而失靈 %blink_damage_cooldown% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink:
Active: Blink

Teleport to a target point up to %blink_range% units away.

Blink Dagger cannot be used for %blink_damage_cooldown% seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink_Lore: 傳說中這塊大陸上來去如風的刺客使用的匕首。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bloodstone_Des:
主動：血之契約

將自身最大魔力的 %mana_cost_percentage%%% 轉換成持續 %restore_duration% 秒的生命恢復。\n

被動：魔力電池

每點能量被動地提升 %regen_per_charge% 魔力恢復和 %amp_per_charge%%% 技能增強。血精石具備 %initial_charges_tooltip% 點初始能量，將在附近有英雄死亡時獲得 %kill_charges%，和在裝備者死亡時損失 %death_charges% 點能量。提供 %mana_regen_multiplier%%% 魔力恢復速率加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blood:
Active: Bloodpact

Converts %mana_cost_percentage%%% of your max mana to health regeneration over %restore_duration% seconds.\n

Passive: Mana Battery

Each charge provides %regen_per_charge% MP regen and %amp_per_charge%%% Spell Amp. Nearby kills provide %kill_charges% charges. Dying causes you to lose %death_charges% charges. Starts with %initial_charges_tooltip% charges.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bloodstone_Lor: 血精石鮮紅的色彩在戰場上絕對不會被看錯，擁有者似乎有無限的生命力和精力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blood: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_boots_Lore: 腳穿舒適靴，步伐快輕盈。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_boots_of_elves: 這種富有彈性的材質輕巧又便於行動。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_boots: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bottle_Descrip:
主動：恢復

消耗一口的水量於 %restore_time% 秒間恢復 %health_restore% 生命和 %mana_restore% 魔力。恢復效果將隨著受效者承受來自敵方英雄或羅煞的攻擊而喪失。

魔瓶會自動在泉源附近裝滿。

按住【左 Ctrl 鍵】便可對友方英雄使用。

使用距離：%abilitycastrange%\n

被動：儲存神符

神符可在裝備著魔瓶的情況下拾取來儲存 2 分鐘，到期時自動啟動。

儲存神符可裝滿魔瓶的水量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bottl:
Active: Regenerate

Consumes a charge to restore %health_restore% health and %mana_restore% mana over %restore_time% seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

The Bottle automatically refills at the fountain.

Hold Control to use on an allied hero.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Store Rune

Runes can be stored in the bottle for later use by right-clicking them. Unused runes will automatically activate after 2 minutes.

Using a stored rune fully refills the Bottle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bottle_Lore: 一個流傳至今的古老瓶子，內部空間隨著時間的流逝逐漸擁有魔力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bottl: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bracer_Lore: 護腕是一種常見增強防禦和延長壽命的選擇。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_brace: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_branches_Lore: 一根看起來很普通的樹枝，它如鋼鐵般堅硬的品質賦予持有者好運。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_branc: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_broadsword_Lor: 騎士經典的武器選擇，這把闊劍殺起敵來既堅韌又牢靠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_broad: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_buckler_Descri:
被動：玄明護甲

提升附近友方英雄及屬下單位 %bonus_aoe_armor% 護甲。

施效範圍：%bonus_aoe_radius%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_buckl:
Passive: Buckler Aura

Grants %bonus_aoe_armor% armor to allied player units.

Radius: %bonus_aoe_radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_buckler_Lore: 一面強大的盾牌賜予攜帶者過往英雄們的力量，它能在戰鬥中為整支軍隊提供保護。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_buckl: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_butterfly_Lore: 只有最強大最老練的戰士才能攜帶蝴蝶，但它也在戰場上提供無可比擬的靈活敏捷作為回報。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_butte: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_chainmail_Lore: 金屬鎖鏈製成的編織盔甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_chain: A medium weave of metal chains.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cheese_Descrip:
使用：啊嘶

吃掉乳酪，瞬間恢復 %health_restore% 生命和 %mana_restore% 魔力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_chees:
Use: Fondue

Instantly restores %health_restore% health and %mana_restore% mana.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cheese_Lore: 一個久未謀面的熊怪供應商用奶做的乳酪，能瞬間恢復品嘗者的活力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_chees: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_circlet_Lore: 為人類公主們設計的雅致頭環。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_circl: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_clarity_Descri:
使用：補魔

對目標施加每秒 %mana_regen% 的魔力恢復效果，持續 %buff_duration% 秒。

補魔效果將隨著受效者承受來自敵方英雄、防禦塔、或羅煞的傷害而喪失。

使用距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_clari:
Use: Replenish

Grants %mana_regen% mana regeneration to the target for %buff_duration% seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_clarity_Lore: 能增強冥想能力的清水。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_clari: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_claymore_Lore: 一把能劈透盔甲的劍，通常是是蓄勢待發的劍士所首選的武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_claym: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cloak_Lore: 一件用魔法材料製成的斗篷，可以驅散一切施加於其上的魔法。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cloak: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_courier_Descri:
使用：部署信使

叫出一個提供貨運服務的小幫手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_couri:
Use: Deploy Courier

Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_courier_Lore: 弄丟信使會被判處死亡的懲罰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_couri: Losing the courier is punishable by death.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flying_courier:
使用：升級信使

升級我方陣營的動物信使為飛行信使，令其獲得不受地形阻礙的移動能力來更為迅捷地運貨。

此道具需搭配一隻已出場的動物信使才能使用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flyin:
Use: Upgrade Courier

Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base.

Requires a deployed Animal Courier.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_Descri:
主動：龍捲風

把目標單位吹起至空中 %cyclone_duration% 秒，並使其於期間呈無敵狀態。龍捲風只能對敵方單位或自身施放。

若目標為敵方單位，則對方還將於落地時承受 %tooltip_drop_damage% 魔法傷害。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclo:
Active: Cyclone

Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for %cyclone_duration% seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself.

Enemy units take %tooltip_drop_damage% magical damage upon landing.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_Lore: 一支從久遠年代流傳下來的神秘權杖，能招來破壞性的龍捲風行善或作惡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclo: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_Descript:
主動：能量衝擊

向目標敵方單位噴射一道強勁的魔法傷害。此道具可進行升級。

傷害：%damage%
施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
魔耗：%mana_cost_tooltip%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon:
Active: Energy Burst

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %abilitycastrange%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_Lore: 越使用威力就越大的次級法杖，讓持有者的魔法從指尖噴湧而出。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_2_Descri:
主動：能量衝擊

向目標敵方單位噴射一道強勁的魔法傷害。此道具可進行升級。

傷害：%damage%
施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
魔耗：%mana_cost_tooltip%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon:
Active: Energy Burst

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %abilitycastrange%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_2_Lore: 越使用威力就越大的次級法杖，讓持有者的魔法從指尖噴湧而出。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_3_Descri:
主動：能量衝擊

向目標敵方單位噴射一道強勁的魔法傷害。此道具可進行升級。

傷害：%damage%
施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
魔耗：%mana_cost_tooltip%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon:
Active: Energy Burst

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %abilitycastrange%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_3_Lore: 越使用威力就越大的次級法杖，讓持有者的魔法從指尖噴湧而出。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_4_Descri:
主動：能量衝擊

向目標敵方單位噴射一道強勁的魔法傷害。此道具可進行升級。

傷害：%damage%
施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
魔耗：%mana_cost_tooltip%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon:
Active: Energy Burst

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %abilitycastrange%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_4_Lore: 越使用威力就越大的次級法杖，讓持有者的魔法從指尖噴湧而出。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_5_Descri:
主動：能量衝擊

向目標敵方單位噴射一道強勁的魔法傷害。

傷害：%damage%
施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
魔耗：%mana_cost_tooltip%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon:
Active: Energy Burst

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %abilitycastrange%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon_5_Lore: 越使用威力就越大的次級法杖，讓持有者的魔法從指尖噴湧而出。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dagon: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_demon_edge_Lor: 由惡魔鐵匠阿布茲迪安鍛造的最古老的武器之一，一出爐就殺死了它的鍛造者。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_demon: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_desolator_Desc:
被動：腐蝕

普攻會降低目標 %corruption_armor% 護甲 %corruption_duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_desol:
Passive: Corruption

Your attacks reduce the target's armor by %corruption_armor% for %corruption_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_desolator_Lore: 這件邪惡並且嗜血的武器，通常用於折磨政治犯。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_desol: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_diffusal_blade:
主動：抑止

減緩目標敵方單位的移速 %purge_slow_duration% 秒。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%\n

被動：破魔

普攻會燃燒目標 %feedback_mana_burn% 魔力，並隨每燃燒掉 1 魔力造成 %damage_per_burn% 物理傷害。

破魔的效力由幻象單位運用時有別於一般英雄，近戰幻象每次可燃燒 %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_melee% 魔力，遠程幻象每次可燃燒 %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_ranged% 魔力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_diffu:
Active: Inhibit

Targets an enemy, slowing it for %purge_slow_duration% seconds.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Manabreak

Each attack burns %feedback_mana_burn% mana from the target, and deals %damage_per_burn% physical damage per burned mana.

Burns %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_melee% mana per attack from melee illusions and %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_ranged% mana per attack from ranged illusions.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_diffusal_blade: 一把直接切入敵人靈魂的魔力之刃。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_diffu: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_diffusal_blade:
主動：抑止

移除目標敵方單位身上的增幅效果並減緩對方移速 %purge_slow_duration% 秒。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%\n

被動：破魔

普攻會燃燒目標 %feedback_mana_burn% 魔力，並隨每燃燒掉 1 魔力造成 %damage_per_burn% 物理傷害。

破魔的效力由幻象單位運用時有別於一般英雄，近戰幻象每次可燃燒 %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_melee% 魔力，遠程幻象每次可燃燒 %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_ranged% 魔力。

驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_diffu:
Active: Purge

Targets an enemy, removing buffs from the target and slowing it for %purge_slow_duration% seconds.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Manabreak

Each attack burns %feedback_mana_burn% mana from the target, and deals %damage_per_burn% physical damage per burned mana.

Burns %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_melee% mana per attack from melee illusions and %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_ranged% mana per attack from ranged illusions.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_diffusal_blade: 一把直接切入敵人靈魂的魔力之刃。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_diffu: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dust_Descripti:
使用：顯影

撒出顯影之塵，揭露周遭 %radius% 範圍內的隱形敵方英雄 %duration% 秒，並於期間減緩對方移速 %movespeed%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dust_:
Use: Reveal

Reveals and slows invisible heroes by %movespeed%%% in a %radius% radius around the caster for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_eagle_Lore: 這個神秘的號角捕捉雄鷹嘹亮的呼嘯，能給予聽見這聲音的英雄幾近無限的敏捷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_eagle: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_energy_booster: 在嘗試增強他們的戰鬥存在感時，巫師們通常會把這塊寶石添加入收藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_energ: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ethereal_blade:
主動：虛化衝擊

發射一枚虛靈彈把目標單位變成虛靈形態，於期間免疫於物理傷害，無法進行普通攻擊，且降低 %ethereal_damage_bonus%%% 魔法抗性。虛靈狀態持續時間將取決於目標是友方還是敵方，友方為 %duration_ally% 秒，敵方為 %duration% 秒。

若目標是敵人，虛化衝擊還將向對方造成施放者主要屬性 %blast_agility_multiplier% 倍 + %blast_damage_base% 的魔法傷害，還有為幅 %blast_movement_slow%% 的移速減緩效果。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ether:
Active: Ether Blast

Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and %ethereal_damage_bonus%%% more vulnerable to magic damage. Lasts for %duration_ally% seconds on allies and %duration% seconds on enemies.

Enemy targets are also slowed by %blast_movement_slow%%%, and take %blast_agility_multiplier%x your primary attribute + %blast_damage_base% as magical damage.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ethereal_blade: 一把忽隱忽現的陰森刀刃，可以在物理和魔法兩個平面上造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ether: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flask_Descript:
使用：塗抹藥膏

對目標施加每秒 %health_regen% 的生命恢復效果，持續 %buff_duration% 秒。

療效將隨著受效者承受來自敵方英雄或羅煞的傷害而喪失。

使用距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flask:
Use: Salve

Grants %health_regen% health regeneration to the target for %buff_duration% seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flask_Lore: 即使最嚴重的傷口也能快速治癒的魔法藥膏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flask: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_force_staff_De:
主動：原力

令任何目標單位向其面對方向位移 %push_length% 距離。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_force:
Active: Force

Pushes any target unit %push_length% units in the direction it is facing.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_force_staff_Lo: 讓您可以操縱他人，不論出於善或惡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_force: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gauntlets_Lore: 帶來野獸般力量的釘飾皮革手套。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gaunt: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gem_Descriptio:
被動：真實視野

賦予裝備者 %radius% 範圍大的真實視野來揭露範圍內隱形的敵方單位。\n

被動：永恆

真視寶玉會於裝備者死亡後掉落供任何人撿起，且無法被摧毀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gem_D:
Passive: True Sight

Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within %radius% range of its carrier. \n

Passive: Everlasting

Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ghost_Descript:
主動：幽靈形態

進入幽靈形態 %duration% 秒，於期間免疫於物理傷害，無法進行普通攻擊，且降低 %extra_spell_damage_percent%%% 魔法抗性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ghost:
Active: Ghost Form

You enter ghost form for %duration% seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and %extra_spell_damage_percent%%% more vulnerable to magic damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ghost_Lore: 賜予使用者幽靈般的姿態，讓他們避開物理性的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ghost: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gloves_Lore: 一雙讓手中的武器變的似乎沒有重量的魔法手套。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_glove: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_greater_crit_D:
被動：暴擊

普攻有 %crit_chance%%% 機率造成 %crit_multiplier%%% 的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_great:
Passive: Critical Strike

Grants each attack a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal %crit_multiplier%%% damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_greater_crit_L: 這件武器有著驚人的力量，即使是最強的戰士也難以掌控它。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_great: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hand_of_midas_:
主動：煉金

瞬間擊殺目標非英雄單位，使其發放 %xp_multiplier% 倍的擊殺經驗獎勵和 %bonus_gold% 金錢獎勵。

無法對遠古單位施放。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hand_:
Active: Transmute

Kills a non-hero target for %bonus_gold% gold and %xp_multiplier%x experience.

Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hand_of_midas_: 以未知的魔法手段維持的彌達斯之手，是件貪婪的武器，透過犧牲生靈來填滿持有者的腰包。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hand_: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_headdress_Desc:
被動：恢復靈氣

提升附近友方單位 %aura_health_regen% 每秒生命恢復。

施效範圍：%aura_radius%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_headd:
Passive: Regeneration Aura

Grants %aura_health_regen% health regeneration to allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_headdress_Lore: 製造一個寬慰的靈氣在戰鬥中為友方恢復生命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_headd: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_heart_Descript:
被動：恢復增強

增強所有生命恢復 %hp_regen_amp%%%。

加深效果將隨著裝備者承受來自敵方英雄或羅煞的攻擊而中止，中止時間將取決於裝備者的攻擊類型，近戰為 %cooldown_melee% 秒，遠程為 %cooldown_ranged_tooltip% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_heart:
Passive: Regeneration Amplification

Increases all passive health regeneration by %hp_regen_amp%%%.

If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan, this amplification is disabled for %cooldown_melee% seconds for melee heroes, or %cooldown_ranged_tooltip% seconds for ranged heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_heart_Lore: 已絕種怪物的心臟，能提升攜帶者的耐久力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_heart: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_of_iron_w: 一位戰死沙場的傳奇武士穿戴過的頭盔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_of_the_do:
主動：支配

控制一個非英雄、亦不屬於遠古類型的敵方或中立單位。受控制者會獲得 %creep_bonus_damage% 普攻傷害、%creep_bonus_armor% 護甲、%creep_bonus_hp_regen% 每秒生命恢復、%creep_bonus_mp_regen% 每秒魔力恢復，並且有 %speed_base% 的基礎移速和 %health_min% 的基礎血量。

受控制者會因為血量先天上高於 %health_min% 而維持原血量。受控制者的擊殺金錢獎勵會改為 %bounty_gold%。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_:
Active: Dominate

Takes control of one neutral, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to %speed_base% and max health to a minimum of %health_min%. Also provides the unit with +%creep_bonus_damage% base attack damage, +%creep_bonus_hp_regen% health regen, +%creep_bonus_mp_regen% mana regen and +%creep_bonus_armor% armor.

Dominated units with a max health of greater than %health_min% retain their original max health. Dominated unit's bounty is set to %bounty_gold% gold.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_of_the_do: 死去的死靈法師留下的可怕頭盔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hood_of_defian: 一頂巫師們所害怕、具有魔法抗性的皮質兜帽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hood_: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hyperstone_Lor: 一塊刻有神秘紋路的石頭，能夠提升攜帶者的激情。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hyper: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_invis_sword_De:
主動：暗影步

進入為期 %windwalk_duration% 秒的影刃隱形狀態，於期間提升 %windwalk_movement_speed%%% 移速並能忽略單位碰撞。施放技能或使用道具會使此狀態提前結束。

趁此狀態做出的普攻將為暗影步攻擊，額外造成 %windwalk_bonus_damage% 物理傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_invis:
Active: Shadow Walk

Makes you invisible for %windwalk_duration% seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move %windwalk_movement_speed%%% faster and can move through units.

If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain %windwalk_bonus_damage% bonus physical damage on that attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_invis_sword_Lo: 一位殞落君王的寶劍，讓你可以隱身移動並從暗處發動襲擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_invis: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_javelin_Descri:
被動：穿刺

普攻有 %bonus_chance%%% 機率穿透迴避屬性並造成 %bonus_chance_damage% 額外魔法傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_javel:
Passive: Pierce

Grants each attack a %bonus_chance%%% chance to pierce through evasion and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus magical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_javelin_Lore: 一把相當有特色的長槍，用來攻擊時有時會刺穿敵人的盔甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_javel: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lesser_crit_De:
被動：暴擊

普攻有 %crit_chance%%% 機率造成 %crit_multiplier%%% 的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lesse:
Passive: Critical Strike

Grants each attack a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal %crit_multiplier%%% damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lesser_crit_Lo: 用稀有水晶鍛造的劍刃，會尋找敵人護甲的脆弱處。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lesse: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lifesteal_Desc:
被動：生命吸取

普攻造成的傷害中有 %lifesteal_percent%%% 會轉成自我治療。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lifes:
Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for %lifesteal_percent%%% of attack damage dealt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lifesteal_Lore: 這個面具會吸取被它凝視之人的生命力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lifes: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sphere_Descrip:
被動：法術抵擋

每 %block_cooldown% 秒阻擋一次大部分的鎖定性法術。\n

主動：轉移法術抵擋

將法術抵擋效果從此道具持有者暫時轉移給一位友方目標 %block_cooldown% 秒。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_spher:
Passive: Spellblock

Blocks most targeted spells once every %block_cooldown% seconds.\n

Active: Transfer Spellblock

Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for %block_cooldown% seconds.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sphere_Lore: 這個有魔力的球體曾經保護了一位歷史上最有名的英雄。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_spher: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_maelstrom_Desc:
被動：連鎖閃電

普攻有 %chain_chance%%% 機率釋放一道連鎖閃電，對 %chain_radius% 連鎖範圍內的目標逐一各造成 %chain_damage% 魔法傷害。每道連鎖閃電最多能擊中 %chain_strikes% 名目標。觸發連鎖閃電的那次普攻將穿透迴避屬性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_maels:
Passive: Chain Lightning

Grants a %chain_chance%%% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between %chain_strikes% targets within a %chain_radius% radius, dealing %chain_damage% magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_maelstrom_Lore: 神祇親自打造的戰錘，漩渦可以在攻擊中發動閃電的力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_maels: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_stick_De:
主動：充能

依照累積的能量點數瞬間補充生命和魔力。每點補充 %restore_per_charge% 生命和魔力。

能量會每當周圍 %charge_radius% 範圍內有可見的敵人施放技能而自動獲得，最多累積 %max_charges% 點。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic:
Active: Energy Charge

Instantly restores %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored.

Max %max_charges% charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_stick_Lo: 一把簡易但實用的魔棒，能夠補充使用者的能量--從巫師學徒到高級術士都無不喜愛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_wand_Des:
主動：充能

依照累積的能量點數瞬間補充生命和魔力。每點補充 %restore_per_charge% 生命和魔力。

能量會每當周圍 %charge_radius% 範圍內有可見的敵人施放技能而自動獲得，最多累積 %max_charges% 點。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic:
Active: Energy Charge

Instantly restores %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored.

Max %max_charges% charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic_wand_Lor: 一把簡易但實用的魔杖，能夠補充使用者的能量--從巫師學徒到高級術士都無不喜愛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_magic: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_manta_Descript:
主動：鏡像

基於自己製造出 %images_count% 個能持續 %tooltip_illusion_duration% 秒的幻象。
