近戰鏡像將造成 %tooltip_damage_outgoing_melee%%% 傷害並承受 %tooltip_damage_incoming_melee_total_pct%%% 傷害。而遠程鏡像將造成 %tooltip_damage_outgoing_ranged%%% 傷害並承受 %tooltip_damage_incoming_ranged_total_pct%%% 傷害。

主動功能冷卻時間將取決於使用者的攻擊類型，遠程會較近戰多 %tooltip_ranged_cooldown_increase% 秒。

驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_manta:
Active: Mirror Image

Creates %images_count% images of your hero that last %tooltip_illusion_duration% seconds.

Melee images deal %tooltip_damage_outgoing_melee%%% damage and take %tooltip_damage_incoming_melee_total_pct%%% damage, while Ranged images deal %tooltip_damage_outgoing_ranged%%% and take %tooltip_damage_incoming_ranged_total_pct%%% damage.

Cooldown increased by %tooltip_ranged_cooldown_increase% seconds on ranged heroes.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_manta_Lore: 用反光材料製成的斧頭，能夠混淆敵軍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_manta: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mantle_Lore: 由歷代多位睿智的女王傳承下來之鑲有藍寶石的華麗斗篷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mantl: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mask_of_madnes:
主動：狂怒

提升 %berserk_bonus_movement_speed% 移速和 %berserk_bonus_attack_speed% 攻速 %berserk_duration% 秒，但於期間喪失 %berserk_armor_reduction% 護甲並受到沉默。\n

被動：生命吸取

普攻造成的傷害中有 %lifesteal_percent%%%% 會轉成自我治療。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mask_:
Active: Berserk

Gives %berserk_bonus_attack_speed% attack speed and %berserk_bonus_movement_speed% movement speed, but reduces your armor by %berserk_armor_reduction% and silences you. Lasts %berserk_duration% seconds.\n

Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for %lifesteal_percent%%% of attack damage dealt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mask_of_madnes: 一旦戴上這個面具，持有者就會變成無法控制的好戰分子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mask_: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mekansm_Descri:
主動：恢復

治療周圍 %heal_radius% 範圍內友方單位 %heal_amount% 生命。\n

被動：梅肯斯姆靈氣

提升附近 %aura_radius% 範圍內的友方單位 %aura_health_regen% 每秒生命恢復和 %aura_armor% 護甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mekan:
Active: Restore

Heals %heal_amount% health to allied units in a %heal_radius% radius.\n

Passive: Mekansm Aura

Grants %aura_health_regen% health regeneration and %aura_armor% armor to allied units in a %aura_radius% radius.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mekansm_Lore: 各種分散的配件莫名其妙完美地組合起來，形成的散發著光芒的珠寶。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mekan: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mithril_hammer: 由純粹的秘銀打造而成的錘子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mithr: A hammer forged of pure mithril.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjollnir_Descr:
主動：靜電蓄積

對目標單位施加一個靜電護盾 %static_duration% 秒，使對方於期間會隨著受到普攻有 %static_chance%%% 機率對攻擊者和一旁的另外 %static_strikes% 名敵人釋放閃電，逐一對各目標造成 %static_damage% 魔法傷害。

施加距離：%abilitycastrange%\n

被動：連鎖閃電

普攻有 %chain_chance%%% 機率釋放一道連鎖閃電，對 %chain_radius% 連鎖範圍內的目標逐一各造成 %chain_damage% 魔法傷害。每道連鎖閃電最多能擊中 %chain_strikes% 名目標。觸發連鎖閃電的那次普攻將穿透迴避屬性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjoll:
Active: Static Charge

Places a charged shield on a target unit for %static_duration% seconds which has a %static_chance%%% chance to release a %static_damage% magical damage shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and %static_strikes% additional enemies.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Chain Lightning

Grants a %chain_chance%%% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between %chain_strikes% targets within a %chain_radius% radius, dealing %chain_damage% magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjollnir_Lore: 索爾的魔法之錘，由矮人名匠布魯克和伊特理打造。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjoll: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_monkey_king_ba:
被動：穿刺

普攻有 %bash_chance%%% 機率穿透迴避屬性並造成 %bonus_chance_damage% 額外魔法傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_monke:
Passive: Pierce

Grants each attack a %bonus_chance%%% chance to pierce through evasion and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus magical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_monkey_king_ba: 一位偉大的戰士曾經用過的獨特戰棍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_monke: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mystic_staff_L: 完全由最貴重的水晶製作的謎之法杖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mysti: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_necronomicon_L: 死靈書在死靈術與惡魔學界中的地位就宛如聖杯，它有著一股強大的邪惡力量封印在其書頁之下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_necro: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_necronomicon_2: 死靈書在死靈術與惡魔學界中的地位就宛如聖杯，它有著一股強大的邪惡力量封印在其書頁之下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_necro: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_necronomicon_3: 死靈書在死靈術與惡魔學界中的地位就宛如聖杯，它有著一股強大的邪惡力量封印在其書頁之下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_necro: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_null_talisman_: 鑲飾於鎖鏈上的小巧寶石。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_null_: A small gemstone attached to several chains.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ogre_axe_Lore: 光是帶著這把斧頭就足以變得更加強壯。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ogre_: You grow stronger just by holding it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_orchid_Descrip:
主動：靈魂燃燒

沉默目標單位 %silence_duration% 秒，並使對方於沉默期間承受的傷害有 %silence_damage_percent%%% 將隨著沉默結束轉為二次魔法傷害。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_orchi:
Active: Soul Burn

Silences the target unit for %silence_duration% seconds. At the end of the silence, %silence_damage_percent%%% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_orchid_Lore: 由火炎惡魔精華焠鍊出來的深紅法杖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_orchi: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_pers_: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_phase_boots_De:
被動：相位移動

在對 %attack_range_limit% 距離外的目標下達攻擊命令時獲得相位移動能力，於期間忽略單位碰撞、能夠迅速轉向、並提升移速。移速提升效力將取決於受效者的攻擊類型，近戰為 %phase_movement_speed%%%，遠程為 %phase_movement_speed_range%%% 。\n多雙靴子的移速加成效果不會疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_phase:
Active: Phase

Gives %phase_movement_speed%%% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and %phase_movement_speed_range%%% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for %phase_duration% seconds.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_phase_boots_Lo: 讓人能穿梭虛空的靴子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_phase: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_pipe_Descripti:
主動：抗魔護盾

為附近所有友方單位（包括建築）施加一道能夠抵擋 %barrier_block% 魔法傷害的護盾，護盾持續 %barrier_duration% 秒。

施效範圍：%barrier_radius%\n

被動：洞察靈氣

提升附近友方單位 %aura_health_regen% 每秒生命恢復，及 %magic_resistance_aura%%% 魔法抗性。

施效範圍：%aura_radius%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_pipe_:
Active: Barrier

Gives a shield that blocks %barrier_block% magic damage to all nearby allies. Lasts %barrier_duration% seconds.

Radius: %barrier_radius%\n

Passive: Insight Aura

Gives allied units %aura_health_regen% health regeneration and %magic_resistance_aura%%% magic resistance.

Radius: %aura_radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_pipe_Lore: 一件能施展抗拒法術結界卻來源不明的遠古神器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_pipe_: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_platemail_Lore: 保護整個上半身的沈重盔甲，小心別砸到腳。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_plate: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_poor_mans_shie:
被動：傷害抵擋

有特定機率抵擋承受的普攻傷害，效力將取決於受效者的攻擊類型，近戰為 %damage_block_melee%、遠程為 %damage_block_ranged%。

抵擋機率取決於攻擊者的單位類型，英雄為 100%、非英雄為 %block_chance%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_poor_:
Passive: Damage Block

Gives a 100% chance to block %damage_block_melee% damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and %damage_block_ranged% damage on ranged.

Has a %block_chance%%% chance to block damage from creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_poor_mans_shie: 破舊卻仍然堅固的老式盾牌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_poor_: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_power_treads_D:
主動：切換屬性

將道具被動提供的屬性在 %bonus_stat% 點力量、%bonus_stat% 點敏捷、或 %bonus_stat% 點智力間作切換。\n多雙靴子的移速加成效果不會疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_power:
Active: Switch Attribute

Switches between +%bonus_stat% Strength, +%bonus_stat% Agility, or +%bonus_stat% Intelligence.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_power_treads_L: 一雙厚實的皮靴，能根據穿著者的需求切換屬性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_power: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_quarterstaff_L: 設計簡單又能輕易揮舞的棍棒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_quart: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_quelling_blade:
主動：劈砍樹木

摧毀目標樹木。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%\n

被動：壓制

普攻會對非英雄單位造成額外傷害，額外傷害效力將取決於攻擊者的攻擊類型，近戰為 %damage_bonus%，遠程為 %damage_bonus_ranged%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_quell:
Active: Chop Tree

Destroy a target tree.

Cast Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against non-hero units by %damage_bonus% for melee heroes, and %damage_bonus_ranged% for ranged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_quelling_blade: 墮落小矮人的斧頭，能讓你有效率地在樹林中移動。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_quell: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_radiance_Descr:
切換：「炙耀靈氣」開關

開啟時，炙耀靈氣對附近敵人每秒造成 %aura_damage% 傷害，並令受效者的普攻有 %blind_pct%%% 機率落空。

施效範圍：%aura_radius%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_radia:
Toggle: Burn

When active, scorches enemies for %aura_damage% magical damage per second, and causes them to miss %blind_pct%%% of their attacks. Illusions deal %aura_damage_illusions% magical damage per second.

Radius: %aura_radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_radiance_Lore: 一把能以耀眼光芒灼盡四周敵人的神聖兵器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_radia: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_rapier_Descrip:
被動：永恆

聖劍會於裝備者死亡後掉落供任何人撿起，且無法被摧毀。

掉出的聖劍在經手敵人後將能讓任何人運用，原有者的隊友在該聖劍經手敵人前都只能幫撿而不能用。信使無法撿起聖劍。

被動：真實打擊

你的普攻不會落空。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_rapie:
Passive: Everlasting

Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.

Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up and is killed. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier. \n\n

Passive: True Strike

Your attacks cannot miss.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_rapier_Lore: 隱藏於劍身之中的強大力量使之從未被一人主使駕馭過。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_rapie: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_reaver_Lore: 一把開山斷岳的強力巨斧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_reave: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_refresher_Desc:
主動：重置冷卻時間

重置所有道具和技能的冷卻時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_refre:
Active: Reset Cooldowns

Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_refresher_Lore: 為巫師製作的強力神器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_refre: A powerful artifact created for wizards.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_relic_Lore: 一把足以改變戰爭形勢的遠古兵器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_relic: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_basili:
被動：聖殿靈氣

提升附近友方單位 %aura_mana_regen% 每秒魔力恢復。

施效範圍：%aura_radius%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_:
Passive: Basilius Aura

Grants %aura_mana_regen% mana regeneration to allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_basili: 這枚戒指是給予最偉大法師們的獎勵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_health: 在一個肥胖的半身人屍體下找到的閃亮戒指。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_protec: 能提供基本防禦的閃爍戒指。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_regen_: 小矮人們相信這個戒指有著帶來好運的魔力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_robe_Lore: 這件長袍會甫話使用者的心靈，卻能夠提升智力作為交換。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_robe_: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sange_Lore: 散華是一把異常精準的武器，會自動尋找對方的弱點所在。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sange: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sange_and_yash: 散華和夜叉經過月光的照耀而產生共鳴，雙劍合璧發揮出更大的威力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sange: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_satanic_Descri:
主動：不潔狂暴

提升生命吸取效力至 %unholy_lifesteal_total_tooltip%%%，持續 %unholy_duration% 秒。\n

被動：生命吸取

普攻造成的傷害中有 %lifesteal_percent%%% 會轉成自我治療。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_satan:
Active: Unholy Rage

Increases Lifesteal percentage to %unholy_lifesteal_total_tooltip%%% for %unholy_duration% seconds. \n

Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for %lifesteal_percent%%% of attack damage dealt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_satanic_Lore: 以靈魂為代價換取無法想像的強大力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_satan: Immense power at the cost of your soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sheepstick_Des:
主動：邪惡變形

把目標變成一隻柔弱的家畜 %sheep_duration% 秒，令其於期間受到沉默、受到禁聲、受到繳械，且基礎移速被降至 %sheep_movement_speed%。
若目標單位為幻象，則對方會直接被消滅。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sheep:
Active: Hex

Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for %sheep_duration% seconds. The target has a base movement speed of %sheep_movement_speed% and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.
Instantly destroys illusions.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sheepstick_Lor: 維斯教徒最為寶貴的聖物，法師們最為垂涎的武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sheep: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shivas_guard_D:
主動：極寒衝擊

向周圍擴張出一圈極寒波動，對波動內的敵人造成 %blast_damage% 魔法傷害和為幅 %blast_movement_speed%%% 的移速減緩效果 %blast_debuff_duration% 秒。

擴張範圍：%blast_radius%\n

被動：寒霜靈氣

降低周圍敵人 %aura_attack_speed% 攻速，削弱周圍敵人 %hp_regen_degen_aura%%% 生命恢復、治療、吸血。

施效範圍：%aura_radius%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shiva:
Active: Arctic Blast

Emits a freezing wave that deals %blast_damage% magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by %blast_movement_speed%%% for %blast_debuff_duration% seconds.

Radius: %blast_radius%\n

Passive: Freezing Aura

Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by %aura_attack_speed% and all heals, regeneration and lifesteal by %hp_regen_degen_aura%%%.

Radius: %aura_radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shivas_guard_L: 護甲上還保存着來自傳說中的女神之神力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shiva: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_skadi_Descript:
被動： 寒冰攻擊

普攻會對敵人施加持續 %cold_duration% 秒的寒冰攻擊減幅，對其造成攻移雙緩和生命恢復/生命吸取/技能生命吸取削弱效果。緩速效力將取決於目標的攻擊類型，近戰為 %cold_slow_melee% 攻速和 %cold_slow_melee%%% 移速，遠程為 %cold_slow_ranged% 攻速和 %cold_slow_ranged%%% 移速。生命恢復削弱效力為 %heal_reduction%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_skadi:
Passive: Cold Attack

Attacks lower enemy movement and attack speed and reduces heals, health regeneration, lifesteal and spell lifesteal by %heal_reduction%%% for %cold_duration% seconds. Slows enemy ranged units by %cold_slow_ranged%%% movement speed and by %cold_slow_ranged% attack speed. Slows enemy melee units by %cold_slow_melee%%% movement speed and by %cold_slow_melee% attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_skadi_Lore: 絲卡蒂之眼由蒼穹之龍看守的罕見遠古神器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_skadi: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_slippers_Lore: 這用蜘蛛皮做成的輕便鞋子能夠刺激你的感官。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_slipp: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sobi_mask_Lore: 法師與術士常用於舉辦各種儀式的面罩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_sobi_: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_soul_ring_Desc:
主動：犧牲

消耗自身 %health_sacrifice% 生命來暫時獲得 %mana_gain% 魔力 %duration% 秒。

若獲得的魔力值超出了角色的魔力上限，則超出的魔力並不會蒸發而是會被暫時儲存為額外的魔力來源。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_soul_:
Active: Sacrifice

Consume %health_sacrifice% health to temporarily gain %mana_gain% mana. Lasts %duration% seconds.

If the mana gained cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_soul_ring_Lore: 一只賴以穿戴者靈魂為生的戒指。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_soul_: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_staff_of_wizar: 一把由法師長老代代相傳的魔法之杖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_staff: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_stout_shield_D:
被動：傷害抵擋

有 %block_chance%%% 機率抵擋承受的普攻傷害，效力將取決於受效者的攻擊類型，近戰為 %damage_block_melee%、遠程為 %damage_block_ranged%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_stout:
Passive: Damage Block

Grants a %block_chance%%% chance to block %damage_block_melee% damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and %damage_block_ranged% damage on ranged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_stout_shield_L: 一個人的酒桶底蓋，在另一個人手裡就成了圓盾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_stout: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_talisman_of_ev: 能讓你預知到敵人攻擊並加以迴避的項鍊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_talis: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tango_Descript:
使用：吞食

吃掉一棵樹木來獲得 %health_regen% 每秒生命恢復，持續 %buff_duration% 秒。可吞食偵察/崗哨守衛。若吞食對象是守衛或鐵樹枝幹種出的快樂小樹，則療效翻倍。

購買時將一次購買一組，每組 %tooltip_charges% 個。可向友方英雄使用來分享一個木靈藥給對方。

使用距離：%abilitycastrange%
對守衛使用距離：%cast_range_ward%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tango:
Use: Devour

Consumes a target tree to gain %health_regen% health regeneration for %buff_duration% seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Comes with %tooltip_charges% charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

Tree Range: %abilitycastrange%
Forage to survive on the battlefield.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tpscroll_Descr:
使用：傳送

經過 %tooltip_channel_time% 秒的持續施法後，將您傳送至目標友方建築。

雙擊以直接傳送至我方泉源。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tpscr:
Use: Teleport

After channeling for %tooltip_channel_time% seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building.

Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_travel_boots_D:
升級：傳送卷軸

被動地升級裝備者身上的傳送卷軸，使其使用冷卻降低、用度不會消耗掉卷軸、以及變得夠向小兵和野怪傳送。\n多雙靴子的移速加成效果不會疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_trave:
Upgrade: Town Portal Scroll

Upgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units, reduces cooldown and does not consume a charge on usage. \nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ultimate_orb_L: 蘊含生命本質的神秘法球。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ultim: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ultimate_scept:
被動：技能升級

強化所有英雄的特定技能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ultim:
Passive: Ability Upgrade

Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ultimate_scept: 擁有半神之力的法師權杖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ultim: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_urn_of_shadows:
主動：靈魂釋放

向友方單位施放時每秒治療 %soul_heal_amount% 生命，向敵方單位施放時每秒造成 %soul_damage_amount% 傷害。

持續 %duration% 秒。

每當敵方英雄在 %soul_radius% 距離內死亡時獲得使用次數，只有最靠近死亡英雄的影之靈龕會獲得使用次數。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_urn_o:
Active: Soul Release

Provides %soul_heal_amount% health regeneration when cast on allies, and deals %soul_damage_amount% damage per second when cast on enemies.

Lasts %duration% seconds.

Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within %soul_radius% units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.

Cast Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_urn_of_shadows: 包含有強大的惡魔骨灰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_urn_o: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vanguard_Descr:
被動：傷害抵擋

有 %block_chance%%% 機率抵擋承受的普攻傷害，效力將取決於受效者的攻擊類型，近戰為 %damage_block_melee%、遠程為 %damage_block_ranged%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vangu:
Passive: Damage Block

Grants a %block_chance%%% chance to block %block_damage_melee% damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and %block_damage_ranged% damage on ranged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vanguard_Lore: 能夠讓持有者躲過最致命攻擊的強力盾牌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vangu: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vladmir_Descri:
被動：弗拉迪米爾靈氣

提升附近友方單位 %lifesteal_aura%%% 生命吸取、%damage_aura%%% 普攻傷害、%mana_regen_aura% 每秒魔力恢復。

施效範圍：%aura_radius%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vladm:
Passive: Vladmir's Aura

Grants %lifesteal_aura%%% lifesteal, %damage_aura%%% bonus damage, and %mana_regen_aura% mana regeneration to nearby allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vladmir_Lore: 被死去的吸血鬼怨念詛咒的面具。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vladm: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ward_observer_:
使用：設置

設置一個有著 %vision_range% 範圍的一般視野，持續 %duration_minutes_tooltip% 分鐘，並有著隱形狀態的偵察守衛。

按下此道具在道具欄中對應的熱鍵前先按住【Ctrl 鍵】即可接著以滑鼠游標點擊隊友來分享一個守衛給對方。

設置/傳遞距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ward_:
Use: Plant

Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives ground vision in a %vision_range% radius to your team. Lasts %duration_minutes_tooltip% minutes.

Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ward_sentry_De:
使用：設置

設置一個有著 %true_sight_range% 範圍的真實視野，持續 %duration_minutes_tooltip% 分鐘，並有著隱形狀態的崗哨守衛。

真實視野僅產生揭露隱形效果，需搭配能揭開戰爭迷霧的一般視野才可使我方能進而看見隱形的敵方單位。

按下此道具在道具欄中對應的熱鍵前先按住【Ctrl 鍵】即可接著以滑鼠游標點擊隊友來分享一個守衛給對方。

設置/傳遞距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ward_:
Use: Plant

Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a %true_sight_range% radius.
Lasts %duration_minutes_tooltip% minutes.

Does not grant ground vision.
Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_wraith_band_Lo: 總是迴響著微弱耳語的圓環。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_wrait: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_yasha_Lore: 夜叉可以稱得上有史以來最輕巧的武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_yasha: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_arcane_boots_D:
主動：補充魔力

為周圍友方單位恢復 %replenish_amount% 魔力。

施效範圍：%replenish_radius%\n多雙靴子的移速加成效果不會疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_arcan:
Active: Replenish Mana

Restores %replenish_amount% mana to all nearby allies.

Radius: %replenish_radius%\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_arcane_boots_L: 穿著這種靴子的法師在戰鬥中將更顯得法力高強。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_arcan: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_orb_of_venom_D:
被動：淬毒攻擊

普攻令目標中毒 %poison_duration% 秒，每秒造成 %poison_damage_melee% 傷害並減緩移動速度。緩速幅度取決於攻擊者的攻擊類型，近戰為 %poison_movement_speed_melee%%%，遠程為 %poison_movement_speed_range%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_orb_o:
Passive: Poison Attack

Poisons the target, dealing %poison_damage_melee% magical damage per second and slowing movement by %poison_movement_speed_melee%%% if the equipped hero is melee, or by %poison_movement_speed_range%%% if they are ranged. Lasts for %poison_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_orb_of_venom_L: 將你的武器淬上劇毒蜘蛛的毒液。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_orb_o: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ancient_janggo:
主動：堅韌

提升附近友方單位 %bonus_movement_speed_pct%%% 移速和 %bonus_attack_speed_pct% 攻速，持續 %duration% 秒。

施效範圍：%radius%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ancie:
Active: Endurance

Gives +%bonus_attack_speed_pct% attack speed and +%bonus_movement_speed_pct%%% movement speed to nearby allies for %duration% seconds.

Radius: %radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ancient_janggo: 在危難時刻能鼓舞周圍人士氣的遺物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ancie: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_medallion_of_c:
主動：勇氣

向友方施放時提升對方 %bonus_armor% 護甲並降低自身等量護甲。

向敵方施放時降低雙方 %bonus_armor% 護甲。

無法對具有技能免疫狀態的敵方目標施放。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_medal:
Active: Valor

If cast on an ally, grants them the %bonus_armor% armor, and removing it from the caster.

If cast on an enemy, reduces %bonus_armor% armor on both the enemy and the caster.

Cannot target spell immune enemies.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
The bearer has no fear of combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_smoke_of_decei:
使用：遮掩

立即遮掩使用者和周圍 %application_radius% 範圍內由玩家控制的友方單位，並提升受遮掩者 %bonus_movement_speed%%% 移速，持續 %duration% 秒。

詭計之霧的遮掩效果是種僅會隨著受遮掩者做出普攻、或與敵方英雄或防禦塔相距 %visibility_radius% 以內而破除的隱形效果。

真實視野無法揭露詭計之霧的遮掩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_smoke:
Use: Disguise

Turns the caster and all allied player-controlled units in a %application_radius% radius invisible, and grants %bonus_movement_speed%%% bonus movement speed for %duration% seconds.

Attacking, or moving within %visibility_radius% range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility.

Disguise grants invisibility that is immune to True Sight.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_veil_of_discor:
主動：魔法弱化

發出 %debuff_radius% 範圍大的魔法弱化波，使敵人承受的技能傷害加深 %spell_amp%%%。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
持續時間：%resist_debuff_duration% 秒。 \n\n

被動：聖殿靈氣

提升附近友方單位 %aura_mana_regen% 每秒魔力恢復。

施效範圍：%aura_radius%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_veil_:
Active: Magic Weakness

Cast a %debuff_radius% radius blast that causes enemies to take %spell_amp%%% increased damage from spells.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Duration: %resist_debuff_duration% seconds. \n\n

Passive: Basilius Aura

Grants %aura_mana_regen% mana regeneration to allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_st: 魅影之紗成員學習到的第一個技能，常做為後續攻勢的前導招式。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_as: The first skill learned by the Sisters of the Veil often signals an incoming hit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_ph: 茉崔蒂的絲綢面紗是她倒楣的目標最後所能看見的事物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_as: Mortred's silken veil is the last thing her unfortunate target sees.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_bl: 長期的冥想使得魅影之紗的成員能夠在作戰時周密地預知敵人的下一步。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_as: Meditation allows a Veiled Sister to carefully anticipate her opponents in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_co: 超凡之擊，茉崔蒂選擇賜予她的對手死亡以表敬意。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_as: A divine strike, Mortred honors her opponent by choosing them for death.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_hellf: 奧斯塔里昂呼喚他的詛咒之血，將敵人化作灰燼。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_k: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_vampi: 冥魂大帝的劍刃將敵人的精髓抽出，注入自己的靈氣。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_k: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_reinc: 冥魂大帝的逆臣一直很疑惑為何他能長生不死。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_k: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_waveform_: 輕鬆沖走敵人的滔滔洪水。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_morph_agi: 轉變為水液形態的變體精靈特質很難被辨別。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_morph_str: 轉變為水液形態的變體精靈特質很難被辨別。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_replicate: 原本因盯著變體精靈看而產生的映像，成了模仿得維妙維肖的複製品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_bloodra: 史德利古爾與人分享他那野獸般的嗜血饑渴。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeke: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_blood_b: 剝皮雙子永遠都樂意幫助戰場上的任何人捐血。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeke: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_thirst_: 史德利古爾聞到血腥味就會變得無比狂熱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeke: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_rupture: 當血魔追殺你時，受傷就意味著死亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeke: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_dual_breath_: 灼霜龍族每個物種分支的個體都擁有極端危險的龍息；而將各物種分支的特性混合起來簡直難以想像。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_dua: Pyrexae dragons have tremendously dangerous breath for each branch of the species; combining them is unimaginable.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_ice_path_Lor: 傑奇洛狡猾的右腦使出它的冰封天賦，用駭人的酷寒凍結大地。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_ice: Jakiro's cunning right head calls upon its frozen heritage, glazing the earth with blistering cold.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_liquid_fire_: 傑奇洛張開左邊的咽喉，摧毀正前方的任何事物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_liq: The left maw of Jakiro opens, laying waste to any in its path.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_macropyre_Lo: 將冰與火混合而成的極端溫度撕裂戰場。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_mac: Ice and fire combine to rip the battlefield to shreds with extreme temperatures.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_sticky_nap: 蝙蝠騎士給他的對手潑燃油時，經常能聽見他在喋喋不休。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_s: It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_flamebreak: 蝙蝠騎士選擇用燃燒彈作為武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_f: A molotov cocktail is the weapon of choice for Batrider.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_firefly_Lo: 當一個敵人逃進荒獄叢林時，大部分人都不得不先砍開擋住的樹叢。而蝙蝠騎士卻選擇直接將他的敵人，連同叢林一起破壞殆盡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_f: When an enemy escapes into the Yama Raskav Jungle, most would cut through the brush to find the fugitive.  Batrider just chooses to destroy the jungle along with his foes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_flaming_la: 就算蝙蝠騎士說免費，也幾乎沒人敢去騎他的蝙蝠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_f: Few dare to ask to ride on the bat, as Batrider gives them free of charge.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_plasma_field_: 閃電幽魂用電漿力量統治著永劫之墟。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_plas: The Lightning Revenant rules the Underscape with plasmatic power.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_static_link_L: 剃刀的極性吸引電流通向自身，以汲取他對手的力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_stat: Razor's polarity channels electricity into his being, draining the power of his opposition.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_unstable_curr: 閃電幽魂對於僅只是靠近者仍會予以電療獎勵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_unst: Merely approaching the Lightning Revenant is rewarded with shock therapy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spirit_static: 雷神風暴凱格用電分裂出自己形象的能力讓他能以令人為之震驚的方式自己欣賞自己。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spir: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spirit_electr: 雷神狂暴的雷霆力量總是讓其他人受到震懾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spir: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_crys: 莉萊周圍的溫度急劇下降，讓周圍的人被急速凍結。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_ma: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_fros: 莉萊引來藍心冰川的寒風，將敵人封禁在寒霜裡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_ma: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_bril: 低溫提升了魔法精華，莉萊的出現能夠讓盟友更頻繁地使用魔法而不必擔心消耗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_ma: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_free: 在她被流放的地方，莉萊學會了運用極寒領域來完全釋放她寒冰魔法的能力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_ma: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_torrent_Lore: 世界中心噴湧出的遠古洪流，應艦隊統帥的召喚而來。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_tor: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_tidebringer_: 迷失的鐵帆海軍靈魂依附在昆卡信賴的寶劍 - 潮汐使者之中，增強它對洪流惡魔的破壞力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_tid: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_x_marks_the_: 艦隊統帥諸多神秘能力中的一種，能用於戰鬥或娛樂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_x_m: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_ghostship_Lo: 鐵帆艦隊最後的戰艦雖然只是個幻影，但它給昆卡的敵人帶來的死亡卻是完全真實的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_gho: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_fatal_bonds: 將多重生命形式的生命體連接合而為一的遠古咒語。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_fa: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_shadow_word: 術士的奧術有無窮的用途，可以用來強化友方也可以用作詛咒去傷害敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_sh: Demnok's arcane arts have a myriad of uses, allowing them to be powerful friendly enchantments or damaging curses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_upheaval_Lo: 戴蒙操縱時空，削弱所有敵軍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_up: Demnok manipulates space-time, impairing entire armies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_rain_of_cha: 戴蒙釋放被他關在懼木法杖中的異界靈魂，在敵陣中造成毀滅性的襲擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_ra: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_arc_lightning_: 弧形閃電是宙斯在對付渺小凡人時最喜歡用的法術。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_arc_l: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_lightning_bolt: 對那些反叛的異教徒最震懾的天譴。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_light: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_static_field_L: 當雷神行於世間，空氣中充滿著靜電的爆裂聲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_stati: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_thundergods_wr: 天界之王毀滅一切膽敢反抗他的敵人，使他們無所遁形。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_thund: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_avalanche_Lore: 當受到山嶺巨人召喚時，毫無生氣的石頭也會具有殺傷力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_avala: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_toss_Lore: 小小那巨大的身形讓他能夠隨意拋起最強壯的勇士。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_toss_: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_grow_Lore: 親眼看著丘陵變成山巒是非常震撼的 - 特別是這座山將他的敵人毀滅的時候。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_grow_: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_illusory_orb_L: 頑皮的仙女龍很喜歡捉弄他人，一下子消失，然後在他們意想不到的地方出現。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_illus: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_waning_rift_Lo: 帕克淘氣地一笑，將它能中斷魔法流動的仙女粉塵灑出。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_wanin: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_phase_shift_Lo: 帶著嘲笑，帕克瞬間轉移到了它的異次元空間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_phase: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_dream_coil_Lor: 仙女龍散播混亂，讓敵人陷入栩栩如生的夢境，見證自己死亡的命運。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_dream: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_poison_touch: 少數攻擊性的德尊儀式之一，麻痺魔法經常顯示出它的有用之處。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_poi: One of the few Dezun rites used for offensive purposes, the paralytic enchantment often proves useful.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_shallow_grav: 只有經驗老道的暗影侍僧才能正確做出免死儀式。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_sha: Only a seasoned acolyte of the Shadow can properly perform the rite of preventing death.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_shadow_wave_: 雖然對暗影牧師來說，暗影波只是很簡單也很日常的儀式，不過它也確實是取勝的關鍵所在。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_sha: While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_weave_Lore: 戴佐在虛無之境的縹緲之旅讓他能將光與暗的力量融在一起，創造出有兩種力量的魔力波動。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_wea: His ethereal journey into the Nothl realm has allowed Dazzle to mend together the powers of light and dark, creating shifting waves of enchantments.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_battery_: 瑞托崔普某些更新裝備的裝置運作不良，所以就把它們拿來爆炸出去作為有效的進攻手段。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap: Some of Rattletrap's contraptions don't quite work correctly, so detonating them proves useful as an offensive maneuver.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_power_co: 發條技師最驕傲的發明之一就是他的能量齒輪 - 雖然有時會被他的隊友看輕。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap: One of Clockwerk's inventions of which he is most proud is the power cog - though it is sometimes despised by his allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_rocket_f: 最初用作節日的焰火，現在成了偵察和轟炸敵人的工具。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_hookshot: 鉤爪略顯笨重，卻能帶著更加厚重的發條裝甲在空中穿梭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap: A somewhat unwieldy device, the Hookshot sends the otherwise clunky Clockwerk armor flying through the air.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_nova_Lor: 冰霜法師艾斯瑞安從沒忘記哪怕是最簡單的冰系操控咒語。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_armor_Lo: 原本是為了在中埋伏自我防衛時打造的，巫妖能夠為他人施加一個強力的寒冰護體魔咒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost: Originally crafted during his ambush for self-defense, the Lich is capable of enchanting others with a formidable defense of frost magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_dark_ritual_Lo: 在艾斯瑞安還是人類的時候，從沒聽過他會對質疑他統治的人手下留情。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_dark_: It was not unheard of Ethreain to make examples out of those who contested his rule during his human life.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_chain_frost_Lo: 幾乎所有人都認為是冰霜法術中的終極咒語，艾斯瑞安的霜死之珠能用恐懼襲擊那些膽敢站出來反對他的人們。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_chain: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_gush_Lor: 在沉沒之島的競賽中，利維坦贏得了對公海的統治。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter: During his championship of the Sunken Isles, Leviathan gained mastery over the open sea.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_kraken_s: 鐵帆海軍裡有一個傳言，說是有隻強大的海獸，明明被矛刺中被劍砍傷依然能踐踏艦隊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter: Claddish navymen tell tales of a mighty sea-faring beast that suffered spear and sword but continued to lay waste to the fleet.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_anchor_s: 從艦隊統帥昆卡的一艘戰艦上偷來的重錨，被利維坦用作有效的近戰武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter: Stolen from one of Admiral Kunkka's flagships, Leviathan's heavy anchor proves useful as a melee weapon.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_ravage_L: 呼喚深海之神麥爾朗恩的舉動導致整支武裝艦隊在海上失蹤。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter: Calling to the abyssal god Maelrawn has resulted in entire armadas being lost at sea.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_ether: 最初是給流浪藝人開場作秀用的，羅斯塔的閃電能分成數叉來震擊不止一位對手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_sha: Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_voodo: 羅斯塔通常將自己變成一個小雞來結束表演——現在他把這個屈辱分享給別人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_sha: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_shack: 原本是一個自我防衛用的咒語，在師傅在滲色嶺被殺害之後，羅斯塔研發出了枷鎖咒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_sha: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_mass_: 耍蛇曾是演藝中的重頭戲；現在羅斯塔可以授予蛇力量，以服從他自己的吩咐。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_sha: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_malefice_Lor: 奇異的重力將敵人拉向黑洞的中心，將他們困在其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_mal: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_demonic_conv: 謎團有能力召喚其他空間的自己 —— 並把它轉化成一組作祟肉體空間的虛靈。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_dem: Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_midnight_pul: 世界的一部分緩緩墮至虛空。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_mid: A section of the world slowly descends into the void.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_black_hole_L: 大地隨著謎團毀滅的漩渦而戰慄，威力如同世界末日。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_bla: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_laser_Lore: 鮑西在他的地下實驗室改善了這把雷射岩石切割器，從沒考慮過它的作戰效用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_las: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_heat_seeking: 最後將鮑西救下來的玩意兒，是一個改良過的導引式火箭筒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_hea: The last contraption Boush was able to save was a retrofitted rocket launcher with a homing mechanism.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_march_of_the: 就算實驗室最後被封鎖了，呼叫機械兵團的無線電仍是通的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_mar: Even though the laboratory has since been sealed off, the ability to radio in robotic drones is still in working order.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_rearm_Lore: 這兒換塊新電池，那兒塞幾枚火箭彈，鮑西不斷改良現有的技術。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_rea: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_shrapnel_Lor: 卡德爾利眼的制式化步槍還能發射榴霰彈，對攻擊戰壕中的敵人很有用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_shr: Kardel's modular rifle also fires incendiary rounds, useful for assaulting entrenched locations.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_headshot_Lor: 童年時對潛行獸的胡亂射擊現在精練成攻擊敵人的技術。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_hea: Taking potshots at steepstalkers in his childhood has been thoroughly refined into perfect leads on enemy combatants.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_take_aim_Lor: 卡德爾總是保持自己待在遠處遠離傷害，同時仍能稱職地勝任狙擊手這職位 - 進行完美狙擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_tak: Kardel always takes it upon himself to stay as far from harm as he can while still performing his role - taking perfect aim.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_assassinate_: 為了能完成預言然後返回家鄉，卡德爾必須和參加古老考驗當天一樣，做出完美狙擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sniper_ass: In order to fulfill the prophecy and return to his home town, Kardel must make another shot as perfect as the one on the day of his ancient test.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_death_pul: 羅坦德吉利回收那些死在他手中的靈魂，為將來所用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_: Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_heartstop: 接近死靈法師就會感受到在他周圍的空氣中存在著瘟疫和災禍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_: Those who come within a short distance of Necrophos can feel pestilence and plague in the air.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_sadist_Lo: 羅坦德吉利利用受害者的靈魂搭起往返現世和來世之間的橋樑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_: Rotund'jere uses the souls of his victims as bridge from life to afterlife.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_reapers_s: 空氣中死亡和苦難的總和增強了死靈法師的瘟疫魔法。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necrolyte_: The amount of death and suffering in the air increases the power of Necrophos's plague magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_knight_breat: 龍騎士達維安的氣息已經變成那焚燒過無數騎士的神龍斯萊瑞克之龍息。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_kni: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_knight_drago: 達維安將龍族的天賦和騎士的戰鬥技巧完美結合，使他在近身肉搏中無比勇猛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_kni: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_knight_drago: 斯萊瑞克的血液流遍達維安的全身，使他的活力達到尋常騎士的兩倍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_kni: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_knight_elder: 達維安體內休眠著一個更為強大的形態，一個將傳奇騎士和神龍完美結合的形態。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_kni: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_phantom_assassin_b: 變得朦朧模糊，從敵方的視野中銷聲匿跡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_phantom_a: Blurring out to disappear from the enemy's sight.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_sprint_Lore: 斯拉達從深海來到陸地後，發現有必要用強而有力的尾巴衝刺來代替游泳。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_sp: As Slardar has made the transition from the Deeps, it has been necessary to use his powerful tail for sprinting instead of swimming.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_slithereen_: 強力的快速碎擊，濺起的水浪打破最堅固的防禦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_sl: A swift crush of might and water breaks even the toughest of defenses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_bash_Lore: 偷竊深海寶藏的盜賊在肉搏中領教了魚人守衛的殘暴之力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_ba: Thieves of the wealth of the Deep Ones meet the brutality of the Slithereen Guard in melee combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_amplify_dam: 再怎麼堅硬的護甲都還是免不了受海水侵蝕。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slardar_am: Even the strongest armor counts for little when left to the brine of the sea.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_wild_ax: 在獨自學習野外生存時，獸王也掌握了飛斧的運用技巧，使他能夠熟練的砍下樹木，或者敵人的腦袋。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaste: While learning to maneuver in nature alone, the Beastmaster also mastered the use of a pair of tomahawks, adept at cutting down trees as well as adversaries.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_call_of: 自兒時就開始與野生動物為伍之後，獸王便已習得如何在需要的時候召喚牠們為他效力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaste: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_inner_b: 獸王激起野獸天生力量的能力，在他劈打狂王斯洛姆的時候就已被察覺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaste: Beastmaster's ability to incite the innate strength of animals was seen in the mauling of the king of Slom.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_primal_: 獸王學會將他的原始本能凝聚為猛獸般的怒吼咆哮，攻擊一整排的敵軍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaste: The Beastmaster has learned to channel his primal instincts into an animalistic roar, causing devastation in the ranks of enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_venomous: 一種由基迪島叢林裡搜集的各種毒針、毒液和毒素混合而成的藥劑，幾乎沒有受害者能存活下來。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer: A concoction of various stings, poisons, and toxins gathered from the jungles of Jidi Isle, victims surviving it are rare.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_poison_s: 造成他變異的生物身上的癱瘓毒刺，現在屬於劇毒術士的了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer: The paralytic sting of the creature which caused his transformation now belongs to the Venomancer.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_plague_w: 將他以前的草藥學天賦和後天獲得的毒素專精混合，創造出了一個瘟疫活化複合體。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer: A mixture of his old herbalist talents and newfound toxic mastery creates a living embodiment of plague.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_poison_n: 濃酸密林中的生物通常會對攻擊者釋放毒氣來保命；而劇毒術士卻將這種瘟疫擴散出基迪島。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer: In the Acid Jungles, creatures releasing noxious poison to their attackers is common; Venomancer spreads this plague beyond the Jidi Isle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_void_time_: 暗懼者將時間撕出一個洞，穿過克拉錫利姆並瞬間重現出來。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_v: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_void_time_: 虛空假面的突襲伴隨著空間轉移之力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_v: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_void_chron: 當克拉錫利姆的裂痕出現時，所有不幸被其困住的可悲靈魂都將萬劫不復。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_v: When a rift opens to Claszureme, all poor souls caught within will likely never return.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_nether_blast_: 湮滅術包含一道來自三途川的震耳欲聾的青綠爆破。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_neth: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_decrepify_Lor: 童年時期遺留下來的癖好，現在帕格納精通於把人放逐到幽冥之境，不管是善還是惡，或者僅僅是他的一時心血來潮。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_decr: A now-mastered relic from his childhood, Pugna delights in banishing others into the Nether Realm, whether for good, evil, or simple enjoyment.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_nether_ward_L: 當還在湮滅寺廟研習湮滅術時，帕格納便學會了利用一個充有幽冥魔法的簡單守衛去支配他的同班同學。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_neth: While at the lamasery for the Arts of Oblivion, Pugna learned to dominate his classmates with a simple ward charged with Nether magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_life_drain_Lo: 帕格納已確實變得更為強大，甚至連湮滅術的前任掌門大師都不是對手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_life: Pugna has truly become more powerful than even the grandmaster of Oblivion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_purifica: 全知牧師們善於清除友方戰士們身心中的雜念。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight: Priests of the Omniscience are adept at removing impurities from fellow warriors.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_repel_Lo: 當面對著犧牲之淵時，普利斯特對魔法的適應力得到了歷練和認可。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_degen_au: 作為神聖的化身，普利斯特雷霆之怒的能力足以削弱那些不忠之徒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight: The holy embodiment of Purist Thunderwrath is enough to weaken those of lesser faith.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_guardian: 全知之神讓守護天使降臨那些被普利斯特稱為「朋友」的人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight: The All Seeing One casts down his protection over those that Purist calls friend.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_requiem_L: 釋放那些被捕獲的死者靈魂來毀滅他們生前的盟友。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_storm_bolt_Lor: 流浪劍客從他父親的學校裡取得的鑄鐵拳套能對敵人造成致命打擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_storm: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_great_cleave_L: 守夜騎士團仍然在試圖從斯溫那裡取回被奪走的棄誓之刃，一把能劈斬低等戰士的利劍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_great: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_warcry_Lore: 吟誦守夜人法典的法條能夠強化斯溫對他流浪的決心。好有詩意呀！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_warcr: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_gods_strength_: 憑藉能夠擊碎神聖之盔的力量，流浪劍客在近身肉搏中未嘗一敗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_gods_: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_frost_a: 覆蓋著寒冰的箭矢破空而出，將敵人凍結致死。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_range: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_silence: 翠拉克希絲對實際會戰時的寧靜尤為鍾愛，於是用她的卓爾天賦來中止對方法師的吟唱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_range: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_truesho: 翠拉克希絲在卓爾老家的森林中所獨處的時光讓她有時間教導其他弓箭手如何提升弓術。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_range: Traxex' time spent alone in the forests of her Drow home has allowed her to teach other archers how to improve their bow skills.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_marksma: 卓爾遊俠是神射手登峰造極的典型。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_range: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_poison_attack: 冥界亞龍天生帶有劇毒的呼吸能夠迅速的抽乾敵人的生命力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_pois: The Netherdrake's inborn toxic breath quickly drains the vitality of its afflicted.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_nethertoxin_L: 幽冥劇毒讓你的傷口更加致命，讓你的疲勞能夠致死。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_neth: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_corrosive_ski: 對那些攻擊冥界亞龍的人來說，接觸到它皮膚的刀刃被腐蝕是再正常不過的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_corr: It is not unusual for sword and shield alike to corrode in the very hands of those who attack the Netherdrake.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_viper_strike_: 曾經用於屠殺它那殘酷主人的招數，冥界亞龍毒素中最強大的一種，用來折磨那些膽敢激怒它的人來說再適合不過了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_vipe: Once used to slay his sadistic summoner, the most powerful of Netherdrake infections spreads through the veins of those foolish enough to cross Viper.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_vacuum_Lo: 伊許卡菲爾能隨心所欲地改變某一地區的引力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_: Ish'Kafel modifies the center of gravity to a place of his choosing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_ion_shell: 黑暗賢者打通「牆末幻境」，讓其中的稜刺力量滲透出來。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_: The Dark Seer slices holes into the 'Land Behind the Wall,' causing prismatic energy to seep forth.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_surge_Lor: 伊許卡菲爾曾經用他神速的心智在牆末幻境之間辨明方向。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_: Ish'Kafel once used his speed of mind to navigate the maze between the walls.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_wall_of_r: 儘管黑暗賢者不能回到他原來的國度，他仍能召喚出強大心智力量的璀璨幻牆，在敵人之間製造混亂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_: The Dark Seer, while unable to return to his natural realm, can channel part of the prismatic wall with powerful strength of mind, sowing confusion amongst enemy ranks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_spell_block_: 羅煞對狀態效果有為幅 25% 的抗性，且可每 15 秒一次抵擋阻擋一次鎖定性法術。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_spe: Roshan will block one targeted spell every 15 seconds. Also reduces status effects by 25%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_bash_Descrip: 羅煞的攻擊有一定機率造成暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_bas: Roshan has a chance to stun on attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_slam_Descrip: 羅煞猛擊地面，對周圍的敵人造成傷害和減速。猛擊的威力會每 1 分鐘成長一次。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_sla: Roshan slams the ground, damaging and slowing all nearby enemies. Slam's damage will increase every minute.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_devotion_Des: 羅煞擁有眾多的保護技能，其中包括 55%% 魔法傷害抗性、減輕來自幻象單位的傷害、以及會隨著時間推移而提升的護甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_roshan_dev: Roshan possesses numerous protective abilities, including 55%% magic damage resistance, the ability to reduce damage from attacking illusions, and a scaling armor bonus that increases as time goes on.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_untouch: 在攻擊愛由莎之後，大多數敵人都會因為弄傷這樣一位自然秀麗的美人而不知所措。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantres: After attacking Aiushtha, most opponents are overwhelmed with guilt having attacked such a natural beauty.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_enchant: 作為森林真正的管理員，無論是卑賤的巨魔還是強大的半人馬，愛由莎都會和他們成為朋友。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantres: A true steward of the forest, Aiushtha befriends all within it - from lowly trolls to powerful centaurs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_natures: 古靈精怪的森林小精靈所擁有的治癒力雖然微弱，但可以用數量彌補。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantres: Whimsical spirits of the woods possess a healing power that is quite subtle, but gains strength in numbers.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_impetus: 雖然愛由莎更喜歡和平的處事方式，但她還是有能力從遠處施展魔法攻勢，她擲出的長矛將透過大自然中充滿的生命力獲得力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantres: While Aiushtha favors peaceful means, she is capable of a magical onslaught from a distance, her spears gaining energy from the natural life around her.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_inner_vitali: 雖然哈斯卡很少用魔法，不過從戴佐還有德尊牧師那裡學來的次級強化術，在他嚴重受傷時經常使用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_inn: While Huskar has little use for magic, this minor enchantment was learned from the Dazzle and the Dezun priests, to be used in times of great injury.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_burning_spea: 神聖武士用自身的鮮血浸染武器，而後將其點燃，讓敵人承受遠超自己的痛苦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_bur: The Sacred Warrior ignites his weaponry after marking it with his own blood - causing far greater pain than he himself feels.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_berserkers_b: 從虛無之境逃出後，哈斯卡的力量會隨著血量的損失而增強，使他能夠造成致命的物理性破壞。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_ber: After losing his birthright, Huskar gained a lethality in physical combat that is only heightened as his own blood is spilled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_life_break_L: 哈斯卡不顧危險，衝入只有他能倖存的激烈肉搏近戰中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_lif: No matter the danger, Huskar thrusts himself into melees that only he can survive.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stalker_void_: 巴拉那製造一個無垠之夜的漩渦，將敵人猛烈地拉扯進永恆的黑暗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stal: Balanar creates a vortex of infinite night, tearing opponents violently into the eternal darkness that once was.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stalker_cripp: 巴拉那在那些擋在他面前卑微靈魂的腦袋中植入扭曲深淵的幻象。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stal: A vision of the twisted maw of Balanar etches itself into the minds of the poor souls unlucky enough to cross his path.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stalker_hunte: 巴拉那的狩獵技術隨著夜晚降臨而提升。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stal: The hunting prowess of Balanar improves as the night beckons.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stalker_darkn: 最令人感到羞恥的景象莫過於看到最強大的戰士都懼怕黑暗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stal: It is a humbling sight to see when the mightiest of warriors become afraid of the dark.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_spawn_s: 布萊克‧艾拉齊妮雅不斷撫育她的後代，即使是在戰場上。新孵化的小蜘蛛很快就學會如何支援他們的母親。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmothe: Black Arachnia continues to raise her young, even amidst the field of combat.  The brood quickly learns how to support their mother.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_spin_we: 編織出一張蛛絲床，艾拉齊妮雅的網保護她和她的後代，同時給予前進的敵人警告。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmothe: Weaving a bed of silken fibers, Arachnia's web both protects her and her offspring, as well as giving advancing opponents a sense of forboding.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_incapac: 布蕾克‧艾拉齊妮雅的尖牙中的麻痹毒液對侵入她的蜘蛛網中的敵人造成減速和痛苦的死亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmothe: Paralytic toxins come from Black Arachnia's fangs, causing a slow and painful death to those who intrude on her webs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_insatia: 大多數獵物都被她用絲繭裹了起來，作為飼料留給後代，育母蜘蛛自己則品嘗那些迷路的英雄。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmothe: While most of her prey is wrapped in silken cocoons and saved for her young, the Broodmother herself has a taste for wandering heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_the_swarm_Lo: 斯吉斯喀爾打開創世之紗的缺口，讓年輕的編織者穿越而出，幫助他戰鬥。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_the: Skitskurr opens a gap in the space time fabric, allowing young Weavers to slip through and aid him in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_shukuchi_Lor: 編織者曾為創世之紗工作，小小的蟲洞讓他們可以穿越時間來更容易發揮他們的手藝。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_shu: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_geminate_att: 斯吉斯喀爾與時間有著多變的聯繫，使他的動作被看見和感受到不止一次。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_gem: Skitskurr's relationship with time is somewhat variable, causing his actions to be witnessed - and felt - more than once.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_time_lapse_L: 如果斯吉斯喀爾認為世界目前的現實與他所渴望的不合，他就爬回過去的時間點來糾正錯誤。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_tim: If Skitskurr does not deem the current reality of the world to fit his desires, he simply crawls back in time to right what was wronged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_penitence_Lore: 儘管陳控制動物的能力還不足以控制敵方英雄，不過還是可以用來考驗他們的戰鬥意志。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_penit: Although Chen's brand of animal enthrallment isn't quite strong enough to control the minds of enemy heroes, it still tests their resolve in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_test_of_faith_: 教會騎士所掌握的狂熱魔法形式，不過大多數其他魔法師都認為沒什麼用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_test_: Knights of the Fold possess a fanatical form of magic that is considered quite unwieldy by most other users of arcane arts.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_holy_persuasio: 儘管他們可能當不了騎士，陳仍將野獸們納入教會，就像他自己當年改變信仰一樣。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_holy_: Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_hand_of_god_Lo: 利用他奴僕們與他的精神連接，陳給予他們完全的康復和幸福。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_hand_: Using the mental link with his thralls, Chen calls down restoration and well-being to those who share his fanaticism.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_spectral_da: 墨丘利的匕首將物理空間隱藏在暗影中，凡人在其中畏縮，幽鬼則變得強勢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_sp: Mercurial's dagger eclipses the physical plane in shadow, a state in which mortals cower, but spectres thrive.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_desolate_Lo: 戰士們常常發現只有一個墨丘利的幻象和他們在一起 - 不得不去質疑，這是不是真正的幽鬼。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_de: Often times, warriors find themselves alone with a vision of Mercurial - the fated question is if it is the true Spectre.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_dispersion_: 墨丘利的敵人往往會面臨一個令人卻步的考驗 - 嘗試用劍和魔法泯滅一個影子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_di: A daunting task lies before enemies of Mercurial - killing a shadow with blade and magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_haunt_Lore: 在戰鬥最激烈的時候，墨丘利將自己的物理形態分裂，朦朧的碎片在生者身邊作祟。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_ha: At the height of combat, Mercurial's physical manifestation shatters, and the shadowy pieces haunt those who still cling to life.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_reality_Lor: 分散的影子重新聚成一個真正的幽鬼。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_re: The scattered shadows unite into the one true Spectre.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_devour: 路西法的食慾和貪婪永遠不會得到滿足。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bring: Lucifer's appetite and greed are never sated.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_scorch: 墮落者在他所及之處散佈毀滅，他的火焰不寬恕任何人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bring: The Fallen One spreads destruction in his wake, sparing none from the flame which sustains him.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_doom_L: 當法軒昂都的喪鐘緩緩報出一個名字時，這名字主人的末日就將到來。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bring: When a name is tolled from the bell of Vashundol, doom is sure to follow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_apparition_: 卡爾德的存在將周圍的敵人吸入寒霜虛空，威脅將他們鎖進永恆的冰牢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_ap: Kaldr's presence draws those around him into a frozen void, threatening to lock them in an icy prison for eternity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_apparition_: 卡爾德帶來嚴峻的寒風，將戰爭變得更加刺骨。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_ap: Frozen, caustic winds are at the whim of Kaldr, chilling the field of battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_apparition_: 遠古幽魂的永恆知識為他的普攻帶來寒冰強化。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_ap: The Ancient Apparition's eternal knowledge brings a frigid enchantment to his attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_apparition_: 卡爾德的寒霜行體中流出遠古的寒冰風暴，將這個世界的居民凍結成他永恆力量的紀念碑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_ap: Ice storms from ages past flow through Kaldr's frosty limbs, crashing into the world and turning its inhabitants into monuments to his eternal power.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_acid_spra: 拉澤爾運用黑釀家族祖傳的煉金術調製出的強酸，就算是最堅硬的金屬也會被溶解。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_unstable_: 將整座山轉變成黃金的實驗失敗後帶來的副產品，這種易揮發的藥劑有著強大破壞的潛力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_goblins_g: 儘管不是一座山，不過拉澤爾還是掌握將一些較小的化合物轉化成金錢來填滿他荷包的技術。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_chemical_: 拉澤爾在越獄時給食人魔喝的釀造物成了激戰中的有效藥劑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prophet_carri: 克蘿貝露絲在鬼門關前來來回回聚集了一大群被詛咒的生物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prop: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_rage_L: 奈克斯的狂怒和殘暴讓他在戰鬥中異常凶狠無情。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: The madness and brutality of N'aix makes him a vicious and unrelenting foe in combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_feast_: 從德瓦克的監獄中逃離後，奈克斯就靠著吞噬那些擋路倒楣鬼的血肉維持生命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: After escaping from his cell in Devarque, N'aix subsisted on flesh and bones of those unfortunate to cross his path.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_open_w: 新鮮的傷口和鮮血的芳香通常能引來那些嗜血的清道夫。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: Fresh wounds and the scent of blood often draw out the scavengers to finish the job.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prophet_silen: 凝視敵人的命運之紗，克蘿貝露絲看到的是沉默的未來。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prop: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prophet_exorc: 伴隨著無數次的死亡，她前世死亡幻化出的女妖們總是縈繞於現世。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prop: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_infest: 奈克斯透過寄宿耗盡寄主的血液，恢復自己的不潔的力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: With this infestation, N'aix consumes the life blood of the host, restoring him back to full unholy power.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hunter_shuri: 儘管手裏劍很小，但剛鐸精確的準度令其能夠造成致命傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hun: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_earthshock_Lor: 雄性熊戰士強力的步伐撼動著大地，也動搖了敵軍的士氣。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_earth: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_overpower_Lore: 烏爾薩這等龐然大物卻有著難以聯想的敏捷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_overp: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_fury_swipes_Lo: 在自然中，很少有傷者能在飢餓的獵食者的攻擊下倖存。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_fury_: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_enrage_Lore: 烏爾薩任憑他的遠古之魂支配，成為戰場上最兇猛的生物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_enrag: Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_char: 巴拉森帶著狂蠻之力從黑暗中衝出。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_bre: Barathrum erupts from the darkness with unwieldy force.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_empo: 看到裂魂人在戰場上的霸主般風範，志向高遠的英雄隊友們也因此提升速度與力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_bre: Aspiring heroes gain speed and power from simply observing the Spirit Breaker's dominance on the battle field.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_grea: 巴拉森用幽靈般的球鏈造成致命性的一擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_bre: The signature strike of Barathrum's ghostly ball and chain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_neth: 巴拉森暫時回到他所在的領域，再一次帶回兩個世界的懲戒回擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_bre: Barathrum temporarily returns to the realm from where he came, bringing with him the retribution of both worlds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_curse_of_t: 無法使用咒語對諾崇來說毫無影響，但對於他的敵人來說可是個嚴重的問題。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_c: Nortrom's lack of incantations is less of a problem for him than it is for his adversaries.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_glaives_of: 雖然無法使用傳統咒語，風蝕之寒的血統卻賦予諾崇過人的智慧，並一併應用於他的物理攻擊上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_g: Although lacking in traditional incantations, Nortrom's pedigree of the Aeol Drias gives him uncanny wisdom, which he applies to physical combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_last_word_: 諾崇的敵人口中念出的咒語往往是他們最後的遺言。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_l: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_global_sil: 伴隨著一波掠過大地的衝擊，諾崇沉默了一切魔法和聲音，實現了他的預言。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_g: With a shock to the ground, all magic and sound pauses, and Nortrom fulfills his prophecy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_destroyer_: 在歿境毀滅者的普攻中附加額外傷害，附加量的多寡取決於歿境毀滅者的目前魔力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_d: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Devourer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_destroyer_: 將一名敵方或友方單位禁錮在星體牢籠中一段時間，令其呈現無敵和動彈不得的狀態。星體牢籠將於效力結束時隨之內爆，對禁錮對象以及附近 %radius% 範圍內的敵人造成傷害。獲得一次神智侵蝕使用次數。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_d: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals damage to the target and nearby enemies with %radius% range. Gains a Sanity's Eclipse charge.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_destroyer_: 提升自己的基礎魔力。沉浸在精華靈氣下的友方英雄將有一定機率隨著施放技能恢復一定百分比的最大魔力。不具冷卻時間、或能切換開關的技能將無法觸發精華靈氣。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_d: Whenever nearby allied Heroes or Outworld Devourer itself casts a spell, it gains a chance to restore a percentage of its mana pool.  Outworld Devourer also passively gains a bonus to its base mana pool.  Several skills with no cooldown and toggled spells cannot trigger Essence Aura.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_summon_wolves: 狼人身上的魔法不只能扭曲他的身形，更是還能讓他召喚出靈狼夥伴。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_summ: The very enchantment that twisted his being also summons canine familiars.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_summon_wolves: 召喚兩隻靈狼為狼人戰鬥。等級 3~4 的靈狼具有致殘技能，等級 4 的靈狼具有永久隱形技能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_summ: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan.  Level 3-4 wolves have Cripple, and level 4 wolves have permanent invisibility.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_howl_Lore: 令人毛骨悚然的狼嚎讓敵人清楚地瞭解貝恩霍勒就在他們周遭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_howl: Blood-curdling wolf cries signal to opponents that Banehallow is among them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_howl_Descript: 狼人和他的靈狼一起進行嚎叫，使他們周遭 %radius% 半徑內的敵人毛骨悚然而降低護甲和普攻傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_howl: Strikes fear into enemies, reducing armor and attack damage to all enemies within %radius% range of Lycan and his wolves.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_feral_impulse: 貝恩霍勒與群居狼群的獸性提升了他的本能反應和狩獵能力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_fera: His animalistic symbiosis with canine kind gives Banehallow enhanced reflexes and hunting capabilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_feral_impulse: 增加狼人及其屬下單位的每秒生命恢復和普攻傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_fera: Increases the HP regeneration and damage of Lycan and all units under his control.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_shapeshift_Lo: 雖然已成為狼人形態永遠的奴隸，但貝恩霍勒反而接納他的詛咒、擁抱他的獸性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_shap: Forever a slave to his lycanthropy, Banehallow has come to accept his curse, and embrace his own savagery.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_shapeshift_De: 狼人化為兇殘的巨狼形態，使狼人自己和所有聽命於他的單位獲得夜間視野加成和移動速度加成，並免疫於移動速度減緩效果。同時在巨狼形態結束前賦予狼人麾下的單位普攻暴擊能力，令其普攻能以 %crit_chance%%% 機率打出 %crit_multiplier%%% 的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_shap: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal a critical strike doing %crit_multiplier%%% damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_obsidian_destroyer: 施法後，你的魔力將有一定機率恢復一定百分比。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_obsidian_: After casting a spell, you have a chance to restore a percentage of your mana pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_obsidian_destroyer: 鎖入星體監牢，無法進行任何動作或被他人影響。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_obsidian_: Locked away in an Astral Prison, cannot act or be acted upon.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_ring_of_aquil: 魔力恢復提升 %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT_UNIQUE% 點，護甲提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS_UNIQUE% 點。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_ring: Mana regeneration increased by %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT_UNIQUE% and armor increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS_UNIQUE%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_heavens_halberd_bu: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，攻擊速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_heavens_h: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_heavens_halberd_de: 被天堂之戟繳械，無法攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_heavens_h: Disarmed by Heaven's Halberd, cannot attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_forest_troll_high_p: 為附近的友方提供額外魔力恢復。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_forest_tro: Provides bonus mana regeneration to all nearby allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_abyssal_blade_:
主動：深淵壓制

瞬間跳到目標面前並暈眩對方 %stun_duration% 秒。

深淵壓制可穿透技能免疫狀態。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%\n

被動：深淵重擊

近戰/遠程普攻有 %bash_chance_melee%%%/%bash_chance_ranged%%% 機率造成 %bonus_chance_damage% 額外物理傷害和 %bash_duration% 秒的暈眩效果。\n

被動：傷害抵擋

有 %block_chance%%% 機率抵擋承受的普攻傷害，效力將取決於受效者的攻擊類型，近戰為 %block_damage_melee%、遠程為 %block_damage_ranged%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_abyss:
Active: Overwhelm

Blinks to and stuns a target enemy unit for %stun_duration% seconds.

Pierces Spell Immunity.

Range: %abilitycastrange%\n

Passive: Bash

Grants melee heroes a %bash_chance_melee%%% chance on hit to stun the target for %bash_duration% seconds and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus physical damage. Bash chance for ranged heroes is %bash_chance_ranged%%%.\n

Passive: Damage Block

Grants a %block_chance%%% chance to block %block_damage_melee% damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and %block_damage_ranged% damage on ranged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_abyssal_blade_: 深淵統馭者的遺失之刃，可以切入敵人的靈魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_abyss: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_rod_of_atos_De:
主動：束縛咒

纏繞目標單位 %duration% 秒，令其於期間無法移動。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_rod_of_atos_Lo: 阿托斯，摧殘之主，將自己的精華儲存於這看似不起眼的魔杖中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_rod_o: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_heavens_halber:
主動：繳械

令目標失去普通攻擊的進行能力，效力將取決於受效者的攻擊類型，近戰為 %disarm_melee% 秒，遠程為 %disarm_range% 秒。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_heave:
Active: Disarm

Prevents a target from attacking for %disarm_melee% seconds on melee targets, and %disarm_range% seconds on ranged targets.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_heavens_halber: 這把戟能如輕武器一般揮動，讓持有者在决鬥中取得勝利
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_heave: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tranquil_boots:
被動：靜謐

獲得 %bonus_health_regen% 每秒生命恢復直到因為對英雄做出普攻或被英雄普攻而進入為期 %break_time% 秒的破損狀態，且於期間降至提供 %broken_movement_speed% 移速。\n多雙靴子的移速加成效果不會疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tranq:
Passive: Break

Whenever you attack a hero or are attacked by any unit, the bonus %bonus_health_regen% HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to %broken_movement_speed% for %break_time% seconds.\nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tranquil_boots: 雖然這雙靴子使穿戴者更加長壽，但並非特別可靠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tranq: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_aquila:
被動：天鷹靈氣

提升附近友方單位 %aura_mana_regen% 每秒魔力恢復和 %aura_bonus_armor% 護甲。
