施效範圍：%aura_radius%\n

切換：「天鷹靈氣」開關

關閉時將不影響非英雄單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_:
Passive: Aquila Aura

Grants %aura_mana_regen% mana regeneration and %aura_bonus_armor% armor to nearby allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%\n

Toggle: Aura

Deactivate to stop affecting non-hero units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_of_aquila: 墮落的天鷹軍閥的戒指依然在戰場上支援著軍隊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ring_: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_axe_culling_blade_s: 秒殺成功加速持續時間：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_strafe_Lore: 人們難以辨明縈繞在骷髏弓箭手周圍的朦朧究竟是來自他熊熊燃燒的心臟，還是他的身軀因顫抖之快而留下的殘影。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_str: It's hard to say whether the blur around the Bone Fletcher is from his flaming heart or his speed with the quiver.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_searing_arro: 克林克茲的箭矢只是用了他的熾烈本質點燃便頗具破壞力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_sea: Clinkz simply lights his arrows from his flaming essence for quite the destructive effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_wind_walk_Lo: 伴隨著一團火焰和一縷青煙，骷髏弓箭手遁入無形。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_win: With a burst of fire and puff of smoke, the Bone Fletcher was nowhere to be seen.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_death_pact_L: 薩瑟雷克斯的生死契約已經成為克林克茲的一部分，他透過殺死那些弱小生命使其骸骨得以不朽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_dea: Sutherex' bond of life and death has become a part of Clinkz, and his old bones are refreshed with repetition of the pact on lesser beings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_summon_wolves: 使普攻有 %maim_chance%%% 機率可致殘目標，令遭致殘者的攻擊速度下降 %maim_attack_speed% 並每秒受到 %maim_damage% 額外傷害，持續 %maim_duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_summ: Gives %maim_chance%%% to cripple the target, causing %maim_damage% damage per second and lose %maim_attack_speed% Attack Speed for %maim_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_spirit_b: 悉拉的終身夥伴與他的靈魂精神同在，在任何艱難的時刻幫助他。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Sylla's lifelong companion is symbiotic with his spirit and heart, coming to aid him in any time of need.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_spirit_b: 召喚一隻可以裝備道具的強大靈熊夥伴。靈熊將在遠離孤行德魯伊超過 1100 距離時喪失進行普通攻擊的能力。靈熊死亡時孤行德魯伊將會承受相當於自己最大生命值 %backlash_damage%%% 的反衝傷害。靈熊不受益於三大屬性。\n靈熊具有下列技能：回歸、粉碎、野蠻咆哮、纏繞之爪。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items.  If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack.  Lone Druid suffers %backlash_damage%%% of his max health as backlash damage if the Spirit Bear dies. Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.\nSpirit Bear has the Return, Demolish and Entangling Roots abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_spirit_b: 普攻有一定機率纏住目標，令其無法動彈且每秒承受傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Attacks have a chance to cause roots to burst from the ground, immobilizing the attacked enemy unit, and dealing damage per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_spirit_b: 增加靈熊的能力，使它對建築物造成更多傷害並獲得額外的魔法抗性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Increases the power of the Spirit Bear, causing it to deal more damage to buildings and have additional spell resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_rabid_Lo: 一般的熊看起來並不像是種敏捷的動物，但暴怒的時候可就不一樣了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Bears are not commonly seen as being agile creatures, but can actually move rather quickly, especially when enraged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_rabid_De: 增加孤行德魯伊和靈熊的攻擊速度和移動速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Increases the attack and movement speed of Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_true_for: 強大的巨熊乃森林之王，以原始本能佔有其王座。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: The mighty bear is the king of the forest, possessing the throne through raw power.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_true_for: 孤行德魯伊學習到如何使自己的形態變成狂怒的巨熊。雖然這會使他失去遠程攻擊優勢，但防禦抗性會提升並獲得纏繞盤根以及粉碎效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage, but gaining increased resistance, Entangling Roots and Demolish.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_true_for: 當悉拉在森林中狂吼時，咆哮聲在千里之遠便能感受到。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: When Sylla cries in the forest, the reverberations are felt for a great distance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_true_for: 孤行德魯伊與周圍控制的單位獲得額外的攻擊力及護甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Adds attack damage and armor to the Lone Druid as well as any nearby units under his control.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lycan_feral_impuls: 獲得 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% 每秒生命恢復，普攻傷害提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lycan_fer: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% health regen and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%% bonus damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_druid_rabid_D: 攻擊速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%，移動速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% 。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_drui: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_druid_true_fo: 獲得 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE% 額外攻擊力和提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% 護甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_drui: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE% bonus damage and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% bonus armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_spir: 阿茲瑞斯運用長矛捕魚的熟練技巧除了養家活口外，也證明在戰場上一樣十分管用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_la: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_dopp: 恐怖巫師沃恩隨著死亡將能夠融入所有光線的能力灌注到了幻影長矛手的體內。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_la: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to bend and fracture all spectrums of light.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_juxt: 阿茲瑞斯每一次的矛擊感覺就像一位普通戰士的兩次、或三次、或四次...
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_la: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four...
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_summon_wolves: 不進行攻擊時永久隱身。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_thunder_: 曼吉斯以巨大的酒桶猛擊來宣示慶典的開始。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: A slam of Mangix' mighty keg starts the festivities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_thunder_: 重擊地面，對附近敵方單位造成傷害並減緩移動速度和攻擊速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_drunken_: 奧尤社解決所有問題的辦法 - 再乾一杯！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_drunken_: 將目標單位浸泡在酒精中，使其移動速度減緩且攻擊有一定機率落空。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: Drenches a target in alcohol, causing their movement speed to be reduced, and causing their attacks to have a chance to miss.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_drunken_: 當曼吉斯贏得奧尤社酒仙的稱號時，也證明了他精通醉拳的地位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: When Mangix won his title as the Brewmaster of the Order of Oyo, he also claimed his place in the mastery of inebriation.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_drunken_: 進入持續 %duration% 秒的醉拳狀態，於期間有一定機率去閃避普攻和打出暴擊、且移動速度將在降低 %min_movement%%% 和提升 %max_movement%%% 之間徘徊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: Goes into a drunken brawler state, granting you a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage. Brewmaster moves with a varying amount of movement speed, alternating between %min_movement%%% slower and %max_movement%%% faster. Lasts %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_primal_s: 沒有人清楚曼吉斯是否查覺到自己和大自然之間有強大的牽絆，因為這總是發生在他醉到不省人事的時候。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: It isn't clear whether Mangix is consciously aware of his potent bond with nature, as it often occurs in the midst of a drunken stupor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_primal_s: 酒仙分離成元素，形成三位擅於生存的獨立戰士。如果在召喚時間結束前有任何一位戰士存活，那麼酒仙就會重生。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival, each with their own abilities. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_resistan: 減少受到的持續性傷害。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_earth_hu: 向一個單位投擲巨石，造成傷害和暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: Throws a boulder at a unit, doing damage and stunning it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_earth_pu: 對建築物造成額外傷害。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_storm_di: 對小範圍的召喚單位造成傷害並淨化大部分增幅或減幅效果。\n\n驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: Damages summoned units in an area and purges most buffs or debuffs.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_storm_cy: 將一個單位捲入龍捲風，使其暫離戰場。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: Encloses a unit in a tornado, removing it from the battlefield.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_storm_wi: 提供短暫隱匿。獲得移動速度加成和解除隱匿的攻擊加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: Provides temporary invisibility.  Bonus movement speed and attack damage when invisible.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_disrup: 短暫地將一個目標禁錮驅逐。接著在對方從禁錮中釋放出來時產生兩個受暗影惡魔控制的幻象。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_dem: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_soul_c: 捕捉敵人的靈魂；向目標範圍內的敵方單位施加靈魂獵手減幅，藉此令其損失一定比例的目前血量。當減幅退去後，損失血量的一半將會回歸。靈魂獵手可影響處於崩裂禁錮的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_dem: Captures the soul of enemy units in an area, causing them to lose a percentage of their current health. When the debuff is removed, the units gain half of the lost health back. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Soul Catcher.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_shadow: 釋放劇毒傷害所有受影響單位。暗影劇毒仍可以影響處於崩裂禁錮的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_dem: Releases the poison to do damage on all affected enemies. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Shadow Poison.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_demoni: 邪惡淨化目標敵方單位，移除對方當下所持有的正面增幅效果、並使對方的移動速度接著受到減緩一段時間。對方的移動速度會慢慢地逐漸復原直到在時效盡頭隨著傷害的產生復原完畢。邪惡淨化可以影響處於崩裂禁錮內的敵人。\n\n驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_dem: Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration.  The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knight_chaos_: 向目標投擲一個神秘的能量之箭。造成隨機傷害和隨機時間的暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knig: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knight_chaos_: 就連混沌騎士都無法預測這不潔的能量會有何種效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knig: Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knight_realit: 拉近自己和目標，使雙方被傳送到介於彼此之間直線範圍上的隨機位置，並使自己的下一次普攻會造成持續 %duration% 秒的扣甲效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knig: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a point along the line between the two of you. Reduces armor of the enemy unit for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knight_realit: 天劫的鐵蹄跨越於不同世界之間，讓混沌騎士的獵物無所遁形。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knig: Armageddon rides between the planes, bringing Chaos Knight to his victim wherever he may hide.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knight_chaos_: 混沌騎士用無邊的力量震懾他面前的敵人，擊碎最堅固的護甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knig: Chaos Knight's unwieldy power bludgeons those who stand before him, crushing the thickest of armors.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knight_phanta: 在各個世界間的戰爭中所向披靡，混沌騎士的幻象足以壓制所有反抗的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knig: Drawing on his battles fought across many worlds and many times, phantasms of the Chaos Knight rise up to quell all who oppose him.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lycan_shapeshift_D: 獲得疾速效果和暴擊效果。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_druid_spirit_: 無法移動並受到持續傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_drui: Immobilized and taking damage over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_brewmaster_thunder: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，攻擊速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_brewmaste: Movement slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attacks slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_brewmaster_drunken: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，做出的普攻有 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE%%% 機率落空。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_brewmaste: Movement slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE%%% chance to miss attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_brewmaster_drunken: 有 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_EVASION_CONSTANT%%% 機率迴避普攻。普攻有 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% 機率打出 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% 暴擊傷害。\n移動速度會忽快忽慢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_brewmaste: %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_EVASION_CONSTANT%%% chance to dodge attacks.\n%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% chance to %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% crit. Movement speed changes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_brewmaster_earth_p: 對建築物造成額外傷害。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_brewmaster_earth_s: 對絕大多數的技能免疫
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_brewmaster_fire_pe: 燃燒每秒造成 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% 傷害。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shadow_demon_soul_: 損失血量，損失的量將在持續時間後回歸。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shadow_de: Missing health. Half the lost health will return after the spell duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_point_booster_: 一塊持有時可以滋養身心的完美紫水晶。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_point: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vitality_boost: 一塊在戰士家族中相傳的紅寶石。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vital: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_void_stone_Lor: 一件曾用來連結冥界魔法的珠寶，這枚戒指蘊含著魔力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_void_: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_invoke_Lore: 知識的全新時代就此展開。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_in: So begins a new age of knowledge.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_disrup: 遭受欺詐時並不會覺得痛楚難耐，而是在真相揭曉當下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_dem: The pain of deception comes not while it happens, but when it is revealed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_soul_c: 嘗試抵擋暗影惡魔的腐化不過是無謂的掙扎。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_dem: Trying to resist the Shadow Demon's corruption is mostly a useless endeavor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_shadow: 暗影惡魔逐漸強大的感染力可以玷污最忠貞和勇猛的英雄。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_dem: The ever growing influence of the Shadow Demon can pollute the most valiant and pure of heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_demoni: 一旦暗影惡魔的傀儡不再有利用價值時，他會解放這些奴隸 - 讓他們的靈魂超脫。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_dem: Once Shadow Demon no longer has any need for his collected cultist, he releases it from its subservience - and its life.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_natures_guis: 在附近有樹木的情況下使自己在 %cooldown_time% 秒的隱形延遲後進入自然掩護狀態，於期間具有樹行步，且會隨著自身接觸到樹木而提升移動速度和生命恢復加深。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_nat: Provides Treant with Tree Walking whenever he hasn't taken damage for %cooldown_time% seconds. While active, Treant gains movement speed bonus and amplified healing and regeneration on himself.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_natures_guis: 樹精衛士並不常出現在人們的視線中；他們以自然之姿隱蔽於蒼翠蓊鬱的同胞之中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_nat: The Protectors don't often come into vision; their natural state being nestled within their leafy brethren.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_leech_seed_L: 魯服崔倫悉心培育的生命物種，透過吸取闖入聖地的入侵者生命力來維持。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_lee: Rooftrellen nurtures the beings under his stewardship, sustained by the lifeforce of trespassers into his sacred ground.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_living_armor: 用活體裝甲保護目標，使其獲得護甲加成同時持續恢復生命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_liv: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which heals the target and provides bonus armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_living_armor: 樹精衛士的根鬚廣袤蔓延，促進自然萬物的成長和生氣。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_liv: The roots and tendrils of the Treant Protectors are far-reaching, stimulating the growth and rejuvenation of all of nature.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_overgrowth_D: 樹精衛士在身邊召喚出瘋狂生長的藤蔓和枝條纏繞敵人，使他們無法移動、閃躍、進入隱形狀態、進行普攻、且受到持續傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_ove: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that deal damage to afflicted enemies and prevent them from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_overgrowth_L: 魯服崔倫召喚自然的先祖靈魂，將能量釋放施予他所有的同胞。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_ove: Rooftrellen calls the ancestral spirit of nature, releasing its power through all of his kin.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_treant_natures_gui: 靠近樹木時隱身。\n獲得 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% 移動速度加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_treant_na: Invisible while next to trees.\nGaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% bonus movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_treant_overgrowth_: 無法移動、攻擊或使用閃躍。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_courier_go_to_secre: 將信使送往您所屬隊伍的秘密商店
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_courier_go: Sends the courier to your team's secret shop
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_destroyer_: 來自歿境的知識讓先兆者能夠從精神的盈衰中獲取能量，將其灌輸到自己體內。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_d: Harbinger's outworldly knowledge allows it to tap into the ebb and flow of all spiritual energy, infusing it into his being.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_destroyer_: 當被禁錮者囿於現世與歿境間的這方寸一隅，他們便會體會自己知識之幼稚和生命之短暫。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_d: Locked away in the pocket between this world and the Outworld, victims realize their infantile knowledge and mortality.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_destroyer_: 先兆者將歿境水晶產生的奧術能量帶入現世。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_d: The crystals of the Outworld produce arcane power, and the Harbinger channels it into the world of mortals.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_destroyer_: 歿境的水晶在破碎時會並釋放出毀滅性的能量，強大到在另一個空間的現世也能感受到它的影響。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_d: When an Outworld crystal ruptures, cataclysmic energies are released, and the reverberations of this power are felt interdimensionally.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_fireblast: 用一道火焰爆轟敵方單位，造成傷害同時暈眩目標。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_fireblast: 食人魔法師能夠輕易地被逗樂，光是玩火就能玩上數小時。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_: The Ogre Magi is easily amused, entertained for hours by playing with fire.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_ignite_De: 向目標以及周遭的隨機一名敵人扔擲易燃化學物，令對方瞬間被火焰吞噬。目標承受著灼燒的巨大痛苦，受到持續傷害和移速減緩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_: Drenches the target and another random unit in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_bloodlust: 「跑步可沒像打人那麼有趣... 一點樂趣都沒有。」
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_: 'Running's not as fun as hitting... Not one bit fun.'
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_multicast: 令食人魔法師每次在施放技能和道具功能時有一定機率可連續施放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_: Enables Ogre Magi to cast his abilities and items multiple times with each use.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_multicast: 儘管極度受到智商的束縛，食人魔法師仍然能利用精湛的技巧在戰鬥中取勝。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_: Despite being largely incapacitated by his IQ, the Ogre Magi's success in battle is attributed to pure skill.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_multicast: 火焰轟擊冷卻時間減少：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi_bloodlus: 移動速度提升提高 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，攻擊速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi: Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi_ignite_d: 您著火了！受到持續性傷害並被減速 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi: You are on fire! Taking periodic damage and slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_earthbind_Lor: 要在裂影遺跡找晚飯吃可是件挑戰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_eart: Catching dinner in the Riftshadow Ruins can be quite the task.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_poof_Lore: 有時候擊碎一塊裂影水晶可以作為擺脫困境的方法。或擺脫另一個我。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_poof: Sometimes breaking one of the Riftshadow Crystals can be just the trick for getting yourself out of a bind.  Or your other self.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_geostrike_Des: 米波為他的武器附魔去對攻擊目標造成每秒傷害，並降低對方的移動速度。闢地鑿擊的效果可自由串聯，令來自不同米波的闢地鑿擊能進行疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_geos: Meepo enchants his weapon to deal damage per second, as well as slow the movement speed of the attacked unit.  Geostrikes from multiple Meepos stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_geostrike_Lor: 輕裝上身但攜帶必備工具是生存的不二法門。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_geos: Keeping your pack light and having few but versatile tools is the best bet for survival.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_meepo_earthbind_De: 禁錮於米波的網中，無法移動或使用閃躍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_meepo_ear: Trapped in Meepo's net; cannot move or blink.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_meepo_geostrike_de: 被減速並受到持續傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_meepo_geo: Slowed down and taking periodic damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_divided_we_st: 米波召喚一個不完整的半自主複製分身，和本尊一樣可以獲得金錢和經驗，也能夠使用本尊的技能。但是分身只能裝備本尊的靴類物品。如果任一米波死亡，無論是分身還是本尊，所有米波將跟著死亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_divi: Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience, attributes and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears.  If any of the clones die, they all die.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_morphling_replicat: 變體精靈複製技能的時效計時器
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_morphling: Timer for clones created by Morphling's abilities
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lycan_howl_aura_De: 讓玩家控制的單位獲得嚎叫靈氣效果。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_lucent_beam_Lo: 膽敢入侵銀夜森林的敵人將受到塞莉蒙娜的懲罰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_lucen: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_moon_glaive_Lo: 精心地研磨後，露娜的迴旋鏢型武器可以在眾多敵人身上留下大片的傷痕。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_moon_: Carefully sharpened, Luna's boomerang-like weapon cuts a wide swath through enemy numbers.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_lunar_blessing: 月之女神的微笑伴隨著她的夥伴們。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_lunar: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_eclipse_Lore: 在必要的時候，賽莉蒙娜會降臨世間，遮住敵人的陽光與生存的希望。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_eclip: In times of great need, Selemene herself descends into the world, blocking out the light and hope of the opposed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_grave_chill_: 維薩吉吸取目標單位的移動速度和攻擊速度，自己獲得等量加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_gra: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_grave_chill_: 冰冷黑暗的狹隘迷宮從來感受不到陽光溫暖的擁抱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_gra: The warmth of the sun is never felt in the dark cold of the Narrow Maze.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_soul_assumpt: 維薩吉將隨著周圍所有英雄承受的傷害多於 %damage_limit% 時被動地搜集一點靈魂能量。當主動施放奪魂時，儲存的靈魂將會全數釋放出去攻擊目標，依據靈魂能量的多寡造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_sou: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than %damage_limit% damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_soul_assumpt: 四散而去的死者亡靈將帶來更多的同伴。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_sou: The collected souls of the dead reach out to bring another into their fold.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_gravekeepers: 維薩吉產生數層屏障來減免承受的傷害。如果受到來自玩家的傷害就會失去一層，失去的屏障需要時間來恢復。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_gra: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from damage.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_gravekeepers: 維薩吉的身型如鬼魂飄渺又如石像般堅固，完全不受刀刃突擊和魔法幻術的影響。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_gra: Visage's tough scales share equal properties of ghost and stone, making it nearly impervious to blade and magical assault.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_decay_Descr: 不朽屍王腐蝕範圍內敵方英雄的生命，造成基礎傷害並竊取對方的力量屬性一段時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_de: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_decay_Lore: 生者的力量只是暫借死者的氣息。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_de: The strength of the living is simply borrowed from the strength of the dead.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_soul_rip_De: 不朽屍王撕扯周遭所有單位的生命能量並灌注到目標身上，依據對方是敵是友造成傷害或治療。灌注對象可是墓碑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_so: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_soul_rip_Lo: 即便是友方英雄也能感受到伴隨不朽屍王而來的絕望氣息。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_so: Even allies feel despair in Undying's presence.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_tombstone_D: 在目標位置召喚一座墓碑。墓碑會在範圍內的每個敵方單位附近不斷產生殭屍攻擊他們。殭屍具有嗜殺技能，使他們的攻擊能降低目標的移動速度，且若目標的生命值低於一定數值或百分比，則殭屍的攻擊速度和移動速度也將會有所提升。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_to: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_tombstone_L: 輓歌召喚他逝去的兄弟為死亡之神戰鬥。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_to: Dirge calls on his fallen brothers to fight for the Dead God.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_tombstone_h: 嗜殺觸發固定生命門檻值：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_tombstone_z: 攻擊時對敵方單位造成減速。如果目標單位的生命值低於臨界值，則殭屍獲得移動和攻擊速度加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_to: Slows enemy units on attack.  If the attacked unit's health goes below the threshold, the zombie receives enhanced movement and attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_flesh_golem: 不朽屍王變身為一具令人毛骨悚然的血肉巨人，在此狀態下享有生命加成且普攻會施加瘟疫減幅。瘟疫減幅將造成移速減緩效果和承受傷害加深效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_fl: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem. Gains a percentage increase to strength and imbues attacks with a slow and damage amplification.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_flesh_golem: 鄰近死者的血肉增強了輓歌散播瘟疫的能力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_fl: The flesh of the recently dead add to the power of Dirge's plague.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_telekinesis_: 拉比克利用他隔空取物的能力將敵人抬升到空中然後再猛摔到地上。被投擲的單位會砸暈附近敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_tel: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_telekinesis_: 就算是最偉大的大魔導師也會拿自己的法力來娛樂一下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_tel: Even the Grandest Magus may use his powers for enjoyment.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_telekinesis_: 選擇隔空取物結束後目標落地的地點。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_tel: Chooses the location the target will land when Telekinesis finishes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_fade_bolt_Lo: 拉比克最喜歡的削弱法術其實只是個簡單的咒語。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_fad: Rubick's favorite spell for dispatching would-be assassins is a rather simple conjuration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_null_field_D: 拉比克對於奧術的精通被動地創造出一個力場，提升附近我方單位的魔抗，或降低附近敵方單位的魔抗。開啟時影響敵人，關閉時影響友軍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_nul: Rubick's mastery of the arcane creates an aura that nullifies nearby enemy senses or increases his own. Can be toggled offensively or defensively to reduce enemy magic resistance or increase allied magic resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_null_field_L: 不是所有魔導師都能成為大魔導師...
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_nul: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_spell_steal_: 拉比克鑽研一位敵方英雄的魔法精華，領教到對方最近所施放的技能的秘密。接著使拉比克將可以把學來的技能當成自己的使用數分鐘，或者直到自己死亡為止。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_spe: Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_spell_steal_: ...但是他們低階的魔法可以成為實用的法術來源。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_spe: ...but even their lesser magics can be a source of much utility.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_empty1_Descr: 此欄將由技能竊取得來的技能所取代。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_emp: Spells acquired with Spell Steal will replace this slot.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_empty2_Descr: 此欄將被技能竊取得來的技能取代。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_emp: Spells acquired with Spell Steal will replace this slot.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rubick_null_field_: 拉比克的友方/敵方將提升/降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%/%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%% 魔抗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rubick_nu: Rubick's affected allies gain %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%% Magic Damage Resistance. Rubick's affected enemies lose %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%% Magic Damage Resistance.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_: The 'who-casts-spell-first' argument between himself is solved simply by both casting at once.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_thunder_s: 以閃電持續攻擊目標和目標身邊的敵方單位，每次電擊將造成傷害以及持續 %slow_duration% 秒的 %slow_amount%%% 攻移雙緩效果，且於作用期間在主要目標身上取得一般視野。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius and slows enemy movement and attack speed by %slow_amount%%% for %slow_duration% seconds.  Provides vision of its target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_glimpse_D: 將目標英雄傳送到其前 4 秒的所在位置。能夠瞬間擊殺幻象單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_kinetic_f: 製造出一堵敵人無法通行環形動能屏障，需要經過短暫的形成過程才能開始作用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_static_st: 製造一場具傷害性的靜電風暴，沉默範圍內的所有敵方單位。傷害量在起初很低，但將隨著過程持續逐漸增強。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_impale: 岩石尖刺沿著地上一直線穿出。將敵方單位拋向空中，著地時會被暈眩並受到傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assass: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_impale: 狂熱聖甲蟲都擁有地道鑽研的秘密學識，並為其帶來優勢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assass: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_mana_b: 根據目標英雄智力屬性的一定倍數燃燒對方魔力，並造成與燃燒掉的魔力等值的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assass: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_mana_b: 秘湮學院的古籍上記載著一種可以侵蝕弱小生物智慧的聖甲蟲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assass: The tome in Ultimyr describes one scarab with the ability eat away at the mind of lesser beings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_spiked: 尖刺外殼在地面上啟動時可以反制夜神刺客在期間所承受的攻擊並將原本會使夜神刺客受到的傷害反射回去（每位攻擊者僅一次），同時攻擊者將受到暈眩。啟動尖刺外殼不會中斷復仇狀態。\n\n尖刺外殼於遁穴潛伏期間施放時將會瞬間暈眩周遭敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assass: When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.\n\nWhile Burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_spiked: 儘管他們的甲殼相對較薄，但有伸縮自如的且如刀刃般鋒利的尖刺保護著。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assass: While their carapace is relatively thin, it's guarded by a retractable field of razor-sharp spikes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_vendet: 夜神刺客進入隱形狀態並於期間獲得速度加成。若夜神刺客藉由普攻去破除隱形狀態，則該次攻擊附加高額的額外傷害、並造成持續 %break_duration% 秒的破勢效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assass: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack. Applies a break status on the enemy for %break_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_vendet: 聖甲蟲爲了女王的榮耀而戰鬥。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assass: The scarab kills for the glory of his queen.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_nyx_assassin_spike: 下一波來自玩家的攻擊將會反彈給該名英雄，受到傷害並被暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_nyx_assas: The next player-owned damage instance will be reflected, damaging and stunning the hero that caused it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren_mirror_i: 創造出三個由娜迦海妖控制的鏡像。\n\n驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren: Creates multiple images of Naga Siren under her control.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren_ensnare_: 中斷目標的動作並困住他們，使其無法移動或閃躍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren_rip_tide: 娜迦海妖和她鏡像的普攻有一定機率濺出具殺傷性的水波，即刻對周圍敵人造成傷害並削弱他們的護甲 %duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren: The Naga Siren and her images have a chance on attack to hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_the_light: 伊札洛的隱藏的光芒讓他看起來閃耀非凡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_: Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_the_light: 每蓄積一秒累積的傷害：
削弱一位敵人的魔法能量，使其在移動時損失魔力。如果敵人耗盡所有魔力的話，則會被暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_: Weakens an enemy's magical essence, causing them to lose mana as they move.  If the enemy loses all of its mana, it will be stunned.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_the_light: 伊札洛分離了初始諧律，從體魄脆弱的身體中抽取魔法能量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_: Ezalor disrupts Primordial harmony, draining magical energy from those with poor constitution.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_the_light: 透過同樣的脈絡，伊札洛將自己的諧律授予他人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_: In the same vein, Ezalor bestows his harmony among others.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_the_light: 依札洛將自己的身軀暫時轉換成靈光形態，在此狀態下獲得「閃耀光芒」和「召回」技能，並令「輝煌」技能在此形態下的蓄積將由另外的靈魂分身代為執行。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_: Ezalor temporarily turns his body luminescent, gaining various abilities.  Illuminate is now channeled by a separate spirit, and gains the Blinding Light and Recall abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_the_light: 在閃耀的光芒中，伊札洛展現出自己真實的形態。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_: In a flash of light, Ezalor reveals his true nature.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_the_light: 經過短暫延遲後，將友方目標英雄傳送到您的位置。如果在這段時間，友方目標英雄受到來自其他玩家的傷害，則技能會中斷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_: After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location.  If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_the_light: 一道閃耀的光芒在目標區域閃出，使區域內的敵方單位被向外擊退、受到傷害、並且失明而暫時落空部分普攻。擊退距離為  %knockback_distance%，擊退過程為 %knockback_duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_: A blinding light flashes over the targeted area, knocking back and blinding the units in the area, causing them to miss some attacks. Knockback is %knockback_distance% range over %knockback_duration% seconds,
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_the_light: 初始光芒將引領著伊札洛和他的同盟扭轉戰局的優勢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_: The Primordial light turns the tides of battle in favor of Ezalor and his allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren_song_of_: 將敵人從歌聲中釋放出來，使他們能再次成為攻擊目標。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren: Release enemy units from your song so they can be targeted again.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_keeper_of_the_ligh: 累積輝煌能量（靈魂形態）
您的靈魂正位於其他位置累積輝煌能量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_keeper_of: Your spirit is channeling Illuminate in another location.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_summon_famil: 召喚兩隻失明傭獸來為維薩吉作戰。傭獸可使用「石像形態」技能轉化為石像，著地時暈眩敵人。傭獸在石像形態下是無敵的，且會迅速地恢復生命。擊殺傭獸的單位將獲得高額賞金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_sum: Conjures two blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_summon_famil: 狹隘迷宮的看守者，死靈飛龍的傭獸會看管他的領地。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_sum: Guardians of the Narrow Maze, Necro'lic's Familiars stand watch over his domain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_summon_famil: 經過短暫延遲後，傭獸轉化為石像並猛擊地面，暈眩並傷害範圍內的所有目標。傭獸將在石像形態下處於無敵狀態，且會迅速恢復生命。傭獸會在 %stone_duration% 秒後自動脫離石像形態。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_sum: After a short delay, the Familiar turns into stone and smashes into the ground, stunning and damaging all targets in the area.  The Familiar becomes invulnerable, and will regain its health very rapidly.  After %stone_duration% seconds, the Familiar will automatically leave Stone Form.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_thunder_s: 遣雷使的能量圈有時能夠超載，讓敵人最後只剩下一塊燒焦的盔甲碎片或是一小搓毛皮。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_: Disruptor's charged coils occasionally overload, and a singed armor plate or tuft of fur is the enemy's result.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_glimpse_L: 玩弄電能可能會發生預料之外的後果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_: Playing with electricity can have unexpected results.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_kinetic_f: 遣雷使的坐騎不受那些會摧殘敵人的狂風任何影響。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_: The stryder is immune to the gale-force winds that will consume its adversaries.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_static_st: 只有歐格羅迪的族人能夠在夏日風暴中存活下來。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_disruptor_: A summer squall in Druud is a hardship that only an Oglodi can survive.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_the_light: 持續蓄積光明能量然後以光波的形式進行釋放。光波將朝瞄準的方向沿直線前進去造成傷害並開闢視野。蓄積時間越長傷害越大。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_the_light: 伊札洛隱匿的光芒會以意想不到的方式呈現。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_: Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_the_light: 每蓄積一秒累積的傷害：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_keeper_of_the_ligh: 傳送至光之守衛的位置。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_keeper_of: Being teleported to Keeper of the Light's location.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_keeper_of_the_ligh: 失明，%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE%%% 機率攻擊落空。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_visage_grave_chill: 提升移動速度 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% 並提升攻擊速度 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_visage_gr: Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_visage_grave_chill: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，攻擊速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_visage_gr: Movement speed decreased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed decreased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_visage_summon_fami: 在石像形態下無敵並獲得 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% 每秒生命恢復。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_dream_coil_coi: 神杖升級縈繞持續時間：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter_rocket_b: 奧雷爾全新的飛機擁有更多的火箭載彈量，而且也提升了射擊速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter: Aurel's new craft has an increased payload for rockets, enhancing their rapid-fire capabilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter_homing_m: 奧雷爾的飛機所能乘載的最大飛彈，經過空氣動力學和爆破物理學嚴密的計算，The Bomb™ 能夠展現最佳成果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter: The biggest missile Aurel could possibly attach to his craft, The Bomb™ has carefully calculated aerodynamics and explosives for maximum impact.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter_flak_can: 這架全新改造的自轉旋翼機搭載充足的彈藥量，能夠 360 度全方位掃射敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter: This newly revamped Gyrocopter has attached enough armaments to assault in a 360 degree radius.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_sonic_w: 提升傷害並降低冷卻時間。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_laguna_blade_a: 將神滅斬的傷害類型改變成純粹傷害，且令它能夠穿透目標身上的技能免疫狀態。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_lagun: Changes Laguna Blade's damage type to Pure, and allows it to slice through spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_focusfir: 降低冷卻時間，減輕傷害降低程度，並移除此技能對於特殊攻擊效果和道具效果的特殊限制。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner: Reduces cooldown, decreases damage reduction, and removes debuffs from item effects.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_finger_of_deat: 提升傷害。縮短冷卻時間。使死亡之指將能一併攻擊到位於目標身旁的所有敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_finge: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_neth: 令「移形換位」在換位後恐懼周遭敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulsp: After a Nether Swap, enemies around Vengeful Spirit are Feared.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_death_: 令「死亡守衛」的攻擊具有真實打擊效果，且會於附近敵人之間彈射。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doct: Death Ward attacks have True Strike and bounce between nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_omni_sla: 賦予新技能「迅猛斬」：施展一個短促的超究武神霸斬。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut: Adds a new ability: Swift Slash. Performs a mini omnislash for a short duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_eye_of_the_st: 使「風暴之眼」能夠一次攻擊兩名目標並能傷害到防禦塔、兵營，和遺跡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_eye_: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures.  When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_rain_of_cha: 召喚 %number_of_golems_scepter% 個數值和賞金均降低的地獄火巨人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_ra: Calls %number_of_golems_scepter% Golems with reduced stats and bounty.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_thundergods_wr: 賦予新技能「閃電雲」，創造一個會自動朝附近敵人施放「雷霆」的閃電雲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_thund: Grants a new ability, Nimbus, creating a cloud that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_dream_coil_agh: 提升魔法力場的持續時間，提升掙脫魔法力場會造成的傷害，並使掙脫時產生的暈眩效果能夠穿透技能免疫狀態。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_dream: Increases damage from coil breaks, increases coil duration, coil break stun goes through spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_hookshot: 賦予新技能「超頻」：進入持續超頻狀態，首先刷新自身技能的冷卻，接著在此狀態下提升攻速和移速，最後隨著狀態結束被暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap: Grants new ability: Overclocking. Resets Clockwerk's ability cooldowns and grants him bonus movement and attack speed for a duration. Clockwerk becomes stunned after the duration runs out.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_chain_frost_ag: 提升傷害和施法距離。移除連環霜凍的彈跳次數限制。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_chain: Increases damage and casting range. Removes the limit on the number of times Chain Frost can jump.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_mass_: 提升群蛇守衛的攻擊距離，並令群蛇守衛的攻擊能夠分裂，一次攻擊兩名目標，各造成完整傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_sha: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage. Increases attack range of Serpent Wards.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_primal_: 降低冷卻時間並提升施法距離。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaste: Reduces cooldown, and increases cast range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_poison_n: 提升傷害和降低冷卻時間。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_life_drain_ag: 移除冷卻時間，提升每秒傷害。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_viper_strike_: 降低魔力消耗和冷卻時間，並提升施法距離。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_viper_vipe: Decreases mana cost and cooldown, and increases cast range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_eclipse_aghani: 令月蝕變得可施加於隊友或自己身上，或直接往目標區域施放。同時增加月蝕的持續時間，增加月蝕產生的月光數量和持續時間，移除月蝕的重複攻擊次數限制，且月光將以兩倍速出現。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_eclip: Allows Luna to cast Eclipse on an allied unit or herself and have its effects follow them, or cast it on an area. Also increases total beams and duration, removes the limit on beams per unit, and makes the beams appear twice as fast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_impetus: 提升攻擊距離以及衝力的施放距離。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantres: Increases attack range, and cast range of Impetus.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_life_break_a: 使「犧牲」一併造成嘲諷效果
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_lif: Forces the enemy target to attack you.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stalker_darkn: 獲得不受阻礙的夜間視野，且無須施放「黑暗飛升」即可獲得。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_night_stal: Grants unobstructed vision in the night. The improved vision does not depend on using Dark Ascension.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_macropyre_ag: 提升火焰的長度、持續時間，和傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_jakiro_mac: Increases flame length, duration, and damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter_call_dow: 添加一位副砲手，自動朝周遭 600 範圍內的隨機敵方目標開火。冷卻時間 1.1 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter: Adds a Side Gunner that at random attacks enemy units within a 600 radius every 1.1 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_neth: 使巨力重擊能夠攻擊目標範圍內的敵人，降低冷卻時間並增加施法距離。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_bre: Causes the Greater Bash to hit an area around the initial target, decreases cooldown, and increases cast range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_invoke_agha: 使「陽炎衝擊」能夠施放天火之災。並使召喚師的技能全都再由冰雷火元素各一級來增強一次。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_in: Adds Cataclysm. Adds one level to the stats provided by Quas, Wex, and Exort on all Invoked spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_divided_we_st: 額外增加一個複製米波。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tether_Descrip: 將艾歐與一名友方單位連接在一起，為彼此提升移動速度。當艾歐補充生命和魔力時，連接對象將得到一定倍數的恢復。連接將隨著連接目標彼此距離過遠或艾歐自行取消技能而斷開。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tethe: Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, tethered units target gains a larger portion of that amount. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tether_break_D: 斷開與他人相連的閃電之鏈。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tethe: Break the link to the tethered unit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_spirits_Descri: 召喚五顆圍繞艾歐起舞的幽光之魂。光魂會在擊中敵方英雄時爆炸，對爆炸附近的所有敵人造成傷害和移速減緩效果。小兵和野怪這類蔓生單位不會引爆光魂，且只會受到較少的擊中傷害。當持續時間結束時所有剩餘幽光之魂都將爆炸。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_spiri: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io. If a particle collides with an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirit, but do not cause them to explode.  When its duration ends, any remaining Spirits explode.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_spirits_in_Des: 令幽光之魂圍繞身邊或巡繞周圍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_spiri: Calls the spirits in and out.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_spirits_out_De: 將幽光之魂遠離你身邊。可透過切換技能隨時暫停。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_spiri: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_overcharge_Des: 艾歐獲得額外攻擊速度並每秒恢復最大生命的一定百分比。若艾歐和一位友軍連接，則該單位也能獲得這些加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_overc: Io gains bonus attack speed and HP Regen based on max health.  If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_relocate_Descr: 持續施法 - 將艾歐和任何與它連接的隊友傳送到地圖上的任何位置。技能結束後艾歐和任何與它連接的隊友將會返回當初來自的位置。可藉由雙擊來直接選擇我方泉源做為傳送目的地。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_reloc: Teleports Io and any tethered ally to any location. After the spell expires Io and any tethered ally will return to their original location. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_wisp_tether_haste_: 移動速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% 並透過艾歐獲得生命恢復以及魔力恢復。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_wisp_teth: Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and getting health and mana regen from Io.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_wisp_spirits_Descr: 被友善的幽光之魂圍繞。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_wisp_relo: About to return to previous location.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_empty1_Descrip: 將幽光之魂召回至你身邊。可透過切換技能隨時暫停。僅於幽光之魂存在時可用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_empty: Calls the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off. Only available while Spirits is active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_empty2_Descrip: 將幽光之魂遠離你身邊。可透過切換技能隨時暫停。僅於幽光之魂存在時可用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_empty: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off. Only available while Spirits is active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_luna_eclipse_Descr: 利用透徹的月光攻擊附近敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_luna_ecli: Striking nearby targets with Lucent Beam.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tether_Lore: 艾歐善意的接觸能帶來不同空間的力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_tethe: The benevolent touch of Io brings strength from between the planes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_spirits_Lore: 艾歐利用它不可思議的能力扭曲宇宙的物質粒子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_spiri: Io twists the particles of the universe with its unimaginable capabilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_overcharge_Lor: 艾歐從所有世界中吸取物質能量，展現出時空的真相。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_overc: Drawing on the energy of matter from all worlds, Io begins the unravelling of time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_relocate_Lore: 艾歐是神祕宇宙的具體化身。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_wisp_reloc: Io is the embodiment of the mystery of the universe.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_dark_pact_Des: 短暫延遲後，斯拉克犧牲部分血量，為自己多次造成可淨化大多數負面效果的驅散效果，同時多次對周圍敵人造成傷害。斯拉克自己將僅會受到 50% 的傷害。\n\n驅散類型：強力
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_dark: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes 50% of the damage.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_dark_pact_Lor: 魚人具有迅速重新長出魚鰭的能力，讓他們在重傷時能夠挽救自己的性命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_dark: Slithereen are capable of quickly regrowing appendages, in case of critical injury, to save their own lives.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_pounce_Descri: 斯拉克向前飛躍，抓住第一個他碰到的英雄，令該單位被斯拉克束縛而僅能在斯拉克落地點附近活動。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_poun: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit is leashed, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_pounce_Lore: 長時間在暗黑之礁服刑讓斯拉克成為一位危險、兇殘、無懼的刺客。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_poun: Time in the Dark Reef made Slark a dangerous assassin; aggressive and fearless.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_essence_shift: 斯拉克的普攻會偷取敵方英雄的生命能量，汲取對方的三大屬性然後轉換成額外的敏捷屬性加成，同時使對方會因為死在斯拉克附近而被永久竊取 %stat_loss% 點敏捷屬性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_esse: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility. If Slark kills an affected enemy hero, he permanently steals %stat_loss% Agility.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_essence_shift: 每攻擊敵手一次，斯拉克對於對方弱點的瞭解就越多。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_esse: With each strike at his adversaries, Slark's knowledge of their weaknesses improves.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_shadow_dance_: 第十三位逃犯是一個狡猾的對手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_shad: The hidden Thirteenth is a slippery foe.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_brewmaster_storm_c: 無敵，無法進行任何動作。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_slark_pounce_leash: 被斯拉克束縛，僅能在有限範圍內移動。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_slark_pou: Leashed to Slark, can only move a limited distance away.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_slark_shadow_dance: 在暗影雲霧中進入隱形狀態。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_slark_sha: Invisible within your cloud of smoke.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_undying_tombstone_: 提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% 移動速度及攻擊速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_undying_t: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% faster movement and attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_re: 透過靈能面紗，拉娜雅能夠隨心所欲地控制自然法則。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_as: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_me: 拉娜雅與隱秘聖堂的誓約一樣無隱無蹤。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_as: Lanaya is as elusive as her covenant with the Hidden Temple.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_ps: 她的刀鋒和她的智慧一樣銳利，理解現實便是她揭開神秘面紗的動力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_as: Her blades pierce the skin as much as the mind, furthering her understanding of the mystery that is reality.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_ps: 隨著隱密聖堂的呼喚而行動，沒有人能逃出聖堂的法眼。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_as: Calling upon the reach of the Hidden Temple, none escape the eye of the Templar.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_kunkka_ghost_ship_: 酒興大起！移動速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，並暫時對承受傷害的一部分感到麻木。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_kunkka_gh: You're drunk! Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, temporary numbness to incoming damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_naga_siren_ensnare: 被困在原地，無法移動或使用閃躍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_naga_sire: Trapped in place, cannot move or blink.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_visage_so: Number of stored souls from Soul Assumption.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_split_shot_D: 梅杜莎藉由魔法將普通攻擊射出的箭矢分裂成若干支，使自己能同時殺傷多名額外目標。分裂箭矢造成的傷害會比平常低。\n\n額外目標不會受到其它攻擊效果（例如暴擊）的影響。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_spl: Medusa magically splits her shot into several arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.\n\nThe extra targets will not receive other attack effects (such as critical strike).
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren_mirror_i: 瑟莉希斯除了驍勇善戰，而且眾人皆知其難以追尋。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren: Slithice, while being strong in her own right, is notoriously hard to track down.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren_ensnare_: 想要逃離魚人追殺的唯一辦法就是永遠不要與之作對。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren: The only way to escape the onslaught of a Slithereen is to never oppose one in the first place.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren_rip_tide: 海妖從深海中湧出的激流能夠瓦解敵人的防禦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren: A torrent from the Deep Ones crushes the defenses of the Siren's enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren_song_of_: 瑟莉希斯那魔幻的歌聲能使敵人不自覺地沉醉其中，同時在需要的時候呼喚她的魚人夥伴前來助戰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren: Slithice's powerful voice enchants leagues of opponents, while calling her Slithereen kin in a time of need.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warlord_berse: 巨魔戰將於啟動期間把原本投擲的飛斧改做近戰武器，降低基礎攻擊間隔、獲得額外移速、護甲，並使普攻有一定機率造成纏繞效果，令其無法移動或使用位移類技能。\n\n狂戰士之怒也會改變旋風飛斧的作用方式。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warl: While active, Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have a chance to ensnare, preventing the target from moving or using mobility spells. Berserker's Rage also grants additional movement speed, armor, and decreases base attack time.\n\nWhirling Axes has different functionality while Berserker's Rage is active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warlord_berse: 巨魔戰將的斧頭就和他的怒火一般，取之不盡 用之不竭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warl: Like his anger, Troll Warlord's supply of axes is infinite.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warlord_whirl: 唯有受憎恨驅使的斧頭才能進行如此致命的旋轉。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warl: Only axes fueled by hate whirl with such a deadly spin.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warlord_fervo: 持續攻擊同一個目標時，巨魔戰將的的攻擊速度會變快。如果改變目標的話，疊加的攻速則歸零。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warl: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warlord_fervo: 如果打一次沒用，那就打到有用為止。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warl: If at first you don't succeed, strike, strike again.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warlord_battl: 純粹的憎恨激發出的衝勁加快著刀鋒的揮舞。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warl: An adrenaline rush of pure hatred quickens your blades.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_hoof_stomp_: 猛擊地面，對周遭敵人造成傷害和暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_ho: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_hoof_stomp_: 戰行者健壯的馬蹄振擊土壤，大地的震撼千裏之外都能感受到。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_ho: When the mighty hoof of the Warrunner touches soil, the tremors are felt far and wide.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_double_edge: 半人馬近距離對敵人做出一個強力打擊，對打擊範圍內所有敵人和自己造成傷害。將根據自身的力量屬性造成額外傷害。雙面刃的自傷不會導致自殺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_do: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target. Deals extra damage based on your strength. Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_double_edge: 布拉德威登在激烈的戰鬥中所進行攻擊猛烈到足以使自己因此受傷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_do: In the spurs of combat, Bradwarden's vicious strikes sometimes cause self-inflicted collateral damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_return_Lore: 布拉德威登沒有親自迴避敵人攻擊的必要，他那宛如盔甲般堅硬的表皮往往就會替他做出反擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_re: Bradwarden has no need to parry his opponent's attacks; his armor-like hide does it for him.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_shockwave: 傑爾拉克山脈本身地質並不穩定，不過馬格納斯學會了引導它的震波。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_: Mt. Joerlak was a somewhat unstable mass, and Magnus has learned to channel its reverberations.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_empower_D: 為一名友方單位施加授予力量增幅，增幅將提升普攻傷害並使近戰普攻帶有波及效果。此加成在馬格納斯自己身上會比較多，增至 %self_multiplier%%% 倍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack. Magnus receives %self_multiplier%%% larger bonus.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_empower_L: 在一聲怒吼之後，馬格納斯即將展現他真正的力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_: With a deep bellow, Magnus displays his true power.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_skewer_Lo: 對於有興趣的商人來說，半人犀牛的獸角價值與它們能造成的破壞成正比。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_: Magnoceros horns are valuable in direct proportion to their danger to prospective merchants.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_reverse_p: 馬格納斯改變物質的極性，將附近的敵人都吸引到他前方，並透過強力的震擊對他們造成暈眩和傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_reverse_p: 馬格納斯戰鬥時的戰怒如同傑爾拉克山的火山噴發。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_: Magnus fights with the fury of the erupting Mt. Joerlak.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_test_of_faith_: 將一個友方單位傳送回我方基地。小兵會立刻被傳送，英雄則在傳送前有一段延遲時間。若朝自身施放，所有藉由神聖信念任命於自己的單位將於一個延遲後傳來自己身旁。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_test_: Teleports an allied unit back to the base.  Creeps are teleported instantly, while Heroes have a delay before teleporting. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen through Holy Persuasion will be teleported to him after a delay.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_medusa_mana_shield: 對梅杜莎造成的部份傷害將由魔力值承擔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_medusa_ma: Some of the damage taken by Medusa is dealt to her mana pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_troll_warlord_batt: 獲得普攻生命吸取效果，攻擊速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%，移動速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，且不會因為受到傷害而死亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_troll_war: Granting %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed, %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% movement speed, and lifesteal. Troll cannot die during Battle Trance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shadow_amulet_:
主動：漸隱

令自己或目標友方英雄進入一個只要靜止不同就可無限維持的隱形狀態。

漸隱效果有 %fade_time% 秒的生效延遲。

對自身使用時無冷卻時間。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shado:
Active: Fade

Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero as long as the target unit remains still.

Has a %fade_time% second fade time, and breaks instantly upon moving.

There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shadow_amulet_: 一個當持有者完全靜止時能夠蒙蔽他人感官的小小護符。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shado: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_stampede_De: 半人馬帶領使自己和所有友方英雄進入萬馬奔騰狀態，於期間獲得最大移動速度，並踐踏任何觸及到的敵方單位。被踐踏的敵方單位將受到移速減緩效果，並承受基於半人馬戰行者當前力量屬性的傷害。同一名敵人無法被同個萬馬奔騰狀態重覆踐踏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_st: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and stop any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_stampede_Lo: 歐梅克斯的巨大腰帶象徵著布拉德威登是同族中最偉大的戰士，激勵著他的角鬥士同夥在戰鬥中跟隨他。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_st: The great belt of Omexe, which labels Bradwarden as the greatest warrior of his kind, incites his fellow gladiators to follow him into barbarous combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_silencer_last_word: 將於詛咒時間結束或施法時，受到傷害和沉默。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_silencer_: Will be damaged and silenced if the timer expires, or if they cast a spell.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_silencer_glaives_o: 任何被沉默術士擊殺、或者在沉默術士周遭 925 範圍內死亡的敵方英雄將被他永久竊取 2 點（天賦強化後為 4 點）智力屬性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_silencer_: Silencer will permanently steal 2 (4 with Talent) Intelligence from any enemy hero he kills, and any enemy hero that dies within 925 range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_centaur_stampede_s: 該單位受到萬馬奔騰的撞擊，移動速度減緩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_centaur_s: Unit is hit by stampede, it has reduced movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_candy_drop_De: 持有糖果，最大血量降低 %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_cand: Holding candy, max health reduced by %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_halloween_cand: 使用：將糖果貯藏到糖果罐來讓地圖上所有英雄都獲得金錢和 XP，或是用來滿足狂暴的羅煞那張貪吃的大嘴巴。貯藏最多的糖果罐來獲得獎勵！攜帶糖果會降低您的血量，而且還會降低您的最大血量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hallo: Use: Deposit the candy in your bucket to give all heroes on the map gold and XP, or use it to satisfy a rampaging Roshan's sweet tooth. Get the highest candy in your bucket to win a prize! Carrying candy makes you less healthy, and decreases your max HP.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_halloween_cand: 一顆詭異的糖果，用小貪魔的奶油及油質維生素組成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hallo: A strange looking candy, made out of Greevil cream and gummy vitamins.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_halloween_can: 獲得 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_STRENGTH_BONUS% 力量、%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_AGILITY_BONUS% 敏捷以及 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_INTELLECT_BONUS% 智力。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_halloween_ap: 羅煞從天上降下極具毀滅性的烈焰光束來襲擊 400 範圍外、1200 範圍內的所有敵方英雄。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_hal: Roshan launches devastating beams of incineration from the sky at all enemy heroes outside of 400 range, but within 1200 range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_halloween_wa: 經過一段緩衝時間後，羅煞猛擊地面來對附近的敵人造成大量傷害並擊退所有敵人。離羅煞越近，受到的傷害越大。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_hal: After a delay, Roshan smashes the ground, causing massive radial damage in an area around him, knocking back all enemies.  The closer to Roshan the enemy is, the more damage it takes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_halloween_to: 羅煞投擲附近一個敵方單位到另一個較遠的單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_hal: Roshan tosses a nearby enemy unit at an enemy that is further away.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_halloween_sh: 羅煞對物理傷害免疫，但短時間內受到的魔法傷害增加。當羅煞使用神盾，所有技能及物品冷卻時間都會重置刷新。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_hal: Roshan becomes immune to physical damage, but takes enhanced magical damage for a brief time.  When Roshan uses Shell, all ability and item cooldowns are refreshed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_roshan_halloween_f: 羅煞才剛吃了些糖果，您現在還無法餵他！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_roshan_ha: Roshan just ate some candy, you can't feed him yet!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_halloween_roshan_b: 您有 3 秒鐘的時間可以給羅煞糖果！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_halloween: You have 3 seconds to give Roshan candy!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_roshan_halloween_c: 羅煞吃下這麼多糖果了！
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_roshan_halloween_s: 羅煞對物理傷害免疫但將受到 400% 魔法傷害！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_roshan_ha: Roshan is immune to physical damage but taking 400% enhanced magic damage!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_halloween_truce_De: 您不會受到其他玩家的傷害！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_halloween: You can't get hurt by other players!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_slark_shadow_dance: 獲得 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% 移動速度加成，每秒恢復 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_PERCENTAGE%%% 最大生命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_slark_sha: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% bonus movement speed and regenerating %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_PERCENTAGE%%% of max HP per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_vladmir_aura_: 獲得 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% 生命吸取效果、%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%% 基礎傷害，和 %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% 魔力恢復。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_vlad: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% lifesteal, %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%% damage, and %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% mana regen.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_whirling_d: 伐木機向外旋出極度鋒利的鋸片，傷害周遭敵人並摧毀範圍內的樹木。受影響的敵方英雄將在短時間內損失一些主要屬性。死亡迴旋將會依照鋸片旋出時摧毀了多少樹木而增加傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_w: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal bonus damage per tree destroyed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_whirling_d: 當瑞茲拉克被夢魘般的藤蔓和植物纏繞時，他毫不猶豫地拿起鏈鋸來抵禦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_w: In the case that Rizzrack gets surrounded by the the vines and plants of his nightmares, he has an immediate chainsaw defense.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_timber_cha: 伐木機發射一條鐵鏈，並將自身迅速拉至鐵鏈勾到的第一棵樹旁，對這條路徑上的任何敵人造成衝撞傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_t: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_timber_cha: 你作夢也想不到你能逃離那些萬惡樹苗的魔掌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_t: You never know when you might need to escape from malevolent saplings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_reactive_a: 每當伐木機受到一次普通攻擊，他就會獲得一層反應裝甲增幅度，每層提升生命恢復和護甲直到持續時間結束。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_r: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_reactive_a: 這套鋸齒機器只要有輕微的觸碰便會立即加強防禦裝備。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_r: The saw-suit is equipped to react to the slightest touch with fortified defenses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_chakram_De: 將機體上的大型鋸刃發射出去，沿途旋轉至目標區域對接觸到的敵人造成傷害和移速減緩，接著懸空在目標地點向繼續牴觸鋸刃的敵人造成傷害，同時隨著敵人每損失 5%% 的血量而加深對方受到的移速減緩程度。鋸刃的發射與回收均會破壞路徑上所有的樹木。鋸齒飛輪的發射和懸空轉動均會消耗伐木機的魔力，並剝奪伐木機的普通攻擊能力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_c: Fires your main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every %slow_health_percentage%%% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_return_cha: 將飛鋸收回到伐木機身上。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristleback_viscous: 將敵人覆滿黏稠的鼻液，降低護甲和移動速度。重覆施放時疊加並刷新持續時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristlebac: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristleback_viscous: 困在大雪中的鋼背獸偶感風寒，卻讓他在戰鬥中所向披靡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristlebac: Having caught a cold while stuck in the snow, Bristleback turns it to his advantage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristleback_quill_s: 對鋼背獸周圍的單位射出針刺造成傷害。被針刺掃射擊中的單位在 %quill_stack_duration% 秒內被再次擊中會造成額外傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristlebac: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback.  Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last %quill_stack_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristleback_quill_s: 暴徒所謂的榮譽甚是棘手。鋼背獸的尖刺也是一樣。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristlebac: An enforcer's honor can be a prickly thing.  So can his quills.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristleback_bristle: 鋼背獸被動地減輕來自背後或兩旁的所有傷害，且每當背後承傷達 %quill_release_threshold% 時就會自動施放目前等級的「針刺掃射」技能；後者沒有時限，只要滿額就會觸發。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristlebac: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes %quill_release_threshold% damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristleback_bristle: 要的就是背對著你戰鬥。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristlebac: Turning his back to a fight might be just the thing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristleback_warpath: 鋼背獸每次使用技能時都會讓自己進入憤怒狀態，增加移動速度與攻擊力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristlebac: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.
'Temper, temper,' his mum always chided.  But in a fight, a temper can come in handy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shredder_reactive_: 每層提供護甲與生命恢復。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shredder_: Gaining bonus armor and HP regen per stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shredder_chakram_d: 受到鋸齒飛輪持續傷害並減速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shredder_: Taking damage over time and being slowed by the Chakram.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shredder_chakram_d: 當鋸齒飛輪旋轉時你無法攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shredder_: You cannot attack while Chakram is in the air.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_magic_missi: 藍色精髓\n向一個敵方單位射出貪魔靈彈，暈眩並造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_ma: BLUE ESSENCE\nFires a greevilish magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_cold_snap_D: 貪魔將敵人的熱量抽空，將其降到絕對零度。敵人將受到傷害並被短暫凍結，持續傷害同樣會使敵人凍結並造成額外傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_co: The greevil draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_decrepify_D: 紅色精髓\n一個強大的驅逐咒語能降低一個單位的速度並使其無法攻擊或受到攻擊。受影響的單位會承受額外魔法傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_de: RED ESSENCE\nA powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_diabolic_ed: 貪魔在他四周的空間中充滿爆發性的魔法能量，對敵方單位和建築同時造成物理和魔法傷害。有效範圍內的敵人越少，這些敵人受到的傷害越大。持續 8 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_di: Saturates the area around the Greevil with magical explosions that deal mixed damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_maledict_De: 紫色精髓\n詛咒一片區域內的所有敵方英雄，其中的英雄每 4 秒受到一次傷害，每損失 100 點生命時會增加傷害加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_ma: PURPLE ESSENCE\nCurses all enemy Heroes in an area, causing them to take damage every 4 seconds and adding bonus damage for every 100 HP lost since the curse began.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_shadow_stri: 紫色精髓\n猛力投擲一把淬毒匕首造成大量初始傷害，然後再造成持續傷害。中毒的單位移動速度會降低。持續傷害每 3 秒產生一次。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_sh: PURPLE ESSENCE\nHurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_laguna_blad: 紅色魔蛋\n發出閃電雷擊一個敵方單位，造成大量傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_la: RED EGG\nFires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_poison_nova: 紫色魔蛋\n對敵方單位造成持續傷害的劇毒之環。劇毒新星最多將敵人血量降至 1 HP。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_po: PURPLE EGG\nA spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units.  Poison Nova's effect cannot bring units below 1 HP.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_ice_wall_De: 藍色精髓\n在貪魔前方製造一堵寒冰之牆。寒冰之牆放射出的寒冰之氣將對敵方單位造成減速和傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_ic: BLUE ESSENCE\nGenerates a wall of solid ice directly in front of the Greevil. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies and deals damage each second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_fatal_bonds: 橘色魔蛋\n將數個敵方單位連接在一起，其中一人受到的傷害的一部份會被其他所有人感受到。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_fa: ORANGE ESSENCE\nBinds several enemy units together, causing a portion of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_blade_fury_: 橘色精髓\n舞起具有破壞性力量的旋風斬，對貪魔周圍的敵方單位造成傷害，並使貪魔自己對魔法免疫。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_bl: ORANGE ESSENCE\nCauses a bladestorm of destructive force around the Greevil, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_phantom_str: 黃色精髓\n傳送到一個友方或敵方單位身邊，如果是敵方單位則在攻擊該目標時獲得攻擊速度加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_ph: YELLOW ESSENCE\nTeleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_time_lock_D: 黃色精髓\n攻擊有一定機率將一個敵方目標鎖定在時間中，造成暈眩和額外傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_ti: YELLOW ESSENCE\nAdds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_shadow_wave: 綠色精髓\n暗影波治療數個友軍，同時對他們附近小範圍內的敵人造成與治療量相等的傷害。暗影波也會治療貪魔，但不會將自己算在目標數量內。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_sh: GREEN ESSENCE\nShadow Wave heals several allies, which in turn cause damage equal to their healing in a small area around them.  The Greevil is always healed by Shadow Wave, and it does not count toward the number of targets.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_leech_seed_: 綠色精髓\n在敵方體內植入一顆侵蝕生命的種子，吸取目標生命的同時減緩其速度。種子治療周圍的友方單位，治療量與吸取的生命值相同。共吸取 4 次。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_le: GREEN ESSENCE\nPlants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it equal to the amount drained.  Pulses 4 times.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_echo_slam_D: 橘色魔蛋\n衝擊波穿過地面傷害敵方單位。每個受到攻擊的敵人都會引起反射波再傷害附近單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_ec: ORANGE EGG\nShockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_natures_att: 綠色魔蛋\n召喚一群小精靈治療貪魔以及身邊的友方單位，持續 10 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_na: GREEN EGG\nA cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby.  Lasts 10 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_bloodlust_D: 黃色魔蛋\n讓一個友方單位陷入狂暴，增加移動速度和攻擊速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_bl: YELLOW EGG\nIncites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_purificatio: 白色魔蛋\n立即治療一個友方單位，並對周圍的敵方單位造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_pu: WHITE EGG\nInstantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_flesh_golem: 黑色魔蛋\n貪魔變身為一具令人毛骨悚然的貪魔巨人，提升自身生命恢復、護甲以及攻擊速度。附近單位則降低護甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_fl: BLACK EGG\nThe Greevil transforms into a horrifying greevil golem, increasing his health regen, armor, and attack damage.  Nearby units have their armor reduced.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_hook_Descri: 紫色精髓\n向指定的方位或目標伸出鉤子，將接觸到的第一個單位鉤回身邊，假如是敵方單位能造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_ho: PURPLE ESSENCE\nLaunches a hook at a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to the Greevil and dealing damage if it is an enemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_rot_Descrip: 紅色精髓\n持續散發出毒氣對任何與其接觸的敵人造成傷害和移動速度減緩效果。貪魔自己也會被毒氣所傷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_ro: RED ESSENCE\nA toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but the Greevil itself.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_black_hole_: 藍色魔蛋\n持續施法 - 召喚一個強力漩渦吸住敵方單位。被黑洞影響的單位不能移動、攻擊或施法。而且越靠近中心點，受到的傷害越大。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_bl: BLUE EGG\nCHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Greevil Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.  The closer units get to the center, the more damage is dealt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_greevil_stats_Desc:
暴擊率：%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%%
