Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_greevil_whistl: 使用小貪魔口哨來暫時變成您的小貪魔！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_greev: Use the Greevil Whistle to temporarily transform into your Greevil!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_greevil_whistl: 使用小貪魔口哨能在小貪魔與英雄之間切換！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_greev: Use the Greevil Whistle to toggle between Greevil and Hero!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winter_stockin: 使用：打開長襪來獲得您的禮物！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winte: Use: Open Stocking to receive your gifts!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winter_cake_De: 吃下蛋糕後會在 8 秒內恢復 400 點生命與 50 點魔力
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winte: Use the cake to heal 400 health and 50 mana over 8 seconds
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winter_cookie_: 吃下餅乾後會在 11 秒內恢復 350 點生命與 100 點魔力
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winte: Use the cookie to heal 350 health and 100 mana over 11 seconds
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winter_coco_De: 喝下可可後會在 14 秒內恢復 300 點生命與 150 點魔力
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winte: Use the cocoa to heal 300 health and 150 mana over 14 seconds
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winter_kringle: 吃下甜甜圈後會在 17 秒內恢復 250 點生命與 200 點魔力
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winte: Use the kringle to heal 250 health and 200 mana over 17 seconds
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winter_ham_Des: 吃下火腿後會在 2 秒內恢復 300 點生命與 75 點魔力
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winte: Use the ham to heal 300 health and 75 mana over 2 seconds
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winter_skates_: 移動速度大幅提升 100。增強冰上的控制性。抄捷徑、切西瓜的時候到了！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winte: Gives a massive increase of 100 to movement speed. Increases control on the ice. Use short paths for the best result!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winter_greevil: 讓您的小貪魔在 10 秒內以最大速度移動。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winte: Makes your greevil move at max speed for 10 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winter_greevil: 沒有任何事能比小貪魔嗑光他最愛的點心還要快了！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winte: There is nothing faster than a greevil eating his favorite treat!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winter_greevil: 吃下蛋糕後會在 5 秒內恢復 400 點生命與 150 點魔力
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winte: Use the chow to heal your greevil 400 health and 150 mana over 5 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winter_mushroo: 刷新所有小貪魔的技能。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winter_greevil: 施法 2 秒後，小貪魔能夠移動到新位置。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_winte: After channeling for 2 seconds the greevil pops to the new location.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_bl: 讓目標敵方或友方英雄進入沉睡並每秒造成傷害。睡著的單位受到攻擊便會醒來，但貪魘將轉移到攻擊者身上。噩夢中的單位受到傷害就會醒來。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep and deals damage per second.  Sleeping units are awakened when attacked, but the Greevilmare passes to the attacking unit.  The nightmared unit instantly wakes up if it takes damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_bl: 侵蝕一個敵方單位的生命能量，造成傷害並恢復自身等量生命值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, dealing damage and gaining health equal to the damage dealt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_greevil_miniboss_b: 使一個敵人進入貪魘並每秒受到 20 點傷害。受到攻擊時貪魘將轉移給攻擊者。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_greevil_m: Puts enemies to sleep and inflicts 20 damage every second. Greevilmare transfers to any unit that attacks you.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_bl: 在一個敵方單位身上施放造成持續傷害的寒冰咒印，但物體只要遠離施法點足夠距離即可消除咒印。如果受攻擊單位沒有在 4 秒內走出消除距離，則將暈眩並被凍在原地。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_bl: 製造一個寒冰能量的漩渦，降低範圍內敵人的移動速度並提升魔法傷害。持續 12 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows movement speed and increases magic damage done in its range.  Lasts 12 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_greevil_miniboss_b: 受到持續傷害，如果你不動的話就會被凍結在原地。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_greevil_m: Taking periodic damage, if you don't move you will be frozen in place
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_greevil_miniboss_b: 減速，受到魔法攻擊時傷害增加
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_greevil_m: Slowed, will take additional damage from magic
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_re: 猛擊地面帶來強烈的衝擊，對附近範圍內的所有敵方單位造成傷害並減速 4 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: Slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_re: 提升接下來接連攻擊的攻擊速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: Gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_ye: 將目標用一面尖刺之盾包圍起來，對周圍的敵人造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_ye: 為一個友方目標注入能量，使其在短時間內移動速度達到最高。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of maximum movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_greevil_miniboss_y: 對附近的敵方單位造成傷害
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_wh: 立即治療一個友方單位，並對周圍的敵方單位造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_wh: 極度減緩附近敵人的移動速度和攻擊速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: Greatly degenerates the movement and attack capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_greevil_miniboss_w: 降低移動速度和攻擊速度 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_greevil_m: Movement and attack speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_si: 沒有什麽是貪魔們圓滾滾的眼睛所看不到的！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: There is nothing the googly greevils eyes can't see!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_pu: 沿直線射出一顆毒液球，碰到的敵人受到初始傷害和持續傷害，並受到減速效果影響。瘴氣在持續時間內每 2 秒造成一次持續傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 2 seconds over its duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_pu: 召喚一個對魔法免疫的守衛來攻擊敵方單位和建築物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: Summons a  ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_greevil_miniboss_p: 減速並每秒受到 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% 傷害。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_or: 釋放出一陣龍息，其烈燄焚燒所有波及到的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: Channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_or: 召喚火焰之柱傷害並暈眩敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_gr: 將目標用外殼保護，獲得生命恢復加成。同時抵擋英雄受到的物理傷害。受到若干次攻擊後失效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: Infuses the target with a protective coating which grants bonus regeneration. Also grants physical damage block from damage from heroes. Dispels when a number of damage instances are taken.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_miniboss_gr: 貪魔在身邊召喚出瘋狂生長的藤蔓和枝條纏繞敵人，使他們無法移動、閃躍、隱形或進行普攻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_greevil_mi: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_greevil_miniboss_g: 生命恢復提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT%。\n防禦 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_CONSTANT_BLOCK% 點傷害。
無法移動、攻擊或使用閃躍。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warlord_whirl: 巨魔戰將擲出兩把斧頭在他自己周圍環繞，對敵方造成傷害並使他們有一定機率攻擊落空。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warl: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_ice_shards_Des: 圖斯克將寒冰碎片壓縮成具冰凍能量的冰球並擲向目標地點，對途中所接觸的敵人造成傷害。當冰球到達目的地時寒冰碎片爆出，在該處產生一道持續 %shard_duration% 秒的障礙。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_ice_s: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for %shard_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_snowball_Descr: 圖斯克將自己滾起一顆雪球內。周遭 %snowball_grab_radius_tooltip% 範圍以內的隊友可藉由滑鼠右鍵將他們加進雪球內，即使是在雪球的行進途中也可加入。雪球滾出後，路徑上被碾壓的敵人會受到傷害和暈眩。雪球碾壓造成的傷害將隨著雪球每多容納一位友方英雄到裡頭而增加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_snowb: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a %snowball_grab_radius% radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_frozen_sigil_D: 圖斯克從嚴酷寒冬中召喚出冰封魔印。魔印環繞有一暴風雪靈氣，會使周遭 600 範圍內敵方單位的攻擊速度和移動速度受到減緩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_froze: Tusk summons a Frozen Sigil by calling upon the deepest cold of winter. The Sigil creates a snowstorm which slows all enemy units within 600 range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_walrus_punch_D: 圖斯克握緊他那強而有力的海象之拳。他下一次攻擊將造成暴擊傷害並將敵人打飛到空中。目標落地後移動速度會被降低。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_walru: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. The victim is slowed upon landing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_split_shot_L: 所有人一遇到受詛咒的蛇髮女妖都將感受到她的憤怒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_spl: All who encounter the cursed Gorgon will feel her rage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_mystic_snake: 蛇髮女妖的詛咒正是她最強大的力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_mys: The Gorgon's curse is her greatest strength.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_mana_shield_: 雖然梅杜莎出生時沒被賜予永恆的生命，但她所受的詛咒卻授予她卓越的防禦力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_man: While Medusa was not gifted with eternal life upon birth, her curse bestowed her with impressive defensive powers.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_stone_gaze_L: 梅杜莎的美貌已經成為傳說。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_sto: The beauty of Medusa is legendary.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: Arcane Bolt
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_arcan: 天怒法師釋放一道飛行緩慢的奧術之箭，基於天怒法師的智力屬性對敵方單位造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_arcan: 對於蒼白之巢內部無止境的密謀，僅有機敏和冷靜才能倖存。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: Within the Ghastly Eyrie's endless intrigue, only the clever and calm can hope to survive.
BASE DAMAGE:
INT DAMAGE MULTIPLIER:
Concussive Shot
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_concu: 天怒法師釋放一道長程光彈攻擊範圍內距離最近的敵方英雄。對位在命中點周圍的敵人造成傷害和減速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_concu: 那些為蒼白之巢效勞的法師們總是縈繞於隱蔽之戰中。你必須時時刻刻了解附近潛伏於暗影中的危險在哪裡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: Those who serve the court of the Ghastly Eyrie are ever locked in covert war. One must always know where danger lurks nearest.
SHOT RANGE:
DAMAGE RADIUS:
DAMAGE:
SLOW DURATION:
%SLOW:
Ancient Seal
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_ancie: 天怒法師將目標單位封印在遠古符文中，使其沉默並於期間承受額外的技能傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_ancie: 一種強大的咒語。無論是誰，凡觸及到艾菲利亞的魔法就得在萬籟俱寂的懺悔中受難。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: A holy incantation, whosoever finds themselves touched by Avilliva's sigil must suffer in penitent silence.
%INCREASED MAGIC DAMAGE:
DURATION:
Mystic Flare
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_mysti: 天怒法師使用他的終極魔法技能，召喚出準確且具毀滅性的祕法力場來毀滅他的敵人。力場將持續 %duration% 秒，並平均的對範圍內的所有敵方英雄造成大量傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_mysti: 只有熟練的天怒巫師才可對穹天塑造成如此般的風暴。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: Only the most practiced of Skywrath sorcerers could hope to shape the skies into such a storm.
RADIUS:
DURATION:
DAMAGE:
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tusk_frozen_sigil_: 攻擊速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%，移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tusk_froz: Attack speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%, movement slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tusk_frozen_sigil_: 降低周圍敵人攻擊速度和移動速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tusk_froz: Slowing nearby enemy attack and movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tusk_walrus_punch_: 下一個目標會被狠揍一頓！
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bristleback_viscou: 護甲降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% 點，移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bristleback_warpat: 移動速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% 並造成 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE% 點額外傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bristleba: Moving %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% faster and dealing %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE% bonus damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_death_coil_: 亞巴頓犧牲部分血量來傷害敵人或治療友方。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_de: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_aphotic_shi: 在友方單位四周召喚黑暗能量創造出一個護盾，其在消失前能夠吸收一定傷害。護盾摧毀後會產生爆炸並將吸收的傷害反擊給附近的敵方單位，同時移除目標身上特定減幅效果。\n\n驅散類型：強力
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_ap: Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_frostmourne: 亞巴頓的普通攻擊將施加地獄詛咒減幅，造成移速減緩效果。若對方在減幅時效內重覆被亞巴頓普攻 %hit_count% 次，則詛咒將會惡化，進一步造成沉默效果和更嚴重的移速減緩效果，並使所有攻擊者帶有更多攻速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_fr: Abaddon strikes an enemy, slowing the target's movement speed. If the target gets hit %hit_count% times, they become affected by a chilling curse causing them to be silenced and slowed, and all attacks against them gain an attack speed boost.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_borrowed_ti: 地獄聖泉最逆性的餽贈，最挑戰凡人認知的力量。傷痛化為治愈，殺戮化為新生。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_bo: The most unnatural of all the gifts of the Font of Avernus, this power defies mortal understanding.  What should hurt, instead heals; and what should kill gives strength anew.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_borrowed_ti: 提升「迴光返照」的持續時間，並使「迷霧纏繞」將於迴光返照作用期間在亞巴頓周圍 %redirect_range_scepter% 半徑內有隊友承受超過 %ally_threshold_scepter% 傷害時自動向其施放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_bo: Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, anytime an ally takes more than %ally_threshold_scepter% damage while within %redirect_range_scepter% range of Abaddon, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_troll_warlord_whir: 失明，進行的攻擊將有著 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE%%% 機率落空。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_troll_war: Blinded, have a %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE%%% chance to miss.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_abaddon_borrowed_t: 所有受到的傷害轉換為治療亞巴頓自己。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_abaddon_b: All damage taken by Abaddon heals him instead.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_abaddon_aphotic_sh: 吸收傷害；吸收傷害達最大值後會爆炸並造成範圍傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_abaddon_a: Absorbing damage; upon absorbing the max damage, explodes and deals damage in an area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_batrider_flaming_l: 燃燒枷鎖使攻擊無法進行
燃燒枷鎖開啟時無法攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_batrider_: Cannot attack while Lasso is active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_echo_st: 創物之力仍在泰坦的重踏中迴響。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_tita: The force of creation still echoes in the stomp of the Titan.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_echo_st: 上古泰坦與他的星體之魂一起重踏大地，令他們周遭的敵方單位陷入昏迷並受到傷害。上古泰坦的踩踏造成物理傷害，星體之魂的踩踏造成魔法傷害。昏迷的單位受到傷害時會甦醒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_tita: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.  Unconscious enemies will wake if they take damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_echo_st: 創物之力仍在泰坦的重踏中迴響。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_tita: The force of creation still echoes in the stomp of the Titan.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_ancestr: 上古泰坦派出他的星體之魂，對觸及的敵人造成傷害。當星體之魂與上古泰坦重新合體時，上古泰坦將獲得星體之魂增幅，依據星體之魂先前觸及多少敵人提升普攻傷害、移動速度、和護甲。\n\n星體之魂可施展回音重踏、喚回星體之魂，以及自然秩序。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_tita: Elder Titan sends forth his Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through.  When the spirit rejoins the Titan, it grants bonus damage and movement speed for each unit it passed through.\n\nThe Astral Spirit can be controlled and possesses the Echo Stomp, Return Spirit, and Natural Order abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_ancestr: 正如四大神力一樣，上古泰坦同時存在于所有平行世界之中，在需要的時候引入自己在其它時空的形體來幫忙。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_tita: Like the four fundamentals, Elder Titan exists across all planes at once and can draw other aspects of himself to assist in times of need.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_return_: 將星體之魂喚回上古泰坦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_tita: Returns the Astral Spirit to Elder Titan.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_natural: 將萬物退回初始水平，降低周遭敵方單位身上的基礎護甲以及魔法抗性。護甲降低效果由本尊施加，魔抗較低效果由星體之魂施加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_tita: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units. The armor reduction is centered around the hero, while the magic armor reduction is centered around Astral Spirit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_natural: 上古泰坦重現了創世之初的秩序。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_tita: As it was at the beginning, Elder Titan makes it so again.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_earth_s: 泰坦所創之世界，將由他親手毀滅。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_tita: That which he created, the titan tears asunder.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_elder_titan_echo_s: 受到上古泰坦踐踏而昏迷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_elder_tit: Reducing base magic damage resistance and armor by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_ov: 利用敵人的數量予以打擊，根據擊中的目標數量造成傷害並給予自己移速加成。擊中英雄所提升的傷害和移速較小兵多。會對幻象和召喚單位額外造成基於對方當前生命一定百分比的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_com: Turns the enemies' numbers against them, dealing damage and granting you bonus movement speed per unit or per hero.  Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_pr: 移除目標友方單位身上的減幅和控制效果，並在短時間內獲得攻擊速度和生命恢復加成。\n\n驅散類型：強力
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_com: Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus attack speed and health regen for a short time.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_mo: 每當受到攻擊，軍團指揮官將有一定機率立刻以普通攻擊回擊，回擊時進行生命吸取。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_com: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately counterattack with bonus lifesteal.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_du: 軍團指揮官與目標在短時間內被迫相互攻擊。雙方均不得使用技能及物品。如果一方在決鬥期間死亡，獲勝的英雄將永久獲得攻擊力加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_com: Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities.  If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_mana_break: 魔源耗損會受技能免疫狀態抵擋。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_m: Mana Burn is blocked by spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_mana_break: 此技能的傷害可以通過吸血靈氣進行生命吸取。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_m: You can lifeleech the damage dealt by this skill with a Lifesteal aura.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_blink_Note: 您可以藉由使用閃躍來閃避遠距離攻擊的投射物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_b: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_spell_shie: 與其它來源的魔法抗性成倍疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_s: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_mana_void_: 傷害取決於主要目標的目前魔力值，但對範圍內的其他單位造成同等傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_m: Damage is calculated based on the primary target's mana, but applied to all enemies within the area of effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_mana_void_: 傷害取決於主要目標的魔力多寡，但對範圍內的其他單位造成同等傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_m: Damage is calculated based on the primary target's mana, but applied to all enemies within the area of effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_shadow_: 受影響單位在持續時間內每秒慢慢恢復移動速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpai: The affected unit slowly regains its original movement speed every second during the duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_shadow_: 受影響單位在生命值低於最大值的 25%% 時可以被友方反補。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpai: Units afflicted by Shadow Strike can be denied by their allies when their HP drops below 25% of their maximum health.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_blink_N: 閃躍可用於閃避投射物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpai: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_scream_: 痛苦尖鳴可以傷害隱形單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpai: Scream Of Pain will hit invisible units.
Scream Of Pain cannot be disjointed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpain_sonic_w: 音爆衝擊波的有效距離可達 1150 距離。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_queenofpai: Sonic Wave can hit units up to 1150 units away.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_dragon_slave_N: 龍破斬可以傷害遠至 1225 範圍的單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_drago: Dragon Slave can hit units up to 1225 units away.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_light_strike_a: 光擊陣可以摧毀技能範圍內的樹木。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_light: Light Strike Array will destroy trees in its area of effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_fiery_soul_Not: 每施放一次法術就會使所有層次的持續時間刷新。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_fiery: Duration refreshes each time a new spell is cast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_fiery_soul_Not: 使用物品不會觸發熾魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lina_fiery: Using items does not trigger Fiery Soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arrow_Note0: 月神之箭每行進 150 距離就將增加 0.5 秒暈眩時間和 14 點傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arr: For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds, and the bonus damage added increases by 14.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arrow_Note1: 神箭可以擊中隱形單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_arr: Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_invis_Note0: 受影響單位不會自動攻擊敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_inv: Units affected will not auto attack enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_invis_Note1: 具有技能免疫狀態的隊友仍可受惠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_inv: Spell Immune allies will be affected.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_starfall_Not: 群星風暴不會被林肯法球抵擋。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_sta: Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_starfall_Not: 群星風暴無法傷害隱身單位。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_rage_N: 會在施放時消除大部分的增幅和減幅。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: Upon casting, many buffs and debuffs will be removed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_feast_: 生命恢復與攻擊力無關。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: The heal is independent of the damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_feast_: 可與其它來源的生命吸取效果進行線性疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_open_w: 可與其它來源的生命吸取效果進行線性疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_infest: 如被寄宿的單位在被噬魂鬼吞噬之前死亡，則噬魂鬼不會恢復生命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: If the infested unit dies before Lifestealer consumes it, no health is gained.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_infest: 噬魂鬼在寄宿期間仍可以獲得經驗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: Lifestealer gains experience while under the effects of Infest.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_sprout_Note0: 萌芽可對任何單位施放，包括地面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_spr: Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_sprout_Note1: 萌芽所創造的樹木與正常樹木一樣影響其他技能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_spr: Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_teleportatio: 開始施法時目標位置即出現效果，敵友均可見。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_tel: When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_force_of_nat: 自然呼喚創造的樹精數量不會多於作用範圍內的樹木數量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_for: Nature's Call can only create as many treants as there are trees in the target area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_wrath_of_nat: 自然之怒不會攻擊視野外的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_wra: Wrath of Nature will not hit units out of vision.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_wrath_of_nat: 對小地圖釋放將攻擊最近的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_wra: Can be cast through the minimap; the nearest valid target will be selected.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_focusfir: 「堅守原位」命令將使角色暫停攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner: Issuing a Hold Position command will pause Windranger's attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_powersho: 蓄力射擊將會摧毀所及之處的樹木。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner: Powershot will destroy trees in its area of effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_shackles: 此技能可同時束縛兩個敵人，對兩者造成暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner: This spell can shackle two enemies together, stunning them both.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_shackles: 可將目標與其身後最遠 %shackle_distance% 的其他敵人或樹木綁在一起。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner: Can shackle the target to an enemy unit or tree at most %shackle_distance% behind the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_windrun_: 可被閃避在風行啟動前就已先襲來的投射物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner: Activating Windrun will evade incoming projectiles.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_voodoo_Note1: 對方在變形狀態下僅有 %movespeed% 基礎移動速度，但使其擁有最大移動速度的增幅效果依然有效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lion_voodo: The target will have a base movement speed of %movespeed%, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_neth: 換位效果無視技能免疫。
釋放技能時復仇之魂及目標周圍的樹木將被摧毀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulsp: Trees near Vengeful Spirit and the target will be destroyed when the spell is cast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_paraly: 只要附近有其它單位可供進行反彈，裝有麻痺藥劑的木桶就可以多次打擊同一名目標。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doct: Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_voodoo: 可正常治療到具有技能免疫狀態的單位。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_death_: 死亡守衛本身是無敵的，僅只會在巫醫的施法動作被打斷或持續時間結束時消失。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doct: The Death Ward is invulnerable, and is only destroyed if Witch Doctor is interrupted or its duration expires.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_death_: 死亡守衛可以受到控制去指定攻擊特定的一名目標。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doct: The Death Ward can be controlled, and made to attack a specific target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_split_earth: 撕裂大地可以摧毀效果範圍內的樹木。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_sp: Split Earth will destroy trees in its area of effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_diabolic_ed: 傷害無法被傷害抵擋減免。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_di: Damage is not reduced by damage block.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_diabolic_ed: 爆炸在拉席瑞克被殺死後依然會持續作用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_di: The explosions will continue even if Leshrac is killed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_diabolic_ed: 可對建築、技能免疫單位及隱形單位造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_leshrac_di: Can damage buildings, Spell Immune units, and invisible units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_blade_fu: 可在施展期間使用道具。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut: You can use items during Blade Fury.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_blade_fu: 劍聖仍可在旋風斬的施放期間進行普攻。話說如此，由此狀態做出的普攻僅對不受旋風斬影響的單位有效，例如防禦塔和守衛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut: Juggernaut can still perform attacks while in Blade Fury. However, only units that are not affected by Blade Fury, such as wards or structures, will take damage from these attacks.
The healing ward can be controlled.
Multiple healing wards do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_omni_sla: 超究武神霸斬期間可以使用物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut: You can use items during Omnislash.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_omni_sla: 能夠朝具有技能免疫狀態的單位施放。
受到斬擊的小兵一擊必殺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut: Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_meat_hook_Not: 目標為敵人時可以中斷對方的持續施法動作。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_meat: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_meat_hook_Not: 肉鉤能如實擊中隱形的單位。
肉鉤可以拉動友方單位，但不會造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_meat: Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_rot_Note0: 使用腐爛不會打斷持續施法。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_rot_Note2: 開啟腐爛期間帕吉被沉默則無法關閉腐爛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_rot_: If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated.

海妖之歌的的作用範圍一直跟隨這娜迦海妖，一旦他遠離目標，目標就會醒來。

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: The projectile moves very slowly (500 ms), providing 325 vision around it.  Upon impact, it will reveal the target area for 3.34 seconds.
Arcane Bolt cannot be disjointed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_concu: 若發射範圍內無敵方英雄，震盪擊將瞄準距離最近的敵方蔓生單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: If no enemy heroes are in range or they are in fog, Concussive Shot targets the nearest enemy creep.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_concu: 目標附近的小兵也將受到傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: Damages creeps around the impact area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_concu: 彈道周圍提供 400 範圍視野，集中目標後揭露目標範圍 3.34 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: Provides 400 vision around the projectile, and reveals the target area for 3.34 seconds upon impact.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_ancie: 對於魔法抗性的降低效果無法影響小兵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: The magic damage resistance reduction doesn't affect creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_mysti: 秘法閃焰僅影響英雄，對英雄幻象和小兵無效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: Mystic Flare only affects Heroes; it does not damage illusions or creep heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_skywrath_mage_anci: 被沈默且魔法傷害提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_skywrath_: Silenced and magic damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_legion_commander_p: 攻擊速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%，每秒恢復 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% 生命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_legion_co: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% HP regen.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_legion_commander_d: 決鬥中，直到雙方有人死亡或效果結束。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_legion_co: Dueling until opponent dies or the effect ends.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_legion_commander_d: 决鬥獲勝永久獲得攻擊力加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_legion_co: Gaining bonus damage permanently from won duels.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_starfall_Not: 如果即將二次攻擊的目標在群星降下前就已死亡則群星風暴將會另新選擇二次攻擊的目標。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_sta: Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_morta: 冥魂大帝的攻擊有機率造成額外傷害。每擊殺 2 名敵方單位即獲得 1 點致命打擊充能，主動施放來把充能轉換成骷髏戰士為你作戰。骷髏戰士將於死亡後重生一次。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_k: Wraith King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack. Every two kills on an enemy unit adds a skeleton charge. Skeletons respawn once when killed.
One blow to crush a foe.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_apparition_: 寒霜詛咒神杖持續時間：
提升寒霜詛咒的持續時間。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_medusa_stone_gaze_: 化為石頭，於石化期間呈暈眩狀態，且承受的物理傷害加深 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_PHYSICAL_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_medusa_st: Turned to stone.  Stunned and taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_PHYSICAL_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE%%% extra physical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ethereal_blade: 虛靈形態在友軍和自己身上將會增加一秒的持續時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ether: Lasts an extra second on Self or Allied cast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_thirst_: 嗜血渴望普攻傷害加成最大值：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_black_hole_a: 為黑洞附加當前等級的午夜凋零。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_bla: Adds the current level of Midnight Pulse to Black Hole.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_spell_steal_: 降低冷卻時間，增加施法距離，竊取的技能將獲得神杖升級。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_spe: Decreases cooldown, increases cast range and upgrades the spell to the Scepter level.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_mysti: 使「秘法閃焰」在每次施放時將二度朝目標周遭 %scepter_radius% 範圍內的另一位隨機目標自動施放。優先瞄準英雄。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: When Skywrath Mage casts Mystic Flare, another Mystic Flare will be created on the position of a different random target enemy within %scepter_radius% range. Heroes will take priority
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_nightstal: Causes you to have reduced vision.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_silencer_int_steal: 任何被沉默術士擊殺、或者在沉默術士周遭 925 範圍內死亡的敵方英雄將被他永久竊取 2 點（天賦強化後為 4 點）智力屬性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_silencer_: Silencer will permanently steal 2 (4 with Talent) Intelligence from any enemy hero he kills, and any enemy hero that dies within 925 range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_frostarmor_sl: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，攻擊速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_fros: Movement speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_ice_shards_Lor: 在冰柵附近的凍土荒原上，隨著秋日的最後一抹餘暉，冰霜正迅速凝結。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_ice_s: In the frozen tundra near the Barrier, after the last sun of autumn has set, ice can form with alarming speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_snowball_Lore: 仍有江湖傳說講述著白色荒原上終結那場激烈格鬥的壯舉。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_snowb: Tales are still told of the wild feat that ended the grand brawl at White Fields.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_walrus_punch_L: 誰打出第一拳並不重要，重要的是誰打出最後一拳。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_walru: It never matters who throws the first punch, only who throws the last.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spirit_searin: 餘燼之靈丟出熾熱的絆鎖綁住附近的敵人，將他們在困在一個地點並造成每秒傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spir: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
Targets are chosen randomly around Xin.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spirit_searin: 無法影響到隱形或具有技能免疫狀態的單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spir: Does not affect Spell Immune or invisible units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spirit_sleigh: 餘燼之靈以熾焰之速衝向目標區域，對該區附近的敵人進行普攻接著回歸衝刺起點。靈炎之拳普攻會對英雄單位造成額外傷害，對蔓生單位則較少。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spir: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes, and less damage to creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spirit_sleigh: 當技能施放時目標立刻決定。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spir: Targets are determined when the spell is cast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spirit_sleigh: 炘所擁有的任何攻擊效果（如暴擊、重擊、波及或法球效果）均可藉此技能生效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spir: Any attack modifier that Xin has (such as Critical Strike, Bash, Cleave, or Orb effects) will be applied normally on these attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spirit_flame_: 餘燼之靈用烈焰環繞自己形成一個可以吸收一定額度魔法傷害的護盾。炙炎之盾在啟動會開始對周圍造成每秒傷害直到盾破裂，或者持續時間結束為止。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spir: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spirit_flame_: 魔法傷害的吸收計算於任何減免效果之前。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spir: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spirit_activa: 選取一個殘炎，向它衝刺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spir: Select the Fire Remnant to arrive at.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spirit_activa: 行以熾炎速，炎靈逝意衝！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spir: With blazing speed does a spirit fly!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spirit_fire_r: 餘燼之靈每隔%charge_restore_time%秒創造出一個殘炎，最多擁有%max_charges%個。釋放時目標地點將產生一個殘炎像（速度為餘燼之靈移動速度的%speed_multiplier%%%）。使用殘炎技能時，餘燼之靈會衝向其中一個殘炎像。在衝刺過程會依次引爆其他殘炎像，沿途造成範圍傷害，最後到達指定的殘炎像，造成範圍傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spir: Ember Spirit generates Fire Remnant charges every %charge_restore_time% seconds, with a max of %max_charges% charges. Releasing a charge sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at %speed_multiplier%%% Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit can dash out to his Remnants, dealing damage along the way and exploding them upon arrival.  The targeted Remnant will be arrived at last.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spirit_fire_r: 升級大絕後即有 3 個殘炎（最大值）。
殘炎以自身 2.5 倍移動速度衝到指定位置。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spir: Fire Remnants move to where you targeted them at 2.5x your speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_boulde: 大地之靈猛烈打擊指定的敵方或友方單位，朝目標面對方向將其擊飛一段距離。若對地面施放，那麼他將選擇身旁 %remnant_smash_radius_tooltip% 範圍內距離自己最近的殘岩為目標將其擊飛。被擊飛的單位或殘岩將傷害所碰撞到的敵方單位。若擊飛目標為殘岩，其擊飛距離更遠，且被殘岩碰撞的敵方單位還將被緩速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest Stone Remnant in a %remnant_smash_radius_tooltip% radius. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits.  If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also slowed. Stone Remnants travel further than other units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_boulde: 大地之靈以山巒之力打擊敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: It is with the power of a mountain that Earth Spirit strikes his enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_boulde: 緩速僅在初始作用目標為殘岩時生效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: Silence is only applied if the initial target is a Stone Remnant.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_rollin: 大地之靈凝聚為巨石，經過 %delay%s 秒延遲後朝施法方向滾去，對敵方單位造成傷害和暈眩效果。大地之靈會在被暈眩或者衝撞到一名敵方英雄後停下。當大地之靈滾過殘岩時，滾動距離及滾動速度將會大幅提升，且被衝撞到的敵人將被暈眩更久。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a %delay%s delay, rolls toward the target location, damaging and stunning enemy units. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and stun enemies for longer.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_rollin: 大地之靈喚起自己和大地的關聯，用匯聚而來的土石化作一顆具有保護作用的大石向前翻滾一小段距離。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: Calling upon his connection to the land, the Earth Spirit draws loose stone to him, which forms a protective ball that he can use to roll short distances.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_geomag: 大地之靈將目標殘岩牽引至自己面前，受到牽引目標衝撞到的敵人將受到傷害和沉默。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: Earth Spirit pulls the target Stone Remnant. Enemies struck by the gripped target will be silenced and take damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_geomag: 物以類聚且有喚必答。就連潛藏在血肉之軀內的微量金屬也難以不受大地之靈所吸引。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: Like calls to like. Even the minerals found in the blood and bones of living beings are not immune to the call of the Earth Spirit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_stone_: 在目標地點召喚一尊殘岩。殘岩雖然既無法提供視野也沒有任何實質效用，但是無法被摧毀而且可與大地之靈的其他技能搭配使用。召喚殘岩需消耗使用次數，每隔一段時間就會自動補充。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: Call a Stone Remnant to the target location.  Stone Remnants have no vision and are invulnerable, and can be used with Earth Spirit's abilities.  Calling a Stone Remnant consumes a charge, which recharge over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_stone_: 大地之靈向他長久埋藏在大地深處的石像軍團傳喚，召喚出一尊兵馬俑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: Earth Spirit calls forth a remnant of his stone army, long buried with him in the dark embrace of the Earth.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_magnet: 磁化附近範圍的單位，使對方於短時內持續受到傷害。任何受磁化的英雄都能觸發附近的殘岩並使其爆炸，繼而刷新附近敵方單位身上的磁化持續時間。此過程可重複多次。如有磁化的敵方英雄遭到地磁牽引沉默或巨礫碎擊影響，則其他受磁化的英雄也將一併受到影響。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: Magnetizes units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by Geomagnetic Grip or Boulder Smash, all magnetized heroes share the effects.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_magnet: 任何血肉之軀內的微量金屬都將於大地之靈一念之間群起造反。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: At the Earth Spirit's call, the minerals in the blood and bones of his enemies rebel against the bodies they find themselves in.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abyssal_underlord_f: 在目標地區喚下數道火焰去殺傷敵方單位，並進一步造成持續傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abyssal_un: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abyssal_underlord_f: 征戰的烈焰從深淵最幽暗的深處向外爆發。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abyssal_un: The flames of conquest blaze forth from the darkest depths of the abyss.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abyssal_underlord_p: 在目標地點召喚出致命深坑，以 %pit_interval% 一次的頻率纏繞任何陷入深坑的敵方單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abyssal_un: A deadly pit is conjured at the target location; any unit that enters will be rooted. Each enemy unit within the pit are affected every %pit_interval% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abyssal_underlord_p: 扭曲成現實本身的接縫，維洛格羅斯昭然的仇恨讓蔑視他意志的人動彈不得。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abyssal_un: Twisting into the seams of reality itself, Vrogros' manifest hatred paralyzes those who defy his will.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abyssal_underlord_a: 光是站在孽主面前就能感受到自己的戰意從心靈深處內被榨乾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abyssal_un: To merely stand in the presence of the Underlord is to feel the conviction of battle sapped from one's soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abyssal_underlord_d: 他們的到來全無徵兆，王國曾經繁榮的地方只剩烈火和血海。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abyssal_un: They come without warning, leaving fire and blood where kingdoms once flourished.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ember_spirit_seari: 被熾炎絆鎖困住後。無法閃躍或移動，每秒持續受到傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ember_spi: Locked in place by Searing Chains.  Cannot blink or move, taking damage per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ember_spirit_flame: 持續吸收魔法傷害，並且造成範圍魔法傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ember_spi: Absorbing magic damage, and dealing magic damage in an area of effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ember_spirit_fire_: 殘炎只要還有使用次數便能供餘燼之靈隨時施放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ember_spi: You may activate a Fire Remnant whenever there is a charge available.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_earth_spirit_stone: 您僅能在尚有殘餘數量的情況下放置殘岩，數量會依據時間逐漸恢復。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_earth_spi: You can only place a Stone Remnant when you have a charge available.  Charges slowly restore over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_earth_spirit_bould: 遭到大地之靈的殘岩沉默。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_earth_spi: Silenced by a Stone from Earth Spirit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_earth_spirit_rolli: 被大地之靈的巨礫翻滾打中，移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_earth_spi: Hit by Earth Spirit's Rolling Boulder, movement slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_earth_spirit_magne: 被大地之靈所磁化而持續受到每秒傷害。受到磁化的單位在靠近大地之靈所召喚的兵馬俑將會引爆它們，讓同樣的減幅附加到受爆炸波及的目標並刷新減幅的持續時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_earth_spi: Magnetized by Earth Spirit and taking damage per second.  Moving near one of Earth Spirit's stones will ignite the stone, Magnetizing all nearby enemy heroes and refreshing the debuff.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_abyssal_underlord_: 遭到怨念深淵困住，無法進行移動或閃躍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_abyssal_u: Ensnared by Pit of Malice, cannot move or blink.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_abyssal_underlord_: 降低附近敵人的攻擊力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_abyssal_u: Reducing the damage of nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_roshan_spell_block: 羅煞每隔 15 秒就可以阻擋一次指定施放的法術攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_roshan_sp: Roshan will block one targeted spell every 15 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_halloween_bu: 羅煞噴出一道炙烈的火焰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_hal: Roshan breathes a lethal arc of searing fire.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_halloween_su: 羅煞大魔王召喚出一群小羅煞來協助牠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_hal: Roshan calls a group of Roshlings to aid him.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_halloween_fi: 羅煞從天空喚下一群緩慢滾向附近敵人的火球。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_roshan_hal: Roshan launches a number of slow moving fireballs at all nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_roshan_sugar_rush_: Roshan is waiting for a victim to attack!
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_roshan_su: Roshan is waiting for a victim to attack!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_du: 與石堂城的戰士進行單獨的對決幾乎是一項不可能完成的任務。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_com: To face a soldier of Stonehall in single combat is a challenge few can resist.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_branches_Descr:
使用：種樹

在目標地點種下一棵快樂小樹，持續 %tree_duration% 秒。

使用距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_branc:
Use: Plant Tree

Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for %tree_duration% seconds.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_ov: 石堂城的弓箭手只等特蕾絲汀的一聲令下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_com: The archers of Stonehall are ready at Tresdin's command.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_pr: 古銅軍團重振號角得以鼓舞任何人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_com: The rallying horn of the Bronze Legion is able to inspire any heart.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_mo: 特蕾絲汀知道在敵人最兇猛一擊力竭之際，就是對方最脆弱的時候。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_com: Tresdin knows that an enemy's most vulnerable moment often follows their fiercest stroke.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_wave_of: 釋放一陣狂風使敵方單位受到沉默和擊退。對方距離自身越近就會被吹移越遠，反之距離越遠受吹移的幅度則會越小。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_range: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to you.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_wave_of: 翠拉克希絲更加喜愛短兵相接時的寧靜，因此她利用卓爾人的天賦來終結敵人的魔法。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_range: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_frozen_sigil_N: 英雄攻擊計為 1 次傷害，非英雄單位攻擊計為 0.25 次傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_froze: Heroes deal 1 damage to the sigil, while non-hero units deal 0.25 damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_icarus_dive: 鳳凰以固定的軌跡和距離朝瞄準的方向進行衝擊，對所有和他接觸的敵方單位造成持續傷害和移動速度降低，最後回到出發地點。若途中鳳凰釋放超新星，衝擊會立刻終止。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_ic: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units it comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to its original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_icarus_dive: 雖然對於在宇宙的虛空中穿行並不陌生，但在大氣中翱翔還是有著別樣的快樂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_ic: Though no stranger to travelling the cosmic void, soaring within an atmosphere offers unique pleasures.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_fire_spirit: 召喚 4 隻烈火精靈環繞在自身周遭。每隻精靈可以單獨朝目標區域放出。受烈火精靈影響的目標將受到每秒持續傷害，攻擊速度大幅降低。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_fi: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around Phoenix. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_fire_spirit: 鳳凰坍縮的內核經常釋放出具有意識的短暫爆炸之光。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_fi: The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_sun_ray_Des: 鳳凰以自己的生命作為代價噴發出一道猛烈的光束。光束會對敵方造成一個基礎值加上他們生命值一定百分比的傷害，對友方則是以相同的計算方式產生治療效果。百分比會隨著光束持續噴發而逐漸攀升。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_su: Phoenix expels a beam of light at the cost of its own health. The beam damages enemies and heals allies for a base amount plus a percentage of their health. The percentage increases as the beam continues to fire.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_sun_ray_Lor: 這顆星體釋放的能流只是原子級別的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_su: The vent through which such stellar energy flows is mere atoms wide.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_sun_ray_tog: 烈日炙烤期間向前緩慢移動。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_su: Toggles slow forward movement during Sun Ray firing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_supernova_L: 超級新星的烈日熔鍊是致命的，但烈焰中的指引之光將永世流傳。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_su: The solar crucible of a Supernova may be fatal, yet from its flames arise new beacons to wander infinity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_reflect: 恐怖利刃喚出目標範圍內所有敵方英雄的無敵倒影。受影響的敵方英雄將被減速且受他們的倒影追殺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblad: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all enemy heroes in a target area. Affected enemy heroes are slowed and attacked by their reflection.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_reflect: 在邪穢之淵的碎裂牢獄中，恐怖利刃了解了古老傳說的真相：你才是你最終的敵人。現在是時候教給其他人了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblad: In the fractal prison of Foulfell, Terrorblade learned the truth of this old tale: you are your own worst enemy.  Now it is a lesson he teaches others.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_reflect: 倒影幻象無法被指定且具有無敵狀態，並會隨著倒影對象身上的移速減幅被驅散而消失。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblad: Reflections are untargetable, invulnerable illusions, that will be destroyed if the slow debuff is removed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_reflect: 創造出的倒影只會去攻擊初始目標。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblad: Reflections can only attack their source.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_conjure: 創造一個恐怖利刃的幻象去造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblad: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_conjure: 世上只有一件事比面對恐怖利刃還要恐怖... 那就是更多恐怖利刃！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblad: There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade.  Facing MORE Terrorblades!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_metamor: 恐怖利刃化身成一位具備遠距離攻擊能力的恐怖惡魔。而在恐怖利刃周遭 %metamorph_aura_tooltip% 範圍內由他掌控的所有幻象也將一併化作魔化金身。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblad: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack. Any of Terrorblade's illusions that are within %metamorph_aura_tooltip% range will also be transformed by Metamorphosis.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_metamor: 狂怒吧！狂怒吧！怒氣中燒並佔據了身體。見識恐怖利刃最強大的自身吧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblad: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_sunder_: 剝離恐怖利刃和目標英雄的生命，然後互換雙方目前的血量百分比。而無論該百分比相當於多少血量，互換後的生命值將不得低於一定百分比。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblad: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_sunder_: 你並不需要生命，對嗎？惡魔掠奪者將你最珍貴的東西竊走了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblad: You didn't need that life, did you?  The demon marauder steals that which you hold most dear.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bristleback_quill_: 每次堆疊都會增加針刺掃射的傷害
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bristleba: Each stack increases damage taken from Quill Spray
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_phoenix_icarus_div: 每秒受到 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% 點傷害，移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_phoenix_i: Taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage per second and movement slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_phoenix_fire_spiri: 烈火精靈已準備好隨時發射
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_phoenix_supernova_: 在獲得新生前持續燃燒敵人。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_phoenix_sun_Descri: 在獲得新生之前持續燃燒敵人。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_terrorblade_reflec: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，並正受到恐怖利刃的倒影襲擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_terrorbla: Movement speed reduced by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, and being attacked by Terrorblade's reflection.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_terrorblade_metamo: 具有遠距離攻擊能力的兇猛惡魔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_terrorbla: Powerful demon form with a ranged attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_fros: 對非英雄單位持續時間：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spir: Xin's harshest lessons often employed the use of red-hot chains.
The studied warrior must whip and weave through its enemies, burning each without pause.
An enemy should never be allowed to approach without difficulty.
By the spirit's power are Xin's teachings spread anew.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knight_chaos_: 暈眩時間與傷害值負相關。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knig: The stun duration and damage values dealt are inversely related.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_launc: Launch the snowball toward the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_launch_snowbal: 無法攜帶幻象，但可以攜帶米波的分身及圖斯克控制的其他單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_launc: Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_fates_edict_: 神諭使令目標陷入狂亂，使其於期間無法進行普攻並獲得 %magic_damage_resistance_pct_tooltip%%% 魔法傷害抗性。對友軍和敵人均可使用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_fat: Oracle enraptures a target, disarming them and granting them %magic_damage_resistance_pct_tooltip%%% magic damage resistance. Can be cast on allies and enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_treant_natures_gui: 遠離樹木後自然掩護將失去效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_treant_na: Nature's Guise will be removed when not near a tree.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_pipe_aura_Des: 獲得 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% 每秒生命恢復以及 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS% 魔抗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_pipe: Regenerating %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% HP per second and +%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS% bonus magic resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshaker_fissure: 小兵不會嘗試繞過裂地所產生出的障礙物，而是會等待它們自動消失。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshake: Creeps will wait for Fissure to disappear. They will not attempt to walk around it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_requiem_N: 靈魂輓歌造成的移速減緩效果可穿透技能免疫狀態。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_: The movement reductions from Requiem of Souls go through spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_ghostship_No: 實際碰撞範圍比幽靈船本體稍大。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_gho: Actual area of effect of ship's collision is larger than the boat itself.
The boat has a movement speed of %ghostship_speed%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_anchor_s: 錨擊對遠古生物同樣有效，但對羅煞無效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter: Anchor Smash works on all Ancient creeps except for Roshan.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter_homing_m: 防禦塔所需的摧毀擊中次數：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_drunken_: 多個不同來源的迴避屬性會以漸減的方式疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_primal_s: 烈火元素具有相位移動能力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: The Fire Element has phased movement.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_demoni: 將冷卻時間以 %max_charges% 次的使用次數取代，使用次數將每 %charge_restore_time_tooltip_scepter% 秒補充一次。同時令邪惡淨化對目標造成破勢效果，在作用期間封住其具有的被動技能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_dem: Cooldown is removed, replaced with %max_charges% charges that replenish every %charge_restore_time_tooltip_scepter% seconds. Also causes Demonic Purge to break its target's passive abilities while active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_flesh_golem: 瘟疫靈氣將會穿透技能免疫狀態。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_fl: Plague Aura goes through spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_impale: 穿刺無法受到林肯法球阻擋。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assass: Impale cannot be blocked by Linken's Sphere.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_the_light: 永久保持靈魂形態，並令「輝煌」能夠在白天對友方目標產生帳面傷害數值 100%% 的治療效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_keeper_of_: Permanent Spirit Form. During daytime, allows Illuminate to heal allies for the same amount as its damage values.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_snowball_Note3: 就連米波家族的每一位成員也都能為雪球增加份量！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_snowb: Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage and speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_launch_snowbal: 就連米波家族的每一位成員也都能為雪球增加份量！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_launc: Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage and speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_death_coil_: 來自地獄聖泉的神秘霧氣侵染著亞巴頓的氣息，任憑他自由釋放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_de: A mysterious vapor from the Font of Avernus now infuses the breath of Abaddon, who releases it at will.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_aphotic_shi: 湧動的黑色迷霧將進攻瓦解，正如將光線全部吞噬。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_ap: The powers of the black mist rise to absorb attacks like the black mist absorbs light.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shadow_demon_demon: 使用次數會在出現空缺時進行補充。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_Note1: 即便自身處於技能免疫狀態龍捲風仍可對自己施放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclo: Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_geomag: 無法作用於時間結界、決鬥及黑洞中的單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_aegis_regen_descri: 不朽之守護已被回收。角色正在迅速恢復生命和魔力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_aegis_reg: The Aegis of the Immortal has expired. Quickly restoring health and mana.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_bloodlust: 可以正常朝具有技能免疫狀態的友方施放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ogre_magi_: Can be cast on Spell Immune allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_soul_assumpt: 奪魂所放出的靈魂無法被逃脫。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_land_mines_: 埋下一枚不會被真實視野揭露，但會隨著有敵人踏入 %radius% 觸發範圍時現形、且停留超過 %proximity_threshold% 秒時引爆的隱形地雷。可對影響單位造成 %building_damage_pct%%% 的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_la: Plant an invisible mine that cannot be detected by True Sight, but is visible if an enemy is within the active %radius% AoE of the mine. Mines detonate if an enemy is standing within the active AoE for %proximity_threshold% seconds. The explosion deals full damage in the blast radius, and deals %building_damage_pct%%% damage to buildings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_land_mines_: 近接式地雷不會阻礙中立野怪營地生出一批新的野怪。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_la: Proximity Mines do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_land_mines_: 地雷沒有在場時間限制，僅會在遭到摧毀或引爆後消失。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_la: Mines last until they explode or are destroyed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_stasis_trap: 佈下一個會在引爆時纏繞附近敵人的隱形陷阱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_st: Plant an invisible trap that roots nearby enemy units instantly when triggered.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_stasis_trap: 麻痺陷阱在引爆時將會連帶摧毀附近所有的麻痺陷阱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_st: Stasis Traps destroy all other Stasis Traps in their area of effect when they detonate.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_suicide_Des: 爆破技工隊飛向目標地點飛馳而去，於落地時產生大爆炸，對區域內的敵人造成傷害和沉默效果，並自傷 50% 最大生命值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_su: Techies hurtle themselves into the enemy's midst, detonating charges upon impact which deal massive area of effect damage and silence enemies. Upon landing, the assault deals Techies damage equal to 50% of their max health.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_remote_mine: 礦工灣再過五分鐘就要爆炸啦！
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_focused_det: 引爆目標範圍內的所有遙控地雷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_fo: Detonate all remote mines in the target area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_remote_mine: 引爆區域內的所有搖控炸彈。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_backdoor_protection: 建築物將受到較少的傷害，且也會在附近沒有敵方小兵的情況下迅速恢復受到的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_backdoor_p: Structure takes reduced damage, and quickly regenerates any damage taken while no enemy creeps are nearby.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_backdoor_protection: 建築物將受到較少的傷害，且也會在附近沒有敵方小兵的情況下迅速恢復受到的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_backdoor_p: Structure takes reduced damage, and quickly regenerates any damage taken while no enemy creeps are nearby.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_neth: 持續施法將會被移形換位中斷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulsp: Channeling spells are interrupted by Nether Swap.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer_poison_s: 毒刺造成的傷害不會中斷物品提供的治療效果，也不會令閃躍匕首進入冷卻狀態。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_venomancer: Damage from Poison Sting does not interrupt healing from items, nor does it activate the cooldown on Blink Dagger.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_seer_vacuum_No: 靠近真空中心的樹木將會被摧毀。

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spir: Abilities and items can be used while Sleight of Fist is active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_suicide_Not: 使用此技能自傷死亡算做自殺，故不會計算經驗值或金錢獎勵給敵隊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_su: Dying from this ability counts as suicide, and does not award gold or experience to the enemy team.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_suicide_Not: 即便因為自傷而死亡，爆破技工隊仍可隨著殺敵正常獲得經驗值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_su: Techies still earn experience for suicide kills made with this ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_focused_det: 若能一次引爆全部，何嘗慢慢來？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_fo: Why light one fuse when you can light them all?
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_backdoor_protectio: 建築物將受到較少的傷害，且也會在附近沒有敵方小兵的情況下迅速恢復受到的傷害。

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_backdoor_protectio: 建築物將受到較少的傷害，且也會在附近沒有敵方小兵的情況下迅速恢復受到的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_backdoor_: Structure takes reduced damage, and quickly regenerates any damage taken while no enemy creeps are nearby.
