Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_la: Mines are triggered by invisible units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_stasis_trap: 隱身起來的單位不會觸發麻痺陷阱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_st: Stasis Traps are not triggered by invisible units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshaker_fissure: 裂地不會被林肯法球抵擋。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshake: Fissure is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_frost_a: 對非英雄單位持續時間：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_dopp: 靠近重現位置的樹木將會遭到摧毀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_la: Trees near a reappearing unit will be destroyed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_dopp: 幻影長矛手和他的隊友將可辨識出會承受完整傷害的幻影。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_la: Phantom Lancer and his allies can see which illusion is the 100% damage illusion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_phan: 隨著朝目標進行攻擊幻影長矛手將會迅速奔馳去拉近距離，並於近身後獲得為時短暫的敏捷屬性加成。幻影長矛手的幻影們也能運用此技能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_la: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost upon reaching the target. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_phan: 阿茲瑞斯悉知速度在戰場上能成為奠定成敗的關鍵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_la: Azwraith knows that on the field of battle, speed can mean everything.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_phan: 若中途停止了攻擊，獲得的額外移動速度也將隨之消退。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_la: If the attack order is cancelled, the movement speed bonus is lost.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_juxt: 並列分裂出的幻影在出現後會自動朝觸發了該次分裂的攻擊動作所瞄準的目標發動攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_la: Illusions created by Juxtapose will attack the target that the ability was triggered upon.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_puck_dream_coil_coi: 神杖升級夢境破碎暈眩時間：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_spin_we: 摧毀選擇的這張蜘蛛網。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hunter_jinad: 剛鐸的豐富經驗保證他在每次交涉中都能獲利。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hun: Gondar's vast experience ensures he never walks away from a transaction empty-handed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hunter_wind_: 親身經歷暴君戈夫刺殺現場的宮廷小丑們腦海中的回憶景象盡是宛如在跳舞一樣的影子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hun: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hunter_track: 運用著他那高度敏銳的視覺和嗅覺，剛鐸的攻擊有著相當好的成功機率。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hun: Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_hand_of_god_an: 神杖允許的遠古野怪控制數：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_spirit_b: 靈熊使用彌達斯之手所獲得的經驗值將會給予孤行德魯伊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Using Hand of Midas from Spirit Bear grants the earned XP to Lone Druid.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_demoni: 神杖使用次數補充時間：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_overgrowth_N: 在樹精衛士施放瘋狂生長時，晴森之眼的纏繞會造成傷害，樹精衛士直接纏繞則不會造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_ove: Being entangled by Overgrowth through enchanted trees from Eyes of the Forest does damage. Being entangled by Overgrowth directly from Treant Protector does not.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_eyes_in_the_: 樹精衛士對樹木施法，獲得其周遭視野。施放瘋狂生長後，晴森之眼也將對周遭一定範圍內的單位造成纏繞效果和傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_eye: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_eyes_in_the_: 晴森之眼瘋狂生長範圍：
敵人若具有真實視野，將能察覺出哪些樹木成爲了睛森之眼。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_eye: If the enemy has True Sight, they will be able to see which trees are enchanted.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_eyes_in_the_: 任誰都沒有把握是誰、又或者是什麼東西需要受到保護。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_eye: One can never be too certain who, or what, might need protecting.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_chakram_2_: 發射另一片鋸刃，沿途旋轉至目標區域對接觸到的敵人造成傷害和移速減緩，接著懸空在目標地點向繼續牴觸鋸刃的敵人造成傷害，同時隨著敵人每損失 5% 的血量而加深對方受到的移速減緩程度。鋸刃的發射與回收均會破壞路徑上所有的樹木。鋸齒飛輪的發射和懸空轉動均會消耗伐木機的魔力，並剝奪伐木機的普通攻擊能力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_c: Fires a secondary saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Additionally, for each 5% of health missing, enemies caught in the saw blade move more slowly. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_chakram_2_: 割    割    割   割  割 割 割 割割割割割！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_c: Cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_return_cha: 將飛鋸收回到伐木機身上。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_snowball_Note4: 隊友可以藉由主動朝雪球點擊來進到雪球內。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_snowb: Allies can click on a snowball to add themselves to it.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_earth_s: 提升緩速持續時間，並使被闢地之舉牽引的單位一併被繳械。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_tita: Increases slow duration, and units pulled in by Earth Splitter are also disarmed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_earth_s: 神杖減速/繳械持續時間：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_boulde: 巨礫碎擊若沒有成功擊退目標或一尊殘岩的話就不會重置冷卻時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: Boulder Smash's cooldown is not reset if it fails to knock back a unit or Remnant.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_petrif: 大地之靈對一名英雄施法，使其獲得殘岩具有的所有特性。殘岩會在經過短暫時間後爆炸，將英雄從中解放並傷害附近敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_petrif: 高嶺運用大地之力將鮮活生命體暫時石化，擴編他的兵馬俑大軍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: Kaolin uses the elemental power of the Earth to temporarily petrify living beings, so that they might be conscripted into his stone funerary army.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_land_mines_: 飛行單位不會觸發地雷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_la: Mines will not be triggered by some flying units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_cyclone_2: Eul 的神聖法杖（2 級）
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bloodseeker_thirst: 血魔感應到你的傷勢不輕，因此能循著血的味道掌握到你的確切位置。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bloodseek: Bloodseeker senses your injuries, and knows exactly where you are.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_riki_blinkstrike_c: 力丸只要有著閃躍突襲可使用就可隨時發動閃躍突襲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_riki_blin: You may cast Blink Strike whenever there is a charge available.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sniper_headshot_sl: 遭到狙擊手擊頭而停止動作！
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_broodmother_spin_w: 育母蜘蛛只要有著蜘蛛絲可使用就可以隨時編織出蜘蛛網。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_broodmoth: You may cast Spin Web whenever there is a charge available.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_crimson_guard: 獲得 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS_UNIQUE_ACTIVE% 點護甲和 100% 的機會抵擋 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_CONSTANT_BLOCK% 點傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_crim: Gained %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS_UNIQUE_ACTIVE% armor, and a 100% chance to block %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_CONSTANT_BLOCK% damage from incoming attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_2_Desc:
主動：龍捲風

把目標單位吹起至空中 %cyclone_duration% 秒，並使其於期間呈無敵狀態。可對自身施放。若目標為敵方單位，則對方將於落地時承受 50 魔法傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclo:
Active: Cyclone

A target unit is swept up in a cyclone and made invulnerable for %cyclone_duration% seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_2_Lore: 一支從久遠年代流傳下來的神秘權杖，能招來破壞性的龍捲風行善或作惡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclo: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_2_Note: 你不能對著隊友使用龍捲風。
即便自身處於技能免疫狀態龍捲風仍可對自己施放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclo: Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_crimson_guard_:
主動：緋紅護體

為附近友方英雄和建築施加一道持續 %duration% 秒的護體，使其有 %block_chance_active%%% 機率抵擋敵方普攻 %block_damage_melee_active% 傷害。受效者的攻擊類型不影響護體的傷害抵擋效力。

緋紅護體有為期 %tooltip_reapply_time% 秒的重複受效冷卻時間。

施加範圍：%bonus_aoe_radius%\n

被動：傷害抵擋

有 %block_chance%%% 機率抵擋承受的普攻傷害，效力將取決於受效者的攻擊類型，近戰為 %block_damage_melee%、遠程為 %block_damage_ranged%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_crims:
Active: Guard

For %duration% seconds, grant nearby allied heroes and buildings a %block_chance_active%%% chance to block %block_damage_melee_active% damage from each incoming attack.

Units may only be affected by Guard once every %tooltip_reapply_time% seconds.

Radius: %bonus_aoe_radius%\n

Passive: Damage Block

Grants a %block_chance%%% chance to block %block_damage_melee% damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and %block_damage_ranged% damage on ranged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_crimson_guard_: 一個原本是為了要討伐在立春祭期間出來亂世的年獸所打造出的鮮紅鎧甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_crims: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_crimson_guard_: 多個傷害抵擋效果即使有著不同來源仍不疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_crims: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_rollin: 殘岩受巨礫翻滾壓過時將會被摧毀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: Rolling over a Stone Remnant will destroy the Remnant.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_rollin: 巨礫翻滾有著 150 的碾壓範圍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: The boulder has a radius of 150.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_crimson_guard: 緋紅護體不會對最近已經接受過同樣效果的單位產生影響。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_crim: Guard will not affect a unit that has recently been protected by Guard.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_chain_frost_No: 寒霜法球不會彈向殭屍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_chain: Chain Frost doesn't bounce to Zombies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_broodmother_spin_w: 在蜘蛛網內遭受攻擊，移動速度下降 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_broodmoth: Slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% for taking damage while in a web
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_druid_spirit_: 若靈熊距離孤行德魯伊太遠，牠將會喪失攻擊能力。孤行德魯伊裝備阿哈利姆神杖後無此限制。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_drui: If the Spirit Bear moves too far away from Lone Druid, it will not be able to attack unless Lone Druid carries Aghanim's Scepter.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tusk_snowball_move: 正於雪球內進行愛斯基摩人體驗旅
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_elder_titan_earth_: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，同時被繳械而無法攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_earthspir: Temporarily transformed into a Stone Remnant.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_fountain_aura_Desc: 為友方迅速地補充血量及魔力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_fountain_: Quickly restores Health and Mana of nearby allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclone_Note2: 龍捲風能夠淨化掉一些增幅和減幅效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cyclo: Cyclone can purge some buffs and debuffs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_bloodra: 傷害加深效果會在當傷害承受者和給予者相隔 2200 距離之外時減半。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeke: Only amplifies for half values when the damage dealer and the receiver are over 2200 range apart.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_maledi: 詛咒一個小範圍內的所有敵人，令對方於期間每秒受到傷害，並依據從詛咒開始後損失了多少血量每 4 秒承受追加傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doct: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_maledi: 若被詛咒的英雄的生命值從詛咒開始後不減反增，則追加傷害將為零。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doct: If an affected hero's health has increased above the amount they had when Maledict was cast, the burst damage will be 0.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_shadow_wave_: 放出一道會於友方單位之間穿梭的治療弧光，並傷害弧光附近的敵方單位。暗影波的弧光始於戴佐戴，因此暗影波永遠都會治療戴佐並傷害戴佐身旁的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_sha: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_destroyer_:
釋放出一道神智波盪，令受影響的敵方英雄依據自己和歿境毀滅者之間的魔力差異多寡去承受傷害。神智侵蝕的波盪可以攻擊到位於星體禁錮內的單位。\n

神智侵蝕能量

神智侵蝕被動地提升歿境毀滅者的魔力。每次以「奧術天球」擊中敵方英雄時獲得 1 點，和以「星體禁錮」關到敵方英雄時獲得 3 點；能量可疊加，疊加時刷新既有的能量持續時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_d:
Unleashes a psychic blast that deals to enemies based on the difference between your mana and the target's mana. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment.\n

Charge Counter

Eclipse increases Outworld Devourer's max mana with each charge of it's buff. 1 charge is gained per arcane orb hit, and 3 per astral imprisonment, against heroes. Each charge replenishes the existing duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warlord_berse: 幻影斧的冷卻時間將依據巨魔戰將在使用其主動功能時是處於近戰型態還是遠程型態來決定。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_troll_warl: Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Troll Warlord was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_fortunes_end: 星體法球充沛的力量讓四周充斥著靜電爆裂聲，而純能量射向八方，暫時使得敵方魂魄出竅。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_for: The astral orb crackles with power while raw energy lances out, temporarily disrupting an enemy's connection to their own body.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_false_promis: 暫時改變目標友方單位的命運，首先在施放點當下移除對方身上絕大多數的負面狀態和控制效果，接著令其於期間承受的傷害、治療、生命再生效果都將延遲至效力結束後才生效。被謬之誓言延遲的治療效果將會翻倍生效。\n\n驅散類型：強力
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_fal: Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is doubled. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_false_promis: 敵人和假先知往往會謬定他人的命運。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_fal: Foes and false prophets oft make lies of men's fates.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_oracle_fortunes_en: 持有的增幅遭到淨化，而移動能力遭到遏止。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_oracle_purifying_f: 處於滌罪之焰的治療效果中。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_sphere_target: 林肯法球的技能抵擋效果
將抵擋下一個指定性法術。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_sphe: The next targeted spell will be blocked.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_illusion_description: 召喚出 2 個有著本尊英雄 35% 攻擊力的幻象。近戰幻象承受的傷害為本尊的 200%，遠程幻象承受的傷害則為本尊的 300%。幻象持續 75 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_rune_illusion_desc: Conjures 2 illusions of your hero which deal 35% damage.  Melee illusions take 200% damage.  Ranged illusions take 300% damage.  Illusions last 75 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_urn_of_shadows: 空的靈龕將一次獲得 2 次充能。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_tombstone_h: %嗜殺觸發百分比血量臨界值：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_purifying_fl: 出自淨魂之焰的治療效果可以自行疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_pur: The healing from Purifying Flames can be stacked with itself.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_false_promis: 延遲的任何傷害都將正常受到魔法抗性等減免因素計算。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_fal: Delayed damage and healing will take armor and magic resistance reductions into account when received.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_false_promis: 延遲的任何傷害和治療效果將隨即在謬之誓言效力結束後立刻生效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_fal: The delayed damage and healing takes effect as soon as the target becomes vulnerable.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_oracle_false_promi: 承受的任何傷害、治療、生命再生效果都將延遲至謬之誓言效力結束時一次結算和生效。經延遲的治療和生命再生效果將會加倍計算。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_oracle_fa: Any healing or damage taken is delayed until False Promise ends. Delayed healing will be doubled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hood_of_defian:
主動：抗魔護盾

為自己施加一道能夠抵擋 %barrier_block% 魔法傷害的護盾。護盾持續 %barrier_duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hood_:
Active: Barrier

Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to %barrier_block% magical damage. Lasts %barrier_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tango_single_D:
使用：吞食

吃掉一棵樹木來獲得 %health_regen% 每秒生命恢復，持續 %buff_duration% 秒。若吞食對象是鐵樹枝幹種出的快樂小樹，則療效翻倍。

吞食樹木距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tango:
Use: Devour

Consumes a target tree to gain %health_regen% health regeneration for %buff_duration% seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Tree Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_infest: 遭寄宿而受控制的非英雄單位的移動速度將與噬魂鬼一致。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: Creeps that are controlled while Infested share Lifestealer's movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_contro: 噬魂鬼對宿主的神經系統進行操縱，使自己從內部控制對方的移動和攻擊能力。受操縱單位的移動速度將與噬魂鬼一致。無法操縱英雄。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: Lifestealer seizes control of the host body's nervous system, allowing him to issue movement and attack orders from within.  Controlled units share Lifestealer's movement speed.  Cannot be used on heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_arcti: 乘著極風飛上空中一段時間，成為可穿越地形的飛行單位。同時讓自己在期間受到多種強化，夜間視野提升 %night_vision_bonus%，普攻距離和攻速均會提升，普攻將會造成相當於目標當前生命 %percent_damage%%% 的持續魔法傷害，普攻將會降低目標的移動速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyv: Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a magical freeze that strips them of %percent_damage%%% of their current health each second. Her sight is also hardened against night's chill, granting her %night_vision_bonus% additional vision range at night while soaring.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_arcti: 寒冬飛龍用來蘊含冰晶碎片的地方就與其它飛龍蘊含體內龍息之處沒兩樣，但奧洛絲內含其中的將是令人煎熬無比的寒冷。從她散發凝空氣息的口中所噴發出的將是灼人意志的嚴酷結晶。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyv: The same organ where some dragons stoke their inner flame is, in Auroth, a crucible of unimaginable cold. From deep within her frosty gullet, an exhalation sends enemies into burning agony.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_splin: 朝目標發射脆冰球。脆冰球將在擊中目標時碎裂，使對方不受其半點影響，但脆冰球將隨著碎裂產生碎冰射向擊中點周圍 %split_radius% 範圍內的其他敵人，對他們造成傷害和 %movespeed_slow_tooltip%%% 移動速度減緩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyv: Launches a ball of brittle ice toward an enemy. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a %split_radius% radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by %movespeed_slow_tooltip%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_splin: 這些冰晶碎片在寒冬飛龍皮下的囊腔中產生，可隨著發射出去將敵人變成串凍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyv: Produced slowly by specialized vesicles in her frozen gullet, Winter Wyvern blast shards of ice at her enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_cold_: 將一名我方英雄置入冰繭一段時間。冰繭將使人無法動彈，但會於期間令繭內的人處於物理傷害免疫狀態，同時每秒治療他們最大生命值的一定比例。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyv: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_cold_: 寒冬飛龍有著一個冷淡卻能療癒的心地。它的冰冷會導致血液循環變慢，使此魔法的治療效果更好發揮。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyv: From winter's heart comes a cold, healing embrace. The ice slows the blood and allows the spell to better work its curative magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_winte: 寒冬飛龍將一名敵人凍在原地，並詛咒對方周圍敵人，使他們帶著攻速增幅轉而攻擊被冰凍的隊友。被凍在原地的人還有那些受詛咒而朝友方進行攻擊的人將免疫於所有來自敵對陣營的傷害，例外是寒冬飛龍和她的屬下單位的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyv: Winter Wyvern freezes an enemy in place while striking those nearby with a maddening curse which causes them to attack their frozen ally with increased attack speed. The frozen ally and those cursed to attack their ally are immune to all damage from their enemies with the exception of Winter Wyvern or her controlled units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_winte: 愛看書的冬龍所學習的最古老的咒語一次又一次的讓她的體驗與書上的古老諺語相左：有時我敵人的敵人依然是我的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyv: The oldest of the bookwurm’s spells, this curse lends truth to the old saw: sometimes the enemy of my enemy is my enemy still.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sniper_shrapnel_ch: 破片榴彈沒有冷卻時間，只要有彈藥就能進行施放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sniper_sh: You may cast Shrapnel whenever there is a charge available.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_granite_golem_hp_au: 提升周遭單位的生命值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_granite_go: Increases the health capacity of nearby units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_alchemist_goblins_: 使您在擊殺單位時將獲得更多金錢獎勵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_alchemist: Grants bonus gold when you kill units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink_Note1: 閃躍匕首的實際閃躍距離會因為您的瞄準位置超出上限施放距離太多而縮減兩成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink: If you used Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_winter_wyvern_arct: 隨著極寒燒灼進入飛行狀態
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_winter_wyvern_cold: 對物理傷害免疫，且正在逐漸恢復生命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_winter_wy: Immune to physical damage, and regenerating health.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_winter_wyvern_wint: 遭凍結在原地且將被周遭隊友攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_winter_wy: Frozen in place, and will be attacked by nearby teammates.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_s: Support
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_de:
<font color="#FFFFFF">第 1 級</font>
治療靈氣：
每隔 2 秒治療位在年獸周遭 1100 半徑範圍內的友方 10 點生命值。

<font color="#FFFFFF">等級 2</font>
真實視野：
給予 1100 半徑距離的真實視野。
煙霧靈氣：
英雄當站在年獸附近不動時將進入詭計之霧的隱形狀態。

<font color="#FFFFFF">等級 3</font>
復活靈氣：
若有英雄在年獸週遭的 1100 半徑範圍以內死亡，則死亡者將可於 3 秒後復活。每復活一人後需冷卻 20 秒才能再次生效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_s:
<font color="#FFFFFF">Level 1</font>
Healing Aura:
Heals 10 HP every 2 seconds in a 1100 area of effect around the Beast.

<font color="#FFFFFF">Level 2</font>
Truesight:
Grants truesight in a 1100 radius.
The Beast will use Mekansm and Arcane Boots every 35 seconds in a 750 radius.
Smoke Aura:
While standing near the Beast, heroes are smoked.

<font color="#FFFFFF">Level 3</font>
Resurrection Aura:
If a hero dies in an 1100 radius of the Beast, it will be resurrected after 3 seconds.  This effect can only happen once every 20 seconds.


Multiple instances of Support Path have independent cooldowns for Arcane Boots, Mek, and Resurrection Aura.
Support
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_au:
<font color="#FFFFFF">第 1 級</font>
治療靈氣：
每隔 2 秒治療位在年獸周遭 1100 半徑範圍內的友方 10 點生命值。

<font color="#FFFFFF">等級 2</font>
真實視野：

年獸會每隔 35 秒使用一次梅肯斯姆和奧術靴，施效範圍為半徑 750。

<font color="#FFFFFF">等級 3</font>

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_combat_des:
<font color="#FFFFFF">等 1 級</font>
重擊：
年獸的攻擊有著 12% 機率造成暈眩，持續 1 秒。

<font color="#FFFFFF">等級 2</font>
尖刺外殼：
當有 2 名以上的敵方英雄與年獸的距離近於 500 以內時，年獸將隨著受到攻擊使出尖刺外殼，把受到的傷害反射給攻擊者，並暈眩對方。
狂戰士怒吼：
當有 2 名以上的敵方英雄與年獸的距離近於 300 以內時，他們將不自主地朝年獸攻擊 2.5 秒。

<font color="#FFFFFF">Level 3</font>
強力變形：
年獸釋放出充滿魔力的煙霧，煙霧將逐漸向外擴散 1000 距離，把接觸到煙霧的敵人通通變成無害的豬 4 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_c:
<font color="#FFFFFF">Level 1</font>
Bash:
The Beast gains a 12% chance to stun attacked enemies for 1 second.

<font color="#FFFFFF">Level 2</font>
Spiked Carapace:
If 2 or more heroes are within 500 range of the Beast, the Beast will stun and reflect damage if attacked.
Berserker's Call:
If there are 2 or more heroes within 300 range of the Beast, they will be forced to attack it for 2.5 seconds.

<font color="#FFFFFF">Level 3</font>
Greater Hex:
The Beast unleashes a magical smoke that expands outward in a 1000 radius, turning enemy units into harmless pigs for 4 seconds.


Multiple instances of Combat Path have independent chances to proc Bash, and independent cooldowns for Berserker's Call, Spiked Carapace, and Greater Hex.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_s: Speed
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_desc:
<font color="#FFFFFF">等 1 級</font>
攻擊速度靈氣：
距離年獸 900 範圍內的友方單位的功擊速度將提升 30。

<font color="#FFFFFF">等級 2</font>
萬馬奔騰：
若有 2 名以上的敵方英雄與年獸的距離近於 500 以內，年獸將使出萬馬奔騰，令所有友方單位獲得疾速和相位效果，持續 3 秒。

<font color="#FFFFFF">等級 3</font>
刷新靈氣：
友方英雄在距離年獸 900 範圍以內時所施放的法術將有 50%% 的機率會在施放後瞬間刷新。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_s:
<font color="#FFFFFF">Level 1</font>
Attack Speed Aura:
Allied units gain 30 attack speed in a 900 radius around the Beast.

<font color="#FFFFFF">Level 2</font>
Stampede:
If there are 2 or more enemy Heroes within 500 range of the Year Beast, it causes a Stampede, and all friendly units gain haste and phase for 3 seconds.

<font color="#FFFFFF">Level 3</font>
Refresher Aura:
When an allied hero casts a spell within 900 range of the Beast, that spell has a 50% chance to be instantly refreshed.


Multiple instances of Speed Path have independent cooldowns for Stampede, and indepedent chances to proc Refresher Aura.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny_beast_aegis_De: 這隻年獸在死亡時將在經過一個些許延遲後復活。年獸之守護僅能使用一次，使用後就會消失。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny_beast: This Year Beast will respawn after a short delay when killed.  Gone after one use.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_cny2015_black_hole_: 持續施法 - 召喚一個強力漩渦吸住敵方單位。被黑洞影響的單位不能移動、攻擊或施法。而且越靠近中心點，受到的傷害越大。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_cny2015_bl: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.  The closer units get to the center, the more damage is dealt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_cny2015_black_hole_: 無視敵人的技能免疫狀態並予以限制。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_cny2015_chronospher: 在時空中創造一個結界，將所有身在其中的單位定住，只有您自己能迅速移動。只有年獸和虛空假面不會受到影響。結界會顯現位在其中的隱形單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_cny2015_ch: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only a Year Beast and Faceless Void are unaffected.  Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_cny2015_chronospher: 無論敵我暫停所有受結界影響的建築物
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_cny2015_ch: Pauses all units and buildings, friendly or enemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_cny2015_chronospher: 虛空假面能不受任何人製造出的時間結界所影響。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_cny2015_ch: Faceless Void is never affected by Chronospheres from any owner.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_cny2015_sonic_wave_: 年獸在牠面前製造出巨大的音波，對所有波及到的敵方單位造成重大傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_cny2015_so: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Year Beast, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_cny2015_sonic_wave_: 音爆衝擊波的有效距離可達 1350 距離遠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_cny2015_so: Sonic Wave can hit units up to 1350 units away.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cny2015_beast_: 主動：傳送 - 將年獸傳送到一個友方建築物或非英雄單位身邊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cny20: Active: Teleport - Teleports the Year Beast to an allied non-hero unit or structure.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_arcti: 嚴寒燒灼所造成的負面狀態（減速、每秒損失生命）無法於同次效力間疊加。在同次效力間重複攻擊同一目標僅會刷新此效果在對方身上的持續時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyv: Enemy units can only receive the Arctic Burn debuff once per cast.
This ability does not affect Roshan.
The primary projectile cannot be disjointed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_cold_: 冰繭的狀態無法消除、驅散或淨化。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_winte: 藉由受詛咒的敵人所造成的擊殺將視為由寒冬冰龍所殺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyv: If the target dies to its allies, Winter Wyvern will receive credit for the kill.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_fates_edict_: 一則預言一再靈驗：選中之友不畏魔；中選之人畏非魔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_fat: An unbreakable prophecy resounds: a chosen ally shall briefly suffer no magics.  Other kinds of suffering however...
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_purifying_fl: 就像充滿房間的鏡子可放大一枝蠟燭的光芒一樣，破碎四散的宇宙之壁將使預言之光聚為耀眼火炬。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_pur: Like a hall of mirrors might amplify the light of a single candle, the shattered walls of the universe can transform the light of prophecy into a burning torch.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Note1: 給予的力量將於 0.6 秒間的逐漸生效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armle: The strength change occurs over 0.6 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Note2: 開啟或關閉不潔之力不會打斷持續施法。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armle: Activating or deactivating Unholy Strength does not interrupt channeling.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury_Note2: 若同時有多個波及效果，則每個波及效果都將分別生效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury: If multiple sources of Cleave are present, each Cleave's damage is applied separately.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade_mail_Not: 將會反射出與承受的傷害類型一致的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade: Returned damage type is the same as it was received.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hand_of_midas_: 藉由煉金所獲得的經驗不會被附近的其他隊友分走。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_hand_: Experience gained by using Transmute is not shared.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_of_the_do: 可對敵方的線兵和召喚單位使用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_: Can also Dominate enemy lane creeps and summoned units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_rapier_Note0: 若聖劍是由原擁有者的敵人所撿起的，則該把聖劍將變得只能藉由死亡脫手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_rapie: If Divine Rapier is dropped and picked up by an enemy of its original owner, it cannot be dropped again except by death.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tpscroll_Note0: 若有多名英雄選擇了同樣的目的地進行傳送，則傳送所需時間將隨著每多一位後繼傳送者而增加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tpscr: If multiple heroes teleport to the same location in succession, the channeling time will be increased for each successive hero.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ancient_janggo: 重新購買韌鼓的設計圖將可補充它的使用次數。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ancie: Re-purchasing the Drum of Endurance recipe will refresh its charges.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_assimi: 噬魂鬼將一位友軍吞下肚，讓對方躲藏在噬魂鬼的肚子內。期間噬魂鬼所接受的任何治療都會和肚子內的隊友分享。當對方從噬魂鬼的體內出來時，噬魂鬼將隨著迸發對周遭敵人造成傷害。\n\n驅散類型：強力
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: Lifestealer swallows an allied hero, allowing them to hide within him. Any healing Lifestealer receives is shared with the hero within. When an assimilated hero leaves Lifestealer, they erupt outward, damaging nearby enemies.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_assimi: 噬魂鬼怎麼捨得拒絕能嚐嚐隊友是啥味道的機會？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: How can Lifestealer resist the chance to sample an ally?
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_assimi: 將吸收進體內的英雄迸發出去，殺傷周圍敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: Ejects an Assimilated hero, damaging nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_reinc: 死期推延結束後，擊殺功勞將會算給當初給予致命一擊的人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_k: Credit for allies whose death was delayed will go to whoever struck the original killing blow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_reinc: 冥魂延命對冥魂大帝自己來說僅會於當他無法進行重生時才會生效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_k: Wraith Delay affects Wraith King's actual deaths, not Reincarnate deaths.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_reinc: 神杖升級死期推延時間：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_hybrid_De: 變體精靈化身成虛實混體，一個與目標友方英雄近乎相同的複製品。虛實混體可施放除終極技能外真身具備的任何技能。敵人能辨識出哪個單位是虛實混體。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_: Morphling creates a hybrid replication of a target allied hero, which can cast all of that hero's current, non-ultimate abilities. Enemies are able to see which unit is a hybrid.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_warlock_rain_of_cha: 地獄火巨人生命恢復速率：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_laser_durati: 小兵/野怪失明持續時間：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_time_lapse_c: 神杖升級施放隊友距離：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_time_lapse_a: 降低冷卻時間，並讓編織者能朝友方使用時光倒流。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_tim: Reduces cooldown, and allows Weaver to cast Time Lapse on an ally.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_chemical_: 煉金術士可以熔解阿哈利姆神杖，對一名隊友（包含自己在內）施加它的所有神力，並藉此使自己獲得普攻傷害和技能增強。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_: Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades. When you have a Scepter of your own, you will gain bonus damage and spell amplification for each gifted Scepter.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_invoke_Note: 若元素召喚的發動僅對調了招式在技能欄中的位置的話則將不會進入冷卻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_in: Invoke will not cost mana or go on cooldown if the only effect is to swap the positions of existing spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_true_for: 令靈熊不再受限於只能在孤行德魯伊身邊時才能進行攻擊，且可生還於孤行德魯伊的死亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_burrow: 夜神刺客在短暫延遲後遁入地穴，於期間無法移動或進行普通攻擊，但獲得隱形狀態、額外的生命恢復及魔力恢復，並減免部分的承受傷害。其它技能將於期間受到強化：穿刺和魔力燃燒的施法距離提升、穿刺的冷卻時間降低，尖刺外殼變得可於發動時瞬間暈眩周遭單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assass: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mana Burn and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. His health and mana regeneration are also increased, and he gains damage reduction from all damage sources.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_burrow: 遁穴潛伏狀態會隨著發動復仇而取消。
遁地提升魔力燃燒施法距離：
遁地提升穿刺施法距離：
遁地降低穿刺冷卻時間：
遁地尖刺外殼作用範圍：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_stampede_ag: 處於萬馬奔騰狀態的英雄將承受較少的傷害，且移動將變得可跨越地形阻礙，例如峭壁和樹木。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_st: Heroes affected by Stampede take reduced damage, and are able to run through obstructions, including trees and up cliffs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_walrus_kick_De: 將目標單位踢飛，造成傷害並降低其移動速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_walru: Kicks the target unit back, damaging them and slowing their movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_borrowed_ti: 亞巴頓可在承受沉默效果之外的控制效果時正常主動開啟迴光返照。若受到沉默，則迴光返照將只能被動開啟。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_bo: Borrowed Time can be manually activated while Abaddon is disabled, but not while silenced.  The passive activation can still occur while silenced.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_du: 提升「決鬥」的持續時間，令軍團指揮官於決鬥期間處於技能免疫狀態，並使決鬥者們免疫旁人的任何傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_com: Increases Duel duration, makes Legion Commander Spell Immune in Duel, and makes Legion Commander and her opponent only take damage from each other.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_du: 決鬥狀態會隨著軍團指揮官會和對手的彼此相距超過 2000 時中斷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_com: Duels will end if the units are pushed 2000 units apart.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_fire_spirit: 烈火精靈會揭露擊中區域的視野達 1 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_fi: Fire Spirits reveal the area they strike for 1 second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_skeleton_king_rein: 化為冥魂以暫時推延死期，但最終還是得死。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_skeleton_: Became a wraith to delay death, but will die shortly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_life_stealer_assim: 別緊張，你很快就會被排出體外
躲藏在噬魂鬼的體內。噬魂鬼所接受的任何治療都將等量分享給你。\n\n嘗試進行移動、施法、或用游標點擊此圖示都將使你迸發出噬魂鬼的身體，並隨著迸發對周遭敵人造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_life_stea: Hiding within Lifestealer. Any healing Lifestealer receives is shared.\n\nMoving, casting an ability, or clicking on this icon will cause you to erupt from Lifestealer and damage nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_ultimate_scep: 永久獲得阿哈利姆神杖的英雄升級。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_ulti: Permanently granted Aghanim's Scepter hero upgrade.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_nyx_assassin_burro: 無法移動、無法進行普通攻擊、呈現隱形狀態、獲得額外生命及魔力恢復，並減免承受傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_nyx_assas: Stationary, invisible, and unable to attack. Gaining bonus health and mana regeneration and taking reduced damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_keeper_of_the_ligh: 接著施放的技能將享有冷卻時間減免。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_keeper_of: The next spell cast will have its cooldown reduced.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_boots_of_travel_re: 正在傳送至一名友方身邊。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_lotus_orb_act: 使大部分的鎖定性技能會重新反彈給施術者。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_lotu: Most targeted spells will be re-cast at the caster.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_silver_edge_w: 呈現隱形狀態。移速提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，並能忽略單位碰撞。藉由普通攻擊去破除隱形狀態時將附帶 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE_POST_CRIT% 額外傷害和暗影步減幅，封住受效者的被動技能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_silv: Invisible. Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and you can move through units. Attacking to break invisibility will deal %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE_POST_CRIT% bonus damage, slow the target and disable their passives.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mud_golem_hurl_boul: 向一個單位投擲泥石，造成傷害和暈眩。一般來說除非必要，否則泥土巨人不會選擇扔掉自己的骨肉。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mud_golem_: Hurls a boulder at the target, damaging and stunning them. Golems do not do this unless commanded to.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mud_golem_hurl_boul: 「他們幹嘛猶豫？什麼東西他們不敢丟？」
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mud_golem_: \"Why do they hesitate? What are they afraid of throwing?\"
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mud_golem_rock_dest: 死亡時，泥土巨人將會分裂成兩隻較小的泥人。泥土小人的血量爲 %shard_health_tooltip% ，攻擊力爲 %shard_damage_tooltip%。泥土小人會在持續 %shard_duration_tooltip% 秒後自動死亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mud_golem_: On death, Mud Golems shatter into 2 Shard Golems. Shard Golems have %shard_health_tooltip% health, deal %shard_damage_tooltip% damage per attack, and live for %shard_duration_tooltip% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_abyssal_blade_: 多個傷害抵擋效果即使有著不同來源仍不疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_abyss: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_basher_Note1: 下列英雄無法觸發此物品的碎顱重擊：裂魂人、虛空假面、斯拉達。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bashe: The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, and Slardar.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gem_Lore:
蒼生不奴於海底深淵
魂魄不囚於溺水要塞
鬚面麥爾朗恩不令諸海翻湧
迄此，寶玉方眠
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_gem_L:
Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_moon_shard_Des:
使用：消耗

消耗月痕之凝來永久獲得 %consumed_bonus% 攻速和 %consumed_bonus_night_vision% 夜間視野加成。只能用 1 次。\n

被動：凝蔭之眼

夜間視野提升 %bonus_night_vision%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_moon_:
Use: Consume

Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain %consumed_bonus% attack speed and %consumed_bonus_night_vision% bonus night vision. Max 1 use.\n

Passive: Shade Sight

Grants %bonus_night_vision% bonus night vision.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_moon_shard_Not: 提升的夜間視野範圍在暗夜魔王的黑暗時間作用期間也有效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_moon_: The bonus night vision works during Night Stalker's Darkness ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_moon_shard_Lor: 這個結晶據說是月之女神賽莉蒙娜的眼淚所凝聚而成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_moon_: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_silver_edge_De:
主動：暗影步

進入為期 %windwalk_duration% 秒的銀鋒影刀隱形狀態，於期間提升 %windwalk_movement_speed%%% 移速並能忽略單位碰撞。施放技能或使用道具會使此狀態提前結束。

趁此狀態做出的普攻將為暗影步攻擊，額外造成 %windwalk_bonus_damage% 物理傷害、和持續 %backstab_duration% 秒的暗影步減幅去封鎖受效者的被動技能。\n

被動：回響打擊

近戰普攻能夠迅速地連擊兩次。兩次攻擊均會造成為幅 %movement_slow%%% 的移速減緩效果 %slow_duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_silve:
Active: Shadow Walk

Makes you invisible for %windwalk_duration% seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While invisible, you move %windwalk_movement_speed%%% faster and can move through units.

Attacking to end the invisibility will deal %windwalk_bonus_damage% bonus physical damage to the target, and disable their passive abilities for %backstab_duration% seconds.\n

Passive: Echo Strike

Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a %movement_slow%%% movement slow for %slow_duration% seconds on each strike.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_silver_edge_Lo: 曾用於上斬昏君的耀眼銀鋒，接著成了令王國隨著餘後動盪陷入內戰的影刃。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_silve: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_silver_edge_No: 暗影步攻擊無法穿透技能免疫狀態。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_silve: Backstab does not pierce spell immunity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_glimmer_cape_D:
主動：星光之庇

令自己或一位目標友方英雄在經過 %fade_delay% 秒的淡入延遲後隱形 %duration% 秒，並於期間提升 %active_magical_armor%%% 魔法抗性。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%

使用時不會打斷其它法術的持續施法。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_glimm:
Active: Glimmer

After a %fade_delay% second delay, grants invisibility and %active_magical_armor%%% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit for %duration% seconds.

Range: %abilitycastrange%

Can be cast while channelling.
The stolen cape of a master illusionist.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_octarine_core_:
被動：冷卻減免

縮短所有技能和道具的冷卻時間 %bonus_cooldown%%%。\n

被動：技能生命吸取

無論傷害類型，對敵方英雄造成的技能傷害中有 %hero_lifesteal%%% 會轉成自我治療。

技能生命吸取的效力對非英雄單位較少，僅有 %creep_lifesteal%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_octar:
Passive: Cooldown Reduction

Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by %bonus_cooldown%%%.\n

Passive: Spell Lifesteal

%hero_lifesteal%%% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.

Lifesteal reduced to %creep_lifesteal%%% against creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_octarine_core_: 法術這門學問的核心是為幾道光譜，只有天賦異稟之人才能感知。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_octar: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_enchanted_mang:
使用：吃芒果

吃掉這顆神奇的芒果來瞬間恢復 %replenish_amount% 魔力。

使用距離：%abilitycastrange%
兩棲動物的味蕾就是無法抗拒基迪島特有的苦中帶甜滋味。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_encha: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_iron_talon_Des:
主動：劈砍

向非玩家敵方單位使用時造成相當於對方 %creep_damage_pct%%% 目前生命的純粹傷害。

向樹木使用時予以摧毀。

對單位施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
對樹木施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_iron_:
Active: Chop

Targets a non-player enemy unit to remove %creep_damage_pct%%% of its current HP.

If cast on a tree, instantly destroys it.

Unit Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tree Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_iron_talon_Lor: 一件為平息當初的地獄熊怪起義事件所設計的簡單利器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_iron_: A simple but effective weapon devised to quell a great Hellbear uprising.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lotus_orb_Desc:
主動：回音屏障

向目標單位施加一道持續 %active_duration% 秒的屏障，使其在套有屏障期間所承受的大部分鎖定性施放法術會反彈回去給各自的施放者。

屏障產生的是重新施放效果，而非直接的保護作用。

施加距離：%abilitycastrange%
驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lotus:
Active: Echo Shell

Applies a shield to the target unit for %active_duration% seconds which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster.

The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lotus_orb_Lore: 含蘊於此物中央的寶石依舊映出其創造者的蒼白身影。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_lotus: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_guardian_greav:
主動：康復

為附近友方單位恢復 %replenish_health% 生命及 %replenish_mana% 魔力，並移除施效身上絕大多數的減幅效果。

施效範圍：%replenish_radius%
驅散類型：基本\n

被動：守護者靈氣

提升附近友方單位 %aura_health_regen% 每秒生命恢復和 %aura_armor% 護甲。靈氣對於血量低於 %aura_bonus_threshold%%% 的受效者將改為 %aura_health_regen_bonus% 每秒生命恢復和 %aura_armor_bonus% 護甲。

施效範圍：%aura_radius% \n多雙靴子的移速加成效果不會疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_guard:
Active: Mend

Restores %replenish_health% health and %replenish_mana% mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.

Radius: %replenish_radius%
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel\n

Passive: Guardian Aura

Grants %aura_health_regen% health regeneration and %aura_armor% armor to allied units. If an allied hero's health falls below %aura_bonus_threshold%%%, they receive %aura_health_regen_bonus% health regeneration and %aura_armor_bonus% armor.

Radius: %aura_radius% \nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_guardian_greav: 當初為了向全能之神致敬而打造的許多聖器之一。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_guard: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_solar_crest_De:
主動：照耀

暫時釋出耀陽頂飾提供的護甲去影響目標。

對友方單位施放時，給予對方 %bonus_armor% 護甲、%target_attack_speed% 攻速、和 %target_movement_speed%%% 移速。對敵方單位施放時，降低對方 %bonus_armor% 護甲、%target_attack_speed% 攻速、和 %target_movement_speed%%% 移速。

無法對具有技能免疫狀態的敵方目標施放。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_solar:
Active: Shine

When cast on an ally, grants them %bonus_armor% armor, %target_attack_speed% attack speed, and %target_movement_speed%%% movement speed. When cast on an enemy, removes %bonus_armor% armor, %target_attack_speed% attack speed, and %target_movement_speed%%% movement speed.

Removes the armor from the caster when used.

Cannot target spell immune enemies.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_solar_crest_Lo: 當初為紀念太陽照耀大地而打造的頭冠護符。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_solar: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjollnir_Note2: 靜電蓄積不會向位於戰爭迷霧內或處於隱形狀態的目標進行彈跳。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mjoll: Static Charge procs will not bounce to heroes that are invisible or hidden by Fog of War.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_whip_Descripti: 鞭打一個目標，造成目標 2 秒鐘移速提升 35%，之後 3.5 秒移速降低 35%。同時造成 50 物理傷害，目標可為友方或敵方。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_whip_: Whips a target, causing them to move 35% faster for 2 seconds, then slower by 35% for 3.5 seconds. Deals 50 physical damage. Can target allies or enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_travel_boots_2:
升級：傳送卷軸

被動地升級裝備者身上的傳送卷軸，使其使用冷卻降低、用度不會消耗掉卷軸、以及變得夠向友方小兵或英雄單位進行傳送。\n多雙靴子的移速加成效果不會疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_trave:
Upgrade: Town Portal Scroll

Upgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units and heroes, reduces cooldown and does not consume a charge on usage. \nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_urn_of_shadows: 若朝正受靈魂釋放的英雄重複使用靈魂釋放，則對方身上的靈魂釋放效果將受到刷新。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_urn_o: If used on a hero with Soul Release already active on them, it will refresh its duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ward_observer_: 具有半感知能力的植物型態，通常由學徒巫師培養。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ward_: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ward_sentry_Lo: 一種植物型態，原植於一位憂心國王的花園中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ward_: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ward_dispenser:
使用：設置

設置一個此欄位目前啟用的守衛。雙擊快捷鍵來切換此欄位目前啟用的守衛類型。

使用距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ward_:
Use: Plant

Plant the currently active ward. Double-Click to switch the currently active ward.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ward_dispenser: 偵察守衛持續時間（分鐘）：
崗哨守衛真實視野範圍：
崗哨守衛持續時間（分鐘）：
能夠混裝兩種不同守衛已讓守衛的運用更加便捷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ward_: Advancements in stacking efficiency have made wards easier to carry than ever.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_mekansm_nohea: 恢復效果重覆施加冷卻時間
梅肯斯姆的恢復效果以及守護者護脛的康復效果無法施加於最近已藉由恢復或康復來恢復過生命的單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_meka: Mekansm Restore and Guardian Greaves Mend will not affect a unit that has recently been healed by Restore or Mend.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_guardian_greav: 靈氣效果的成長僅對英雄有效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_guard: The aura boost only applies to heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_burrow: 某些種類的狂熱聖甲蟲是因為懂得如何製造洞窟、守株待度和埋伏獵物而知名。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assass: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_unburr: 某些種類的狂熱聖甲蟲是以挖小地洞、潛伏其中以突襲獵物而著名。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assass: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_legion_commander_m: 接著進行的普通攻擊將有最大攻擊速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_legion_co: The next attack will have maximum attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_centaur_stampede_D: 以最大移動速度移動並使遭踐踏的單位移動停滯。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_centaur_s: Moving at max speed and stopping enemy units trampled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_soul_rip_No: 抽魂不會從隱形單位剝削。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_so: Does not rip from invisible units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_holy_persuasio: 受降者的最低血量會設在招降當下的技能等級，後續不會隨著此技能提升等級而變動。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_holy_: The health of creeps already under Chen's control does not update to the new level upon leveling Holy Persuasion further.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_flesh_golem: 瘟疫靈氣造成的傷害加深和移速減緩程度最低值為 1%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_fl: The minimum damage amplification and move slow from Plague Aura is 1%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_dopp: 此技能可用於閃避投射物和驅散減幅。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_la: This ability can be used to dodge projectiles, and dispell debuffs.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_techies_m: Hidden by the Techies' Minefield Sign.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_infest: 必須達等級 2 以後才能對遠古野怪使用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: Infest Level 2 and 3 can be used on Ancient creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_st: 機率性觸發的效果將繼續以原機率去進行觸發。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_as: If an attack effect is chance-based, the chance of its application will be the same as its chance to occur.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_flaming_la: 神杖升級連帶拖行距離：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_dispersion_: 反射傷害的傷害類型會與來源傷害一致，故除非反射的是真實傷害否則實際造成量仍會受敵人的防禦屬性所減免。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_di: Damage is reflected before reductions, and is returned as the same damage type.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_mysti: 具有技能免疫狀態的敵人將隨著不受傷害而不劃分傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: Spell immune enemies do not count toward the damage distribution.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_land_mines_: 會在受敵方英雄摧毀時提供對方 30 金錢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_la: Grants 30 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_stasis_trap: 麻痺陷阱不會阻礙中立野怪營地生出一批新的野怪。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_st: Stasis Traps do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_remote_mine: 會在受敵方英雄摧毀時提供對方 10 金錢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_re: Grants 10 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_winte: 僅能穿透主要目標身上的技能免疫狀態，而非範圍內一樣具有技能免疫狀態的其他敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyv: Will only pierce the spell immunity of the primary target, not the target's surrounding allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_flux_Des: 對目標敵方單位灌輸一股紛擾且亟欲發展的原始能量，使其被施加一道減幅。減幅會於時效期間減緩移動速度和造成持續傷害，並會於有另一敵方單位接近到一定範圍內時無效化。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden: Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, slowing its movement speed and dealing damage over time. The effect is muted if another enemy unit is near the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_magnetic: 創造出一個圓形扭曲磁場，使包覆在其內的友方英雄和友方建築物獲得攻擊速度加成，並對於來自磁場外的普攻有著迴避率加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden: Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_spark_wr: 使目標地點緩慢地具現出一隻熒光妖靈。這隻妖靈在具現出來後會一直駐守該地直到隨著時效截止而消失，或者隨著有敵人踏入駐守範圍時朝其追擊，接著於接觸時造成魔法傷害和緩速效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden: Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and slowing the unit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_furion_wrathofnatu: 此單位死亡時將會生出一隻樹精。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_furion_wr: Will spawn a treant if killed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_terrorblade_metamo: 恐怖利刃掌控的幻象在此靈氣的所及範圍內將會與他的當前形態維持一致。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_terrorbla: Terrorblade's nearby illusions will match his current form.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_arc_warden_flux_De: 這個單位當沒有友方單位在附近時移動速度將下降 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% 並承受持續傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_arc_warde: Taking damage and slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% when not near a friendly unit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_arc_warden_magneti: 位在磁場範圍內而提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% 攻擊速度，並對來自磁場外的普攻有著 100% 迴避率。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_arc_warde: Gaining bonus %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed and granting 100% evasion from attacks outside the field.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_arc_warden_tempest: 這是天穹守望者的完美分身，可近乎全面的繼承本尊的技能和道具。無法繼承真視寶玉及聖劍這類會隨死亡掉落的道具。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_arc_warde: A complete clone of Arc Warden that can use spells and items with the exception of Gem of True Sight and Divine Rapier.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_black_dragon_dragon: 遠古邪龍的邪惡氣場賦予周遭隊友更多護甲。此靈氣可重複疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_black_drag: The Ancient Black Dragon's dreaded presence grants nearby allies additional armor. This bonus can stack with itself.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_big_thunder_lizard_: 遠古雷隱獸的隆隆心跳提升附近隊友的攻擊速度和普攻準確度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_big_thunde: The rhythm of the Thunderhide's heartbeat increases the attack speed and accuracy of nearby allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_big_thunder_lizard: 攻擊速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%，普攻傷害提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_big_thund: Attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%, and attack damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury_Note3: 主動功能「劈砍」可用於摧毀爆破技工隊的遙控地雷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bfury: Chop can be used to destroy Techies' Remote Mines.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_quelling_blade: 主動功能「劈砍」可用於摧毀爆破技工隊的遙控地雷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_quell: Chop can be used to destroy Techies' Remote Mines.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_undying_tombstone_: 不朽屍王的殭屍會減緩攻擊對象的速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_undying_t: Undying Zombie attacks slow their target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doctor_death_: 死亡守衛有著每 0.22 秒一次的攻擊速率。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_witch_doct: Death Ward attacks once every 0.22 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_requiem_a: 提升「支配死靈」的靈魂數上限，並令「靈魂輓歌」的衝擊波會在盡頭處產生向自己當下位置返回的第二道衝擊波。第二道衝擊波的傷害較少，但會為自己提供與造成的傷害等量的生命治療。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_: Increases Necromastery Max Souls and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_vampi: 可進行開關來決定是否只影響英雄。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_k: Can be toggled to make heroes only.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_ranger_marksma: 使卓爾遊俠的普攻於擊中目標後一分為二，以較少的傷害接續攻擊主要目標附近的其他單位。分裂箭矢視為一般的普通攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_drow_range: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting nearby units with normal attacks that deal reduced damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_ghostship_ag: 拖行幽靈船前方的敵人至幽靈船的撞毀地點，敵人在拖行過程中仍可正常動作。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_gho: Drags enemies with the Ghostship towards the crash site. Enemies are still able to perform actions while being dragged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_permanent_invi: 力丸的幻象會做出背刺的動作，但實際上不會有背刺的額外傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_perma: Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_permanent_invi: 背刺的額外傷害無法迴避。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_perma: Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_tricks_of_the_: 立即遁出世界的現實層面並開始對周遭的隨機敵方單位從後方進行普攻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_trick: Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy units from behind in an area around him.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_tricks_of_the_: 潛形刺客並不在乎手段是否齷齪，且擅長背後暗著來。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_trick: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_tricks_of_the_: 移動會立即中斷此技能的作用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_trick: Moving while phased out will cancel the ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prophet_spiri: 死亡先知在她和一名敵方目標之間創造一條靈魂連結，在減緩對方移動速度 %movement_slow%%% 的同時偷取 %movement_slow%%% 移動速度，並每秒汲取 %damage% + 對方最大生命值 %damage_pct%%% 的血量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prop: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining %damage% + %damage_pct%%% Max HP per second and steal %movement_slow%%% movement speed from the enemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prophet_spiri: 無法同時對同一目標多次施放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prop: Cannot cast multiple on same target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_decrepify_Not: 被衰老的友方單位不會受到移動速度減緩。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_re: 敵人可看見偏折環繞於角色身上的特效。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_infern: 末日使者奮力揮動他的燃燒大劍，對敵人造成持續 %ministun_duration% 秒的暈眩並且點燃對方 %burn_duration% 秒，造成持續傷害。持續傷害為每秒基礎值加上對方最大生命的一定百分比。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bring: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for %ministun_duration% seconds and applies a %burn_duration% second burn that deals a base damage plus a percentage of the target's Max HP as damage per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_infern: 被流放的路西法將他翅膀上獨特的火焰施予敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bring: Lucifer shares the fire branding bestowed upon him at the time of his exile.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_infern: %燃燒傷害最大生命值百分比：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_doom_N: 受影響的單位生命值在低於 25% 時可被反補。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bring: Units afflicted by Doom can be denied when their HP drops below 25%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_enrage_aghanim: 降低激怒的冷卻時間並使角色能在被控制的狀態下施放激怒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_enrag: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_curse_of_t: 奧術詛咒的效力會隨著對方受到沉默而擱置。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_c: If an enemy hero affected by Arcane Curse is silenced, Arcane Curse will pause damage, slow and duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_savage_r: 悉拉研習並精通了失落的巨熊部落的所有學識，令自己與野外更加同調。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Sylla studies and masters the arts of the lost Bear Clan, enhancing his attunement with the wild.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_savage_r: 孤行德魯伊和靈熊一起兇猛地咆哮，令附近的敵方單位帶著 %bonus_speed%%% 移動速度加成朝他們基地的方向加速逃跑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear roar fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by %bonus_speed%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_savage_r: 靈熊和孤行德魯伊一起兇猛地咆哮，令附近的敵方單位帶著 %bonus_speed%%% 移動速度加成朝他們基地的方向加速逃跑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear roar fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by %bonus_speed%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_savage_r: 受纏繞的英雄將無法逃跑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: An entangled hero will not be able to move.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_savage_r: 受纏繞的英雄將無法逃跑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: An entangled hero will not be able to move.
Cooldown is shared with Spirit Bear.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_savage_r: 與孤行德魯伊共享冷卻時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Cooldown is shared with Lone Druid.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_flux_Lor: 一股力量囚禁遺跡，其渺小碎片。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden: An infinitesimal fraction of the power which imprisoned the Ancients.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_magnetic: 時間和空間對於有如澤特般古老的存在而言實在微不足道。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden: Time and space are of little consequence to one as old as Zet.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_spark_wr: 澤特原始自我的微小碎片。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden: Lesser fragments of Zet's original self.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden_tempest_: 受到了同類影響，天穹守望者自己反倒體現了它最為抗拒的…盪亂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_arc_warden: Warped by the power of its peers, Arc Warden becomes what it despises most: disharmony.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_fountain_aura_buff: 每秒恢復 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_PERCENTAGE%%% 最大生命及 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_TOTAL_PERCENTAGE%%% 最大魔力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_fountain_: Heals %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_PERCENTAGE%%% HP and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_TOTAL_PERCENTAGE%%% mana per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_death_prophet_spir: 勾魂虹吸只要備有使用次數就可隨時使用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_death_pro: You may cast Spirit Siphon whenever there is a charge available.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lycan_summon_wolve: 攻擊速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% 並受到 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% 持續傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lycan_sum: Reducing attack speed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and taking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% damage.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_rune_arcane_descri: Reduces cooldowns and mana costs by 30%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_arcane_Descri: 減免冷卻時間 30%、魔力消耗 30%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_arca: Reduces cooldowns by 30% and manacosts by 30%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mudgolem_cloak_aura: 此生物用魔抗靈氣保護盟友。對非英雄單位的效力較大。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mudgolem_c: This creature protects its allies with a Magic resistance aura. Creeps are better protected.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_black_dragon_fireba: 遠古黑龍朝地表吐出一顆火球，點燃 %radius% 半徑範圍內的目標達 %duration% 秒。被火球點燃的目標將每秒受到 %damage% 傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_black_drag: The Black Dragon hurls a fire blast on the ground, igniting the area in a %radius% radius for %duration% seconds. Enemies caught in the fire will take %damage% damage per second.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_faerie_fire_De:
使用：吞服

瞬間恢復 %hp_restore% 生命。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_faerie_fire_Lo: 來自寬惠之樹永不熄滅的烈焰，這飄渺的火苗可跨越次元點燃漫天大火。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_faeri: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dragon_lance_D:
被動：及龍長伸

提升遠程普攻距離 %base_attack_range%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_drago:
Passive: Dragon's Reach

Increases attack range of ranged heroes by %base_attack_range%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dragon_lance_N: 多個攻距提升效果不會疊加。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dragon_lance_L: 刃宿飛龍，衝鋒如雷，槍落不留人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_drago: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aether_lens_De:
被動：乙太聚焦

提升道具功能和角色技能的施放距離 %cast_range_bonus%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aethe:
Passive: Aethereal Focus

Increases targeted spell and item cast range by %cast_range_bonus%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aether_lens_Lo: 這面鏡子是一位魔法師臨終前留給病兒的禮物，他用最後一口氣施法，完成鏡子最後的裝飾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aethe: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_iron_talon_Not: 對樹木使用後有著 4 秒的冷卻時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_iron_: Has a 4 second cooldown on Trees.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_iron_talon_Not: 無法對遠古類單位使用。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tranquil_boots:
被動：靜謐

獲得 %bonus_health_health% 每秒生命恢復直到因為做出普攻或承受普攻而進入為期 %break_time% 秒的破損狀態，且於期間降至提供 %broken_movement_speed% 移速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tranq:
Passive: Break

Whenever you attack or are attacked, the bonus %bonus_health_health% HP regen is lost and your movement speed is reduced to %broken_movement_speed% for %break_time% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tranquil_boots: 雖然這雙靴子使穿戴者更加長壽，但並非特別可靠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tranq: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_obsidian_destroyer: 已從敵方單位竊取 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% 點智力屬性。
被歿境毀滅者竊取了 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% 點智力...
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_magnataur_empower_: 基礎傷害提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%%。近戰英雄獲得 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% 波及傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_magnataur: Base damage increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE%%%.  Melee heroes gain %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% cleave damage on hit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_hood_of_defia: 具有一個能抵擋 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_SPELL_DAMAGE_CONSTANT% 魔法傷害的抗魔護盾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_hood: Magic shield that blocks %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_SPELL_DAMAGE_CONSTANT% incoming magic damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_neutral_spell_immu: 此生物對絕大多數的魔法都無感。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_neutral_s: This creature does not feel the effects of most magical spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_burrowstri: 令「掘地穿刺」會對所有擊中的敵方英雄（幻象單位不算）自動注入腐屍毒，並提升此技能的有效距離。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sandking_b: Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit by your Burrowstrike and increases its cast range. Does not apply Caustic Finale to illusions.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_starfall_agh: 令「群星風暴」會自動隨著附近有敵人而被動且免費地觸發一次，冷卻時間 %interval_scepter% 秒。不會透過無法看見蜜拉娜的敵人被動觸發。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mirana_sta: Passively triggers Starstorm every %interval_scepter% seconds. Does not trigger if the enemy doesn't see Mirana.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshaker_enchant: 透過自身施放的方式使用時將施展出未經神杖升級，即沒有跳躍的原版。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshake: Self-cast with Scepter will make it behave in the non-Scepter form, without jumping.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshaker_enchant: 強化圖騰轉變為有著 %distance_scepter% 施放距離的指向式技能，令自己躍向目標地點，然後於落地時完成強化圖騰的施展。透過自身施放的方式使用時將施展出未經神杖升級，即沒有跳躍的原始版。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earthshake: Enchant Totem becomes a %distance_scepter% range ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeker_rupture: 令「割裂」有著 %max_charges_scepter% 次使用次數和 %charge_restore_time_scepter% 秒的補充時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bloodseeke: Grants %max_charges_scepter% charges to Rupture with a %charge_restore_time_scepter% seconds replenish time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spirit_electr: 令「電子渦流」從單體技變為影響風暴之靈周遭敵方單位的範圍技。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_storm_spir: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_degen_au: 無法影響到具有技能免疫狀態的單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight: Does not affect Spell Immune units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_weaver_time_lapse_N: 時光倒流可用於逃脫投射物。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_supernova_m: 神杖摧毀所需攻擊次數：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_purifying_fl: 降低冷卻時間並改良其施放時間點。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_oracle_pur: Reduces cooldown and improves cast point.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyvern_arcti: 令「極寒燒灼」變成不再有持續時間限制的開關類技能，開啟時每秒消耗魔力，且允許極寒燒灼的負面效果對同目標重覆施加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_winter_wyv: Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining mana every second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_frostnova_slo: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，攻擊速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_fros: Movement speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_chainfrost_sl: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，攻擊速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_chai: Movement speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_hurricane_pik: 可無視距離限制對目標進行普攻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_hurr: Can attack the target without range restrictions.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tower_aura_bonus_D: 護甲提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% 點，每秒生命恢復提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tower_aur: Armor increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% and health regeneration by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade_mail_Not: 若原始傷害能傷害到技免目標，例如為純粹傷害的話，則刃甲便將能夠對其造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blade: Can pierce Spell Immunity if the original damage type does.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_infused_raindr:
被動：魔法傷害抵擋

在裝備者承受超過 %min_damage% 魔法傷害時觸發並消耗 1 點充能來擋下該次傷害中的 %magic_damage_block%。

備有 %initial_charges% 點初始充能並隨充能耗盡時自動消失。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_infus:
Passive: Magical Damage Block

Consumes a charge to block %magic_damage_block% magic damage from damage instances over %min_damage% damage.

Comes with %initial_charges% charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_infused_raindr: 每次受傷最多觸發和消耗一點能量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_infus: Uses at most one charge per damage instance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_infused_raindr: 蘊含魔法保護力的自然元素。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bloodthorn_Des:
主動：靈魂撕裂

沉默目標單位 %silence_duration% 秒，並使對方於沉默期間承受的傷害有 %silence_damage_percent%%% 將隨著沉默結束轉為二次魔法傷害。

同時，我方於期間對目標做出的所有普攻將具真實打擊效果，且有 %tooltip_crit_chance%%% 機率造成 %target_crit_multiplier%%% 的暴擊傷害。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blood:
Active: Soul Rend

Silences a target for %silence_duration% seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional %silence_damage_percent%%% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magical damage.

All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and %tooltip_crit_chance%%% chance to crit for %target_crit_multiplier%%% damage.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bloodthorn_Lor: 死者臨終前的每次掙扎，都讓這把褻瀆之刃咬得更深。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blood: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_echo_sabre_Des:
被動：回響打擊

近戰普攻能夠迅速地連擊兩次。兩次攻擊均會造成為幅 %movement_slow%%% 的移速減緩效果 %slow_duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_echo_:
Passive: Echo Strike

Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a %movement_slow%%% movement slow for %slow_duration% seconds on each strike.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_echo_sabre_Lor: 回響魔法滿盈的軍刀，敏捷似錯覺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_echo_: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_blight_stone_D:
被動：次級腐蝕

普攻會降低目標 %corruption_armor% 護甲 %corruption_duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_bligh:
Passive: Lesser Corruption

Your attacks reduce the target's armor by %corruption_armor% for %corruption_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_blight_stone_L: 一顆從戮盡之地挖掘出的喪膽之石。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_bligh: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_wind_lace_Desc: 多個風繚緞帶的移速加成效果不會疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_wind_: Bonuses from multiple Wind Laces do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_wind_lace_Lore: 風撫足跟，彈指之間上戰場。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_wind_: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_tome_of_knowle:
使用：啟迪

立即獲得 %xp_bonus% 經驗值。經驗量在最初的兩本之後將隨著我方隊伍每使用一本而多 %xp_per_use%。

我方已用：%customval_team_tomes_used%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_tome_:
Use: Enlighten

Grants you %xp_bonus% experience plus %xp_per_use% per tome consumed by your team after the first two.

Tomes Used By Team: %customval_team_tomes_used%
That which raises beast to man and man to god.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_hurricane_pike:
主動：颶風驅力

對敵方單位使用時，令自己和目標推離彼此 %enemy_length% 距離，接著讓施放者在接下來的 %range_duration% 秒或 %max_attacks% 次普攻間可帶著 %bonus_attack_speed% 攻速加成無視距離對目標進行普攻。

對自己或友方單位施放的作用同原力法杖。

對我方施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
對敵方施放距離：%cast_range_enemy%\n

被動：及龍長伸

提升遠程普攻距離 %base_attack_range%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_hurri:
Active: Hurricane Thrust

Pushes you and target enemy %enemy_length% units away from each other, and for %range_duration% seconds, allows you to make %max_attacks% attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +%bonus_attack_speed% attack speed.

Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.

Allied Range: %abilitycastrange%
Enemy Range: %cast_range_enemy%\n

Passive: Dragon's Reach

Increases attack range of ranged heroes by %base_attack_range%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_hurricane_pike: 一把傳奇長茅，曾為古代飛龍騎士的皇家象徵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_hurri: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_hurricane_pike: 自身施放將會使颶風長矛推移自己。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_hurri: Self-cast will use Hurricane Pike on yourself.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_hurricane_pike: 颶風長矛不會打斷目標的動作。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_hurri: Hurricane Pike doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_hurricane_pike: 無法對位於時間結界或黑洞內，或是處於決鬥狀態的單位產生作用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_hurri: Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_radar_Description: 掃描地圖上任一半徑 900 大的區域 8 秒鐘，指出該區域是否有敵方英雄。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_radar_Desc: Scans a targeted 900 AoE for 8 seconds. Indicates whether there are enemy heroes in that area during the 8 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_river_painter_: 使用此道具來將藥劑倒入河中，令河水變為液態鉻，持續 %paint_duration% 秒。<font color='#FF5555'>此物品將從您的軍械庫存貨中消耗一次用度。若於效力結束前被藥效更強的河水藥瓶覆蓋，該次的使用次數將不作計算。</font>河水藥瓶必需要在軍械庫中備有至少一次用額才能使用。用額不會隨著此道具在遊戲內被賣掉、被丟下、或被摧毀而耗用，僅會隨著成功改變河水而消耗。藥效較低的河水藥劑無法覆蓋藥效較高者。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_river: Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into liquid chrome for %paint_duration% seconds. <font color='#FF5555'>Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration.</font> Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_river_painter2: 使用此道具來將藥劑倒入河中，令河水變得乾涸，持續 %paint_duration% 秒。<font color='#FF5555'>此物品將從您的軍械庫存貨中消耗一次用度。若再效力結束前被藥效更強的河水藥瓶覆蓋，則使用次數不作計算。</font>河水藥瓶必需要在軍械庫中備有至少一次用額才能使用。用額不會隨著此道具在遊戲內被賣掉、被丟下、或被摧毀而耗用，僅會隨著成功改變河水而消耗。藥效較低的河水藥劑無法覆蓋藥效較高者。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_river: Pour this serum into the river to dry up the water for %paint_duration% seconds. <font color='#FF5555'>Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect . Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration.</font> Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.
