Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_meat_hook_agh: 降低冷卻時間並提升傷害。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter_gush_agh: 使「巨浪」成為指向式範圍技，並降低冷卻時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tidehunter: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tinker_heat_seeking: 提升「熱導引飛彈」的目標數。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_holy_persuasio: 令「神聖信念」可對遠古野怪使用。能夠招降遠古野怪數量與「上帝之手」的等級一致。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_holy_: Allows Holy Persuasion to target Ancient Creeps, maximum one per level of Hand of God.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_spirit_b: 令「靈熊」不再有著普攻限制，也不會和主人一起死。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_undying_decay_aghan: 提升每次竊取的力量數。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristleback_viscous: 令「黏稠鼻液」的使用方式從瞄準目標改為無需目標的瞬發，自動朝有效範圍內的所有敵人施放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristlebac: Viscous Nasal Goo becomes a no target area of effect ability, applying to all enemies within range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_minefield_s: 令「雷區路標」能夠藏匿近接式地雷、麻痺陷阱，和遙控地雷，使其不受敵方真實視野所揭露。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_mi: Allows Minefield Sign to hide any Proximity Mines, Stasis Traps, and Remote Mines in an area around the sign from True Sight.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bloodseeker_ruptur: 割裂只要備有使用次數就可隨時使用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bloodseek: You may cast Rupture whenever there is a charge available.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_attribute_b: 每點技能點數提升所有屬性
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_at: Improves all attributes per point spent
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_abyssal_underlord_: 獲得 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% 點額外攻擊力。
孽主正在傳送至此單位中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_abyssal_u: Underlord is teleporting to this unit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tower_aura_Descrip: 鄰近友方英雄的護甲已提升。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tower_aur: Armor of nearby friendly heroes increased.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_pudge_flesh_heap_D: 被動給予帕吉額外的魔法抗性，並且每當擊殺敵方英雄或者附近有敵方英雄死亡時，帕吉都將獲得額外力量屬性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_pudge_fle: Gives Pudge bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_windrunner_shackle: 被風行者箭上的粗繩牢牢捕獲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_windrunne: Bound by thick ropes from Windranger's ensnaring arrow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flying_courier: 在戰爭的機運中翱翔的可靠坐騎。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_flyin: The faithful mount upon which soar the fortunes of battle.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_dust_: One may hide visage, but never volume.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_smoke_of_decei: 行騙江湖的巫師梅汀對奧術唯一算得上貢獻之物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_smoke: The charlatan wizard Myrddin's only true contribution to the arcane arts.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_filler_ability_Desc: 啟動後釋放靈氣，恢復靈氣有效範圍內友方單位的生命及魔力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_filler_abi: Generates an aura that provides increased health and mana regeneration to nearby allies when activated.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_filler_ability_Note: 滑鼠右鍵點擊來使用療壇。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_filler_abi: Right click the Shrine to activate.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_filler_ability_Note: 提升每分鐘恢復速率，生命增加 2 點，魔力增加 1 點。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_filler_abi: Regeneration values increase by +2/1 health/mana per minute.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_filler_heal_Descri: 每秒恢復 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% 點生命與 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT_UNIQUE% 魔力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_filler_he: Heals %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% hp and restores %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT_UNIQUE% mana per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_spell_shie: 令「咒法護盾」每隔 %scepter_cooldown% 秒阻擋和反彈一次大部分的鎖定性法術。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_s: Causes Spell Shield to passively block and reflect a targeted spell once every %scepter_cooldown% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_spir: 令「靈魂之矛」放出的精神體會向附近敵人彈跳。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_la: Causes Spirit Lance to bounce on nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_cloud_Descript: 在場上的任何一處創造閃電雲。閃電雲會自動朝附近敵人施放「雷霆」。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_cloud: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_tricks_of_the_: 提升持續時間，並使這招能夠朝一名友方英雄施放，於作用期間躲藏在對方身上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_riki_trick: Increases duration, attacks, cast range and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hunter_shuri: 使「投擲手裏劍」冷卻時間降低、施放距離提升，且會附帶「忍技」的效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bounty_hun: Upgrades Shuriken Toss. Applies Jinada to it, reduces cooldown and increases cast range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_natural: 星體之魂不在時，護甲降低效果及魔抗降低效果均由上古泰坦施加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_tita: When the Astral Spirit isn't present, both the armor and magic armor reduction is centered around Elder Titan.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_natural: 星體之魂不在時，護甲降低效果及魔抗降低效果均由上古泰坦施加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_tita: When the Astral Spirit isn't present, both the armor and magic armor reduction is centered around Elder Titan.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_natural: 將萬物退回初始狀態，降低周遭敵方單位的基礎護甲及魔法抗性。護甲降低效果由本尊施加，魔抗降低效果由星體之魂施加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_tita: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units. The armor reduction is centered around the hero, while the magic armor reduction is centered around Astral Spirit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_titan_natural: 上古泰坦大手一揮，萬象猶如創世之初。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_elder_tita: As it was at the beginning, Elder Titan makes it so again.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_land_mines_: 近接式地雷的觸發範圍不可被重疊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_la: Cannot be placed within active AoE of another Proximity Mine.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_tree_da: 齊天大聖躍上樹頂伺機而動。處於樹頂時將可施展「乾坤之躍」技能。若齊天大聖的腳下樹木被毀，他將摔落地面且被暈眩 4 秒。同時，受到源自玩家或羅煞的傷害將令此技能進入冷卻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: Monkey King jumps to a tree and perches atop it. While perched, he gains the Primal Spring ability-a channeled leap attack. If Monkey King's tree is destroyed, he falls and is stunned for 4 seconds. Taking damage from player controlled units or Roshan while on the ground puts Tree Dance on cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_tree_da: 孫悟空靈敏地於樹梢間跳躍，似近猶遠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: Sun Wukong dances nimbly along the treetop canopy, always just out of arm's reach.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_tree_da: 樹舞冷卻時間從落地時開始計算。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: Tree Dance cooldown starts upon landing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_primal_: 齊天大聖自樹頂的伏匿點躍下，依據蓄力時間長短對目標範圍內的敵人造成傷害以及移動速度減緩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: Monkey King springs out from his tree perch, damaging and slowing enemies in the area where he lands. Damage and slow amounts are in proportion to channel duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_primal_: 孫悟空從安全的藏身處縱身一躍深入敵陣，下手毫不留情。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: Leaping from the safety of cover into the midst of his enemies, Sun Wukong attacks without mercy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_boundle: 齊天大聖將金箍棒變大並用它重擊大地，對打擊路徑上的敵人造成暈眩效果還有基於自己普攻傷害的暴擊傷害。如意打擊不會落空。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: Monkey King enlarges his staff and slams it against the ground, stunning enemies in a line and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Has True Strike.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_boundle: 傳奇的金箍棒伸縮自如，任何人都逃不出齊天大聖的手掌心。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: The legendary Jingu Bang grows to match its master's will, ensuring no enemy can escape the Monkey King's reach.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_jingu_m: 齊天大聖的普攻會對敵方英雄造成金箍棒法減幅，同一英雄身上的金箍棒法減幅將隨著累積 4 層後轉變為 4 層金箍棒法增幅給齊天大聖，每層使齊天大聖的普攻傷害有所提升並會附帶生命吸取效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: Monkey King's attacks awaken the Jingu Bang's power. Upon the fourth hit on the same enemy hero, Monkey King earns four charged attacks that have bonus damage and lifesteal.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_jingu_m: 金箍棒無時無刻與主人的情緒同步，神力隨孫悟空的高漲戰意爆發。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: Always sensitive to the moods of its master, the Jingu Bang radiates power when Sun Wukong's combat fervor is on full display.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_jingu_m: 如意打擊可計入金箍棒法減幅的攻擊次數。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: Hitting an enemy with Boundless Strike adds to the hit counter.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_monkey_king_boundl: 被齊天大聖的金箍棒暈眩
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_monkey_ki: Stunned by Monkey King's Boundless Strike
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_monkey_king_quadru: 普攻傷害有所提升並附帶生命吸取效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: Reverts Monkey King's shape to his original form.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_wukongs: 齊天大聖將一簇猴毛吹散於場上，向目標區域派遣一個陣列的猴子士兵在各自的崗位上以固定的速率向鄰近敵方英雄進行同等於本尊的普攻，猴子士兵不會疊加金箍棒法。同時，齊天大聖的護甲將於期間有所提升。本尊死亡或出界將使陣列提前結束。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: Monkey King creates a circular formation of soldiers that spread out from his position. If Monkey King leaves the area his soldiers disperse. The soldiers have Monkey King's attack and only target heroes. Monkey King is granted bonus armor for the spell's duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_wukongs: 齊天大聖拔下一簇毛吹向敵人，變出無數分身。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: Monkey King rips out a tuft of fur to blow at his enemies, charging each strand to transform into a copy of himself.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_wukongs: 猴子士兵不會獲得金箍棒法增幅效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: Soldiers do not receive Jingu Mastery bonuses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: +{s:value} 霜凍魔盾每秒生命恢復
普攻會造成 {s:value}% 攻移雙緩
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Attacks Apply {s:value}% MS and AS Slow
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 地獄火巨人獲得 80% 魔抗
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: 80% Magic Resistance for Chaotic Offering Golems
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 魔法靈彈穿透技能免疫
+{s:value} 秒閃電風暴緩速持續時間
{s:value} 倍龍族血統生命恢復/護甲
+{s:value} 秒骨隱步攻速加成時間
實相裂痕可穿透技能免疫
+{s:value} 秒電子渦流牽引持續時間
奧術天球魔力轉傷害比率 +{s:value}
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mirana_starfall_sc: 就緒後，敵人接近時群星風暴會自動施放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mirana_st: Starstorm can automatically cast when charged.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_elder_tit: Reducing base magic damage resistance and armor by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%%.
Reducing base magic damage resistance by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spawnlord_aura_Desc: 為附近友方單位提供生命吸取效果和生命恢復。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spawnlord_: Gives lifesteal and health regeneration to nearby allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_spawnlord_aura_bon: 提供 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% 生命吸取效果及每秒恢復 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% 點生命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_spawnlord: Provides %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% lifesteal and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% hp per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spawnlord_master_fr: 令下次普攻會僵化目標，造成纏繞效果和每秒 %damage% 的持續傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spawnlord_: Causes the next attack to petrify the enemy, rooting them and dealing %damage% damage per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_spawnlord_master_f: 此單位受到纏繞並每秒持續損失 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% 點生命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_spawnlord: Unit is rooted and is damaged %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% hp per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spawnlord_master_st: 重跺大地，傷害周遭敵人，並使其基礎護甲降低 %armor_reduction_pct%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spawnlord_: Stomps the ground, dealing damage to nearby units and reducing their base physical armor by %armor_reduction_pct%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_spawnlord_master_s: 此單位的基礎護甲為 -%fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS% 點。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bottle_Note1: 信使會因為攜帶未滿的魔瓶而降低 30% 移速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bottl: If Bottle does not have full charges and is placed on a courier, the courier's movement speed will be slowed by 30%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knight_phanta: 使「混沌亂象」的冷卻降低、混沌亂象傷害承受率降低，並能對友方英雄施放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knig: Creates an illusion of allied heroes. Creates an additional illusion for Chaos Knight as well.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_monkey_ki: Fell out of a tree; stunned
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_phantom_lancer_pha: 透過幻影奔馳提升敏捷屬性。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_attack_slow_d: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，攻擊速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_atta: Movement speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_necrolyte_sadist_a: 降低附近敵人移動速度，並提升自身受到的恢復效果及魔法傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_necrolyte: Slowing nearby enemies and amplifying your healing while taking increased magic damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_recipe_cyclone: Eul 的神聖法杖設計圖
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_recipe_armlet: 莫爾迪基安臂章設計圖
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: +{s:value}% 授予力量傷害/波及傷害
幽冥守衛浮動傷害倍數 +{s:value}
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tower_armor_bonus_: 防禦塔的護甲將隨著周遭有越多敵方英雄而提升。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tower_arm: Tower armor increases the more enemy heroes are nearby.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_eye_of_the_st: 將優先攻擊靜電連接目標。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_razor_eye_: Eye of the Storm will prioritize striking static linked heroes.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_sha: Causes Shallow Grave to be an AoE spell.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_glaives_of: 令「智慧之刃」可穿透技能免疫狀態，並對受沉默的敵人多造成 100% 的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_g: Causes Glaives to pierce Spell Immunity and deal 100% more damage against silenced units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_destroyer_: 神杖使用次數補充時間：
令「星體禁錮」能累積使用次數。傷害會疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_d: Grants charges to Astral Imprisonment. Damage areas stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_shockwave: 提升「震波」的行進速度和有效距離，並使其會在抵達盡頭後原路返回，造成二次傷害和移速減緩效果。返回那次的傷害對小兵減半。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_: Increases travel distance and speed, and causes Shockwave to come back. Return wave slows units, but deals half damage to creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_wukongs: 猴子士兵無法運用碎顱重擊和深淵重擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: Soldiers do not copy Basher or Abyssal.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 死亡時召喚出一隻地獄火巨人
烈焰焚身變純傷並可穿透技免
觸發重生時釋放冥火爆擊
地磁牽引可影響友方英雄
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_obsidian_destroyer: 星體禁錮只要備有使用次數就可隨時使用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_obsidian_: You may cast Astral Imprisonment whenever there is a charge available.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_windrunne: Unseen but for the hindering gust in your wake.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_assau: Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_enchanted_mang: 按下此道具在道具欄中對應的熱鍵前先按住【Ctrl 鍵】即可接著以滑鼠游標點擊隊友來向隊友使用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_encha: Hold Control to use on a nearby allied hero.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_power: Power Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, or a Robe of the Magi.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_power: The attack speed bonus from multiple Power Treads does not stack.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necronomicon_archer: 移除在目標身上的正面效果增幅，同時造成移速減緩效果。\n\n驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_necronomic: Removes positive buffs from enemies and slow their movement speed.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_adaptive_: 變體精靈召喚他所有的元素形成大浪擊潰對手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_adaptive_: 變體精靈召喚他所有的元素形成大浪擊潰對手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_bramble: 暗黑柳仙在目標區域創造出由一叢叢荊棘構成的迷宮，令觸及荊棘的敵人受到纏繞和持續傷害。荊棘迷宮在施放後需要經過 %initial_creation_delay% 秒的形成延遲後才會開始作用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willo: Dark Willow creates a maze of brambles that grow in the target area after %initial_creation_delay% seconds.  Enemies that walk into a bramble are rooted and take damage over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_bramble: 精靈界域無所不在，等著把你我拖進去……
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willo: The fae realm exists all around you, merely waiting to draw you in...
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_shadow_: 暗黑柳仙回歸暗影界，於期間處於無法被選為目標的不可指定狀態。此狀態會隨著自己做出普攻而破除，且若是由此法破除的，則該次普攻將會帶有攻擊距離加成，以及根據在暗影界域停留多久而定的額外魔法傷害；此額外魔傷越久越高，於停留 %max_damage_duration% 秒後達最大值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willo: Dark Willow recedes into the shadows, becoming untargetable.  Her next attack has increased attack range and deals bonus magic damage, and will end Shadow Realm. Damage scales based on how long she remains under the effects of Shadow Realm, the maximum being reached after %max_damage_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_shadow_: 最有可能傷害你的東西是肉眼看不見的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willo: What you can't see will most definitely hurt you.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_cursed_: 暗黑柳仙對目標施加一道古老仙咒。在生效延遲後，使目標與附近敵人暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willo: Dark Willow casts an ancient fae curse on the target. After a delay, the target and nearby enemies are stunned.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_cursed_: 沒人告訴過你嗎？不要和精靈打交道……
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willo: Didn't anyone ever tell you? Never strike a deal with a fairy...
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_terrori: 暗黑柳仙釋放她的寵物精靈去恐懾敵人。短暫延遲過後，目標區域內的所有敵人將因恐懼而朝他們的基地方向加速逃跑。恐懾不能和擾害同時發動。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willo: Dark Willow releases her pet wisp to terrorize her enemies. After a short delay, all enemies in the target area become fearful and run toward their home fountain. Terrorize cannot be used while Bedlam is active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_terrori: 你以為自己很了解恐懼嗎？傑克斯會讓你真正認識這個字……
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willo: You think you know the first thing about fear? Jex'll show you what that word truly means...
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_bedlam_: 暗黑柳仙釋放出她的寵物精靈在自己身旁迅速巡繞，對附近的敵人進行攻擊。擾害不能和恐懾同時發動。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willo: Dark Willow's pet wisp roams around her for the duration, rapidly attacking nearby enemies.  Bedlam cannot be used while Terrorize is active.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_bedlam_: 請原諒我的朋友傑克斯，他真的太愛殺戮了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willo: You'll have to excuse my friend Jex. He's really into murder.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dark_willow_brambl: 受到纏繞，無法進行移動。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dark_willow_shadow: 無法被選為目標，並為下次攻擊累積魔法傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dark_will: Untargetable and gaining bonus magic damage.
Running to home base away from Dark Willow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dark_willow_bedlam: 寵物精靈於身旁巡繞，攻擊附近敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dark_will: A wisp swirls around Dark Willow and attacks enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_swashbuck: 向量式瞄準。穿心劍客沿線衝刺，接著朝指定方向迅速刺擊一定次數，傷害路徑上的所有敵人。\n\n具一定機率觸發幸運一擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_: Vector Targeted. Pangolier dashes along the target line, then slashes all enemies in the drawn direction with several quick swipes.\n\nLucky Shot has a chance to activate from this damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_swashbuck: 穿心劍客的劍可是比他的舌頭還滑溜。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_: The Pangolier's blade is even nimbler than his tongue.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_shield_cr: 穿心劍客縮為圓球，向他目前位置的前方往空中一躍緊接著猛擊地面，傷害範圍內的所有敵人，同時依照擊中的敵方英雄數量暫時獲得承受傷害減免效果。\n\n若在隆隆滾雷作用期間施放，遁甲衝撞的位移狀態將持續更久，進而可以越過更大的障礙。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_: Pangolier jumps in the air and slams back to the ground in front of his current position, damaging all enemies in a radius. For each enemy hero hit, he gains a percentage of incoming damage reduction for a short time.\n\nForward movement is maintained if Shield Crash is used while Rolling Thunder is active, and allows Rolling Thunder to clear walls or cliffs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_shield_cr: 最適合穿心劍客的舞台就是敵陣中央。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_: Only in the midst of his enemies does the Pangolier truly thrive.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_heartpier: 穿心劍客完美識破敵人的舉動，靈巧地引領劍鋒穿越對方防禦。普攻將帶有一定機率可使自身攻擊在短暫延遲過後無視目標護甲，並減緩目標移速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_: Pangolier reads his enemies perfectly, deftly slipping his blade past defenses. Each attack has a chance to negate enemy armor and slow the target for a duration, activating after a short delay.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_heartpier: 那些蠢蛋對真正的護甲一無所知……
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_: These fools know nothing of real armor...
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_gyroshell: 祖先只想保護自己，對穿心劍客來說這可是大好機會……
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_: Where his ancestors sought only refuge, the Pangolier saw opportunity...
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_gyroshell: 唐特潘林何時停止，全憑心情。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_: Donté Panlin stops when he pleases.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_pangolier_heartpie: 使護甲無效並降低移動速度 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%。

攻擊有 {s:value}% 機率觸發海象烈拳
謬之誓言賦予隱形狀態
崩裂禁錮驅逐時間 +5 秒
閃電之鏈賦予神杖升級
{s:value} 秒翻滾期間遁甲衝撞冷卻
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aeon_disk_Desc:
被動：連技阻斷

每當裝備者在受到傷害且血量低於 %health_threshold_pct%% 以下時，萬古之盤首先會對裝備者施加強力驅散效果，接著施加一個使傷害輸出和傷害輸入歸零、並提供 %status_resistance%%% 狀態抗性的萬古之盤增幅，增幅持續 %buff_duration% 秒。此被動功能只對源自玩家的傷害有反應。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aeon_:
Passive: Combo Breaker

When you take damage and your health falls below %health_threshold_pct%%, a strong dispel is applied and you gain a %buff_duration% second buff that provides +%status_resistance%%% Status Resistance and causes all damage you deal and are dealt to be reduced to zero. Only triggers on player based damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aeon_disk_lore: 一件很久以前從象牙孵巢偷渡出來的神器，至少這是許多人相信的說法。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_aeon_: A powerful artifact long ago smuggled out of the Ivory Incubarium. Or so many believe.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_kaya_lore: 知名女術士的法杖，在此之前失落了千萬年。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_kaya_: The staff of a renowned sorceress, lost for countless millennia.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_meteor_hammer_:
主動：隕星鎚

持續施法 - 施法完畢後，在 %impact_radius% 範圍大的目標區域砸下大量隕石，首先造成 %stun_duration% 秒的暈眩效果和撞擊傷害，接著對敵方單位與建築造成 %burn_duration% 秒的持續傷害。

對建築撞擊傷害：%impact_damage_buildings%
對建築持續傷害：%burn_dps_buildings%

對非建築撞擊傷害：%impact_damage_units%
對非建築持續傷害：%burn_dps_units%

施法完成時需：%max_duration% 秒。
擊中延遲：%land_time% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_meteo:
Active: Meteor Hammer

CHANNELED - After a successful channel, summons a meteor that strikes a %impact_radius% AoE, stunning enemies for %stun_duration% seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage over time to enemies units and buildings for %burn_duration% seconds.

Building Impact Damage: %impact_damage_buildings%
Building Over Time Damage: %burn_dps_buildings%

Non-Building Impact Damage: %impact_damage_units%
Non-Building Over Time Damage: %burn_dps_units%

Channel Duration: %max_duration% seconds.
Landing Time: %land_time% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_meteor_hammer_: 一把蘊含魔力的鎚子，從一個被劇烈的隕星風暴摧毀的村莊廢墟所發掘出的金屬製成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_meteo: An enchanted hammer forged of metals discovered in the ruins of a village destroyed by a great star storm.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_nullifier_Desc:
主動：廢止

對目標施加一個持續 %mute_duration% 秒的廢止減幅，使對方於期間持續受到驅散，且會隨著每受到一次普攻而承受為幅 %slow_pct%%%、為時 %slow_interval_duration% 秒的移速減緩效果。

\n\n驅散類型：基本
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_nulli:
Active: Nullify

Dispels the target and applies a debuff for %mute_duration% seconds. Continuously dispels the target. Anytime the target is attacked, it will be slowed by %slow_pct%%% for %slow_interval_duration% seconds.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_nullifier_lore: 自一個反向維度輕牽慢引所竊得的危險武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_nulli: A dangerous weapon pilfered from an inverse dimension.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_spirit_vessel_:
主動：精神釋放

釋放靈甕中的精神去影響目標 %duration% 秒。

向敵方目標施放時造成每秒 %soul_damage_amount% + %enemy_hp_drain%%% 目前生命的傷害效果，並令其生命恢復削弱 %hp_regen_reduction_enemy%%%。

向友方目標施放時造成每秒 %soul_heal_amount% 的治療效果。

每當敵方英雄在 %soul_radius% 距離內死亡時獲得使用次數，只有最靠近死亡英雄的精神靈甕會獲得使用次數。

施放距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_spiri:
Active: Soul Release

When used against enemies, it reduces health by %enemy_hp_drain%%% of current health per second, and reduces HP regeneration, healing, lifesteal and spell lifesteal by %hp_regen_reduction_enemy%%%. Deals %soul_damage_amount% damage per second.

When used on allies, it provides %soul_heal_amount% health regeneration per second.

Lasts %duration% seconds.

Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within %soul_radius% units. Only the closest Spirit Vessel to the dying hero will gain a charge.

Cast Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_spirit_vessel_: 出自神之手，用來困住同胞的魂魄。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_spiri: Forged by a god to entrap the soul of another.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_skeleton_king_mort: 目前可轉換的骷髏戰士數量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mirana_le: Number of charges left on Leap.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tiny_toss: Number of charges left on Toss.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_craggy_exterio: 小小揮舞樹樁的模樣可真夠折騰，把地方夷為平地只是剛好順便而已。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_cragg: Sticks and stones break all the bones, with structures sure to follow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_toss_tree_Desc: 擲出拆來的樹木，形同對目標進行一次普攻，並在擊中點附近造成波及傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_toss_: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_toss_tree_Lore: 就連敵人都能「體會」小小對喬木的熱情。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_toss_: Even enemies can share in Tiny's arbor ardor.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dark_will: About to be stunned by Cursed Crown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_refresher_shar:
使用：重置冷卻時間

重置所有道具和技能的冷卻時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_refre:
Use: Reset Cooldowns

Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_refresher_shar: 橫跨一個征戰無數的時代，不朽的戰勝意志永不消退。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_refre: Across an epoch of endless battle, the Immortal's will to triumph never faltered.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_king_morta: 致命打擊骷髏戰士會向冥火爆擊的目標發動攻擊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skeleton_k: Summoned skeletons will automatically attack any unit targeted by Wraithfire Blast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_cloud_lore: 只要是雷神感到不滿的地方，雷雲總是很快的在那雷雲匯聚。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_cloud: Where the thunder god's ire grows, storm clouds quickly gather.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prophet_spiri: 克蘿貝露絲樂意的向他人展示她無法獨自遵循的業途。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_death_prop: Krobelus willingly shows others the path she alone cannot follow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_strafe_Note0: 可閃躲遠程普攻或技能發出的投射物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_str: Can dodge ranged attacks or spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_kaya_note0: 多個由此道具提供的魔耗減免、魔損抗性、和技能增強屬性無法疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_kaya_: Multiple instances of this item do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_void_time_: 對和暗懼者交手的那些人來說，每分每秒似乎都被無限推延著。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_v: For those facing off against Darkterror, each moment seems to stretch into eternity.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_shadowraz: 疊加持續時間於再次疊加時重新計算。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_shadowraz: 減幅持續時間於疊加時刷新。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_shadowraz: 減幅持續時間於疊加時刷新。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_beastmaster_axe_st: 從獸王和聽命於他的單位那承受更多傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_beastmast: Taking amplified damage from Beastmaster and his units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_walrus_kick_lo: 圖斯克雖以烈拳立下名聲，但夠聰明的敵人也一定會慎防圖斯克的勁腳。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_walru: Tusk may have made his name with his fists, but the wise enemy is wary of any and all limbs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_tome_of_knowl: 立即提供 700 經驗，供給量將隨著使用方每使用一本而多 135。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_tome: Immediately grants 700 experience plus 135 per tome previously consumed by your team.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_pangolier_gyroshel: 進行彈跳，其後暫時無法控制方向。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_pangolier: Pangolier ricochets and briefly loses control of his movement.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 靈魂獵手目標死亡時創造 2 個幻象
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Soul Catcher Creates 2 Illusion On Death
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_test_of_faith_: 可對具有技能免疫狀態的友方單位施放。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_holy_persuasio: 神聖信念會使招降目標的魔力值完全恢復。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_holy_: Fully restores the creep's mana upon converting.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ancient_apparition_: 無法影響具有技能免疫狀態的單位。
寒風觸拂增幅持續時間：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_drunken_: 多個不同來源的迴避屬性會以漸減的方式疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_bramble: 纏繞效果不會揭露隱形的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willo: Does not reveal rooted invisible enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_bramble: 無法中斷持續施法動作。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willo: Does not interrupt channeling spells upon rooting.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_shadow_: 可隨著施放逃脫尚在來襲途中的投射物。
需要視野才能施放的技能無法影響到處於暗影界域的暗黑柳仙。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willo: Spells which require vision cannot affect Dark Willow in the Shadow Realm.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_swashbuck: 擊中效果可藉華麗衝刺觸發。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_: Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on Swashbuckle attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_swashbuck: 隆隆滾雷會隨著施放華麗衝刺而提前終止。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_: Casting Swashbuckle during Rolling Thunder ends Rolling Thunder.
Does not proc when attacking Roshan or buildings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_gyroshell: 可在一次施放中多次影響同一名敵人，不過得待前次的暈眩效果結束後才行。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_: Enemies can be stunned multiple times per use, but cannot be affected a subsequent time until the previous stun duration ends.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令該技能隨著施放在閃躍起點創造一個不可控的幻象。閃躍幻象的傷害承受率為 {s:incoming_damage}%，傷害輸出率為 {s:outgoing_damage}%，持續 {s:illusion_duration} 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: After blinking, an uncontrollable illusion is created at Anti-Mage's original location.  Deals {s:outgoing_damage}% less damage, takes {s:incoming_damage}% damage, and lasts {s:illusion_duration} seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令該技能在一次施放中以左右各 30 度之扇形偏差多投射 2 枝神聖之箭矢。無法重複擊中同一名目標。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: The extra arrows are launched in a cone shape, 30 degrees to the left and right of the original arrow, and cannot hit the same target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令該技能在一次施放中多放 1 枚奪魂投射物。多的那枚會打向施放距離內的隨機一名敵方目標，優先瞄準英雄。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: A second Soul Assumption is launched towards a random enemy unit within the cast range, prioritizing Heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令該技能一併對所有擊中的敵方單位施加一次效力為基本的驅散效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Applies a basic dispel on all enemies hit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令該技能在後方 {s:value} 距離處產生第二堵複製之牆。兩堵牆各會產生幻象。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: A second Wall of Replica is created {s:value} units behind the first wall.  Illusions are independent for each Wall.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令該技能隨著擊中敵方英雄在擊中點後方 100 範圍內產生當下等級的瘟疫守衛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: The wards are based on the current level of Plague Ward and spawned within 100 range of the impacted Hero, on opposite sides.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令該技能擊中的敵人一併被施效者普攻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Enemies hit by Waveform are also instantly attacked by Morphling.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 虛弱作用期間，竊得的攻擊速度將加給災禍元素。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Bane gains attack speed equal to the attack speed stolen for the duration of Enfeeble.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令該技能在施放當下對施放者自己施加一次效力為基本的驅散效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Applies a basic dispel to Templar Assassin.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令該技能向四面八方釋出總計 12 道的超震聲波。無法重複擊中同一名目標。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Releases 12 Deafening Blasts around Invoker in a circular pattern.  An enemy can only be hit once per cast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令自己做出的普攻也有相同機率觸發反擊螺旋。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Your own attacks against enemy units also have a chance to trigger Counter Helix.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令該技能在一次施放中多放 1 枚灼熱之箭，打向技能施放距離內的隨機一名敵方單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: When using Searing Arrows, a second Searing Arrow targets a random enemy within the spell's range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 不影響移速減緩效果的持續時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: The slow is still applied for the same duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 使自己有 {s:dodge_chance_pct}% 機率完全避免傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Grants a {s:dodge_chance_pct}% chance to avoid damage entirely.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令該技能於作用期間每 {s:value} 距離自動留下一個殘影。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Every {s:value} distance travelled in Ball Lightning creates a Static Remnant.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令該技能另原目標外也能將地面當成投擲目的地。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Toss can target the ground as well as enemy units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 能在暈眩時施放，並對巨魔戰將施加一次強力驅散。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Can be cast while stunned and applies a strong dispel to Troll Warlord.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令該技能多影響 2 個敵方目標，對象為原目標附近 400 範圍內同樣具有魔力值的單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Automatically targets additional enemy units with a mana pool within 400 distance around the original target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 不影響暈眩效果的持續時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: The duration of the stun is not affected.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令藉由該技能做出的所有普攻投射物都能附帶擊中效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Allows on-hit effects to apply to the secondary attacks from Split Shot.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 使施效者的移速在該技能作用期間無法低於 550 。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: While Exorcism is active, Death Prophet moves at 550 movement speed and cannot be slowed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令該技能在一次施放中多放 2 枚窒息之刃投射物，打向施放範圍內可見的隨機一名敵方單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Launches a two extra Stifling Daggers towards random visible enemies within the cast range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令該技能的隱形效果除了被真實視野所揭露之外，均不會因受效者做出的任何動作而破除。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: No actions take Riki out of invisibility, only revealed by sources of True Sight.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令自己做出的普攻也有相同機率觸發海象烈拳。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Walrus Punch gains a chance to be triggered on normal attacks, independent of mana cost or cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令該技能一併對施放目標施加隱形效果（有著為期 0.6 秒的隱形延遲）。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: The target of False Promise also becomes invisible for the duration (with a 0.6 second fade time).
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 使自己每 {s:value} 秒一次向所有被該技能繫住者自動做出普攻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Puck instantly attacks all enemies while affected by Dream Coil, every {s:value} seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 使自己同步攻擊該技能鏈結目標的攻擊目標。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: While tethered to a friendly Hero, each time that Hero attacks, Io will attack the same target automatically.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 令閃電之鏈的鏈結目標於鏈結期間獲得阿哈利姆神杖升級。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: While tethered to a friendly Hero, that Hero gains its Aghanim's Scepter ability upgrades for the duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sandking_sand_stor: 移速降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，且做出的普攻有 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE%%% 機率落空。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sandking_: Movement speed slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, and outgoing attacks have a %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MISS_PERCENTAGE%%% chance to miss.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_templar_assassin_p: 目前備有的靈能陷阱數量。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_night_stalker_hunt: 成為飛行單位，具地形穿越能力。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_wisp_tether_scepte: 藉由閃電之鏈獲得阿哈利姆神杖升級。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_wisp_teth: Receiving Aghanim's Scepter upgrade during Tether.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shredder_timber_ch: 受到伐木鉤鏈牽引並傷害路徑上的任何敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_shredder_: Damaging any enemy in your path.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_aeon_disk_buf: 此單位輸出的所有傷害以及輸入於此單位的所有傷害均歸零。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_aeon: All incoming and outgoing damage negated.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_abyssal_blade_: 多個傷害抵擋效果即使有著不同來源仍不疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_abyss: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_of_the_do: 支配頭盔所控制的單位會因為此道具出售而死亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_helm_: Selling Helm of the Dominator will cause dominated units to die.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ward_dispenser: 按下此道具在道具欄中對應的熱鍵前先按住【Ctrl 鍵】即可接著以滑鼠游標點擊隊友來分享一個守衛給對方。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ward_: Hold Control to give one ward to an allied hero.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_stacked_neutral_De: 此野怪已因經過堆疊而含有額外的擊殺金錢獎勵。此額外金錢得藉由堆疊者的隊友領取，且僅對堆疊者有效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_stacked_n: Killing this stacked creep will provide bonus gold to the stacker.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 惡魔赦令帶給自身虛靈效果
+{s:value} 秒冥火爆擊緩速持續時間
縛足之霜有 {s:value} 施效範圍
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_morphling_replicat: 表示變體精靈何時變回原型。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_morphling: Indicates when Morphling will transform back into his native form.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_rune_super_arcane_: Reduces cooldowns and mana costs by 60%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_flying_haste_descripti: 提升至最大速度，並能夠行越樹木和峭壁。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_rune_flying_haste_: Increases movement speed to maximum, can path through trees and cliffs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_super_illusion_descrip: 召喚出 4 個有著本尊英雄 35% 攻擊力的幻象。近戰幻象承受的傷害為本尊的 200%，遠程幻象承受的傷害則為本尊的 300%。幻象持續 75 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_rune_super_illusio: Conjures 4 illusions of your hero which deal 35% damage. Melee illusions take 200% damage. Ranged illusions take 300% damage. Illusions last 75 seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_persistent_invisibilit: 進入為期 45 秒的隱形狀態。此狀態將隨著做出普攻、施放技能或者使用道具而暫時破除。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_rune_persistent_in: Become invisible for 45 seconds. Invisibility will be re-applied after attacking or using an ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_rune_super_regeneration_des: 恢復至最大生命和魔力。療效不會因受傷而中斷或補滿而停止。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_rune_super_regener: Regenerates health and mana to maximum.  Does not break on damage, or end when full.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_flying_haste_: 提升至最大速度，並能夠行越樹木和峭壁。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_flyi: Movement speed increased to maximum, can path through trees and cliffs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_super_invis_D: 此隱形狀態將隨著做出普攻、施放技能或者使用道具而暫時破除。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_supe: Invisibility will be re-applied after attacking or using an ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_super_regen_D: 每秒恢復 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% 生命和 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% 魔力。療效不會因受傷而中斷或補滿而停止。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rune_supe: Regenerating %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% HP and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% mana per second.  Does not break on damage, or end when full.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_super_blink_De:
主動：閃躍

傳送至目標位置。有效距離 %blink_range%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_super:
Active: Blink

Teleport to a target point up to %blink_range% units away.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_super_blink_Lo: 傳說中這塊大陸上來去如風的刺客使用的匕首。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_super: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 沸血之矛變純傷並可穿透技免
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pugna_decr: Can be used on your Nether Ward.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_dark_art: 撇出一道墨跡，對路徑上的敵人造成傷害和緩速效果。傷害將隨著每擊中一名敵人而遞增。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke: Grimstroke paints a path of ink with his brush, damaging and slowing enemies. The damage is increased with each enemy the ink hits.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_dark_art: 天涯墨客揮灑的墨汁汲取於死去族人化作的墨池，其中的腐蝕之力將吞噬所有攫獲的敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke: The corruptive force of Grimstroke's ink, drawn from the reservoir of his fallen people, consumes any enemy caught in its path.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstroke_dark_ar: 此單位的移動速度降低。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstrok: This unit has slowed movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_ink_crea: 釋放出一個鬼魂去糾纏目標，造成傷害和沉默效果。鬼魂擁有次數制血量並可被普攻消滅。若鬼魂直到糾纏完畢都未被擊殺，鬼魂將進一步撕裂目標去造成更多傷害，並刷新此技能的冷卻。\n\n來自英雄的攻擊將計為 3 次。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke: Summons a phantom that moves quickly towards the target, latching to it when she arrives. Once latched, the phantom damages and silences. If she survives the full latch duration she rends her victim for heavy damage and refreshes Phantom's Embrace's cooldown.\n\nHero attacks against the phantom count as 3 attacks each.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_ink_crea: 天涯墨客不為族人的衰亡感到悲傷，只有想到姚薇，他最摯愛的女子時，心中才會漫起一絲思念。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke: Grimstroke holds no sorrow for the downfall of his people. Only for Yaovhi, she who was most dear to him, does he feel even a semblance of longing.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstroke_ink_cre: 此單位被鬼魂糾纏，承受持續性傷害和沉默效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstrok: A phantom is silencing and damaging this unit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_spirit_w: 用墨汁覆蓋自己或一名友方單位 %buff_duration% 秒，令其於期間獲得移速加成且持續對鄰近敵人造成墨鬚傷害。時效結束後，墨汁噴發，基於墨鬚存在於任何英雄附近的時間長短，對目標位置造成範圍傷害和暈眩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke: Grimstroke shrouds an allied unit in ink, increasing its movement speed. Enemies in range of the allied unit are damaged with inky tendrils over time. After %buff_duration% seconds it triggers, applying damage and stun in an area around the unit in proportion to how how long ink tendril was near any hero.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_spirit_w: 高漲的墨潮對天涯墨客來說已不具滅頂的威脅，他便能自由操控力量的墨鬚。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke: Now that the rise of the ink tide no longer threatens to overwhelm Grimstroke, its tendrils of power are never far from his hand.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstroke_spirit_: 此單位具有移速加成並且持續傷害附近敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstrok: This unit has increased movement speed and is damaging nearby enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_soul_cha: 把目標敵方英雄和施效範圍內與其最近的另一名友方英雄連結在一起，使他們無法遠離彼此。任一方受到何種瞄準單位的技能影響，另一方也會受到同樣的影響。若魂結在持續時間結束前斷開，原目標將被與其最近的友方英雄連結。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke: Binds a targeted enemy hero to its nearest allied hero within the bind radius, preventing both from moving away from each other. Any unit-targeted ability that either bound hero receives also gets cast on the other hero. If the bind is broken before the duration expires, the initial target will be bound to its nearest allied hero in the radius.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_soul_cha: 飛昇之人皆為燼州城的受選之子，因著自己的靈魂與受命守護之族人的靈魂相連結而獲得無限的力量。在他親族滅絕後的那些年，天涯墨客發現了此連結儀式更為邪惡的用途…
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke: The Ascended were chosen sons of Ashkavor, granted immense power by the bonds forged between their own souls and those they were charged with protecting. In the years that followed the ruination of his kin, Grimstroke discovered much more sinister applications for the binding rituals...
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_soul_cha: 受影響者將承受著拘束效果，也因此無法進行閃躍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke: Affected units are leashed, and prevented from blinking.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstroke_soul_ch: 與另一個單位連接並綁定受拘束。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_grimstrok: Bound to another unit and leashed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tpscroll_2_Des:
使用：傳送

經過 %tooltip_channel_time% 秒的持續施法後，將您傳送至目標友方建築、單位、或英雄。

雙擊以直接傳送至我方泉源。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tpscr:
Use: Teleport

After channeling for %tooltip_channel_time% seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building, unit or hero.

Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tpscroll_2_Not: 若有多名英雄選擇了同樣的目的地進行傳送，則傳送所需時間將隨著每多一位後繼傳送者而增加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tpscr: If multiple heroes teleport to the same location in succession, the channeling time will be increased for each successive hero.
What a hero really truly needs.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_ink_crea: 鬼魂將隨著目標於糾纏期間死亡而返回。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke: The phantom will return if the target dies during the latch.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_ink_crea: 鬼魂會隨著目標在糾纏期間死亡而返回。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke: The phantom will return if the target dies during the latch.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_soul_cha: 在被連結者身上取得視野。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke: Provides vision of both leashed units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_counterspe: 被動地提供魔抗。可主動施放，在自己身上施加一道反咒法護盾，完美抵擋和反彈任何受到的鎖定性法術。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_c: Passively grants you magic resistance. Can be activated to create an anti-magic shell around you that sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead of affecting you.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_antimage_countersp: 令所有指定性法術被完美抵擋和反彈。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_antimage_: Causes all spells that target you to be blocked and reflected onto the enemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_comm: 令復仇幻象得以運用本尊的所有技能（但無法使用道具）。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulsp: Causes the Vengeance Illusion to be able to cast abilities (but not items).
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_vengefulspirit_neth: 神杖使用次數補充時間：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_bad_juju_Des: 被動縮短自身技能及物品的冷卻時間。任何時候只要施放技能，都會降低所有周遭敵人的護甲。減幅可疊加，同時刷新持續時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_bad: Passively reduces cooldowns on your abilities and items. Anytime you cast a spell, all nearby enemies will have their armor reduced. Debuff stacks and refreshes duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_dark_sorcery_D: 特定次數的攻擊可獲得攻擊速度加成，每次攻擊皆可吸收一定百分比的魔力。施放需花費當下生命的一定百分比，攻擊次數用完即結束，最多維持 %duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_dark_: Grants you bonus attack speed for a limited number of attacks, draining a percentage of mana for each hit. Costs a percentage of current health to cast. Lasts up to %duration% seconds or when the attack count is consumed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_aura_Des: 為周遭友方單位提供靈氣，令他們的普攻能夠減緩移動速度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost: Allied Aura. Causes all nearby ally attacks to slow enemy movement speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_shield_D: 為目標施加一個持續 %interval% 秒的霜凍魔盾，進一步減輕外來普攻造成的傷害，同時每 %interval% 秒一次對周遭敵人造成小幅的傷害及緩速效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost: Applies a magical frost shield around the target, reducing damage from attacks against you. While the shield is active, ice magic will affect nearby enemy units every %interval% seconds, dealing minor damage and slowing them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost_shield_L: 最初是為了保護自己的人身安全而生成的魔盾，艾斯瑞安用來圍繞在自身周圍的霜凍魔法至此只隨著時間變得更加霜寒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_frost: First conceived of to protect him in his mortal years, the frost magic that Ethreain weaves around himself has only grown colder with time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_frost_shield_: 降低外來普攻的物理傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_fros: Reducing physical attack damage against you.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lich_sini: You are helpless against Lich's Sinister Gaze!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_slardar_bash_activ: 每 4 次普攻觸發一次。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_slardar_b: Applies a bash every four attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_call_of: 獸王喚來一隻箭豬助他戰鬥。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaste: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_call_of: 自兒時就開始與野生動物為伍之後，獸王便已習得如何在需要的時候召喚牠們為他效力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaste: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_call_of: 獸王派出一隻隱形的偵查鷹去探測一個區域。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaste: Beastmaster sends an invisible Hawk to scout an area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaster_call_of: 自兒時就開始與野生動物為伍之後，獸王便已習得如何在需要的時候召喚牠們為他效力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_beastmaste: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_burning_army: 向量式瞄準，派出一隊燃燒的骷髏射手去構成弓箭陣。骷髏射手會在各自的崗位上以目前等級的灼熱之箭去攻擊周遭敵方英雄，並可被敵方英雄以兩次普攻擊殺。骷髏射手的普攻距離與克林克茲相同，普攻傷害為克林克茲的一定百分比。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_bur: Clinkz summons an army of fiery ranged skeleton archers. Archers are immobile and die with 2 attacks from a hero. Skeletons deal a percentage of Clinkz' damage, use his current Searing Arrows ability and attack only heroes. Attack range is equal to Clinkz's attack range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_pacify_D: 一定期間內使受影響的敵人所造成的技能傷害減少。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight: Causes affected enemies to deal less spell damage for a duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight_pacify_L: 當面對著犧牲之淵時，普利斯特對魔法的適應力得到了歷練和認可。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_omniknight: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_inner_fire_D: 哈斯卡在盛怒之下擊退周遭所有敵人一定距離，同時造成傷害和繳械效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_huskar_inn: In a fiery rage, knocks all nearby enemies away from you to a fixed distance, dealing damage and disarming them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_divine_favor_D: 被動地產生靈氣，提升受效者的每秒生命恢復和生命恢復率。\n\n可對友方單位主動施放，來在傳送延遲後將其傳到陳的身邊，也可對自我施放來用同樣的方式傳來所有自己聽命於自己的單位。被傳送者受到傷害就會停止傳送。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chen_divin: Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration and amplifies all health restore by a percentage.\n\nCan be cast on allies to teleport them to Chen. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen will be teleported to him. Taking damage will dispel the buff.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_chen_divine_favor_: 每秒生命恢復提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT%、所有生命恢復加深 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HP_REGEN_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_chen_divi: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% health regen, and amplifying all regen by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HP_REGEN_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE%%%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_bull: 裂魂人獲得移動速度加成和狀態抗性加成，衝進敵人之間。可在暗影衝刺過程中施放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_bre: Spirit Breaker gains movement speed and status resistance to ram through enemies. Can be used while charging.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_spirit_breaker_bul: 移動速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%、狀態抗性提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATUS_RESISTANCE_STACKING%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_spirit_br: Gaining %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% movement speed and %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATUS_RESISTANCE_STACKING%%% status resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_obsidian_destroyer: 技能傷害會恢復自身魔力並造成緩速效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_obsidian_: Your spell damage steals mana and slows your enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_spirit_b: 靈熊代替孤行德魯伊承受 %damage_share%%% 傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Spirit Bear absorbs %damage_share%%% of the damage dealt to Lone Druid.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid_spirit_l: 將孤行德魯伊與靈熊繫在一起，提升雙方攻速，且靈熊造成的傷害將會治療孤行德魯伊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lone_druid: Links Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear, increasing the attack speed of both and causing damage dealt by the Spirit Bear to heal Lone Druid.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_druid_spirit_: 靈熊代替承受瞄準你的一定百分比的傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_drui: A percentage of damage targeted at you is being taken by your Spirit Bear instead.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_druid_spirit_: 攻擊速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%，且造成的傷害將有部分會轉換成治療給夥伴。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_drui: Granting %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% attack speed, and granting a percentage of damage dealt as health to your companion.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_cinder_b: 奧尤社解決所有問題的辦法 - 再乾一杯！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster_cinder_b: 用酒精浸泡目標區域，使敵人減緩移速、做出的普攻有一定機率會反而打自己，並且會隨著受到超過 %ignite_threshold% 的技能傷害而額外承受燃燒傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_brewmaster: Drenches an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignited once they take any spell damage. Duration is increased by %extra_duration% seconds when ignited.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_brewmaster_cinder_: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，且將隨著承受技能傷害而燃燒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_brewmaste: Slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%. Will ignite if upon taking spell damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_chaos_knight_reali: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，攻擊速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_chaos_kni: Movement decreased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and attack speed decreased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_ransack_Descr: 米波的每次普攻都會竊取生命，以相同數值治療場上其他米波。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_meepo_rans: Steals health from the enemy with each strike and heals all other Meepos for that amount.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_arcane_supre: 拉比克精通奧術，能提高技能造成的傷害，並延長技能造成的效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_arc: Rubick's mastery of the arcane allows him to deal more spell damage and create spells that last longer on enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_arcane_supre: 不是所有魔導師都能成為大魔導師……
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rubick_arc: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_keeper_of_the_ligh: 範圍內的敵人被閃爍的光芒催眠而無法動彈。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_keeper_of: Enemies within the radius are hypnotized by the flickering light and unable to act.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_troll_war: Troll Warlord has you in his sights!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_troll_warlord_bers: 你被盛怒的巨魔誘捕了！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_troll_war: You're ensared by an enraged Troll!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_return_Note: 對防禦塔的反攻效力減半。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_re: Tower attacks grant half a charge.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_centaur_return_dama: 普攻傷害加成持續時間：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_centaur_return_cou: 主動施放以依照反攻層數獲得普攻傷害加成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_centaur_r: Activate to grant additional attack damage per stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_tag_team_Descr: 在身邊產生一個持續 %debuff_duration% 秒的摔角場，友方英雄在場內進行的普通攻擊將對敵人造成額外的物理傷害、攻速減緩、移速減緩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_tag_t: Temporarily applies a negative debuff aura around you, causing enemies that are attacked under it to take bonus physical damage and reduced movement speed. Lasts %debuff_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tusk_tag_team_aura: 摔角場內的敵人在承受普通攻擊時，將受到額外物理傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_tusk_tag_: Slowing enemies and causing attacks against them to deal more physical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_du: 決鬥獲勝後自動對自身施放發憤圖強。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_com: Winning a Duel automatically casts Press the Attack on yourself.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_lucky_sho: 穿心劍客任憑機運決定敵人的生死，普攻有一定機率造成繳械和護甲降低效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_: Pangolier rolls the dice and lets fate decide the outcome for his enemies. Grants a chance to slow, apply a Disarm and reduce armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_50_cr: 普攻有 {s:crit_chance}% 機率打出 {s:crit_multiplier}% 暴傷
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: {s:value} 秒隱匿攻擊得重擊效果
迷霧纏繞有 {s:value} 施效範圍
地獄詛咒可影響防禦塔
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_holy_locket_De:
主動：充能

依照累積的能量點數瞬間補充生命和魔力。每點補充 %restore_per_charge% 生命和魔力。

能量會每當周圍 %charge_radius% 範圍內有可見的敵人施放技能而自動獲得，最多累積 %max_charges% 點。 \n\n

被動：神聖祝福

治療輸出加深 %heal_increase%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_holy_:
Active: Energy Charge

Target an allied unit to instantly restore %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored.

Max %max_charges% charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability. \n\n

Passive: Holy Blessing

Amplifies heals you provide by %heal_increase%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tpscroll_Note1: 纏繞效果可預防或打斷傳送。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tpscr: Teleport can be prevented or canceled by Root abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_slark_essence_shif: 永久竊得 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_AGILITY_BONUS% 點敏捷屬性。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_tag_team_Note0: 來自友方英雄、圖斯克、圖斯克的屬下單位的普通攻擊將造成額外傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_tag_t: Affects attacks from allied heroes, Tusk or any of his units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_slark_essence_shif: 永久損失 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_AGILITY_BONUS% 點敏捷屬性。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_filler_ability_Note: 每秒額外恢復 2% 最大生命及魔力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_filler_abi: Additionally restores 2% health/mana pool per second.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_throw_snow: 向一名友軍或敵人丟雪球。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_t: Throw a snowball at an ally or enemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_throw_snow: 在絕佳的溫度下手工精心捏製。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_t: Hand crafted at the perfect temperature.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_s: He'll stay friends as long as he can.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_decorate_t: 為任何樹木進行節慶裝飾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_d: Give any tree a delightfully seasonal touch.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_decorate_t: 連最為血腥的戰場也適用的節慶裝飾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_d: Festive trappings for even the bloodiest of battlefields.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_f: Shoot a firework into the air.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_festive_fi: 沒什麼比爆破更具節慶氣息！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_f: There's nothing more festive than explosions!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2018_throw: 向一名敵人丟雪球，造成傷害並暈眩周圍所有敵人。\n\n註：所有凌霜庇境消耗品共享冷卻時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2: Throw a snowball at an enemy, damaging and stunning all enemy units around it.\n\nNote: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2018_throw: 來顆石心雪皮的調皮冰球吧！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2: Enjoy a bold, rocky center with a packed-ice crust!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2018_summo: 召喚一尊歡樂雪人來嘲諷周遭敵人。\n\n註：所有凌霜庇境消耗品共享冷卻時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2: Summons a snowman that taunts nearby enemies.\n\nNote: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2018_summo: 他真是令人無可抗拒地親切！
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2018_decor: 在一顆樹木上裝飾節慶飾品，用閃爍的繽紛色彩傷害周遭敵人。\n\n註：所有凌霜庇境消耗品共享冷卻時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2: Decorate a tree with blinking lights that damage nearby enemies.\n\nNote: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2018_decor: 誰能料到幾顆閃爍的燈泡如此致命？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2: Who knew a few twinkling lights could be so deadly?
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2018_festi: 可以向地圖上的任一目標區域發射煙火，對區域內敵人造成傷害和失明效果，並提供 10 秒的視野。\n\n註：所有凌霜庇境消耗品共享冷卻時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2: Fires a global range firework that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies, blinding them, and providing vision for 10 seconds.\n\nNote: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2018_festi: 沒什麼比煙火更具節慶氣息！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_frostivus2: There's nothing more festive than explosions!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_sven_warcry_strengt: 力量屬性轉護盾厚度倍數：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bane_fiends_grip_D: 因魔攫動彈不得並持續受到傷害，並於期間每 %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% 秒損失 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% 最大魔力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_bane_fien: Disabled and taking damage. Losing %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP%%% of max mana per %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% seconds.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_sniper_ta: Attack range doubled for one shot.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_necrolyte_heartsto: 暫時提升 %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% 每秒生命恢復和 %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% 每秒魔力恢復。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_necrolyte: Temporarily gaining %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT% health regen and %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_CONSTANT% mana regen per second.
Frozen in the face of the Reaper.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi_item_mul: 每次作用時令角色技能或道具功能多重施放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ogre_magi: Able to cast abilities and items multiple times with each use.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_spear_Descript: 馬爾斯極度精準地擲出他的傳奇戰矛，對擊中的每個敵方單位造成傷害。第一名被擊中的敵方英雄會被刺穿並擊退。若英雄被貫穿後撞上樹木、建築，或峭壁，將被釘住並受到暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_spear: Mars throws his legendary Spear with deadly precision, damaging each enemy unit it strikes. The first enemy hero it hits is skewered on the spear, pushing it back. If a skewered hero hits a tree, building, or cliff, they will be impaled to it and stunned.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_spear_Lore: 傳奇的戰神之矛依舊散發著爐神之火的熱力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_spear: The legendary Spear of Mars still glows with the heat of the forge god's fires.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mars_spear_stun_De: 受到持續 %fMODIFIER_PROPERTY_TOOLTIP% 秒的暈眩效果。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_gods_rebuke_Lo: 世上沒有一個戰士在受到戰神厲斥的創傷後，還能屹立不搖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_gods_: There isn't a warrior alive who can stand unmoved by the sting of Mars' rebuke.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_gods_rebuke_No: 擊中效果可藉神的厲斥觸發。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_gods_: Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on God's Rebuke attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_bulwark_Descri:
馬爾斯手持巨盾，當前方和兩側受擊時，能抵擋一部分的物理攻擊。

可切換開關，開啟時固定盾牌面對的方向，使自己無法普攻並降低移動速度，但有 %redirect_chance%%% 機率能夠代替周遭友方完整承受遠程普攻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_bulwa:
Mars wields his massive shield to block a portion of each physical attack when hit from the front or sides.

Can be toggled, removing Mars's ability to attack, and locking the direction he is facing. When active, reduces movement speed and re-directs %redirect_chance%%% of the attack projectiles aimed at Mars's allies towards Mars instead.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_bulwark_Lore: 唯有愚蠢至極之輩才膽敢與戰神正面交鋒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_bulwa: Only the very foolish dare to fight fair with the god of war.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mars_bulwark_Descr: 抵擋 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE%%% 來自前方的普攻傷害，兩側防禦效力減半。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mars_bulw: Blocking %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE%%% of each physical attack from the front, half from the sides.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_arena_of_blood: 經過短暫的形成時間，馬爾斯召喚灰燼軍團的不死戰士，在目標地點圍成一圈角鬥場阻礙敵人的通行與攻擊，並用戰矛刺向場內靠近邊緣的敵人，造成傷害並將之擊退。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_arena: After a short formation time, Mars summons an arena lined with the undead warriors of the Ash Legion, who block enemy attacks and movement. Enemy heroes near the inside edge of the arena will be attacked by spears, dealing damage and knocking them back.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_arena_of_blood: 灰燼軍團由世上最頂尖的一群戰士組成，是唯一一支考驗過馬爾斯戰技的軍隊，雖已死去多時，成員們依舊熱衷於戰鬥，更欣然聽命於當初將他們擊倒的人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_mars_arena: The long-dead members of the Ash Legion, assembled from the finest warriors to ever test the might of Mars, still revel in the thrill of combat, gladly beholden to the hand that fell them for as long as he so commands.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mars_arena_of_bloo: 阻擋敵人的攻擊與通行。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_high_five_Descripti: 把你的手（或能當作手的附肢）舉起來！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_high_five_: Throw your hand (or handy appendage) in the air!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_summon_ti9: 沒有人能抗拒天蛇的傻氣魅力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_s: No one can resist the sky snake's goofy charms.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_t: Dig around the map for buried treasure!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_ti9_monkey: 就算你不想給敵人難看，憨猴也不會讓他們好看。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_t: He'll fling filth at your enemies so you don't have to.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_ti9_banner: 在戰場上插下您的個人戰旗來宣示勢力版圖！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_t: Plant your personal battle standard to mark this battleground as yours!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ti9_monkey_poop_De: 那隻猴子對您的行為表示不悅。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_ti9_monke: The monkey has expressed its displeasure with your actions.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_mana_void_: 使「魔力虛空破」的暈眩時間提升，並令在此技暈眩狀態下死亡的敵方英雄技能組中冷卻最久的技能將在重生時被加上冷卻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_antimage_m: Increases stun duration. Mana Void kills cause the enemy's highest cooldown ability to take longer to cool down upon respawning.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner_windrun_: 使「風行」能累積 %max_charges% 次使用次數，提升風行的移速加成效力，並使風行加成一併解鎖移速上限。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_windrunner: Grants %max_charges% charges to Windrun, increases movement speed, and removes movement speed limit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_assassin_bl: 使自身技能將隨著擊殺英雄而刷新冷卻。使「朦朧」主動施放生效延遲降至 0 秒，主動施放冷卻降低，且會在施放時為自身施加驅散效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_as: Causes Blur to have instant cast time and applies a dispel. Anytime you get a hero kill, your abilities are refreshed. Reduces Blur cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_grow_aghanim_d: 賦予新技能「樹轟」：持續施法，以特定頻率把自己周圍的隨機樹木丟向目標區域去造成帶有範圍的普攻傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_grow_: Grants you a new channeling ability, Tree Volley. Tiny throws a random tree within range towards the targeted aoe. Deals Tiny's attack damage plus a bonus to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_tree_channel_D: 持續施法，以特定頻率把自己周圍的隨機樹木丟向目標區域去造成帶有範圍且傷害較高的普攻傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_tree_: Tiny throws random trees within range towards the targeted aoe. Deals Tiny's attack damage plus a bonus to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_knight_elder: 使目前的「真龍形態」等級提升 1。新增第四形態「黑龍」。黑龍使真龍型態的攻擊距離加成提升 150、腐蝕龍息每秒傷害提升 10、濺燒龍息倍率提升 40%、及寒霜龍息緩速效力提升 20%，並帶來 30% 魔抗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dragon_kni: Increases the level of your ultimate. Adds a 4th level, Black Dragon. Black Dragon has 50% more Corrosive Damage, Splash Damage and Slow amount. Increases attack range by 600 and grants 30% Magic resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_broodmother_spin_we: 神杖升級蜘蛛絲庫存上限：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_summon_wolves: 使每三波兵中會有一波有三隻靈狼。這些靈狼的移速與線兵相同，不受你控制，且被視為是你的單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_summ: Causes one of the three creep waves to include three wolves. You cannot control the wolves, but they are considered your units. These wolves have the same movement speed as lane creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spirit_fire_r: 使「殘炎」施放距離提升、行進速度提升、備有數量上限提升、魔耗下降。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spir: Increases cast range, initial remnant speed, and maximum charges. Activate Fire Remnant costs less mana.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ember_spirit_fire_r: 神杖升級殘炎累積上限：

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_ursa_overp: Missing an attack still consumes a charge of Overpower.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter_flak_can: 添加一位副砲手，自動向自轉旋翼機附近的敵方目標進行普攻。優先攻擊範圍內距離最遠的單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter: Adds a Side Gunner that at random attacks enemy units near Gyrocopter. Prioritizes furthest unit away within its range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_destroyer_: 對非英雄單位和中立單位無效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_d: Does not damage creeps or neutral units.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_obsidian_destroyer: 所有對敵人造成的傷害均會產生緩速效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_obsidian_: All damage dealt slows enemy movement.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_demon_demoni: 邪惡淨化將持續驅散目標身上的增幅。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_dem: Positive buffs are continously removed from the target for the duration of the Purge.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren_mirror_i: 鏡像無法疊加，既有鏡像將隨著此技能重複施放而被摧毀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_naga_siren: Upon casting, existing Mirror Image illusions are destroyed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_essence_shift: 能量轉移的永久竊取敏捷屬性只要被竊者承受著能量轉移減幅，以及死亡時與斯拉克之間的距離不超過 300 即可觸發。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_esse: To permanently steal Agility, Slark doesn't need to land the killing blow, as long as the enemy hero is killed within 300 range of Slark while having the Essence Shift debuff.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_mage_mysti: 秘法閃焰將隨著範圍內無敵方英雄轉而瞄準敵方的小兵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_skywrath_m: Mystic Flare will damage enemy creeps if no enemy heroes are present.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_death_coil_: 亞巴頓不可用此技能來反補自己。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_abaddon_de: Abaddon can not kill himself with this skill.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_geomag: 地磁牽引也可對友方蔓生單位施放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: Geomagnetic Grip can also target allied creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_stone_: 賦予一項新技能：岩像魔咒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spir: Grants a new ability: Enchant Remnant.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_conjure: 魔喚鏡像的外觀與一般幻象不同，且敵人也看的到此差異。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblad: Illusions created by Conjure Image are visually different for enemies.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: Hit charges on enemies cannot be dispelled.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_gyroshell: 穿心劍客在隆隆滾雷狀態下即使承受控制效果仍會持續滾動，繼續對觸及的敵人造成傷害、擊退、和暈眩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pangolier_: If Pangolier is disabled while rolling, he will continue to stun and knock enemies that come within range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_soul_cha: 賦予新技能「墨繪」：瞄準一名敵方英雄，依照對方創造出一個汙墨幻象。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke: Grants you a new ability, Dark Portrait. Creates an ink illusion of a target enemy hero.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_gravekeepers: 周遭 %radius% 範圍內的傭獸將一併獲得守墓者斗篷目前層數的效力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_visage_gra: Familiars within %radius% range of Visage will receive the current damage reduction from Gravekeeper's Cloak.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_alchemist_scepter_: 因溶解了阿哈利姆神杖而提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_PREATTACK_BONUS_DAMAGE% 普攻傷害和 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_SPELL_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE%%% 技能增強。

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_eject_Descrip: 吐出肚子內的友方英雄。

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_pudge_swallow_Desc: 將一名友方英雄吞下肚，為其提供治療。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_pudge_swa: Swallowed an allied hero, healing them.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phantom_lancer_phan: 使「幻影奔馳」能夠無視冷卻讓你不斷奔馳（敏捷加成仍需要冷卻）、敏捷加成的持續時間降低、移除發動最低間距、且提升最遠發動距離。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_tree_grab_Desc: 拆下目標樹木作為武器，在有限的攻擊次數間強化普攻威力，使其提升距離、傷害，並且帶有遍及攻擊路徑的波及傷害。拆下來的樹木可以向目標丟擲，形同隔空做出近戰普攻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_tree_: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_tree_grab_Note: 樹木擲出或攻擊次數用盡後才進入冷卻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_tree_: The cooldown begins when the tree is thrown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_shadow_wave_: 使「暗影波」目標數提升、穿梭範圍提升，且會一併對友方目標造成驅散效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_sha: Increases heal targets, bounce range and dispels each target.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_sinister_gaze_: 在目標範圍施放寒心凝視。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lich_sinis: Casts Sinister Gaze in a target area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_riki_blink_strike_: 閃躍突襲只要備有使用次數就可隨時使用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_riki_blin: You may cast Blink Strike whenever there is a charge available.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_untouch: 賦予新技能「蹦跳」：魅惑魔女向後跳並閃避投射物。並且提升普攻距離。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantres: Grants new ability: Sproink. Enchantress leaps backward and dodges incoming projectiles. Also increases your attack range.
Leaps backward and dodges incoming projectiles.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bringer_infern: 使「地獄烈刃」暈眩時間提升、燃燒時間提升、且會一併造成破勢效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_doom_bring: Increases stun duration, burn duration and applies Break.
