Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_silencer_l: Causes Last Word to become an AoE ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_obsidian_destroyer_: 神智侵蝕能量持續時間：
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lycan_wolf_bite_li: 隨著狼人和狼咬對象在彼此附近而獲得生命吸取效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lycan_wol: Gaining Lifesteal when Lycan and the bitten hero are nearby.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_natures_gras: 瞄準目標地點，在該方位一段距離內創造出一連串藤蔓，使觸及藤蔓的敵人每秒受到傷害和移速減緩效果。每秒傷害和緩速效力將隨著藤蔓有接觸到任何樹木而提升 50%。傷害對小兵和野怪這類蔓生單位只有一半。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_nat: Creates vines towards the target location. Vines slow down and deal damage to enemies that walk through. Vines deal 50% more damage if they touch a tree. Does half damage to creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_pounce_aghani: 使「突襲」能夠累積 %max_charges% 次使用次數，並提升飛躍距離。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_slark_poun: Provides %max_charges% charges and increases pounce range.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_skewer_ag: 降低魔耗及冷卻，並加快施放時間點。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_magnataur_: Lowers cooldown, cast point and manacost.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_techies_land_mines: 您僅能在尚有殘餘數量的情況下放置近接式地雷，數量會依據時間逐漸恢復。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_techies_l: You can only place a Proximity Mine when you have a charge available.  Charges slowly restore over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_void_spirit_aether: 此單位正被牽向一個殘空。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_void_spir: This unit is being pulled towards an Aether Remnant.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_void_spirit_dissimi: 虛無之靈暫時遁入乙太之中，同時創造數個空洞，他能透過空洞來重組自身。在竄出空洞後，他會對區域內所有敵人造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_void_spiri: Void Spirit temporarily fades into the aether, creating a number of portals through which he can reassemble himself. Upon exiting a portal, he damages all enemies in the area.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_void_spirit_astral_: 虛無之靈從目前位置瞬移到目標位置，對移動路徑上的所有敵方單位做出一次普攻，同時對他們施加一個持續 %pop_damage_delay% 秒的虛無印記。印記將造成移速減緩效果，並在截止時引爆造成傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_void_spiri: Void Spirit tears a rift through the astral plane to appear at the target location, attacking all enemies along the path. This attack inflicts a void mark that slows for %pop_damage_delay% seconds and then detonates.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_void_spirit_astral_: 虛步無法觸發普攻波及效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_void_spiri: Astral Step attacks do not cleave.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_void_spir: Number of charges left on Astral Step.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_void_spirit_astral: 移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%，並將隨著緩速效果消失而受傷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_void_spir: Slowed by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE% and will take damage on expiration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_void_spirit_resonan: 虛無之靈以虛無物質纏繞自己，形成一道可抵擋物理傷害的屏障，同時向周圍釋出一道共振波去傷害敵人。此護盾的厚度將隨著周遭的敵方英雄數量增加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_void_spiri: Void Spirit wraps himself in a protective shield that absorbs physical damage and emits a single damaging pulse around him. The shield gains increased damage absorption for each enemy hero the pulse hits.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_void_spirit_resona: 此單位具有能夠抵擋物理傷害的護盾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_void_spir: This unit has a shield that absorbs physical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_void_spirit_planes: 空間轉移 - 特殊攻擊
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 殘空提供真實視野（半徑 {s:value}）
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_scatterbla: 電炎絕手用她的可靠霰彈槍轟出一發散射，對轟到的敵人造成傷害和移速減緩效果。傷害對一定距離以內的敵人多 %point_blank_dmg_bonus_pct%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_s: Snapfire unloads with a wide blast that damages and slows enemies in a cone. Enemies caught at point-blank range take an extra %point_blank_dmg_bonus_pct%%% damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_scatterbla: 老轟是碧婆婆收藏裡的最愛，每當她在外疆之地闖蕩時總會用它作為第一線防衛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_s: A favorite from her collection, Beadie crafted Ol' Rackatee as her first line of defense when she ventured into the Outlands.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_firesnap_c: 電炎絕手給小莫迪或一名隊友餵食一片帶勁餅乾，使他們不自主的向前蹦跳一小段距離，且令蹦跳者著陸區內的敵人受到傷害和暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_f: Snapfire feeds a potent cookie to Mortimer or an ally, causing them to hop a short distance. The hopping unit stuns and damages enemies in the landing zone.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_firesnap_c: 藉由結合了碧婆婆的烹飪技巧以及她對火藥的熱情的祕密配方所製成，這些戰鬥餅乾真的十分帶勁。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_f: With the help of a secret mixture that pairs Beadie's baking skills with her passion for black powder, these battle biscuits pack a punch.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_snapfire_cooki:
使用：吃餅乾

食用來恢復生命。
用滿滿的愛所烤出的蜥龍形餅乾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_snapf: A lizard-shaped cookie that was baked with love.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_lil_shredd: 基礎普攻間隔將於機砲攻擊期間設在 %base_attack_time%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_l: Sets %base_attack_time% base attack rate for the duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_lil_shredd: 攻擊效果可藉小小機砲觸發。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_l: Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on Lil' Shredder attacks.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_lil_shredd: 碧婆婆不斷改良著這款她當時為了轟轟烈烈的脫離幫派所構思出來的設計。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_l: Beadie constantly tinkers with a design she first dreamed up plotting an exodus from her old gang.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_snapfire_lil_shred: 攻擊速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%，普攻附帶攻速減緩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_snapfire_: Attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT% and applying attack speed reduction to the target on hit.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_mortimer_k: 電炎絕手讓小莫迪在 %duration_tooltip% 秒內，持續向前方吐出一團又一團的火痰。火痰在直接命中造成的初始傷害之外還會殘留在擊中點，令接觸到殘留火痰的敵人受到持續傷害和移速減緩效果。火痰有 %min_range% 最小噴吐距離限制。此技能可藉由滑鼠右鍵去調整噴吐位置。技能在作用時將降低自身轉向速率。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_m: Snapfire's friend launches a barrage of firespit globs over %duration_tooltip% seconds. Globs cause impact damage and create pools of firespit, which slow and apply damage over time. Snapfire has a reduced turn rate for the duration and a minimum launch range of %min_range%. Each glob can be targeted with a right click.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_mortimer_k: 可藉由按下「停止鍵」或「堅守原位」、或施放其它技能來停止吐火痰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_m: Can be cancelled by pressing Stop, Hold Position, or using another ability.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_snapfire_magma_bur: 此單位的移動速度受到減緩且受到持續傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_snapfire_: This unit has slowed movement and is taking damage over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 小莫迪之吻移速減緩效力 +{s:value}%
炎電餅乾會恢復 {s:value} 生命
小小機砲改用普攻傷害

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Puck instantly attacks all enemies upon casting Phase Shift, within attack range + 200.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_grove_bow_Desc:

普攻施加減幅，令對方魔抗降低 %magic_resistance_reduction%%。

Reduces magic resistance of the attacked enemy by %magic_resistance_reduction%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_quickening_cha:

縮短所有技能和道具的冷卻時間 %bonus_cooldown%%%。

被動：速度解鎖

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_force:
Active: Force

Dispels the user and pushes them %push_length% units in the direction they are facing.\n

Passive: Speed Unlock

Completely removes the speed limit for the wearer \nMovement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_desolator_2_De:

Your attacks reduce the target's armor by %corruption_armor% for %corruption_duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_desolator_2_No: 護甲降低對建築物也有效。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_phoenix_ash_De:

無效化自身承受的致命傷害，同時恢復一半生命值，並刷新基礎技能的冷卻狀態。鳳凰灰燼將在此功能觸發後消失。

療效將隨著受效者承受來自敵方英雄或羅煞的傷害而喪失。

使用距離：%abilitycastrange%

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_craggy_coat_De: 提升裝備者的護甲，但導致攻擊速度降低。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_cragg: Increases the wearer's armor, while reducing their attack speed.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_greater_faerie:
使用：吞服

瞬間恢復 %hp_restore% 生命。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_timeless_relic: 提升技能傷害以及提升減幅持續時間。

每 %block_cooldown% 秒一次阻擋並反彈鎖定性法術。

Block and reflect most targeted spells back to their caster once every %block_cooldown% seconds.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ironw:

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_royal_jelly_De:
使用：消耗

令使用者獲得永久性的蜂王漿加成，此加成提供 %health_regen% 每秒生命恢復以及 %mana_regen% 每秒魔力恢復。

此加成無法在同一個單位身上疊加。

Use: Consume

Grants a target allied unit a permanent buff that provides +%health_regen% Health Regen and +%mana_regen% Mana Regen.

Does not stack on the same unit.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_tome_of_aghani:

對建築使用，使其於 %duration% 秒間恢復 %heal_percent%%% 最大生命，同時提升 %armor_bonus% 以及具有 +%multishot_count% 分裂攻擊。

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_repair_kit_Descrip: 獲得修繕加成，持續恢復生命並提升護甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_repair_ki: Restoring health and gains bonus armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_mind_breaker_D:

賦予裝備者 %truesight_radius% 範圍大的真實視野來揭露範圍內隱形的敵方單位。\n

Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within %truesight_radius% range of its carrier. \n

Passive: Charge Loss

Loses a charge on death. After all charges are lost, the item disappears.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_spell_prism_De:

縮短所有技能和道具的冷卻時間 %bonus_cooldown%%%。

Passive: Cooldown Reduction

Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by %bonus_cooldown%%%.

瞄準一個單位作為傳送目的地並予以擊退 %knockback_distance% 距離。擊退過程持續 %knockback_duration% 秒。

Targets a unit to teleport to them. Knocks enemies back %knockback_distance% distance and disables them for %knockback_duration% second.

Survive for an extra %duration% seconds after receiving a killing blow.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_helm_of_the_u: 因不死頭盔而死期推延

Targets the ground to plant a mango tree that provides unlimited mango power. The tree generates Enchanted Mangoes every %seconds% seconds, and provides unobstructed vision in the area

Range: %abilitycastrange%

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_ocean_heart_De:

踩水時提升 %water_hp_regen% 每秒生命恢復以及 %water_mp_regen% 每秒魔力恢復。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_ocean:

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_trusty_shovel_:
主動：挖掘

需 %abilitychanneltime% 秒持續施法。
有可能挖到獎賞神符、治療藥膏、一張傳送卷軸或一隻渾身起床氣的地靈。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_trust:
Active: Dig

Channel for %abilitychanneltime% second.
Can find a Bounty Rune, a Flask, a TP Scroll, or an enemy Kobold.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_nether_shawl_D: 提升裝備者得魔抗和技能增強，但導致護甲降低。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_nethe: Increases the wearer's magic resistance and magic damage, while decreasing their armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_dragon_scale_D:

令普攻燃燒敵人 %duration% 秒，每秒造成 %damage_per_sec% 傷害。可影響建築。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_drago:
Passive: Afterburn

Causes attacks to burn the enemy, dealing %damage_per_sec% damage per second for %duration% seconds. Affects buildings.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_dragon_scale_burn_: 因龍皮餘火而受到持續傷害。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_essence_ring_D:

在 %health_gain_duration% 秒加成期間暫時提升 %health_gain% 目前生命及最大生命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_essen:

Increases your current and max health by %health_gain% for %health_gain_duration% seconds.

主動：誘捕

誘捕自己也誘捕目標，持續 %duration% 秒。

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_encha:
Passive: Certain Strike

Empowers your next attack with %bonus_damage% bonus magical damage and True Strike. Ranged Attackers have +%bonus_attack_range% bonus range for the attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_ninja_gear_Des:
主動：孤獨偽裝

為自身施放詭計之霧。

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_illusionsts_ca:
主動：創造幻象

創造一個幻象供你使喚。\n

被動：幻術精通

使你的幻象以及所有聽命於你的單位提升 %attack_damage_aura%%% 傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_illus:
Active: Create Illusion

Creates an image under your control. \n

Increases outgoing damage of all units and illusions controlled by the hero by %attack_damage_aura%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_havoc_hammer_D:
主動：浩劫

擊退周遭 %range% 半徑內的敵人一定距離，並對他們造成持續 %slow_duration% 秒的 %slow%%% 移速減緩效果、以及施放者力量屬性 %nuke_str_dmg% 倍 + %nuke_base_dmg% 的魔法傷害。

Knocks back enemies in %range% range around you, slowing them by %slow%%% for %slow_duration% seconds and dealing %nuke_base_dmg% + %nuke_str_dmg%x your str as magical damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_panic_button_D:
被動：回春

每當裝備者血量低於 %health_threshold%%% 時，魔法燈籠會為裝備者施加強力驅散效果以及恢復 %heal% 生命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_panic:

When the wearer's health falls below %health_threshold%%%, they will receive a hard dispel and be healed for %heal% health.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_ballista_Descr:
被動：擊退

令普攻會擊退敵人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_balli:
Passive: Knockback

Knocks back enemies %knockback_distance% distance and deals %bonus_damage% pure damage with every attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_woodland_strid:
主動：林地跨步

進入為時 %active_duration% 秒的林地跨步狀態，在此狀態下持續在身後種下樹木。樹木持續 %tree_duration% 秒。

被動：樹行步

移除移動速度上限，並使裝備者能夠行越樹木。 多雙靴子的移速加成效果不會疊加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_woodl:
Active: Woodland Stride

Create a path of trees behind you for %active_duration% seconds. Trees last up to %tree_duration% seconds.

Passive: Tree Walking

Removes movement speed limit and allows free pathing through trees. Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_woodland_: Creating a path of trees behind the wearer.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_trident_Descri: 把散華、夜叉、和卡雅結合成三叉戟。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_tride: Combines Sange, Yasha and Kaya together.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_demonicon_Desc:
主動：強力召喚死靈

召喚 6 名 3 級死靈書單位為你作戰 %summon_duration% 秒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_demon:
Active: Greater Demonic Summoning

Summon 2 sets of Level 3 Necronomicon Units that last %summon_duration% seconds. Units have 50% more health and damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_fallen_sky_Des:
主動：墜天

化成隕石傳送至目標地點，於 %land_time% 秒的撞擊延遲後在該處 %impact_radius% 範圍大的區域砸下隕石。隕石會首先造成 %stun_duration% 秒的暈眩效果和撞擊傷害，接著對敵方單位與建築每 %burn_interval% 秒一次造成後續傷害，後續傷害持續 %burn_duration% 秒。

對建築撞擊傷害：%impact_damage_buildings%
對建築後續傷害：%burn_dps_buildings%

對非建築撞擊傷害：%impact_damage_units%
對非建築後續傷害：%burn_dps_units%

有效距離：%abilitycastrange%
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_falle:
Active: Fallen Sky

Transform into a meteor that strikes down at the target area after %land_time% seconds in a %impact_radius% AoE, stunning enemies for %stun_duration% seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage every %burn_interval% seconds to enemy units and buildings for %burn_duration% seconds.

Building Impact Damage: %impact_damage_buildings%
Building Over Time Damage: %burn_dps_buildings%

Non-Building Impact Damage: %impact_damage_units%
Non-Building Over Time Damage: %burn_dps_units%

Range: %abilitycastrange%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_fallen_sky_Not: 不會因為受到傷害而無法使用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_falle: Does not get disabled by incoming damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_pirate_hat_Des:
主動：挖掘

需 %abilitychanneltime% 秒持續施法。
總是找到獎賞神符！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_pirat:
Active: Dig

Channel for %abilitychanneltime% second.
Always finds a Bounty Rune!
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_dimensional_do:
主動：

瞬間傳送至地圖上的任何地方。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_dimen:
Active

Teleport instantly anywhere on the map.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_ex_machina_Des:
主動：重置道具冷卻時間

重置所有道具（刷新法球除外）的冷卻時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_ex_ma:
Active: Reset Item Cooldowns

Reset the cooldown on all items (except Refresher Orb).
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_paladin_sword_:
被動：強力療效

使裝備者的生命恢復、受到的治療、以及生命吸取量皆增強 %bonus_amp%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_palad:
Passive: Greater Healing

Amplifies the wearer's Regeneration, Healing, Lifesteal and Spell Lifesteal by %bonus_amp%%%.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_minotaur_horn_:
主動：小神下凡

進入持續 %duration% 秒的技能免疫狀態。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_minot:
Active: Lesser Avatar

Grants Spell Immunity for %duration% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_orb_of_destruc:
被動：毀滅腐蝕

普攻會降低敵人的護甲和移速。緩速效力取決於裝備者的攻擊類型是近戰還是遠程。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_orb_o:
Passive: Impeding Corruption

Attacks reduce the target's armor and movement speed. Slow amount varies based on whether the wearer is melee or ranged.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_titan_sliver_D: 提升裝備者的普攻傷害、魔法抗性、及狀態抗性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_titan: Increases the wearer's attack damage, magic and status resistance.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vambrace_Descr:
並依據前臂鎧的版本提供不同加成。
 <font color='#ec3d06'>力量：</font> +%bonus_magic_resistance%%% 魔抗 
 <font color='#3ed038'>敏捷：</font> +%bonus_attack_speed% 攻擊速度 
 <font color='#00d9ec'>智力：</font> +%bonus_spell_amp%%% 技能增強
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_vambr:
Also provides one of the following, based on the Vambrace's main attribute:
 <font color='#ec3d06'>Strength:</font> +%bonus_magic_resistance%%% Magic Resistance 
 <font color='#3ed038'>Agility:</font> +%bonus_attack_speed% Attack Speed 
 <font color='#00d9ec'>Intelligence:</font> +%bonus_spell_amp%%% Spell Amp
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_witless_shako_: 提升裝備者的最大生命，但導致最大魔力降低。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_witle: Increases the wearer's max health, while reducing their max mana.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rattletrap_overclo:
移動速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%，攻擊速度提升 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%。

狀態結束後被暈眩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_rattletra:
Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%, attack speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT%.

Will become stunned after duration runs out.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_sun_strike_:
賦予新技能「天火之災難」：藉由對自身施放陽炎衝擊來使用，瞬間在場上每位敵方英雄附近 %cataclysm_min_range%-%cataclysm_max_range% 範圍間各施放 2 道可見的陽炎衝擊。施放後令「陽炎衝擊」進入 %cataclysm_cooldown% 的冷卻。

使召喚師的技能全都再由冰雷火元素各一級來增強一次。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_su:
Adds Cataclysm. Launched when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a %cataclysm_cooldown% second cooldown. Creates 2 visible Sun Strikes within %cataclysm_min_range%-%cataclysm_max_range% range of each enemy hero.

Adds one level to the stats provided by Quas, Wex, and Exort on all Invoked spells.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_druid_true_fo: 變成狂怒巨熊的形態。失去遠程攻擊優勢，但防禦抗性會提升並獲得纏繞盤根以及粉碎效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_lone_drui: Morphed into a raging bear, losing ranged advantage, but gaining increased resistance, Entangling Roots and Demolish.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_treant_leech_seed_: 受到持續傷害。\n移動速度降低 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bo: Attacks made with Astral Step deal a critical strike.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_veil_of_disco: 提升附近友方單位每秒魔力恢復。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_summon_pen: 召喚出一隻到處滑的友善企鵝。每當有英雄與滑行中的企鵝發生碰撞時，企鵝就會提升滑行速度並且延長在場時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_s: Summon a friendly penguin who slides around. Each time a hero bumps the penguin, it gains speed and lasts a bit longer.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_summon_pen: 世界上沒啥東西像企鵝一樣能讓世敵撇開彼此差異一起玩樂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_s: Nothing gets age-old enemies to set aside their differences quite like a penguin to play with.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_summon_pen: 企鵝不會與我方看不到的敵方英雄發生碰撞。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_s: Your team's penguins will pass through enemy heroes that you don't have vision of.
Tokens.dota_hud_error_cookie_target_immobilized: 目標的移動受到強力限制
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 極寒之擁最大生命療效 +{s:value}%
奧術脈衝穿透技能免疫
地磁牽引沉默時間 +{s:value} 秒
動能力場提供真實視野
新月之痕施效範圍及最大距離 +{s:value}
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_sticky_nap: 黏性燃油無需施放者面對目標也能施放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_batrider_s: Sticky napalm does not require turning to cast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knight_chaos_: 附近的幻影會模仿此施法動作。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_chaos_knig: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_swift_sl: 施展一個短促的超究武神霸斬。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_char: 使「暗影衝刺」冷卻時間降低，衝刺移速加成提升。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_bre: Increases Charge of Darkness movement speed and reduces cooldown.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_gobble_up_: 叫小莫迪把鄰近的一名友方小兵或英雄塞進嘴裡，最多塞 %max_time_in_belly% 秒，或趁此時命令莫蒂默把對方向目標地點噴吐過去。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_g: Mortimer gobbles up a creep or an allied hero, which he can then spit towards enemies. The unit stays in his belly up to %max_time_in_belly% seconds.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_gobble_up_: 將隨著被吐出的單位死亡獲得其擊殺獎勵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_g: Snapfire earns the creep's bounty after it has been spat out and died.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_snapfire_gobble_up: 此英雄已吞下一名單位。該單位即使沒藉由「吐出」投射也會隨著吞嚥時間結束而自動脫離。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_snapfire_: This hero has swallowed a unit. If Spit Out is not used, the unit will be ejected when this expires.
This unit is in Mortimer's belly.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_spit_creep: 小莫迪把吞下的單位向目標地點噴吐過去，去對目標區域的敵人造成暈眩效果和初始傷害，並且在該地留下火痰令接觸者受到持續傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_s: Mortimer spits out the unit that's in his mouth, causing impact damage and stun in a large area. The glob leaves a pool of firespit that slows and applies damage over time.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_bad_juju_agh: 使自己隨著施放技能對周遭敵人自動做出普攻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dazzle_bad: Causes all of your abilities to fire an attack at nearby enemies when they are cast.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_void_spirit_dissimi: 使「異化」能夠累積使用次數，且將一併造成沉默效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_void_spiri: Causes Dissimilate to silence and gain two charges.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_void_spirit_resonan: 使「共振波」能夠累積使用次數，且將一併造成沉默效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_void_spiri: Causes Resonant Pulse to silence and gain two charges.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_wrath_of_nat: 「自然之怒」的神杖擊殺產生樹精效果需要一併徵召「自然呼喚」才有用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_furion_wra: Treants for Wrath of Nature Scepter kills will only spawn if you have drafted Nature's Call.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut_omni_sla: 技能徵召模式支援「迅猛斬」。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_juggernaut: Swift Slash available in Ability Draft.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_pudge_dismember_abi: 技能徵召模式支援「肢解」向隊友使用。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_requiem_a: 「靈魂輓歌」需要來自「支配死靈」的靈魂才會有傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nevermore_: Requires drafting Necromastery to do damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_maiden_free: 「極寒領域」的神杖寒霜封禁需要一併徵召「寒霜封禁」才會作用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_crystal_ma: Frostbite must be drafted for Aghanim's Scepter upgrade to work.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_torrent_abil: 技能徵召模式不支援「洪流風暴」；該模式停用了非終極技能的神杖技能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kunkka_tor: Torrent Storm not available in Ability Draft. (Non-ultimate Scepter abilities disabled)
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_static_field_a: 「靜電力場」只能用其它同樣源自宙斯的技能去觸發。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_stati: Only applies damage with other Zeus abilities.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_thundergods_wr: 技能徵召模式雖支援「閃電雲」，但還需要「雷霆」才會有傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_zuus_thund: Nimbus available in Ability Draft, but requires Lightning Bolt to be drafted for damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_tree_grab_abil: 技能徵召模式不支援「樹轟」；該模式停用了非終極技能的神杖技能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tiny_tree_: Tree Volley not available in Ability Draft. (Non-ultimate Scepter abilities disabled)
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_rattletrap_hookshot: 技能徵召模式支援「超頻」。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_void_chron: 虛空假面不需「時間結界」也可在時間結界裡自由活動。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_faceless_v: Faceless Void can move freely within the Chronosphere without drafting Chronosphere and regardless of team.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_assassin_ps: 技能徵召模式支援「靈能投射」。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_templar_as: Psionic Projection available in Ability Draft.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_moon_glaive_ab: 「銀月飛刀」適用所有近戰英雄。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_moon_: Moon Glaives work on all melee heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_eclipse_abilit: 「靈魂輓歌」需要「透徹月光」才會有傷害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_luna_eclip: Must draft Lucent Beam as well to work.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_burning_army: 「燃燒軍團」骷髏射手的灼熱之箭攻擊需要一併徵召「灼熱之箭」才有效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_clinkz_bur: Searing Arrows must be drafted for skeleton archers to have the extra damage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enchantress_untouch: 技能徵召模式支援「蹦跳」。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_haunt_abili: 技能徵召模式支援「鬼影步」。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spectre_ha: Shadow Step available in Ability Draft.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter_flak_can: 技能徵召模式支援「副砲手」。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gyrocopter: Side Gunner available in Ability Draft.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_char: 「暗影衝刺」需要「巨力重擊」才能撞到衝刺路徑途中的其它目標。「暗影衝刺」不需「巨力重擊」也可正常對衝刺目標造成暈眩效果。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_bre: No other units will be hit by Greater Bash if it's not drafted as well. Target of Charge of Darkness will be stunned on impact even without Greater Bash.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_breaker_neth: 「幽冥一擊」的暈眩效果來自「巨力重擊」，額外傷害正常作用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_spirit_bre: Greater Bash must be drafted for stun.  Bonus damage still applies without Greater Bash.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_shapeshift_ab:
技能徵召模式支援「狼咬」。

遠程英雄將在狼咬變形狀態下降低普攻距離，但仍可受到修改普攻距離的技能影響（例如寒冬飛龍的極寒燒灼）。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_lycan_shap:
Wolf Bite available in Ability Draft.

Ranged heroes will lose attack range during Shapeshift, though bonus range abilities can modify that (i.e. Arctic Burn)
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_nyx_assassin_vendet: 技能徵召模式支援「遁穴潛伏」。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_mystic_snake: 「秘術異蛇」的神杖石化效果需要一併徵召「石化凝視」才會作用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_medusa_mys: Stone Gaze must be drafted for Aghanim's Scepter upgrade to work.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_walrus_punch_a: 技能徵召模式支援「海象勁踢」。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tusk_walru: Walrus Kick available in Ability Draft.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_metamor: 技能徵召模式不支援「恐怖波」；該模式停用了非終極技能的神杖技能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblad: Terror Wave not available in Ability Draft. (Non-ultimate Scepter abilities disabled)
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_king_tree_da: 僅適用於技能徵召模式。停留在樹梢時「樹舞」將和「乾坤之躍」替換。玩家將須先返回地面才能再跳至其它樹梢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_monkey_kin: For Ability Draft only, Tree Dance ability swaps with Primal Spring while you are perched on a tree. You can no longer jump to other trees without returning to the ground first.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke_soul_cha: 技能徵召模式支援「汙墨幻象」。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_grimstroke: Dark Portrait available in Ability Draft.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_mortimer_k: 技能徵召模式支援「吞嚥」。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_snapfire_m: Gobble Up available in Ability Draft.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_basher_ability: 「碎顱重擊」可讓裂魂人、虛空假面、斯拉達這三位英雄在技能徵召模式中運用，但將隨著一併徵召了「時間鎖定」而變得無法觸發。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_bashe: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, and Slardar can trigger Bash in Ability Draft. Though if Time Lock is drafted, Bash will not be triggered.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_stealer_infest: 「寄宿」的神杖狂暴增幅需要一併徵召「狂暴」才會作用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_life_steal: Rage buff for Aghanim's Scepter upgrade requires drafting Rage.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_nightmare_abil: 在技能徵召模式中徵召了「夢魘」的英雄將能繞過其沉睡效果轉移及解除機制，至於災禍元素則不需「夢魘」也可照常攻擊沉睡中的單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bane_night: Hero that drafts Nightmare can continue to attack nightmared units. Bane can also attack even if he didn't draft this ability.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_goblins_g: 「化學狂暴」的神杖升級在技能徵召模式中將改為「貪魔之慾」所有。化學狂暴的阿哈利姆神杖升級為：對一名友方英雄使用阿哈利姆神杖來賦予對方所有阿哈利姆神杖加成，同時使自己隨著每給予一位隊友（自己也算）神杖升級而獲得普攻傷害加成和技能增強。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_: Chemical Rage Aghanim's Scepter has been moved to Greevil's Greed for Ability Draft. Use Aghanim's Scepter on an allied hero to grant them all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades. When you have a Scepter of your own, you will gain bonus damage and spell amplification for each gifted Scepter.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_chemical_: 「化學狂暴」的神杖升級在技能徵召模式中將改為「貪魔之慾」所有。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_alchemist_: Chemical Rage Aghanim's Scepter has been moved to Greevil's Greed for Ability Draft. Getting Aghanim's Scepter for Chemical Rage does not grant any bonuses.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_dark_willow_terrori: 此技能將一併賦予「擾害」技能。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 可在超新星狀態下施放烈日炙烤
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_item_spirit_vessel: 所有生命恢復、治療、吸血被削弱 %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_HP_REGEN_AMPLIFY_PERCENTAGE%%%。
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_black_hole_a: 「黑洞」的神杖升級需要「午夜凋零」才會有作用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_enigma_bla: Must draft Midnight Pulse for Scepter upgrade to work.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_24_cr: 普攻有 {s:crit_chance}% 機率打出 {s:crit_multiplier}% 暴傷
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_reinc: 獲得重生能力（冷卻 {s:value} 秒）
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_special_bonus_uniqu: 狂戰士之血每秒生命恢復係數 +{s:value}%
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_cold_snap_a: 召喚師把敵人的熱量抽空至椎心刺骨的地步，使其承受急速冷卻狀態一段時間。此狀態將隨著對方後續受到更多傷害而造成形同暈眩的凍結效果和凍結傷害；會在狀態施加當下先凍結一次。之後凍結雖可反覆觸發，但有具有觸發次數上限，不過觸發間隔下限將隨著技能等級提升而縮短。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_co: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases as the level goes up.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_cold_snap_a: 並非任何傷害都能觸發凍結效果，唯有傷害量超過 %damage_trigger% 的傷害才能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_co: The freeze stun only triggers on damage greater than %damage_trigger% after reductions.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_ghost_walk_: 召喚師操縱冰雷之力纏繞自身，令自己隱形起來。組合出的元素失衡將對對附近敵人持續造成傷害和移速減緩效果，但也會導致自身移速降低。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_gh: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies, and slows Invoker as well based on the level.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_ghost_walk_: 減速效果不會影響到具有技能免疫狀態的單位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_gh: The slow effect does not work on Spell Immune enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_deafening_b: 召喚師在自己前方釋放出一道強力聲波，對所有觸及聲波的敵方單位造成傷害。震波強度之大，受影響者還會隨著傷害被擊退一段時間，隨即再被繳械一段時間。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_invoker_de: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration then disarm their attacks for a duration.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_chakram_ab: 技能徵召模式支援「又一片鋸齒飛輪」。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_c: Second Chakram available in Ability Draft.
Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristleback_bristle: 「鋼背」的被動針刺掃射需要一併徵召「針刺掃射」才會作用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_bristlebac: Quill Spray must be drafted also to release when damage threshold reached.

Tokens.DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_voodoo_mask_De:
被動：技能生命吸取

無論傷害類型，對敵方英雄造成的技能傷害中有 %hero_lifesteal%%% 會轉成自我治療。

技能生命吸取的效力對非英雄單位較少，僅有 %creep_lifesteal%%%。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_voodo:
Passive: Spell Lifesteal

%hero_lifesteal%%% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.

Lifesteal reduced to %creep_lifesteal%%% against creeps.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_treant_ove: Eyes In The Forest available in Ability Draft.
